GE07mbh_03_u:001.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_03_u:001.000-0003_01: oṃ vyāsaṃ vasiṣṭhanaptāraṃ śakteḥ pautram akalmaṣam
GE07mbh_03_u:001.000-0003_04: namo vai brahmanidhaye vāsiṣṭhāya namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.001a: evaṃ dyūtajitāḥ pārthāḥ kopitāś ca durātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.002a: śrāvitāḥ paruṣā vācaḥ sṛjadbhir vairam uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:001.004a: ke cainān anvavartanta prāptān vyasanam uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:001.004c: kimāhārāḥ kimācārāḥ kva ca vāso mahātmanām
GE07mbh_03_u:001.005a: kathaṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi vane teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_03_u:001.006a: kathaṃ ca rājaputrī sā pravarā sarvayoṣitām
GE07mbh_03_u:001.007a: etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ vistareṇa tapodhana
GE07mbh_03_u:001.007e: kathyamānaṃ tvayā vipra paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_03_u:001.008a: evaṃ dyūtajitāḥ pārthāḥ kopitāś ca durātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.010c: rathair anuyayuḥ śīghraiḥ striya ādāya sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.010d-0004_01: tatas te puruṣavyāghrā rathān āsthāya bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:001.011a: vrajatas tān viditvā tu paurāḥ śokābhipīḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.012a: nedam asti kulaṃ sarvaṃ na vayaṃ na ca no gṛhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.013a: no cet kulaṃ na cācāro na dharmo 'rthaḥ kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_03_u:001.015a: neyam asti mahī kṛtsnā yatra duryodhano nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.015c: sādhu gacchāmahe sarve yatra gacchanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.017a: evam uktvānujagmus tān pāṇḍavāṃs te sametya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:001.018a: kva gamiṣyatha bhadraṃ vas tyaktvāsmān duḥkhabhāginaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.018c: vayam apy anuyāsyāmo yatra yūyaṃ gamiṣyatha
GE07mbh_03_u:001.019a: adharmeṇa jitāñ śrutvā yuṣmāṃs tyaktaghṛṇaiḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.019c: udvignāḥ sma bhṛśaṃ sarve nāsmān hātum ihārhatha
GE07mbh_03_u:001.022a: vastram āpas tilān bhūmiṃ gandho vāsayate yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:001.023a: mohajālasya yonir hi mūḍhair eva samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.024a: tasmāt prājñaiś ca vṛddhaiś ca susvabhāvais tapasvibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.024c: sadbhiś ca saha saṃsargaḥ kāryaḥ śamaparāyaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.025a: yeṣāṃ trīṇy avadātāni yonir vidyā ca karma ca
GE07mbh_03_u:001.025c: tān sevet taiḥ samāsyā hi śāstrebhyo 'pi garīyasī
GE07mbh_03_u:001.026a: nirārambhā hy api vayaṃ puṇyaśīleṣu sādhuṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:001.027c: dharmācārāḥ prahīyante na ca sidhyanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.028a: buddhiś ca hīyate puṃsāṃ nīcaiḥ saha samāgamāt
GE07mbh_03_u:001.028c: madhyamair madhyatāṃ yāti śreṣṭhatāṃ yāti cottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.030a: te yuṣmāsu samastāś ca vyastāś caiveha sadguṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.032a: tad ahaṃ bhrātṛsahitaḥ sarvān vijñāpayāmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.033a: bhīṣmaḥ pitāmaho rājā viduro jananī ca me
GE07mbh_03_u:001.033c: suhṛjjanaś ca prāyo me nagare nāgasāhvaye
GE07mbh_03_u:001.035c: svajane nyāsabhūte me kāryā snehānvitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.036a: etad dhi mama kāryāṇāṃ paramaṃ hṛdi saṃsthitam
GE07mbh_03_u:001.036c: sukṛtānena me tuṣṭiḥ satkāraś ca bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:001.037c: cakrur ārtasvaraṃ ghoraṃ hā rājann iti duḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.039a: nivṛtteṣu tu paureṣu rathān āsthāya pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.040a: taṃ te divasaśeṣeṇa vaṭaṃ gatvā tu pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.040c: ūṣus tāṃ rajanīṃ vīrāḥ saṃspṛśya salilaṃ śuci
GE07mbh_03_u:001.040e: udakenaiva tāṃ rātrim ūṣus te duḥkhakarśitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.041a: anujagmuś ca tatraitān snehāt ke cid dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.041e: sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā śuśubhe brahmavādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:001.043d-0006_01: rājā tu bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ tathā sarvaiḥ suhṛdgaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.001e: tān uvāca tato rājā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.003c: parikleśaś ca vo manye dhruvaṃ tatra bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:002.004c: kiṃ punar mām ito viprā nivartadhvaṃ yatheṣṭataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.005a: gatir yā bhavatāṃ rājaṃs tāṃ vayaṃ gantum udyatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.006a: anukampāṃ hi bhakteṣu daivatāny api kurvate
GE07mbh_03_u:002.007a: mamāpi paramā bhaktir brāhmaṇeṣu sadā dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.008a: āhareyur hi me ye 'pi phalamūlamṛgāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:002.008c: ta ime śokajair duḥkhair bhrātaro me vimohitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.009c: duḥkhānvitān imān kleśair nāhaṃ yoktum ihotsahe
GE07mbh_03_u:002.010a: asmatpoṣaṇajā cintā mā bhūt te hṛdi pārthiva
GE07mbh_03_u:002.012a: evam etan na saṃdeho rameyaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:002.013a: kathaṃ drakṣyāmi vaḥ sarvān svayam āhṛtabhojanān
GE07mbh_03_u:002.014a: ity uktvā sa nṛpaḥ śocan niṣasāda mahītale
GE07mbh_03_u:002.014c: tam adhyātmaratir vidvāñ śaunako nāma vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.014e: yoge sāṃkhye ca kuśalo rājānam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:002.015c: divase divase mūḍham āviśanti na paṇḍitam
GE07mbh_03_u:002.017d-0007_01: śuśrūṣā śravaṇaṃ caiva grahaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:002.023a: matimanto hy ato vaidyāḥ śamaṃ prāg eva kurvate
GE07mbh_03_u:002.026a: manaso duḥkhamūlaṃ tu sneha ity upalabhyate
GE07mbh_03_u:002.026c: snehāt tu sajjate jantur duḥkhayogam upaiti ca
GE07mbh_03_u:002.028a: snehāt karaṇarāgaś ca prajajñe vaiṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:002.028c: aśreyaskāv ubhāv etau pūrvas tatra guruḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.030a: viprayoge na tu tyāgī doṣadarśī samāgamāt
GE07mbh_03_u:002.032c: na teṣu sajjate snehaḥ padmapatreṣv ivodakam
GE07mbh_03_u:002.033c: icchā saṃjāyate tasya tatas tṛṣṇā pravartate
GE07mbh_03_u:002.035a: yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.035c: yo 'sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukham
GE07mbh_03_u:002.036a: anādyantā tu sā tṛṣṇā antardehagatā nṛṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:002.038a: rājataḥ salilād agneś corataḥ svajanād api
GE07mbh_03_u:002.038b-0009_01: arthibhyaḥ kālatas tasmān nityam arthavatāṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_03_u:002.038c: bhayam arthavatāṃ nityaṃ mṛtyoḥ prāṇabhṛtām iva
GE07mbh_03_u:002.039a: yathā hy āmiṣam ākāśe pakṣibhiḥ śvāpadair bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:002.039c: bhakṣyate salile matsyais tathā sarveṇa vittavān
GE07mbh_03_u:002.040a: artha eva hi keṣāṃ cid anartho bhavitā nṛṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:002.040c: arthaśreyasi cāsakto na śreyo vindate naraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.041a: kārpaṇyaṃ darpamānau ca bhayam udvega eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:002.041c: arthajāni viduḥ prājñā duḥkhāny etāni dehinām
GE07mbh_03_u:002.042a: arthasyopārjane duḥkhaṃ pālane ca kṣaye tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:002.042c: nāśe duḥkhaṃ vyaye duḥkhaṃ ghnanti caivārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_03_u:002.043a: arthā duḥkhaṃ parityaktuṃ pālitāś cāpi te 'sukhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.043c: duḥkhena cādhigamyante teṣāṃ nāśaṃ na cintayet
GE07mbh_03_u:002.044c: anto nāsti pipāsāyāḥ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_03_u:002.045a: tasmāt saṃtoṣam eveha dhanaṃ paśyanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.045e: aiśvaryaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyed eṣu na paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.046a: tyajeta saṃcayāṃs tasmāt tajjaṃ kleśaṃ saheta kaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.046c: na hi saṃcayavān kaś cid dṛśyate nirupadravaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.047a: ataś ca dharmibhiḥ pumbhir anīhārthaḥ praśasyate
GE07mbh_03_u:002.047b-0010_01: dharmārthaṃ yasya vittehā varaṃ tasya nirīhatā
GE07mbh_03_u:002.047c: prakṣālanād dhi paṅkasya dūrād asparśanaṃ varam
GE07mbh_03_u:002.048a: yudhiṣṭhiraivam artheṣu na spṛhāṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:002.048c: dharmeṇa yadi te kāryaṃ vimukteccho bhavārthataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.049c: bharaṇārthaṃ tu viprāṇāṃ brahman kāṅkṣe na lobhataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.050a: kathaṃ hy asmadvidho brahman vartamāno gṛhāśrame
GE07mbh_03_u:002.050c: bharaṇaṃ pālanaṃ cāpi na kuryād anuyāyinām
GE07mbh_03_u:002.051a: saṃvibhāgo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām eva śiṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:002.052a: tṛṇāni bhūmir udakaṃ vāk caturthī ca sūnṛtā
GE07mbh_03_u:002.052c: satām etāni geheṣu nocchidyante kadā cana
GE07mbh_03_u:002.053c: tṛṣitasya ca pānīyaṃ kṣudhitasya ca bhojanam
GE07mbh_03_u:002.054a: cakṣur dadyān mano dadyād vācaṃ dadyāc ca sūnṛtām
GE07mbh_03_u:002.054b-0011_01: utthāya cāsanaṃ dadyād eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.056a: nātmārthaṃ pācayed annaṃ na vṛthā ghātayet paśūn
GE07mbh_03_u:002.056c: na ca tat svayam aśnīyād vidhivad yan na nirvapet
GE07mbh_03_u:002.057a: śvabhyaś ca śvapacebhyaś ca vayobhyaś cāvaped bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:002.058d-0012_01: cakṣur dadyān mano dadyād vācaṃ dadyāc ca sūnṛtām
GE07mbh_03_u:002.059a: etāṃ yo vartate vṛttiṃ vartamāno gṛhāśrame
GE07mbh_03_u:002.059c: tasya dharmaṃ paraṃ prāhuḥ kathaṃ vā vipra manyase
GE07mbh_03_u:002.060a: aho bata mahat kaṣṭaṃ viparītam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_03_u:002.065c: viddhaḥ patati lobhāgnau jyotir lobhāt pataṃgavat
GE07mbh_03_u:002.066a: tato vihārair āhārair mohitaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:002.067a: evaṃ patati saṃsāre tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:002.068c: jale bhuvi tathākāśe jāyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.069a: abudhānāṃ gatis tv eṣā budhānām api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_03_u:002.069c: ye dharme śreyasi ratā vimokṣaratayo janāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:002.070a: yad idaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca
GE07mbh_03_u:002.070c: tasmād dharmān imān sarvān nābhimānāt samācaret
GE07mbh_03_u:002.072c: kartavyam iti yat kāryaṃ nābhimānāt samācaret
GE07mbh_03_u:002.073a: uttaro devayānas tu sadbhir ācaritaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_03_u:002.074c: samyag vrataviśeṣāc ca samyak ca gurusevanāt
GE07mbh_03_u:002.077a: tathā tvam api kaunteya śamam āsthāya puṣkalam
GE07mbh_03_u:002.077c: tapasā siddhim anviccha yogasiddhiṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:002.078a: pitṛmātṛmayī siddhiḥ prāptā karmamayī ca te
GE07mbh_03_u:002.078c: tapasā siddhim anviccha dvijānāṃ bharaṇāya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:002.079a: siddhā hi yad yad icchanti kurvate tad anugrahāt
GE07mbh_03_u:003.003a: parityaktuṃ na śaknomi dānaśaktiś ca nāsti me
GE07mbh_03_u:003.003c: katham atra mayā kāryaṃ bhagavāṃs tad bravītu me
GE07mbh_03_u:003.004a: muhūrtam iva sa dhyātvā dharmeṇānviṣya tāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_03_u:003.005a: purā sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni pīḍyante kṣudhayā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:003.005d-0013_01: sāntvayitvā tato devaḥ prāṇikārye yuyoja ca
GE07mbh_03_u:003.007c: divas tejaḥ samuddhṛtya janayām āsa vāriṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:003.008c: oṣadhyaḥ ṣaḍrasā medhyās tadannaṃ prāṇināṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:003.009a: evaṃ bhānumayaṃ hy annaṃ bhūtānāṃ prāṇadhāraṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:003.009c: pitaiṣa sarvabhūtānāṃ tasmāt taṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja
GE07mbh_03_u:003.010c: uddharanti prajāḥ sarvās tapa āsthāya puṣkalam
GE07mbh_03_u:003.012a: tathā tvam api dharmātman karmaṇā ca viśodhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.012c: tapa āsthāya dharmeṇa dvijātīn bhara bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:003.013a: evam uktas tu dhaumyena tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.013b-0015_01: tatas tv adhyāpayām āsa mantraṃ sarvārthasādhakam
GE07mbh_03_u:003.013b-0015_02: aṣṭākṣaraṃ paraṃ mantram ārtasya satataṃ priyam
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0001: śuciḥ prayatavāg bhūtvā stotram ārabdhavāṃs tataḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0002: tvaṃ bhāno jagataś cakṣus tvam ātmā sarvadehinām
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0003: tvaṃ yoniḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvam ācāraḥ kriyāvatām
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0004: tvaṃ gatiḥ sarvasāṃkhyānāṃ yogināṃ tvaṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0006: tvayā saṃdhāryate lokas tvayā lokaḥ prakāśyate
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0008: tvām upasthāya kāle tu brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0010: tava divyaṃ rathaṃ yāntam anuyānti varārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0012: trayastriṃśac ca vai devās tathā vaimānikā gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0013: sopendrāḥ samahendrāś ca tvām iṣṭvā siddhim āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0014: upayānty arcayitvā tu tvāṃ vai prāptamanorathāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0016: guhyāḥ pitṛgaṇāḥ sapta ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0017: te pūjayitvā tvām eva gacchantyāśu pradhānatām
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0018: vasavo maruto rudrā ye ca sādhyā marīcipāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0020: sabrahmakeṣu lokeṣu saptasv apy akhileṣu ca
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0021: na tad bhūtam ahaṃ manye yad arkād atiricyate
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0022: santi cānyāni sattvāni vīryavanti mahānti ca
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0023: na tu teṣāṃ tathā dīptiḥ prabhāvo vā yathā tava
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0024: jyotīṃṣi tvayi sarvāṇi tvaṃ sarvajyotiṣāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0025: tvayi satyaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca sarve bhāvāś ca sāttvikāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0030: tapanty anye dahanty anye garjanty anye tathā ghanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0032: na tathā sukhayaty agnir na prāvārā na kambalāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0036: tava yady udayo na syād andhaṃ jagad idaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0041: tasya tvam ādir antaś ca kālajñaiḥ parikīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0050: tvām indram āhus tvaṃ rudras tvaṃ viṣṇus tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0051: tvam agnis tvaṃ manaḥ sūkṣmaṃ prabhus tvaṃ brahma śāśvatam
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0052: tvaṃ haṃsaḥ savitā bhānur aṃśumālī vṛṣākapiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0053: vivasvān mihiraḥ pūṣā mitro dharmas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0054: sahasraraśmir ādityas tapanas tvaṃ gavāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0055: mārtaṇḍo 'rko raviḥ sūryaḥ śaraṇyo dinakṛt tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0057: āśugāmī tamoghnaś ca haritāśvaś ca kīrtyase
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0058: saptamyām atha vā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhaktyā pūjāṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0060: na teṣām āpadaḥ santi nādhayo vyādhayas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0066: ye ca te 'nucarāḥ sarve pādopāntaṃ samāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0068: kṣubhayā sahitā maitrī yāś cānyā bhūtamātaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0069: tāś ca sarvā namasyāmi pāntu māṃ śaraṇāgatam vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:003.014f-001_0070: evaṃ stuto mahārāja bhāskaro lokabhāvanaḥ janamejaya uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:003.015a: kathaṃ kurūṇām ṛṣabhaḥ sa tu rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.015d-0018_01: mayi sneho 'sti ced brahman yady anugrahabhāg aham
GE07mbh_03_u:003.015d-0018_02: bhagavan nāsti ced guhyaṃ tac ca me brūhi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_03_u:003.016c: kṣaṇaṃ ca kuru rājendra sarvaṃ vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.017a: dhaumyena tu yatha proktaṃ pārthāya sumahātmane
GE07mbh_03_u:003.017c: nāmnām aṣṭaśataṃ puṇyaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva mahāmate
GE07mbh_03_u:003.018a: sūryo 'ryamā bhagas tvaṣṭā pūṣārkaḥ savitā raviḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.018c: gabhastimān ajaḥ kālo mṛtyur dhātā prabhākaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.019a: pṛthivy āpaś ca tejaś ca khaṃ vāyuś ca parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:003.019c: somo bṛhaspatiḥ śukro budho 'ṅgāraka eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:003.020a: indro vivasvān dīptāṃśuḥ śuciḥ śauriḥ śanaiścaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.020c: brahmā viṣṇuś ca rudraś ca skando vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.021a: vaidyuto jāṭharaś cāgnir aindhanas tejasāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.022a: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaś ca kaliḥ sarvāmarāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.022c: kalā kāṣṭhā muhūrtāś ca pakṣā māsā ṛtus tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:003.030a: śakrāc ca nāradaḥ prāpto dhaumyaś ca tadanantaram
GE07mbh_03_u:003.030c: dhaumyād yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prāpya sarvān kāmān avāptavān
GE07mbh_03_u:003.031c: varakanakahutāśanaprabhaṃ; tvam api manasy abhidhehi bhāskaram
GE07mbh_03_u:003.032a: sūryodaye yas tu samāhitaḥ paṭhet; sa putralābhaṃ dhanaratnasaṃcayān
GE07mbh_03_u:003.032c: labheta jātismaratāṃ sadā naraḥ; smṛtiṃ ca medhāṃ ca sa vindate parām
GE07mbh_03_u:003.033a: imaṃ stavaṃ devavarasya yo naraḥ; prakīrtayec chucisumanāḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:003.033c: sa mucyate śokadavāgnisāgarāl; labheta kāmān manasā yathepsitān
GE07mbh_03_u:004.001a: tato divākaraḥ prīto darśayām āsa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_03_u:004.002a: yat te 'bhilaṣitaṃ rājan sarvam etad avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:004.002c: aham annaṃ pradāsyāmi sapta pañca ca te samāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003b-0021_01: gṛhṇīṣva piṭharaṃ tāmraṃ mayā dattaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003d-0022_01: itaś caturdaśe varṣe bhūyo rājyam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003e: dhanaṃ ca vividhaṃ tubhyam ity uktvāntaradhīyata
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003f-002_0003: tat tasya dadyāc ca ravir manīṣitaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003f-002_0004: tad āpnuyād yady api tat sudurlabham
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003f-002_0005: yaś cedaṃ dhārayen nityaṃ śṛṇuyād vāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003f-002_0006: putrārthī labhate putraṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanam
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003f-002_0007: vidyārthī labhate vidyāṃ puruṣo 'py atha vā striyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003f-002_0008: ubhe saṃdhye paṭhen nityaṃ nārī vā puruṣo yadi
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003f-002_0009: āpadaṃ prāpya mucyeta baddho mucyeta bandhanāt
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003f-002_0010: etad brahmā dadau pūrvaṃ śakrāya sumahātmane
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003f-002_0011: śakrāc ca nāradaḥ prāpto dhaumyas tu tadanantaram
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003f-002_0012: dhaumyād yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prāpya sarvān kāmān avāptavān
GE07mbh_03_u:004.003f-002_0013: saṃgrāme ca jayen nityaṃ vipulaṃ cāpnuyād vasu
GE07mbh_03_u:004.004a: labdhvā varaṃ tu kaunteyo jalād uttīrya dharmavit
GE07mbh_03_u:004.004c: jagrāha pādau dhaumyasya bhrātṝṃś cāsvajatācyutaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:004.004d-0023_01: tvatprasādād dvijaśreṣṭha yad iṣṭaṃ prāptavān aham
GE07mbh_03_u:004.005c: mahānase tadānnaṃ tu sādhayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:004.006a: saṃskṛtaṃ prasavaṃ yāti vanyam annaṃ caturvidham
GE07mbh_03_u:004.006c: akṣayyaṃ vardhate cānnaṃ tena bhojayate dvijān
GE07mbh_03_u:004.007c: śeṣaṃ vighasasaṃjñaṃ tu paścād bhuṅkte yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:005.001a: vanaṃ praviṣṭeṣv atha pāṇḍaveṣu; prajñācakṣus tapyamāno 'mbikeyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:005.001c: dharmātmānaṃ viduram agādhabuddhiṃ; sukhāsīno vākyam uvāca rājā
GE07mbh_03_u:005.002a: prajñā ca te bhārgavasyeva śuddhā; dharmaṃ ca tvaṃ paramaṃ vettha sūkṣmam
GE07mbh_03_u:005.002c: samaś ca tvaṃ saṃmataḥ kauravāṇāṃ; pathyaṃ caiṣāṃ mama caiva bravīhi
GE07mbh_03_u:005.003a: evaṃ gate vidura yad adya kāryaṃ; paurāś ceme katham asmān bhajeran
GE07mbh_03_u:005.003c: te cāpy asmān noddhareyuḥ samūlān; na kāmaye tāṃś ca vinaśyamānān
GE07mbh_03_u:005.003d-0024_02: krūram ācaritaṃ karma na me priyam anuṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_03_u:005.003d-0024_03: tathaivaṃ hi kṛte tatra tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_03_u:005.003d-0024_04: uttaraṃ prāptakālaṃ ca kim anyan manyate kṣamam
GE07mbh_03_u:005.003d-0024_05: nāsti dharme sahāyatvam iti me dīryate manaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:005.003d-0024_06: yatra pāṇḍusutāḥ sarve kliśyanti vanam āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:005.004a: trivargo 'yaṃ dharmamūlo narendra; rājyaṃ cedaṃ dharmamūlaṃ vadanti
GE07mbh_03_u:005.004c: dharme rājan vartamānaḥ svaśaktyā; putrān sarvān pāhi kuntīsutāṃś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:005.005a: sa vai dharmo vipraluptaḥ sabhāyāṃ; pāpātmabhiḥ saubaleyapradhānaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:005.005c: āhūya kuntīsutam akṣavatyāṃ; parājaiṣīt satyasaṃdhaṃ sutas te
GE07mbh_03_u:005.006a: etasya te duṣpraṇītasya rājañ; śeṣasyāhaṃ paripaśyāmy upāyam
GE07mbh_03_u:005.006c: yathā putras tava kauravya pāpān; mukto loke pratitiṣṭheta sādhu
GE07mbh_03_u:005.007a: tad vai sarvaṃ pāṇḍuputrā labhantāṃ; yat tad rājann atisṛṣṭaṃ tvayāsīt
GE07mbh_03_u:005.007c: eṣa dharmaḥ paramo yat svakena; rājā tuṣyen na parasveṣu gṛdhyet
GE07mbh_03_u:005.007d-0025_01: yaśo na naśyej jñātibhedaś ca na syād
GE07mbh_03_u:005.007d-0025_02: dharmo na syān naiva caivaṃ kṛte tvām
GE07mbh_03_u:005.008a: etat kāryaṃ tava sarvapradhānaṃ; teṣāṃ tuṣṭiḥ śakuneś cāvamānaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:005.008c: evaṃ śeṣaṃ yadi putreṣu te syād; etad rājaṃs tvaramāṇaḥ kuruṣva
GE07mbh_03_u:005.009a: athaitad evaṃ na karoṣi rājan; dhruvaṃ kurūṇāṃ bhavitā vināśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:005.009c: na hi kruddho bhīmaseno 'rjuno vā; śeṣaṃ kuryāc chātravāṇām anīke
GE07mbh_03_u:005.010a: yeṣāṃ yoddhā savyasācī kṛtāstro; dhanur yeṣāṃ gāṇḍivaṃ lokasāram
GE07mbh_03_u:005.010c: yeṣāṃ bhīmo bāhuśālī ca yoddhā; teṣāṃ loke kiṃ nu na prāpyam asti
GE07mbh_03_u:005.010d-0026_02: teṣāṃ loke kiṃ nu duṣprāpam asti
GE07mbh_03_u:005.011a: uktaṃ pūrvaṃ jātamātre sute te; mayā yat te hitam āsīt tadānīm
GE07mbh_03_u:005.011c: putraṃ tyajemam ahitaṃ kulasyety; etad rājan na ca tat tvaṃ cakartha
GE07mbh_03_u:005.011e: idānīṃ te hitam uktaṃ na cet tvaṃ; kartāsi rājan paritaptāsi paścāt
GE07mbh_03_u:005.012a: yady etad evam anumantā sutas te; saṃprīyamāṇaḥ pāṇḍavair ekarājyam
GE07mbh_03_u:005.012c: tāpo na te vai bhavitā prītiyogāt; tvaṃ cen na gṛhṇāsi sutaṃ sahāyaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:005.012e: athāparo bhavati hi taṃ nigṛhya; pāṇḍoḥ putraṃ prakuruṣvādhipatye
GE07mbh_03_u:005.013a: ajātaśatrur hi vimuktarāgo; dharmeṇemāṃ pṛthivīṃ śāstu rājan
GE07mbh_03_u:005.013c: tato rājan pārthivāḥ sarva eva; vaiśyā ivāsmān upatiṣṭhantu sadyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:005.014a: duryodhanaḥ śakuniḥ sūtaputraḥ; prītyā rājan pāṇḍuputrān bhajantām
GE07mbh_03_u:005.014c: duḥśāsano yācatu bhīmasenaṃ; sabhāmadhye drupadasyātmajāṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:005.015a: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ tvaṃ parisāntvayasva; rājye cainaṃ sthāpayasvābhipūjya
GE07mbh_03_u:005.015c: tvayā pṛṣṭaḥ kim aham anyad vadeyam; etat kṛtvā kṛtakṛtyo 'si rājan
GE07mbh_03_u:005.016a: etad vākyaṃ vidura yat te sabhāyām; iha proktaṃ prāpya māṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:005.016c: hitaṃ teṣām ahitaṃ māmakānām; etat sarvaṃ mama nopaiti cetaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:005.017a: idaṃ tv idānīṃ kuta eva niścitaṃ; teṣām arthe pāṇḍavānāṃ yad āttha
GE07mbh_03_u:005.017c: tenādya manye nāsi hito mameti; kathaṃ hi putraṃ pāṇḍavārthe tyajeyam
GE07mbh_03_u:005.018a: asaṃśayaṃ te 'pi mamaiva putrā; duryodhanas tu mama dehāt prasūtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:005.018c: svaṃ vai dehaṃ parahetos tyajeti; ko nu brūyāt samatām anvavekṣan
GE07mbh_03_u:005.019a: sa mā jihmaṃ vidura sarvaṃ bravīṣi; mānaṃ ca te 'ham adhikaṃ dhārayāmi
GE07mbh_03_u:005.019c: yathecchakaṃ gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā tvaṃ; susāntvyamānāpy asatī strī jahāti
GE07mbh_03_u:005.020a: etāvad uktvā dhṛtarāṣṭro 'nvapadyad; antarveśma sahasotthāya rājan
GE07mbh_03_u:005.020c: nedam astīty atha viduro bhāṣamāṇaḥ; saṃprādravad yatra pārthā babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.001a: pāṇḍavās tu vane vāsam uddiśya bharatarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.002c: yayur vanenaiva vanaṃ satataṃ paścimāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_03_u:006.004a: tatra te nyavasan vīrā vane bahumṛgadvije
GE07mbh_03_u:006.005a: viduras tv api pāṇḍūnāṃ tadā darśanalālasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.006a: tato yātvā viduraḥ kānanaṃ tac; chīghrair aśvair vāhinā syandanena
GE07mbh_03_u:006.006c: dadarśāsīnaṃ dharmarājaṃ vivikte; sārdhaṃ draupadyā bhrātṛbhir brāhmaṇaiś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:006.007a: tato 'paśyad viduraṃ tūrṇam ārād; abhyāyāntaṃ satyasaṃdhaḥ sa rājā
GE07mbh_03_u:006.007c: athābravīd bhrātaraṃ bhīmasenaṃ; kiṃ nu kṣattā vakṣyati naḥ sametya
GE07mbh_03_u:006.008a: kaccin nāyaṃ vacanāt saubalasya; samāhvātā devanāyopayāti
GE07mbh_03_u:006.008c: kaccit kṣudraḥ śakunir nāyudhāni; jeṣyaty asmān punar evākṣavatyām
GE07mbh_03_u:006.009a: samāhūtaḥ kena cid ādraveti; nāhaṃ śakto bhīmasenāpayātum
GE07mbh_03_u:006.009c: gāṇḍīve vā saṃśayite kathaṃ cid; rājyaprāptiḥ saṃśayitā bhaven naḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.010a: tata utthāya viduraṃ pāṇḍaveyāḥ; pratyagṛhṇan nṛpate sarva eva
GE07mbh_03_u:006.010c: taiḥ satkṛtaḥ sa ca tān ājamīḍho; yathocitaṃ pāṇḍuputrān sameyāt
GE07mbh_03_u:006.011a: samāśvastaṃ viduraṃ te nararṣabhās; tato 'pṛcchann āgamanāya hetum
GE07mbh_03_u:006.011c: sa cāpi tebhyo vistarataḥ śaśaṃsa; yathāvṛtto dhṛtarāṣṭro ''mbikeyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.012c: evaṃ gate samatām abhyupetya; pathyaṃ teṣāṃ mama caiva bravīhi
GE07mbh_03_u:006.013a: mayāpy uktaṃ yat kṣamaṃ kauravāṇāṃ; hitaṃ pathyaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya caiva
GE07mbh_03_u:006.013c: tad vai pathyaṃ tan mano nābhyupaiti; tataś cāhaṃ kṣamam anyan na manye
GE07mbh_03_u:006.014a: paraṃ śreyaḥ pāṇḍaveyā mayoktaṃ; na me tac ca śrutavān āmbikeyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.014c: yathāturasyeva hi pathyam annaṃ; na rocate smāsya tad ucyamānam
GE07mbh_03_u:006.015a: na śreyase nīyate 'jātaśatro; strī śrotriyasyeva gṛhe praduṣṭā
GE07mbh_03_u:006.015c: bruvan na rucyai bharatarṣabhasya; patiḥ kumāryā iva ṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.016a: dhruvaṃ vināśo nṛpa kauravāṇāṃ; na vai śreyo dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ paraiti
GE07mbh_03_u:006.016c: yathā parṇe puṣkarasyeva siktaṃ; jalaṃ na tiṣṭhet pathyam uktaṃ tathāsmin
GE07mbh_03_u:006.017a: tataḥ kruddho dhṛtarāṣṭro 'bravīn māṃ; yatra śraddhā bhārata tatra yāhi
GE07mbh_03_u:006.017c: nāhaṃ bhūyaḥ kāmaye tvāṃ sahāyaṃ; mahīm imāṃ pālayituṃ puraṃ vā
GE07mbh_03_u:006.018a: so 'haṃ tyakto dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa rājaṃs; tvāṃ śāsitum upayātas tvarāvān
GE07mbh_03_u:006.018c: tad vai sarvaṃ yan mayoktaṃ sabhāyāṃ; tad dhāryatāṃ yat pravakṣyāmi bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.019a: kleśais tīvrair yujyamānaḥ sapatnaiḥ; kṣamāṃ kurvan kālam upāsate yaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.019c: saṃ vardhayan stokam ivāgnim ātmavān; sa vai bhuṅkte pṛthivīm eka
GE07mbh_03_u:006.020a: yasyāvibhaktaṃ vasu rājan sahāyais; tasya duḥkhe 'py aṃśabhājaḥ sahāyāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.020c: sahāyānām eṣa saṃgrahaṇe 'bhyupāyaḥ; sahāyāptau pṛthivīprāptim āhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.021a: satyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pāṇḍava niṣpralāpaṃ; tulyaṃ cānnaṃ saha bhojyaṃ sahāyaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.021c: ātmā caiṣām agrato nātivarted; evaṃvṛttir vardhate bhūmipālaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.022a: evaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā bravīṣi; parāṃ buddhim upagamyāpramattaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:006.022c: yac cāpy anyad deśakālopapannaṃ; tad vai vācyaṃ tat kariṣyāmi kṛtsnam
GE07mbh_03_u:007.001a: gate tu vidure rājann āśramaṃ pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_03_u:007.001d-0030_02: vivṛddhiṃ ca parāṃ matvā pāṇḍavānāṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:007.003a: sa tu labdhvā punaḥ saṃjñāṃ samutthāya mahītalāt
GE07mbh_03_u:007.004a: bhrātā mama suhṛc caiva sākṣād dharma ivāparaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:007.004c: tasya smṛtvādya subhṛśaṃ hṛdayaṃ dīryatīva me
GE07mbh_03_u:007.005a: tam ānayasva dharmajñaṃ mama bhrātaram āśu vai
GE07mbh_03_u:007.005c: iti bruvan sa nṛpatiḥ karuṇaṃ paryadevayat
GE07mbh_03_u:007.006c: bhrātṛsnehād idaṃ rājan saṃjayaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:007.007a: gaccha saṃjaya jānīhi bhrātaraṃ viduraṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:007.007c: yadi jīvati roṣeṇa mayā pāpena nirdhutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:007.008a: na hi tena mama bhrātrā susūkṣmam api kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:007.009a: sa vyalīkaṃ kathaṃ prāpto mattaḥ paramabuddhimān
GE07mbh_03_u:007.009c: na jahyāj jīvitaṃ prājñas taṃ gacchānaya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_03_u:007.010a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rājñas tam anumānya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:007.010c: saṃjayo bāḍham ity uktvā prādravat kāmyakaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:007.011a: so 'cireṇa samāsādya tad vanaṃ yatra pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:007.014a: rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ sa kuśalaṃ sukhāsīnaś ca saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:007.015c: taṃ paśya gatvā tvaṃ kṣipraṃ saṃjīvaya ca pārthivam
GE07mbh_03_u:007.017a: evam uktas tu viduro dhīmān svajanavatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:007.017d-0032_01: so 'bhigatvā tadā veśma rājñaḥ samabhivādya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:007.018c: diṣṭyā prāpto 'si dharmajña diṣṭyā smarasi me 'nagha
GE07mbh_03_u:007.019a: adya rātrau divā cāhaṃ tvatkṛte bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:007.020a: so 'ṅkam ādāya viduraṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya caiva ha
GE07mbh_03_u:007.020c: kṣamyatām iti covāca yad ukto 'si mayā ruṣā
GE07mbh_03_u:007.020d-0033_02: yudhiṣṭhiras tu kuśalī bhrātṛbhiḥ saha tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_03_u:007.020d-0033_03: atha rātriṃ dinaṃ cāhaṃ tvatkṛte bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:007.020d-0033_04: prītas tvam eva me nityaṃ bhrātā sarvaguṇānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:007.021a: kṣāntam eva mayā rājan gurur naḥ paramo bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:007.021c: tathā hy asmy āgataḥ kṣipraṃ tvaddarśanaparāyaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:007.023a: pāṇḍoḥ sutā yādṛśā me tādṛśā me sutās tava
GE07mbh_03_u:007.023c: dīnā iti hi me buddhir abhipannādya tān prati
GE07mbh_03_u:007.024c: viduro dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca lebhāte paramāṃ mudam
GE07mbh_03_u:008.001a: śrutvā ca viduraṃ prāptaṃ rājñā ca parisāntvitam
GE07mbh_03_u:008.003c: viduraḥ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ suhṛd vidvān hite rataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:008.004a: yāvad asya punar buddhiṃ viduro nāpakarṣati
GE07mbh_03_u:008.005a: atha paśyāmy ahaṃ pārthān prāptān iha kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:008.006c: kariṣye na hi tān ṛddhān punar draṣṭum ihotsahe
GE07mbh_03_u:008.007a: kiṃ bāliṣāṃ matiṃ rājann āsthito 'si viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:008.007c: gatās te samayaṃ kṛtvā naitad evaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:008.008c: pitus te vacanaṃ tāta na grahīṣyanti karhi cit
GE07mbh_03_u:008.009a: atha vā te grahīṣyanti punar eṣyanti vā puram
GE07mbh_03_u:008.011a: evam etan mahāprājña yathā vadasi mātula
GE07mbh_03_u:008.011c: nityaṃ hi me kathayatas tava buddhir hi rocate
GE07mbh_03_u:008.011d-0035_01: tathā tad bhavitā rājan nānyathā tad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:008.011d-0036_02: āgaccheyuś ca te mohāt punar dyūtaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:008.012c: aikamatyaṃ hi no rājan sarveṣām eva lakṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:008.013a: evam uktas tu karṇena rājā duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:008.014a: upalabhya tataḥ karṇo vivṛtya nayane śubhe
GE07mbh_03_u:008.014c: roṣād duḥśāsanaṃ caiva saubaleyaṃ ca tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_03_u:008.015c: aho mama mataṃ yat tan nibodhata narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:008.016c: na cāsya śaknumaḥ sarve priye sthātum atandritāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:008.017a: vayaṃ tu śastrāṇy ādāya rathān āsthāya daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:008.018a: teṣu sarveṣu śānteṣu gateṣv aviditāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_03_u:008.019c: yāvan mitravihīnāś ca tāvac chakyā mataṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:008.020a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pūjayantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:008.020c: bāḍham ity eva te sarve pratyūcuḥ sūtajaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:008.021a: evam uktvā tu saṃkruddhā rathaiḥ sarve pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_03_u:009.001c: vakṣyāmi tvā kauravāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ hitam uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:009.002a: na me priyaṃ mahābāho yad gatāḥ pāṇḍavā vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:009.003a: te smarantaḥ parikleśān varṣe pūrṇe trayodaśe
GE07mbh_03_u:009.004a: tad ayaṃ kiṃ nu pāpātmā tava putraḥ sumandadhīḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:009.005a: vāryatāṃ sādhv ayaṃ mūḍhaḥ śamaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:009.005c: vanasthāṃs tān ayaṃ hantum icchan prāṇair vimokṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:009.006a: yathāha viduraḥ prājño yathā bhīṣmo yathā vayam
GE07mbh_03_u:009.006c: yathā kṛpaś ca droṇaś ca tathā sādhu vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_03_u:009.007c: adharmyam ayaśasyaṃ ca mā rājan pratipadyathāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:009.008a: samīkṣā yādṛśī hy asya pāṇḍavān prati bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:009.008c: upekṣyamāṇā sā rājan mahāntam anayaṃ spṛśet
GE07mbh_03_u:009.009a: atha vāyaṃ sumandātmā vanaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:009.010a: tataḥ saṃsargajaḥ snehaḥ putrasya tava pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:009.010c: yadi syāt kṛtakāryo 'dya bhaves tvaṃ manujeśvara
GE07mbh_03_u:009.011a: atha vā jāyamānasya yac chīlam anujāyate
GE07mbh_03_u:009.012a: kathaṃ vā manyate bhīṣmo droṇo vā viduro 'pi vā
GE07mbh_03_u:009.012c: bhavān vātra kṣamaṃ kāryaṃ purā cārtho 'tivartate
GE07mbh_03_u:010.001a: bhagavan nāham apy etad rocaye dyūtasaṃstavam
GE07mbh_03_u:010.001c: manye tad vidhinākramya kārito 'smīti vai mune
GE07mbh_03_u:010.002a: naitad rocayate bhīṣmo na droṇo viduro na ca
GE07mbh_03_u:010.002c: gāndhārī necchati dyūtaṃ tac ca mohāt pravartitam
GE07mbh_03_u:010.004a: vaicitravīrya nṛpate satyam āha yathā bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:010.004c: dṛḍhaṃ vedmi paraṃ putraṃ paraṃ putrān na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:010.005c: anyaiḥ samṛddhair apy arthair na sutād vidyate param
GE07mbh_03_u:010.006a: atra te vartayiṣyāmi mahad ākhyānam uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:010.006c: surabhyāś caiva saṃvādam indrasya ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:010.007c: gavāṃ māta purā tāta tām indro 'nvakṛpāyata
GE07mbh_03_u:010.008a: kim idaṃ rodiṣi śubhe kaccit kṣemaṃ divaukasām
GE07mbh_03_u:010.008c: mānuṣeṣv atha vā goṣu naitad alpaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:010.009a: vinipāto na vaḥ kaś cid dṛśyate tridaśādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:010.009c: ahaṃ tu putraṃ śocāmi tena rodimi kauśika
GE07mbh_03_u:010.010a: paśyainaṃ karṣakaṃ raudraṃ durbalaṃ mama putrakam
GE07mbh_03_u:010.011a: etaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhṛśaṃ śrantaṃ vadhyamānaṃ surādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:010.012e: kṛcchrād udvahate bhāraṃ taṃ vai śocāmi vāsava
GE07mbh_03_u:010.013c: naiva śaknoti taṃ bhāram udvoḍhuṃ paśya vāsava
GE07mbh_03_u:010.015c: kiṃ kṛpāyitam asty atra putra eko 'tra pīḍyate
GE07mbh_03_u:010.016a: yadi putrasahasraṃ me sarvatra samam eva me
GE07mbh_03_u:010.016c: dīnasya tu sataḥ śakra putrasyābhyadhikā kṛpā
GE07mbh_03_u:010.018a: pravavarṣa ca tatraiva sahasā toyam ulbaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:010.019a: tad yathā surabhiḥ prāha samam evāstu te tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:010.019c: suteṣu rājan sarveṣu dīneṣv abhyadhikā kṛpā
GE07mbh_03_u:010.020a: yādṛśo me sutaḥ paṇḍus tādṛśo me 'si putraka
GE07mbh_03_u:010.020c: viduraś ca mahāprājñaḥ snehād etad bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:010.021a: cirāya tava putrāṇāṃ śatam ekaś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_03_u:010.021c: pāṇḍoḥ pañcaiva lakṣyante te 'pi mandāḥ suduḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:010.022a: kathaṃ jīveyur atyantaṃ kathaṃ vardheyur ity api
GE07mbh_03_u:010.022c: iti dīneṣu pārtheṣu mano me paritapyate
GE07mbh_03_u:010.023c: duryodhanas tava sutaḥ śamaṃ gacchatu pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.001a: evam etan mahāprājña yathā vadasi no mune
GE07mbh_03_u:011.001c: ahaṃ caiva vijānāmi sarve ceme narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.002a: bhavāṃs tu manyate sādhu yat kurūṇāṃ sukhodayam
GE07mbh_03_u:011.002c: tad eva viduro 'py āha bhīṣmo droṇaś ca māṃ mune
GE07mbh_03_u:011.003a: yadi tv aham anugrāhyaḥ kauraveṣu dayā yadi
GE07mbh_03_u:011.004a: ayam āyāti vai rājan maitreyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.005a: eṣa duryodhanaṃ putraṃ tava rājan mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.006a: brūyād yad eṣa rājendra tat kāryam aviśaṅkayā
GE07mbh_03_u:011.006c: akriyāyāṃ hi kāryasya putraṃ te śapsyate ruṣā
GE07mbh_03_u:011.007a: evam uktvā yayau vyāso maitreyaḥ pratyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_03_u:011.007b-0038_01: tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ dṛṣṭvā dhṛtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.009c: kaccit kuśalino vīrā bhrātaraḥ pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.010a: samaye sthātum icchanti kaccic ca puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.014c: sadā hy abhyadhikaḥ snehaḥ prītiś ca tvayi me prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:011.015a: naitad aupayikaṃ rājaṃs tvayi bhīṣme ca jīvati
GE07mbh_03_u:011.015c: yad anyonyena te putrā virudhyante narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:011.016a: meḍhībhūtaḥ svayaṃ rājan nigrahe pragrahe bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:011.017c: tena na bhrājase rājaṃs tāpasānāṃ samāgame
GE07mbh_03_u:011.018c: uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā maitreyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.019c: vacanaṃ me mahāprājña bruvato yad dhitaṃ tava
GE07mbh_03_u:011.020a: mā druhaḥ pāṇḍavān rājan kuruṣva hitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.020c: pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca lokasya ca nararṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:011.021a: te hi sarve naravyāghrāḥ śūrā vikrāntayodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.023a: itaḥ pracyavatāṃ rātrau yaḥ sa teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_03_u:011.023c: āvṛtya mārgaṃ raudrātmā tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.024a: taṃ bhīmaḥ samaraślāghī balena balināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.025a: paśya digvijaye rājan yathā bhīmena pātitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.026a: saṃbandhī vāsudevaś ca yeṣāṃ śyālaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.026c: kas tān yudhi samāsīta jarāmaraṇavān naraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.027a: tasya te śama evāstu pāṇḍavair bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:011.027c: kuru me vacanaṃ rājan mā mṛtyuvaśam anvagāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.028a: evaṃ tu bruvatas tasya maitreyasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:011.029c: na kiṃ cid uktvā durmedhās tasthau kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.030c: dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ rājan maitreyaṃ kopa āviśat
GE07mbh_03_u:011.031c: vidhinā saṃprayuktaś ca śāpāyāsya mano dadhe
GE07mbh_03_u:011.033a: yasmāt tvaṃ mām anādṛtya nemāṃ vācaṃ cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_03_u:011.034c: yatra bhīmo gadāpātais tavoruṃ bhetsyate balī
GE07mbh_03_u:011.035a: ity evam ukte vacane dhṛtarāṣṭro mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.035c: prasādayām āsa muniṃ naitad evaṃ bhaved iti
GE07mbh_03_u:011.036a: śamaṃ yāsyati cet putras tava rājan yathā tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:011.036c: śāpo na bhavitā tāta viparīte bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:011.037a: sa vilakṣas tu rājendra duryodhanapitā tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:011.037c: maitreyaṃ prāha kirmīraḥ kathaṃ bhīmena pātitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.038a: nāhaṃ vakṣyāmy asūyā te na te śuśrūṣate sutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:011.038c: eṣa te viduraḥ sarvam ākhyāsyati gate mayi
GE07mbh_03_u:011.039a: ity evam uktvā maitreyaḥ prātiṣṭhata yathāgatam
GE07mbh_03_u:012.001a: kirmīrasya vadhaṃ kṣattaḥ śrotum icchāmi kathyatām
GE07mbh_03_u:012.002c: śrutapūrvaṃ mayā teṣāṃ kathānteṣu punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.003c: jagmus tribhir ahorātraiḥ kāmyakaṃ nāma tad vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:012.005a: tad vanaṃ tāpasā nityaṃ śeṣāś ca vanacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.006a: teṣāṃ praviśatāṃ tatra mārgam āvṛtya bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:012.007a: bāhū mahāntau kṛtvā tu tathāsyaṃ ca bhayānakam
GE07mbh_03_u:012.007c: sthitam āvṛtya panthānaṃ yena yānti kurūdvahāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.009c: muñcantaṃ vipulaṃ nādaṃ satoyam iva toyadam
GE07mbh_03_u:012.010c: vimuktanādāḥ saṃpetuḥ sthalajā jalajaiḥ saha saṃpradrutamṛgadvīpimahiṣarkṣasamākulam
GE07mbh_03_u:012.011c: tad vanaṃ tasya nādena saṃprasthitam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:012.013c: rajasā saṃvṛtaṃ tena naṣṭarṣkam abhavan nabhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.015c: āvṛṇot tad vanadvāraṃ maināka iva parvataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.018a: momuhyamānāṃ tāṃ tatra jagṛhuḥ pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.019a: atha tāṃ rākṣasīṃ māyām utthitāṃ ghoradarśanām
GE07mbh_03_u:012.021a: tam uvāca tato rājā dīrghaprajño yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.021c: ko bhavān kasya vā kiṃ te kriyatāṃ kāryam ucyatām
GE07mbh_03_u:012.022c: ahaṃ bakasya vai bhrātā kirmīra iti viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.023c: yudhi nirjitya puruṣān āhāraṃ nityam ācaran
GE07mbh_03_u:012.024a: ke yūyam iha saṃprāptā bhakṣyabhūtā mamāntikam
GE07mbh_03_u:012.024c: yudhi nirjitya vaḥ sarvān bhakṣayiṣye gatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.025a: yudhiṣṭhiras tu tac chrutvā vacas tasya durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.026a: pāṇḍavo dharmarājo 'haṃ yadi te śrotram āgataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.027a: hṛtarājyo vane vāsaṃ vastuṃ kṛtamatis tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.027c: vanam abhyāgato ghoram idaṃ tava parigraham
GE07mbh_03_u:012.028a: kirmīras tv abravīd enaṃ diṣṭyā devair idaṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:012.029c: carāmi pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ nainam āsādayāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:012.030a: so 'yam āsādito diṣṭyā bhrātṛhā kāṅkṣitaś ciram
GE07mbh_03_u:012.030c: anena hi mama bhrātā bako vinihataḥ priyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.031c: vidyābalam upāśritya na hy asty asyaurasaṃ balam
GE07mbh_03_u:012.032a: hiḍimbaś ca sakhā mahyaṃ dayito vanagocaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.032c: hato durātmanānena svasā cāsya hṛtā purā
GE07mbh_03_u:012.033a: so 'yam abhyāgato mūḍho mamedaṃ gahanaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:012.035a: adyāham anṛṇo bhūtvā bhrātuḥ sakhyus tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:012.036a: yadi tena purā mukto bhīmaseno bakena vai
GE07mbh_03_u:012.037a: enaṃ hi vipulaprāṇam adya hatvā vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_03_u:012.038a: evam uktas tu dharmātmā satyasaṃdho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.038c: naitad astīti sakrodho bhartsayām āsa rākṣasam
GE07mbh_03_u:012.039a: tato bhīmo mahābāhur ārujya tarasā druma
GE07mbh_03_u:012.041a: nivārya bhīmo jiṣṇuṃ tu tad rakṣo ghoradarśanam
GE07mbh_03_u:012.042a: ity uktvainam abhikruddhaḥ kakṣyām utpīḍya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.042e: tam abhyadhāvad vegena bhīmo vṛkṣāyudhas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:012.043c: pātayām āsa vegena kuliśaṃ maghavān iva
GE07mbh_03_u:012.044a: asaṃbhrāntaṃ tu tad rakṣaḥ samare pratyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_03_u:012.044c: cikṣepa colmukaṃ dīptam aśaniṃ jvalitām iva
GE07mbh_03_u:012.045a: tad udastam alātaṃ tu bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.045c: padā savyena cikṣepa tad rakṣaḥ punar āvrajat
GE07mbh_03_u:012.046a: kirmīraś cāpi sahasā vṛkṣam utpāṭya pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_03_u:012.048a: śīrṣayoḥ patitā vṛkṣā bibhidur naikadhā tayoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.050a: tad vṛkṣayuddham abhavat sumuhūrtaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:012.050c: rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya narāṇām uttamasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:012.051a: tataḥ śilāṃ samutkṣipya bhīmasya yudhi tiṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.051c: prāhiṇod rākṣasaḥ kruddho bhīmasenaś cacāla ha
GE07mbh_03_u:012.053c: ubhāv api cakāśete prayuddhau vṛṣabhāv iva
GE07mbh_03_u:012.057a: taṃ cāpy ātha tato rakṣaḥ pratijagrāha vīryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:012.057c: tam ākṣipad bhīmaseno balena balināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.059a: athainam ākṣipya balād gṛhya madhye vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.059c: dhūnayām āsa vegena vāyuś caṇḍa iva drumam
GE07mbh_03_u:012.060a: sa bhīmena parāmṛṣṭo durbalo balinā raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:012.061c: yoktrayām āsa bāhubhyāṃ paśuṃ raśanayā yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:012.065c: bhūtale pātayām āsa vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_03_u:012.066c: kariṣyasi gataś cāsi yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:012.067a: ity evam uktvā puruṣapravīras; taṃ rākṣasaṃ krodhavivṛttanetraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.068a: tasmin hate toyadatulyarūpe; kṛṣṇāṃ puraskṛtya narendraputrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.068c: bhīmaṃ praśasyātha guṇair anekair; hṛṣṭās tato dvaitavanāya jagmuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.070a: tato niṣkaṇṭakaṃ kṛtvā vanaṃ tad aparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.070c: draupadyā saha dharmajño vasatiṃ tām uvāsa ha
GE07mbh_03_u:012.071a: samāśvāsya ca te sarve draupadīṃ bharatarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.072c: viviśus tad vanaṃ vīrāḥ kṣemaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
GE07mbh_03_u:012.073a: sa mayā gacchatā mārge vinikīrṇo bhayāvahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.073c: vane mahati duṣṭātmā dṛṣṭo bhīmabalād dhataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:012.074a: tatrāśrauṣam ahaṃ caitat karma bhīmasya bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:013.001a: bhojāḥ pravrajitāñ śrutvā vṛṣṇayaś cāndhakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:013.002a: pāñcālasya ca dāyādā dhṛṣṭaketuś ca cedipaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.003b-0043_01: keśavaḥ sātyakiś caiva dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.003b-0043_02: amātyaiḥ saha mitraiś ca balena svajanena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:013.003b-0043_03: vane tena yayuḥ pārthān ūcuḥ kiṃ karavāmahe
GE07mbh_03_u:013.003c: garhayanto dhārtarāṣṭrān kiṃ kurma iti cābruvan
GE07mbh_03_u:013.005d-0045_01: etān nihatya samare ye ca teṣāṃ padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.005d-0045_02: tāṃś ca sarvān vinirjitya sahitān sanarādhipān
GE07mbh_03_u:013.007c: arjunaḥ śamayām āsā didhakṣantam iva prajāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.010c: vyacaras tvaṃ purā kṛṣṇa parvate gandhamādane
GE07mbh_03_u:013.011c: puṣkareṣv avasaḥ kṛṣṇa tvam apo bhakṣayan purā
GE07mbh_03_u:013.014e: ātiṣṭhas tapa ekena pādena niyame sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.015a: kṣetrajñaḥ sarvabhūtānām ādir antaś ca keśava
GE07mbh_03_u:013.015c: nidhānaṃ tapasāṃ kṛṣṇa yajñas tvaṃ ca sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.015d-0047_02: śīlas tvaṃ sarvayogānāṃ vīrāṇāṃ niyamasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:013.017a: kṛtvā tat karma lokānām ṛṣabhaḥ sarvalokajit
GE07mbh_03_u:013.017c: avadhīs tvaṃ raṇe sarvān sametān daityadānavān
GE07mbh_03_u:013.019a: sa tvaṃ nārāyaṇo bhūtvā harir āsīḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_03_u:013.019c: brahmā somaś ca sūryaś ca dharmo dhātā yamo 'nalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.020a: vāyur vaiśravaṇo rudraḥ kālaḥ khaṃ pṛthivī diśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.021c: ayajo bhūritejā vai kṛṣṇa caitrarathe vane
GE07mbh_03_u:013.023c: tvaṃ viṣṇur iti vikhyāta indrād avarajo bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:013.024a: śiśur bhūtvā divaṃ khaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_03_u:013.024c: tribhir vikramaṇaiḥ kṛṣṇa krāntavān asi tejasā
GE07mbh_03_u:013.025c: atyarocaś ca bhūtātman bhāskaraṃ svena tejasā
GE07mbh_03_u:013.026c: kṛtaḥ kṣemaḥ punaḥ panthāḥ puraṃ prāgjyotiṣaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:013.027a: jārūthyām āhutiḥ krāthaḥ śiśupālo janaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:013.027c: bhīmasenaś ca śaibyaś ca śatadhanvā ca nirjitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.028c: avākṣīr mahiṣīṃ bhojyāṃ raṇe nirjitya rukmiṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:013.029a: indradyumno hataḥ kopād yavanaś ca kaśerumān
GE07mbh_03_u:013.029c: hataḥ saubhapatiḥ śālvas tvayā saubhaṃ ca pātitam
GE07mbh_03_u:013.029d-0049_01: evam ete yudhi hatā bhūyaś cānyāñ śṛṇuṣva ha
GE07mbh_03_u:013.030c: gopatis tālaketuś ca tvayā vinihatāv ubhau
GE07mbh_03_u:013.031a: tāṃ ca bhogavatīṃ puṇyām ṛṣikāntāṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_03_u:013.032a: na krodho na ca mātsaryaṃ nānṛtaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_03_u:013.032c: tvayi tiṣṭhati dāśārha na nṛśaṃsyaṃ kuto 'nṛju
GE07mbh_03_u:013.034c: ātmany evātmasāt kṛtvā jagad āsse paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_03_u:013.034d-0050_03: taṃ hantum udyatau ghorau dānavau madhukaiṭabhau
GE07mbh_03_u:013.034d-0050_04: tayor vyatikramaṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddhasya bhavato hareḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.034d-0051_02: iṣṭavāṃs tvaṃ mahāsatraṃ kṛṣṇa caitrarathe vane
GE07mbh_03_u:013.035a: naivaṃ pūrve nāpare vā kariṣyanti kṛtāni te
GE07mbh_03_u:013.035c: karmāṇi yāni deva tvaṃ bāla eva mahādyute
GE07mbh_03_u:013.037a: evam uktvā tadātmānam ātmā kṛṣṇasya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.037c: tūṣṇīm āsīt tataḥ pārtham ity uvāca janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.038a: mamaiva tvaṃ tavaivāhaṃ ye madīyās tavaiva te
GE07mbh_03_u:013.038c: yas tvāṃ dveṣṭi sa māṃ dveṣṭi yas tvām anu sa mām anu
GE07mbh_03_u:013.039a: naras tvam asi durdharṣa harir nārāyaṇo hy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:013.039c: lokāl lokam imaṃ prāptau naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
GE07mbh_03_u:013.040a: ananyaḥ pārtha mattas tvam ahaṃ tvattaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:013.041-0052_01: evam ukte tu vacane keśavena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_03_u:013.041-0053_01: ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ pāṇḍavaṃ supriyaṃ priyam
GE07mbh_03_u:013.041-0053_02: prīyamāṇo hṛṣīkeśas tūṣṇīm āsāṃ babhūva ha
GE07mbh_03_u:013.043a: pūrve prajānisarge tvām āhur ekaṃ prajāpatim
GE07mbh_03_u:013.044a: viṣṇus tvam asi durdharṣa tvaṃ yajño madhusūdana
GE07mbh_03_u:013.044c: yaṣṭā tvam asi yaṣṭavyo jāmadagnyo yathābravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:013.045a: ṛṣayas tvāṃ kṣamām āhuḥ satyaṃ ca puruṣottama
GE07mbh_03_u:013.045c: satyād yajño 'si saṃbhūtaḥ kaśyapas tvāṃ yathābravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:013.046d-0055_02: krīḍase tvaṃ naravyāghra bālaḥ krīḍanakair iva
GE07mbh_03_u:013.047a: divaṃ te śirasā vyāptaṃ padbhyāṃ ca pṛthivī vibho
GE07mbh_03_u:013.047c: jaṭharaṃ te ime lokāḥ puruṣo 'si sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.050a: tvaṃ prabhus tvaṃ vibhus tvaṃ bhūr ātmabhūs tvaṃ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.050c: lokapālāś ca lokāś ca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa
GE07mbh_03_u:013.050e: nabhaś candraś ca sūryaś ca tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_03_u:013.052a: sā te 'haṃ duḥkham ākhyāsye praṇayān madhusūdana
GE07mbh_03_u:013.052c: īśas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.053a: kathaṃ nu bhāryā pārthānāṃ tava kṛṣṇa sakhī vibho
GE07mbh_03_u:013.055c: dṛṣṭvā ca māṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ prāhasan pāpacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.055d-0056_01: kṛṣyamāṇāṃ tathā dīnām anāthām iva mādhava
GE07mbh_03_u:013.055d-0056_02: āhuś caitān ṣaṇḍatilān pañca caiva tu pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_03_u:013.055d-0056_03: patim anyaṃ vṛṇīṣveti sarve te madhusūdana
GE07mbh_03_u:013.056a: dāsībhāvena bhoktuṃ mām īṣus te madhusūdana
GE07mbh_03_u:013.057a: nanv ahaṃ kṛṣṇa bhīṣmasya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.057c: snuṣā bhavāmi dharmeṇa sāhaṃ dāsīkṛtā balāt
GE07mbh_03_u:013.058a: garhaye pāṇḍavāṃs tv eva yudhi śreṣṭhān mahābalān
GE07mbh_03_u:013.059a: dhig balaṃ bhīmasenasya dhik pārthasya dhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_03_u:013.059c: yau māṃ viprakṛtāṃ kṣudrair marṣayetāṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_03_u:013.062a: ātmā hi jāyate tasyāṃ tasmāj jāyā bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:013.062c: bhartā ca bhāryayā rakṣyaḥ kathaṃ jāyān mamodare
GE07mbh_03_u:013.063a: nanv ime śaraṇaṃ prāptān na tyajanti kadā cana
GE07mbh_03_u:013.063c: te māṃ śaraṇam āpannāṃ nānvapadyanta pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.065c: arjunāc chrutakīrtis tu śatānīkas tu nākuliḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.066c: pradyumno yādṛśaḥ kṛṣṇa tādṛśās te mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.067a: nanv ime dhanuṣi śreṣṭhā ajeyā yudhi śātravaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.068a: adharmeṇa hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ sarve dāsāḥ kṛtās tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:013.069a: nādhijyam api yac chakyaṃ kartum anyena gāṇḍivam
GE07mbh_03_u:013.070a: dhig bhīmasenasya balaṃ dhik pārthasya ca gāṇḍivam
GE07mbh_03_u:013.070c: yatra duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇa muhūrtam api jīvati
GE07mbh_03_u:013.070d-0057_01: kālaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.070d-0057_02: tat kālena kṛtaṃ manye na te pauruṣavardhanam
GE07mbh_03_u:013.071a: ya etān ākṣipad rāṣṭrāt saha mātrāvihiṃsakān
GE07mbh_03_u:013.074c: baddhvainaṃ kṛṣṇa gaṅgāyāṃ prakṣipya punar āvrajat
GE07mbh_03_u:013.075a: yadā vibuddhaḥ kaunteyas tadā saṃchidya bandhanam
GE07mbh_03_u:013.076c: sarveṣv evāṅgadeśeṣu na mamāra ca śatruhā
GE07mbh_03_u:013.077a: pratibuddhas tu kaunteyaḥ sarvān sarpān apothayat
GE07mbh_03_u:013.078c: śayānān āryayā sārdhaṃ ko nu tat kartum arhati
GE07mbh_03_u:013.079a: yatrāryā rudatī bhītā pāṇḍavān idam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:013.080a: hā hatāsmi kuto nv adya bhavec chāntir ihānalāt
GE07mbh_03_u:013.081c: āryām āśvāsayām āsa bhrātṝṃś cāpi vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.082a: vainateyo yathā pakṣī garuḍaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.083a: āryām aṅkena vāmena rājānaṃ dakṣiṇena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:013.083c: aṃsayoś ca yamau kṛtvā pṛṣṭhe bībhatsum eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:013.084c: bhrātṝn āryāṃ ca balavān mokṣayām āsa pāvakāt
GE07mbh_03_u:013.085a: te rātrau prasthitāḥ sarve mātrā saha yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.086a: śrāntāḥ prasuptās tatreme mātrā saha suduḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.086c: suptāṃś cainān abhyagacchad dhiḍimbā nāma rākṣasī
GE07mbh_03_u:013.086d-0058_01: sā dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavaṃ tatra śayānaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:013.087a: bhīmasya pādau kṛtvā tu sva utsaṅge tato balāt
GE07mbh_03_u:013.088c: paryapṛcchac ca tāṃ bhīmaḥ kim ihecchasy anindite
GE07mbh_03_u:013.088d-0059_01: saivam uktā tu bhīmena rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī
GE07mbh_03_u:013.088d-0059_03: palāyadhvam itaḥ kṣipraṃ mama bhrātā suvīryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:013.088d-0059_04: āgamiṣyati vo hantuṃ tasmād gacchata māciram
GE07mbh_03_u:013.089a: tayoḥ śrutvā tu kathitam āgacchad rākṣasādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.090c: hiḍimbe bhakṣayiṣyāvo na ciraṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:013.092a: sa nādān vinadan ghorān rākṣasaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.093a: tam abhidrutya saṃkruddho vegena mahatā balī
GE07mbh_03_u:013.096d-0063_02: nijaghāna mahāvīryas taṃ tadā nirbalaṃ balī
GE07mbh_03_u:013.096d-0064_01: talair aśanikalpaiś ca muṣṭibhiś cāhanat tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:013.096d-0065_01: tato bhīmo mahābāhū rūpam āsthāya vai mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:013.096d-0065_02: jaghāna rākṣasaṃ kruddho vṛtraṃ devapatir yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:013.097a: hatvā hiḍimbaṃ bhīmo 'tha prasthito bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:013.097c: hiḍimbām agrataḥ kṛtvā yasyāṃ jāto ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.098a: tataś ca prādravan sarve saha mātrā yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.099a: prasthāne vyāsa eṣāṃ ca mantrī priyahito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:013.100a: tatrāpy āsādayām āsur bakaṃ nāma mahābalam
GE07mbh_03_u:013.101a: taṃ cāpi vinihatyograṃ bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.101c: sahito bhrātṛbhiḥ sarvair drupadasya puraṃ yayau
GE07mbh_03_u:013.102c: yathā tvayā jitā kṛṣṇa rukmiṇī bhīṣmakātmajā
GE07mbh_03_u:013.103c: svayaṃvare mahat karma kṛtvā nasukaraṃ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.107a: kule mahati jātāsmi divyena vidhinā kila
GE07mbh_03_u:013.107c: pāṇḍavānāṃ priyā bhāryā snuṣā pāṇḍor mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.108a: kacagraham anuprāptā sāsmi kṛṣṇa varā satī
GE07mbh_03_u:013.109a: ity uktvā prārudat kṛṣṇā mukhaṃ pracchādya pāṇinā
GE07mbh_03_u:013.112a: naiva me patayaḥ santi na putrā madhusūdana
GE07mbh_03_u:013.112c: na bhrātaro na ca pitā naiva tvaṃ na ca bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.113a: ye māṃ viprakṛtāṃ kṣudrair upekṣadhvaṃ viśokavat
GE07mbh_03_u:013.113c: na hi me śāmyate duḥkhaṃ karṇo yat prāhasat tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:013.113d-0066_01: caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ kṛṣṇa tvayā rakṣyāsmi nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.114c: rodiṣyanti striyo hy evaṃ yeṣāṃ kruddhāsi bhāmini
GE07mbh_03_u:013.116a: yat samarthaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ tat kariṣyāmi mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.116c: satyaṃ te pratijānāmi rājñāṃ rājñī bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:013.117a: pated dyaur himavāñ śīryet pṛthivī śakalībhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:013.117c: śuṣyet toyanidhiḥ kṛṣṇe na me moghaṃ vaco bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:013.117d-0070_01: tac chrutvā draupadī vākyaṃ prativākyam athācyutāt
GE07mbh_03_u:013.117d-0070_02: sācīkṛtam avaikṣat sā pāñcālī madhyamaṃ patim
GE07mbh_03_u:013.117d-0070_04: mā rodīḥ śubhatāmrākṣi yad āha madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.117d-0070_05: tathā tad bhavitā devi nānyathā varavarṇini
GE07mbh_03_u:013.118a: ahaṃ droṇaṃ haniṣyāmi śikhaṇḍī tu pitāmaham
GE07mbh_03_u:013.119c: api vṛtrahaṇā yuddhe kiṃ punar dhṛtarāṣṭrajaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:013.120c: teṣāṃ madhye mahābāhuḥ keśavo vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:014.001a: nedaṃ kṛcchram anuprāpto bhavān syād vasudhādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:014.001c: yady ahaṃ dvārakāyāṃ syāṃ rājan saṃnihitaḥ purā
GE07mbh_03_u:014.003a: vārayeyam ahaṃ dyūtaṃ bahūn doṣān pradarśayan
GE07mbh_03_u:014.003c: bhīṣmadroṇau samānāyya kṛpaṃ bāhlīkam eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:014.004c: putrāṇāṃ tava rājendra tvannimittam iti prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:014.005a: tatra vakṣyāmy ahaṃ doṣān yair bhavān avaropitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:014.005c: vīrasenasuto yaiś ca rājyāt prabhraṃśitaḥ purā
GE07mbh_03_u:014.005d-0072_01: puṣkareṇa narendreṇa tāñ ca vakṣyāmi tasya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:014.007c: vyasanaṃ catuṣṭayaṃ proktaṃ yai rājan bhraśyate śriyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:014.008c: viśeṣataś ca vaktavyaṃ dyūte paśyanti tadvidaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:014.009a: ekāhnā dravyanāśo 'tra dhruvaṃ vyasanam eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:014.010a: etac cānyac ca kauravya prasaṅgi kaṭukodayam
GE07mbh_03_u:014.011a: evam ukto yadi mayā gṛhṇīyād vacanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:014.012a: na cet sa mama rājendra gṛhṇīyān madhuraṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:014.012c: pathyaṃ ca bharataśreṣṭha nigṛhṇīyāṃ balena tam
GE07mbh_03_u:014.013c: sabhāsadaś ca tān sarvān bhedayeyaṃ durodarān
GE07mbh_03_u:014.013d-0073_01: sarvāṃs tān anugṛhṇīma baddhvā pāśais tu vāruṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:014.014a: asāṃnidhyaṃ tu kauravya mamānarteṣv abhūt tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:014.016c: tūrṇam abhyāgato 'smi tvāṃ draṣṭukāmo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:014.017a: aho kṛcchram anuprāptāḥ sarve sma bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:014.017c: ye vayaṃ tvāṃ vyasaninaṃ paśyāmaḥ saha sodaraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:015.001c: kva cāsīd vipravāsas te kiṃ vākārṣīḥ pravāsakaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:015.002c: vinihantuṃ naraśreṣṭha tatra me śṛṇu kāraṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:015.003a: mahātejā mahābāhur yaḥ sa rājā mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:015.005c: upāyād dvārakāṃ śūnyām ihasthe mayi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:015.006a: sa tatra yodhito rājan bālakair vṛṣṇipuṃgavaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:015.007a: tato vṛṣṇipravīrāṃs tān bālān hatvā bahūṃs tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:015.009a: tasya yuddhārthino darpaṃ yuddhe nāśayitāsmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:015.009c: ānartāḥ satyam ākhyāta tatra gantāsmi yatra saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:015.011a: kvāsau kvāsāv iti punas tatra tatra vidhāvati
GE07mbh_03_u:015.011c: mayā kila raṇe yuddhaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ sa saubharāṭ
GE07mbh_03_u:015.014a: bhrātā bālaś ca rājā ca na ca saṃgrāmamūrdhani
GE07mbh_03_u:015.014c: pramattaś ca hato vīras taṃ haniṣye janārdanam
GE07mbh_03_u:015.015c: kāmagena sa saubhena kṣiptvā māṃ kurunandana
GE07mbh_03_u:015.016a: tam aśrauṣam ahaṃ gatvā yathā vṛttaḥ sudurmatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:015.017c: niścitya manasā rājan vadhāyāsya mano dadhe
GE07mbh_03_u:015.018a: ānarteṣu vimardaṃ ca kṣepaṃ cātmani kaurava
GE07mbh_03_u:015.019c: sa mayā sāgarāvarte dṛṣṭa āsīt parīpsatā
GE07mbh_03_u:015.020a: tataḥ pradhmāpya jalajaṃ pāñcajanyam ahaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:015.021a: sumuhūrtam abhūd yuddhaṃ tatra me dānavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:015.021c: vaśībhūtāś ca me sarve bhūtale ca nipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:015.022a: etat kāryaṃ mahābāho yenāhaṃ nāgamaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:015.022d-0077_01: śrutvaiva tat kṣaṇaṃ vegād āgato 'haṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:016.001c: saubhasya vadham ācakṣva na hi tṛpyāmi kathyataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:016.002a: hataṃ śrutvā mahābāho mayā śrautaśravaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_03_u:016.003c: śālvo vaihāyasaṃ cāpi tat puraṃ vyūhya viṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:016.004a: tatrastho 'tha mahīpālo yodhayām āsa tāṃ purīm
GE07mbh_03_u:016.011c: utkṣiptagulmaiś ca tathā hayaiś caiva padātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:016.012a: āghoṣitaṃ ca nagare na pātavyā sureti ha
GE07mbh_03_u:016.013a: pramatteṣv abhighātaṃ hi kuryāc chālvo narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:016.013c: iti kṛtvāpramattās te sarve vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:016.015a: saṃkramā bheditāḥ sarve nāvaś ca pratiṣedhitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:016.015c: parikhāś cāpi kauravya kīlaiḥ sunicitāḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:016.016c: samantāt krośamātraṃ ca kāritā viṣamā ca bhūḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:016.016d-0078_01: saṃkramā bheditāḥ sarve prākārāś ca navīkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:016.017a: prakṛtyā viṣamaṃ durgaṃ prakṛtyā ca surakṣitam
GE07mbh_03_u:016.020a: anu rathyāsu sarvāsu catvareṣu ca kaurava
GE07mbh_03_u:016.021c: kṛtāpadānaṃ ca tadā balam āsīn mahābhuja
GE07mbh_03_u:016.022a: na kupyavetanī kaś cin na cātikrāntavetanī
GE07mbh_03_u:017.001a: tāṃ tūpayātvā rājendra śālvaḥ saubhapatis tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:017.003c: valmīkāṃś caiva caityāṃś ca tanniviṣṭam abhūd balam
GE07mbh_03_u:017.004c: pravaṇā nava caivāsañ śālvasya śibire nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:017.009c: cārudeṣṇaś ca sāmbaś ca pradyumnaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:017.011a: gṛhītvā tu dhanuḥ sāmbaḥ śālvasya sacivaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:017.012a: tasya bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ jāmbavatyāḥ suto mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:017.013a: tad bāṇavarṣaṃ tumulaṃ viṣehe sa camūpatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:017.014a: tataḥ sāmbāya rājendra kṣemavṛddhir api sma ha
GE07mbh_03_u:017.015a: tato māyāmayaṃ jālaṃ māyayaiva vidārya saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:017.016a: tataḥ sa viddhaḥ sāmbena kṣemavṛddhiś camūpatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:017.017c: vegavān nāma daiteyaḥ sutaṃ me 'bhyadravad balī
GE07mbh_03_u:017.018c: vegaṃ vegavato rājaṃs tasthau vīro vidhārayan
GE07mbh_03_u:017.019a: sa vegavati kaunteya sāmbo vegavatīṃ gadām
GE07mbh_03_u:017.020a: tayā tv abhihato rājan vegavān apatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:017.021c: praviśya mahatīṃ senāṃ yodhayām āsa me sutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:017.026c: cikṣepa me suto rājan sa gatāsur athāpatat
GE07mbh_03_u:017.027a: vivindhyaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ ca vikṣobhitāṃ camūm
GE07mbh_03_u:017.027c: kāmagena sa saubhena śālvaḥ punar upāgamat
GE07mbh_03_u:017.028a: tato vyākulitaṃ sarvaṃ dvārakāvāsi tad balam
GE07mbh_03_u:017.029a: tato niryāya kaunteya vyavasthāpya ca tad balam
GE07mbh_03_u:017.030a: sarve bhavantas tiṣṭhantu sarve paśyantu māṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_03_u:017.031a: ahaṃ saubhapateḥ senām āyasair bhujagair iva
GE07mbh_03_u:017.032a: āśvasadhvaṃ na bhīḥ kāryā saubharāḍ adya naśyati
GE07mbh_03_u:017.033c: viṣṭhitaṃ tad balaṃ vīra yuyudhe ca yathāsukham
GE07mbh_03_u:018.001c: daṃśitair haribhir yuktaṃ ratham āsthāya kāñcanam
GE07mbh_03_u:018.002c: utpatadbhir ivākāśaṃ tair hayair anvayāt parān
GE07mbh_03_u:018.004a: sa vidyuccalitaṃ cāpaṃ viharan vai talāt talam
GE07mbh_03_u:018.005c: antaraṃ dadṛśe kaś cin nighnataḥ śātravān raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:018.006a: mukhasya varṇo na vikalpate 'sya; celuś ca gātrāṇi na cāpi tasya
GE07mbh_03_u:018.006c: siṃhonnataṃ cāpy abhigarjato 'sya; śuśrāva loko 'dbhutarūpam agryam
GE07mbh_03_u:018.007c: vitrāsayan rājati vāhamukhye; śālvasya senāpramukhe dhvajāgryaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:018.008a: tataḥ sa tūrṇaṃ niṣpatya pradyumnaḥ śatrukarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:018.010a: sa roṣamadamatto vai kāmagād avaruhya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:018.013a: sa taṃ rathavaraṃ śrīmān samāruhya kila prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:018.014a: tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vyasṛjat tarasā raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:018.015a: sa tair abhihataḥ saṃkhye nāmarṣayata saubharāṭ
GE07mbh_03_u:018.015d-0079_01: tān āpatata (sic!) bāṇaughān sa ciccheda mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:018.015d-0079_02: tataś cānyāñ śarān dīptān pracikṣepa sute mama
GE07mbh_03_u:018.017a: tasya varma vibhidyāśu sa bāṇo matsuteritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:018.017c: bibheda hṛdayaṃ patrī sa papāta mumoha ca
GE07mbh_03_u:018.020a: tata utthāya kauravya pratilabhya ca cetanām
GE07mbh_03_u:018.021a: tena viddho mahābāhuḥ pradyumnaḥ samare sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:018.021c: jatrudeśe bhṛśaṃ vīro vyavāsīdad rathe tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:018.022a: taṃ sa viddhvā mahārāja śālvo rukmiṇinandanam
GE07mbh_03_u:018.023a: tato mohaṃ samāpanne tanaye mama bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:018.023c: mumoca bāṇāṃs tvaritaḥ punar anyān durāsadān
GE07mbh_03_u:018.024a: sa tair abhihato bāṇair bahubhis tena mohitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.002c: pradyumne patite rājan pare ca muditābhavan
GE07mbh_03_u:019.003a: taṃ tathā mohitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sārathir javanair hayaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.003c: raṇād apāharat tūrṇaṃ śikṣito dārukis tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.005a: saute kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ kasmād yāsi parāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.006a: kaccit saute na te mohaḥ śālvaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāhave
GE07mbh_03_u:019.006c: viṣādo vā raṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā brūhi me tvaṃ yathātatham
GE07mbh_03_u:019.007a: jānārdane na me moho nāpi me bhayam āviśat
GE07mbh_03_u:019.007c: atibhāraṃ tu te manye śālvaṃ keśavanandana
GE07mbh_03_u:019.008a: so 'payāmi śanair vīra balavān eṣa pāpakṛt
GE07mbh_03_u:019.008c: mohitaś ca raṇe śūro rakṣyaḥ sārathinā rathī
GE07mbh_03_u:019.009a: āyuṣmaṃs tvaṃ mayā nityaṃ rakṣitavyas tvayāpy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:019.009c: rakṣitavyo rathī nityam iti kṛtvāpayāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:019.010a: ekaś cāsi mahābāho bahavaś cāpi dānavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.011a: evaṃ bruvati sūte tu tadā makaraketumān
GE07mbh_03_u:019.011c: uvāca sūtaṃ kauravya nivartaya rathaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.012a: dārukātmaja maivaṃ tvaṃ punaḥ kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:019.012c: vyapayānaṃ raṇāt saute jīvato mama karhi cit
GE07mbh_03_u:019.013a: na sa vṛṣṇikule jāto yo vai tyajati saṃgaram
GE07mbh_03_u:019.013c: yo vā nipatitaṃ hanti tavāsmīti ca vādinam
GE07mbh_03_u:019.014a: tathā striyaṃ vai yo hanti vṛddhaṃ bālaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:019.015a: tvaṃ ca sūtakule jāto vinītaḥ sūtakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_03_u:019.015c: dharmajñaś cāsi vṛṣṇīnām āhaveṣv api dāruke
GE07mbh_03_u:019.016a: sa jānaṃś caritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ pṛtanāmukhe
GE07mbh_03_u:019.016c: apayānaṃ punaḥ saute maivaṃ kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:019.017c: gadāgrajo durādharṣaḥ kiṃ māṃ vakṣyati mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.019a: kiṃ vakṣyati śiner naptā narasiṃho mahādhanuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.019c: apayātaṃ raṇāt saute sāmbaś ca samitiṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.020c: akrūraś ca mahābāhuḥ kiṃ māṃ vakṣyati sārathe
GE07mbh_03_u:019.021c: striyaś ca vṛṣṇīvīrāṇāṃ kiṃ māṃ vakṣyanti saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.022c: dhig enam iti vakṣyanti na tu vakṣyanti sādhv iti
GE07mbh_03_u:019.023a: dhig vācā parihāso 'pi mama vā madvidhasya vā
GE07mbh_03_u:019.023c: mṛtyunābhyadhikaḥ saute sa tvaṃ mā vyapayāḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.024a: bhāraṃ hi mayi saṃnyasya yāto madhunihā hariḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.025a: kṛtavarmā mayā vīro niryāsyann eva vāritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.025c: śālvaṃ nivārayiṣye 'haṃ tiṣṭha tvam iti sūtaja
GE07mbh_03_u:019.026a: sa ca saṃbhāvayan māṃ vai nivṛtto hṛdikātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.026c: taṃ sametya raṇaṃ tyaktvā kiṃ vakṣyāmi mahāratham
GE07mbh_03_u:019.028c: mayā spardhanti satataṃ kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi tān aham
GE07mbh_03_u:019.029a: tyaktvā raṇam imaṃ saute pṛṣṭhato 'bhyāhataḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:019.029c: tvayāpanīto vivaśo na jīveyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:019.030c: na caitad evaṃ kartavyam athāpatsu kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:019.031a: na jīvitam ahaṃ saute bahu manye kadā cana
GE07mbh_03_u:019.032a: kadā vā sūtaputra tvaṃ jānīṣe māṃ bhayārditam
GE07mbh_03_u:019.032c: apayātaṃ raṇaṃ hitvā yathā kāpuruṣaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:019.033a: na yuktaṃ bhavatā tyaktuṃ saṃgrāmaṃ dārukātmaja
GE07mbh_03_u:019.033c: mayi yuddhārthini bhṛśaṃ sa tvaṃ yāhi yato raṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:020.001a: evam uktas tu kaunteya sūtaputras tadā mṛdhe
GE07mbh_03_u:020.001c: pradyumnam abravīc chlakṣṇaṃ madhuraṃ vākyam añjasā
GE07mbh_03_u:020.002a: na me bhayaṃ raukmiṇeya saṃgrāme yacchato hayān
GE07mbh_03_u:020.002c: yuddhajñaś cāsmi vṛṣṇīnāṃ nātra kiṃ cid ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_03_u:020.003a: āyuṣmann upadeśas tu sārathye vartatāṃ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:020.003c: sarvārtheṣu rathī rakṣyas tvaṃ cāpi bhṛśapīḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:020.006c: vītabhīḥ praviśāmy etāṃ śālvasya mahatīṃ camūm
GE07mbh_03_u:020.007a: evam uktvā tato vīra hayān saṃcodya saṃgare
GE07mbh_03_u:020.008c: savyāni ca vicitrāṇi dakṣiṇāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:020.010c: dahyamānā iva tadā paspṛśuś caraṇair mahīm
GE07mbh_03_u:020.012c: yantāram asya sahasā tribhir bāṇaiḥ samarpayat
GE07mbh_03_u:020.013a: dārukasya sutas taṃ tu bāṇavegam acintayan
GE07mbh_03_u:020.014a: tato bāṇān bahuvidhān punar eva sa saubharāṭ
GE07mbh_03_u:020.015a: tān aprāptāñ śitair bāṇaiś ciccheda paravīrahā
GE07mbh_03_u:020.016a: chinnān dṛṣṭvā tu tān bāṇān pradyumnena sa saubharāṭ
GE07mbh_03_u:020.016c: āsurīṃ dāruṇīṃ māyām āsthāya vyasṛjac charān
GE07mbh_03_u:020.018a: te tad astraṃ vidhūyāśu vivyadhū rudhirāśanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:020.018c: śirasy urasi vaktre ca sa mumoha papāta ca
GE07mbh_03_u:020.020c: dṛṣṭvā śaraṃ jyām abhinīyamānaṃ; babhūva hāhākṛtam antarikṣam
GE07mbh_03_u:020.021a: tato devagaṇāḥ sarve sendrāḥ saha dhaneśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:020.021c: nāradaṃ preṣayām āsuḥ śvasanaṃ ca mahābalam
GE07mbh_03_u:020.022c: naiṣa vadhyas tvayā vīra śālvarājaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:020.023a: saṃharasva punar bāṇam avadhyo 'yaṃ tvayā raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:020.023c: etasya hi śarasyājau nāvadhyo 'sti pumān kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:020.024c: kṛṣṇaḥ saṃkalpito dhātrā tan na mithyā bhaved iti
GE07mbh_03_u:020.027a: sa dvārakāṃ parityajya krūro vṛṣṇibhir arditaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:020.027c: saubham āsthāya rājendra divam ācakrame tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:021.004c: kim idaṃ naraśārdūla śrotum icchāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_03_u:021.005a: evam uktas tu sa mayā vistareṇedam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:021.005c: rodhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca śālvena hārdikyo rājasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:021.009a: nāhatvā taṃ nivartiṣye purīṃ dvāravatīṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:021.009c: saśālvaṃ saubhanagaraṃ hatvā draṣṭāsmi vaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:021.010c: sarve mām abruvan hṛṣṭāḥ prayāhi jahi śātravān
GE07mbh_03_u:021.014a: samatītya bahūn deśān girīṃś ca bahupādapān
GE07mbh_03_u:021.015c: prayātaṃ saubham āsthāya tam ahaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nvayām
GE07mbh_03_u:021.016a: tataḥ sāgaram āsādya kukṣau tasya mahormiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:021.016d-0081_01: sa mām ālokya sahasā senāṃ svāṃ prāhiṇon mṛdhe
GE07mbh_03_u:021.016d-0081_02: madbāhunā ca senāyāṃ śiṣṭāyāṃ kiṃ cid eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:021.017a: sa samālokya dūrān māṃ smayann iva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:021.017c: āhvayām āsa duṣṭātmā yuddhāyaiva muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:021.018c: puraṃ nāsādyata śarais tato māṃ roṣa āviśat
GE07mbh_03_u:021.020a: sainikān mama sūtaṃ ca hayāṃś ca samavākirat
GE07mbh_03_u:021.020c: acintayantas tu śarān vayaṃ yudhyāma bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:021.022a: te hayān me rathaṃ caiva tadā dārukam eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:021.023a: na hayā na ratho vīra na yantā mama dārukaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:021.023c: adṛśyanta śaraiś channās tathāhaṃ sainikāś ca me
GE07mbh_03_u:021.024a: tato 'ham api kauravya śarāṇām ayutān bahūn
GE07mbh_03_u:021.025a: na tatra viṣayas tv āsīn mama sainyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:021.025c: khe viṣaktaṃ hi tat saubhaṃ krośamātra ivābhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:021.026a: tatas te prekṣakāḥ sarve raṅgavāṭa iva sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:021.027c: aṅgeṣu rudhirāktās te viviśuḥ śalabhā iva
GE07mbh_03_u:021.028c: vadhyatāṃ viśikhais tīkṣṇaiḥ patatāṃ ca mahārṇave
GE07mbh_03_u:021.029c: nadanto bhairavān nādan nipatanti sma dānavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:021.031a: tān dṛṣṭvā patitāṃs tatra śālvaḥ saubhapatis tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:021.031c: māyāyuddhena mahatā yodhayām āsa māṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_03_u:021.032c: paṭṭiśāś ca bhuśuṇḍyaś ca prāpatann aniśaṃ mayi
GE07mbh_03_u:021.034a: tato 'bhavat tama iva prabhātam iva cābhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:021.034c: durdinaṃ sudinaṃ caiva śītam uṣṇaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:021.035a: evaṃ māyāṃ vikurvāṇo yodhayām āsa māṃ ripuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:021.035c: vijñāya tad ahaṃ sarvaṃ māyayaiva vyanāśayam
GE07mbh_03_u:021.035d-0085_01: sa mohayām āsa tadā māyayā yudhi dānavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:021.035d-0085_02: tato hatāyāṃ ca mayā māyāyāṃ yudhi dānavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:021.035e: yathākālaṃ tu yuddhena vyadhamaṃ sarvataḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:021.037a: tato nājñāyata tadā divārātraṃ tathā diśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:021.037e: tatas tad astram astreṇa vidhūtaṃ śaratūlavat
GE07mbh_03_u:021.038a: tathā tad abhavad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:021.038c: labdhālokaś ca rājendra punaḥ śatrum ayodhayam
GE07mbh_03_u:022.001a: evaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra śālvo rājñāṃ mahāripuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:022.001c: yudhyamāno mayā saṃkhye viyad abhyāgamat punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:022.002a: tataḥ śataghnīś ca mahāgadāś ca; dīptāṃś ca śūlān musalān asīṃś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:022.002c: cikṣepa roṣān mayi mandabuddhiḥ; śālvo mahārāja jayābhikāṅkṣī
GE07mbh_03_u:022.003a: tān āśugair āpatato 'ham āśu; nivārya tūrṇaṃ khagamān kha eva
GE07mbh_03_u:022.003c: dvidhā tridhā cācchinam āśu muktais; tato 'ntarikṣe ninado babhūva
GE07mbh_03_u:022.004c: dārukaṃ vājinaś caiva rathaṃ ca samavākirat
GE07mbh_03_u:022.005a: tato mām abravīd vīra dāruko vihvalann iva
GE07mbh_03_u:022.005d-0086_01: avasthātuṃ na śakyāmi aṅgaṃ me vyavasīdati
GE07mbh_03_u:022.006a: iti tasya niśamyāhaṃ sāratheḥ karuṇaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:022.007a: na tasyorasi no mūrdhni na kāye na bhujadvaye
GE07mbh_03_u:022.008a: sa tu bāṇavarotpīḍād visravaty asṛg ulbaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:022.008d-0087_02: astraiḥ śastraiś ca vividhaiḥ khasthā hy antarhitā api
GE07mbh_03_u:022.009a: abhīṣuhastaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sīdantaṃ sārathiṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:022.010a: atha māṃ puruṣaḥ kaś cid dvārakānilayo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:022.010c: tvarito ratham abhyetya sauhṛdād iva bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:022.011c: viṣaṇṇaḥ sannakaṇṭho vai tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:022.012a: dvārakādhipatir vīra āha tvām āhuko vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:022.013c: viṣakte tvayi durdharṣa hataḥ śūrasuto balāt
GE07mbh_03_u:022.014a: tad alaṃ sādhu yuddhena nivartasva janārdana
GE07mbh_03_u:022.014c: dvārakām eva rakṣasva kāryam etan mahat tava
GE07mbh_03_u:022.015a: ity ahaṃ tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā paramadurmanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:022.016a: sātyakiṃ baladevaṃ ca pradyumnaṃ ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_03_u:022.016c: jagarhe manasā vīra tac chrutvā vipriyaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:022.017a: ahaṃ hi dvārakāyāś ca pituś ca kurunandana
GE07mbh_03_u:022.018c: sātyakī raukmiṇeyaś ca cārudeṣṇaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:022.019a: eteṣu hi naravyāghra jīvatsu na kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:022.019c: śakyaḥ śūrasuto hantum api vajrabhṛtā svayam
GE07mbh_03_u:022.020a: hataḥ śūrasuto vyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ te ca parāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:022.020c: baladevamukhāḥ sarve iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:022.021a: so 'haṃ sarvavināśaṃ taṃ cintayāno muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:022.022c: saubhāc chūrasutaṃ vīra tato māṃ moha āviśat
GE07mbh_03_u:022.023a: tasya rūpaṃ prapatataḥ pitur mama narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:022.024c: prapatan dṛśyate ha sma kṣīṇapuṇya iva grahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:022.025a: tataḥ śārṅgaṃ dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ karāt prapatitaṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:022.025c: mohāt sannaś ca kaunteya rathopastha upāviśam
GE07mbh_03_u:022.026a: tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ sainyaṃ me gatacetanam
GE07mbh_03_u:022.026c: māṃ dṛṣṭvā rathanīḍasthaṃ gatāsum iva bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:022.027a: prasārya bāhū patataḥ prasārya caraṇāv api
GE07mbh_03_u:022.027c: rūpaṃ pitur apaśyaṃ tac chakuneḥ patato yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:022.028c: abhighnanto bhṛśaṃ vīrā mama ceto vyakampayan
GE07mbh_03_u:022.029a: tato muhūrtāt pratilabhya saṃjñām; ahaṃ tadā vīra mahāvimarde
GE07mbh_03_u:022.029c: na tatra saubhaṃ na ripuṃ na śālvaṃ; paśyāmi vṛddhaṃ pitaraṃ na cāpi
GE07mbh_03_u:022.030a: tato mamāsīn manasi māyeyam iti niścitam
GE07mbh_03_u:022.030c: prabuddho 'smi tato bhūyaḥ śataśo vikirañ śarān
GE07mbh_03_u:023.006a: hatās te dānavāḥ sarve yaiḥ sa śabda udīritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:023.008a: evaṃ daśa diśaḥ sarvās tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:023.008c: nādayām āsur asurās te cāpi nihatā mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:023.009a: tataḥ prāgjyotiṣaṃ gatvā punar eva vyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_03_u:023.009c: saubhaṃ kāmagamaṃ vīra mohayan mama cakṣuṣī
GE07mbh_03_u:023.012c: aprakhyātim iyāṃ rājan sadhvajaḥ parvataiś citaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:023.013a: tato vṛṣṇipravīrā ye mamāsan sainikās tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:023.013c: te bhayārtā diśaḥ sarvāḥ sahasā vipradudruvuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:023.014a: tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvam abhūt kila viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:023.014c: dyauś ca bhūmiś ca khaṃ caivādṛśyamāne tathā mayi
GE07mbh_03_u:023.016a: dviṣatāṃ ca praharṣo 'bhūd ārtiś cādviṣatām api
GE07mbh_03_u:023.016c: evaṃ vijitavān vīra paścād aśrauṣam acyuta
GE07mbh_03_u:023.017c: vajram udyamya tān sarvān parvatān samaśātayam
GE07mbh_03_u:023.019c: dṛṣṭvā māṃ bāndhavāḥ sarve harṣam āhārayan punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:023.020a: tato mām abravīt sūtaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇato nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:023.020c: sādhu saṃpaśya vārṣṇeya śālvaṃ saubhapatiṃ sthitam
GE07mbh_03_u:023.021c: mārdavaṃ sakhitāṃ caiva śālvād adya vyapāhara
GE07mbh_03_u:023.022a: jahi śālvaṃ mahābāho mainaṃ jīvaya keśava
GE07mbh_03_u:023.022c: sarvaiḥ parākramair vīra vadhyaḥ śatrur amitrahan
GE07mbh_03_u:023.023c: yo 'pi syāt pīṭhagaḥ kaś cit kiṃ punaḥ samare sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:023.024a: sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla sarvayatnair imaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:023.024c: jahi vṛṣṇikulaśreṣṭha mā tvāṃ kālo 'tyagāt punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:023.024d-0088_02: sa eṣa nānyair vadhyo hi tvām ṛte naiva kaiś cana
GE07mbh_03_u:023.025a: naiṣa mārdavasādhyo vai mato nāpi sakhā tava
GE07mbh_03_u:023.025c: yena tvaṃ yodhito vīra dvārakā cāvamarditā
GE07mbh_03_u:023.026a: evamādi tu kaunteya śrutvāhaṃ sārather vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:023.026c: tattvam etad iti jñātvā yuddhe matim adhārayam
GE07mbh_03_u:023.027c: dārukaṃ cābruvaṃ vīra muhūrtaṃ sthīyatām iti
GE07mbh_03_u:023.029a: yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca dānavānāṃ ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_03_u:023.031a: jahi saubhaṃ svavīryeṇa ye cātra ripavo mama
GE07mbh_03_u:023.031c: ity uktvā bhujavīryeṇa tasmai prāhiṇavaṃ ruṣā
GE07mbh_03_u:023.033c: madhyena pāṭayām āsa krakaco dārv ivocchritam
GE07mbh_03_u:023.034a: dvidhā kṛtaṃ tataḥ saubhaṃ sudarśanabalād dhatam
GE07mbh_03_u:023.035a: tasmin nipatite saubhe cakram āgāt karaṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:023.035c: punaś coddhūya vegena śālvāyety aham abruvam
GE07mbh_03_u:023.036a: tataḥ śālvaṃ gadāṃ gurvīm āvidhyantaṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_03_u:023.036c: dvidhā cakāra sahasā prajajvāla ca tejasā
GE07mbh_03_u:023.037c: hāhābhūtā diśo jagmur arditā mama sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:023.040a: evaṃ nihatya samare śālvaṃ saubhaṃ nipātya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:023.040c: ānartān punar āgamya suhṛdāṃ prītim āvaham
GE07mbh_03_u:023.041c: yady agāṃ paravīraghna na hi jīvet suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:023.041d-0090_01: mayy āgate 'thavā vīra dyūtaṃ na bhavitā tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:023.043c: rājñā mūrdhany upāghrāto bhīmena ca mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:023.044a: subhadrām abhimanyuṃ ca ratham āropya kāñcanam
GE07mbh_03_u:023.047c: jagāma pāṇḍavān dṛṣṭvā ramyāṃ śuktimatīṃ purīm
GE07mbh_03_u:023.048c: āmantrya pāṇḍavān sarvān prayayus te 'pi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:023.049a: brāhmaṇāś ca viśaś caiva tathā viṣayavāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:023.049c: visṛjyamānāḥ subhṛśaṃ na tyajanti sma pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_03_u:023.051a: yudhiṣṭhiras tu viprāṃs tān anumānya mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:023.051c: śaśāsa puruṣān kāle rathān yojayateti ha
GE07mbh_03_u:024.001c: yamau ca kṛṣṇā ca purohitaś ca; rathān mahārhān paramāśvayuktān
GE07mbh_03_u:024.002a: āsthāya vīrāḥ sahitā vanāya; pratasthire bhūtapatiprakāśāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:024.002c: hiraṇyaniṣkān vasanāni gāś ca; pradāya śikṣākṣaramantravidbhyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:024.003a: preṣyāḥ puro viṃśatir āttaśastrā; dhanūṃṣi varmāṇi śarāṃś ca pītān
GE07mbh_03_u:024.003c: maurvīś ca yantrāṇi ca sāyakāṃś ca; sarve samādāya jaghanyam īyuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:024.004a: tatas tu vāsāṃsi ca rājaputryā; dhātryaś ca dāsyaś ca vibhūṣaṇaṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:024.004c: tad indrasenas tvaritaṃ pragṛhya; jaghanyam evopayayau rathena
GE07mbh_03_u:024.005a: tataḥ kuruśreṣṭham upetya paurāḥ; pradakṣiṇaṃ cakrur adīnasattvāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:024.005c: taṃ brāhmaṇāś cābhyavadan prasannā; mukhyāś ca sarve kurujāṅgalānām
GE07mbh_03_u:024.006a: sa cāpi tān abhyavadat prasannaḥ; sahaiva tair bhrātṛbhir dharmarājaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:024.006c: tasthau ca tatrādhipatir mahātmā; dṛṣṭvā janaughaṃ kurujāṅgalānām
GE07mbh_03_u:024.007a: piteva putreṣu sa teṣu bhāvaṃ; cakre kurūṇām ṛṣabho mahātmā
GE07mbh_03_u:024.007c: te cāpi tasmin bharataprabarhe; tadā babhūvuḥ pitarīva putrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:024.008a: tataḥ samāsādya mahājanaughāḥ; kurupravīraṃ parivārya tasthuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:024.008c: hā nātha hā dharma iti bruvanto; hriyā ca sarve 'śrumukhā babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:024.009a: varaḥ kurūṇām adhipaḥ prajānāṃ; piteva putrān apahāya cāsmān
GE07mbh_03_u:024.009c: paurān imāñ jānapadāṃś ca sarvān; hitvā prayātaḥ kva nu dharmarājaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:024.010a: dhig dhārtarāṣṭraṃ sunṛśaṃsabuddhiṃ; sasaubalaṃ pāpamatiṃ ca karṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:024.010c: anartham icchanti narendra pāpā; ye dharmanityasya satas tavogrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:024.011a: svayaṃ niveśyāpratimaṃ mahātmā; puraṃ mahad devapuraprakāśam
GE07mbh_03_u:024.011c: śatakratuprastham amoghakarmā; hitvā prayātaḥ kva nu dharmarājaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:024.012a: cakāra yām apratimāṃ mahātmā; sabhāṃ mayo devasabhāprakāśām
GE07mbh_03_u:024.012c: tāṃ devaguptām iva devamāyāṃ; hitvā prayātaḥ kva nu dharmarājaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:024.013c: ādāsyate vāsam imaṃ niruṣya; vaneṣu rājā dviṣatāṃ yaśāṃsi
GE07mbh_03_u:024.014a: dvijātimukhyāḥ sahitāḥ pṛthak ca; bhavadbhir āsādya tapasvinaś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:024.014c: prasādya dharmārthavidaś ca vācyā; yathārthasiddhiḥ paramā bhaven naḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:024.015a: ity evam ukte vacane 'rjunena; te brāhmaṇāḥ sarvavarṇāś ca rājan
GE07mbh_03_u:024.015c: mudābhyanandan sahitāś ca cakruḥ; pradakṣiṇaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭham
GE07mbh_03_u:024.016a: āmantrya pārthaṃ ca vṛkodaraṃ ca; dhanaṃjayaṃ yājñasenīṃ yamau ca
GE07mbh_03_u:025.005c: ajñātaṃ mānuṣe loke bhavato nāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:025.006a: tvayā hy upāsitā nityaṃ brāhmaṇā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:025.008a: sarvā gatīr vijānāsi brāhmaṇānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:025.008c: prabhāvāṃś caiva vettha tvaṃ sarveṣām eva pārthiva
GE07mbh_03_u:025.009a: tvam eva rājañ jānāsi śreyaḥkāraṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:025.011c: yadi te 'numataṃ rājan kiṃ vānyan manyate bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:025.012a: mamāpy etan mataṃ pārtha tvayā yat samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:025.012c: gacchāma puṇyaṃ vikhyātaṃ mahad dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:025.013a: tatas te prayayuḥ sarve pāṇḍavā dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:025.013c: brāhmaṇair bahubhiḥ sārdhaṃ puṇyaṃ dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:025.014a: brāhmaṇāḥ sāgnihotrāś ca tathaiva ca niragnayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:025.016a: te yātvā pāṇḍavās tatra bahubhir brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:025.017c: tapātyaye puṣpadharair upetaṃ; mahāvanaṃ rāṣṭrapatir dadarśa
GE07mbh_03_u:025.018a: mahādrumāṇāṃ śikhareṣu tasthur; manoramāṃ vācam udīrayantaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:025.019c: mahānti yūthāni mahādvipānāṃ; tasmin vane rāṣṭrapatir dadarśa
GE07mbh_03_u:025.020c: tasmin vane dharmabhṛtāṃ nivāse; dadarśa siddharṣigaṇān anekān
GE07mbh_03_u:025.021a: tataḥ sa yānād avaruhya rājā; sabhrātṛkaḥ sajanaḥ kānanaṃ tat
GE07mbh_03_u:025.021c: viveśa dharmātmavatāṃ variṣṭhas; triviṣṭapaṃ śakra ivāmitaujāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:025.022c: vanaukasaś cāpi narendrasiṃhaṃ; manasvinaṃ saṃparivārya tasthuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:025.023a: sa tatra siddhān abhivādya sarvān; pratyarcito rājavad devavac ca
GE07mbh_03_u:025.023c: viveśa sarvaiḥ sahito dvijāgryaiḥ; kṛtāñjalir dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:025.024a: sa puṇyaśīlaḥ pitṛvan mahātmā; tapasvibhir dharmaparair upetya
GE07mbh_03_u:025.025a: bhīmaś ca kṛṣṇā ca dhanaṃjayaś ca; yamau ca te cānucarā narendram
GE07mbh_03_u:025.025c: vimucya vāhān avaruhya sarve; tatropatasthur bharataprabarhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:025.026a: latāvatānāvanataḥ sa pāṇḍavair; mahādrumaḥ pañcabhir ugradhanvibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:025.026c: babhau nivāsopagatair mahātmabhir; mahāgirir vāraṇayūthapair iva
GE07mbh_03_u:026.001a: tat kānanaṃ prāpya narendraputrāḥ; sukhocitā vāsam upetya kṛcchram
GE07mbh_03_u:026.002a: yatīṃś ca sarvān sa munīṃś ca rājā; tasmin vane mūlaphalair udagraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:026.002c: dvijātimukhyān ṛṣabhaḥ kurūṇāṃ; saṃtarpayām āsa mahānubhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:026.003a: iṣṭīś ca pitryāṇi tathāgriyāṇi; mahāvane vasatāṃ pāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_03_u:026.003c: purohitaḥ sarvasamṛddhatejāś; cakāra dhaumyaḥ pitṛvat kurūṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:026.004a: apetya rāṣṭrād vasatāṃ tu teṣām; ṛṣiḥ purāṇo 'tithir ājagāma
GE07mbh_03_u:026.004c: tam āśramaṃ tīvrasamṛddhatejā; mārkaṇḍeyaḥ śrīmatāṃ pāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_03_u:026.005a: sa sarvavid draupadīṃ prekṣya kṛṣṇāṃ; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhīmasenārjunau ca
GE07mbh_03_u:026.006a: taṃ dharmarājo vimanā ivābravīt; sarve hriyā santi tapasvino 'mī
GE07mbh_03_u:026.006c: bhavān idaṃ kiṃ smayatīva hṛṣṭas; tapasvināṃ paśyatāṃ mām udīkṣya
GE07mbh_03_u:026.007a: na tāta hṛṣyāmi na ca smayāmi; praharṣajo māṃ bhajate na darpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:026.007c: tavāpadaṃ tv adya samīkṣya rāmaṃ; satyavrataṃ dāśarathiṃ smarāmi
GE07mbh_03_u:026.008a: sa cāpi rājā saha lakṣmaṇena; vane nivāsaṃ pitur eva śāsanāt
GE07mbh_03_u:026.008c: dhanvī caran pārtha purā mayaiva; dṛṣṭo girer ṛṣyamūkasya sānau
GE07mbh_03_u:026.009a: sahasranetrapratimo mahātmā; mayasya jeta namuceś ca hantā
GE07mbh_03_u:026.009c: pitur nideśād anaghaḥ svadharmaṃ; vane vāsaṃ dāśarathiś cakāra
GE07mbh_03_u:026.010a: sa cāpi śakrasya samaprabhāvo; mahānubhāvaḥ samareṣv ajeyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:026.010c: vihāya bhogān acarad vaneṣu; neśe balasyeti cared adharmam
GE07mbh_03_u:026.011a: nṛpāś ca nābhāgabhagīrathādayo; mahīm imāṃ sāgarāntāṃ vijitya
GE07mbh_03_u:026.011c: satyena te 'py ajayaṃs tāta lokān; neśe balasyeti cared adharmam
GE07mbh_03_u:026.012a: alarkam āhur naravarya santaṃ; satyavrataṃ kāśikarūṣarājam
GE07mbh_03_u:026.012c: vihāya rāṣṭrāṇi vasūni caiva; neśe balasyeti cared adharmam
GE07mbh_03_u:026.013a: dhātrā vidhir yo vihitaḥ purāṇas; taṃ pūjayanto naravarya santaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:026.013c: saptarṣayaḥ pārtha divi prabhānti; neśe balasyeti cared adharmam
GE07mbh_03_u:026.014a: mahābalān parvatakūṭamātrān; viṣāṇinaḥ paśya gajān narendra
GE07mbh_03_u:026.014c: sthitān nideśe naravarya dhātur; neśe balasyeti cared adharmam
GE07mbh_03_u:026.015a: sarvāṇi bhūtāni narendra paśya; yathā yathāvad vihitaṃ vidhātrā
GE07mbh_03_u:026.015c: svayonitas tat kurute prabhāvān; neśe balasyeti cared adharmam
GE07mbh_03_u:026.016a: satyena dharmeṇa yathārhavṛttyā; hriyā tathā sarvabhūtāny atītya
GE07mbh_03_u:026.016c: yaśaś ca tejaś ca tavāpi dīptaṃ; vibhāvasor bhāskarasyeva pārtha
GE07mbh_03_u:026.017a: yathāpratijñaṃ ca mahānubhāva; kṛcchraṃ vane vāsam imaṃ niruṣya
GE07mbh_03_u:026.017c: tataḥ śriyaṃ tejasā svena dīptām; ādāsyase pārthiva kauravebhyaḥ
