GE07mbh_03_u:026.018a: tam evam uktvā vacanaṃ maharṣis; tapasvimadhye sahitaṃ suhṛdbhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:026.018c: āmantrya dhaumyaṃ sahitāṃś ca pārthāṃs; tataḥ pratasthe diśam uttarāṃ saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:027.003a: yajuṣām ṛcāṃ ca sāmnāṃ ca gadyānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:027.004c: saṃsṛṣṭaṃ brahmaṇā kṣatraṃ bhūya eva vyarocata
GE07mbh_03_u:027.007a: caranti dharmaṃ puṇye 'smiṃs tvayā guptā dhṛtavratāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:027.008c: sarvasya jagataḥ śreṣṭhā brāhmaṇāḥ saṃgatās tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:027.009a: idaṃ tu vacanaṃ pārtha śṛṇv ekāgramanā mama
GE07mbh_03_u:027.009c: bhrātṛbhiḥ saha kaunteya yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi kaurava
GE07mbh_03_u:027.010a: brahma kṣatreṇa saṃsṛṣṭaṃ kṣatraṃ ca brahmaṇā saha
GE07mbh_03_u:027.011a: nābrāhmaṇas tāta ciraṃ bubhūṣed; icchann imaṃ lokam amuṃ ca jetum
GE07mbh_03_u:027.011c: vinītadharmārtham apetamohaṃ; labdhvā dvijaṃ nudati nṛpaḥ sapatnān
GE07mbh_03_u:027.012c: nādhyagacchad balir loke tīrtham anyatra vai dvijāt
GE07mbh_03_u:027.013a: anūnam āsīd asurasya kāmair; vairocaneḥ śrīr api cākṣayāsīt
GE07mbh_03_u:027.013c: labdhvā mahīṃ brāhmaṇasaṃprayogāt; teṣv ācaran duṣṭam ato vyanaśyat
GE07mbh_03_u:027.014a: nābrāhmaṇaṃ bhūmir iyaṃ sabhūtir; varṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ bhajate cirāya
GE07mbh_03_u:027.014c: samudranemir namate tu tasmai; yaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ śāsti nayair vinītaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:027.016a: brahmaṇy anupamā dṛṣṭiḥ kṣātram apratimaṃ balam
GE07mbh_03_u:027.016c: tau yadā carataḥ sārdham atha lokaḥ prasīdati
GE07mbh_03_u:027.017a: yathā hi sumahān agniḥ kakṣaṃ dahati sānilaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:027.017c: tathā dahati rājanyo brāhmaṇena samaṃ ripūn
GE07mbh_03_u:027.018c: alabdhasya ca lābhāya labdhasya ca vivṛddhaye
GE07mbh_03_u:027.019c: yaśasvinaṃ vedavidaṃ vipaścitaṃ; bahuśrutaṃ brāhmaṇam eva vāsaya
GE07mbh_03_u:027.020c: tena te sarvalokeṣu dīpyate prathitaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:027.021a: tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve bakaṃ dālbhyam apūjayan
GE07mbh_03_u:027.023a: karṇaśravāś ca muñjaś ca lavaṇāśvaś ca kāśyapaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:027.024a: ṛtavāk ca suvāk caiva bṛhadaśva ṛtāvasuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:027.025a: ete cānye ca bahavo brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:028.001a: tato vanagatāḥ pārthāḥ sāyāhne saha kṛṣṇayā
GE07mbh_03_u:028.002a: priyā ca darśanīyā ca paṇḍitā ca pativratā
GE07mbh_03_u:028.002c: tataḥ kṛṣṇā dharmarājam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:028.003a: na nūnaṃ tasya pāpasya duḥkham asmāsu kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:028.004a: yas tvāṃ rājan mayā sārdham ajinaiḥ prativāsitam
GE07mbh_03_u:028.004c: bhrātṛbhiś ca tathā sarvair nābhyabhāṣata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:028.005c: yas tvāṃ dharmaparaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ rūkṣāṇy aśrāvayat tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:028.007a: caturṇām eva pāpānām aśru vai nāpatat tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:028.008c: durbhrātus tasya cograsya tathā duḥśāsanasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:028.010a: idaṃ ca śayanaṃ dṛṣṭvā yac cāsīt te purātanam
GE07mbh_03_u:028.011a: dāntaṃ yac ca sabhāmadhye āsanaṃ ratnabhūṣitam
GE07mbh_03_u:028.011c: dṛṣṭvā kuśabṛsīṃ cemāṃ śoko māṃ rundhayaty ayam
GE07mbh_03_u:028.012a: yad apaśyaṃ sabhāyāṃ tvāṃ rājabhiḥ parivāritam
GE07mbh_03_u:028.012c: tac ca rājann apaśyantyāḥ kā śāntir hṛdayasya me
GE07mbh_03_u:028.013c: sā tvā paṅkamalādigdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā muhyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:028.014a: yā vai tvā kauśikair vastraiḥ śubhrair bahudhanaiḥ purā
GE07mbh_03_u:028.014c: dṛṣṭavaty asmi rājendra sā tvāṃ paśyāmi cīriṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:028.015a: yac ca tad rukmapātrībhir brāhmaṇebhyaḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:028.015c: hriyate te gṛhād annaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ sārvakāmikam
GE07mbh_03_u:028.016c: dīyate bhojanaṃ rājann atīva guṇavat prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:028.016e: tac ca rājann apaśyantyāḥ kā śāntir hṛdayasya me
GE07mbh_03_u:028.017a: yāṃs te bhrātṝn mahārāja yuvāno mṛṣṭakuṇḍalāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:028.018a: sarvāṃs tān adya paśyāmi vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:028.019c: dhyāyantaṃ kiṃ na manyus te prāpte kāle vivardhate
GE07mbh_03_u:028.020a: bhīmasenaṃ hi karmāṇi svayaṃ kurvāṇam acyuta
GE07mbh_03_u:028.020c: sukhārhaṃ duḥkhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
GE07mbh_03_u:028.021a: satkṛtaṃ vividhair yānair vastrair uccāvacais tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:028.021c: taṃ te vanagataṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
GE07mbh_03_u:028.022a: kurūn api hi yaḥ sarvān hantum utsahate prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:028.025c: dhyāyantam arjunaṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
GE07mbh_03_u:028.026c: na ca te vardhate manyus tena muhyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:028.027a: yo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca sarpāṃś caikaratho 'jayat
GE07mbh_03_u:028.027c: taṃ te vanagataṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
GE07mbh_03_u:028.028a: yo yānair adbhutākārair hayair nāgaiś ca saṃvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:028.029a: kṣipaty ekena vegena pañca bāṇaśatāni yaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:028.029c: taṃ te vanagataṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
GE07mbh_03_u:028.030a: śyāmaṃ bṛhantaṃ taruṇaṃ carmiṇām uttamaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:028.030c: nakulaṃ te vane dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
GE07mbh_03_u:028.031a: darśanīyaṃ ca śūraṃ ca mādrīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:028.031c: sahadevaṃ vane dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
GE07mbh_03_u:028.031c-0096_02: nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā te duḥkhitāv ubhau
GE07mbh_03_u:028.032c: māṃ te vanagatāṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
GE07mbh_03_u:028.033a: nūnaṃ ca tava naivāsti manyur bharatasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:028.033b-0098_01: tyaktavāṃs tvaṃ vināśāya vyaktaṃ bhṛgupatir yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:028.033c: yat te bhrātṝṃś ca māṃ caiva dṛṣṭvā na vyathate manaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:028.034a: na nirmanyuḥ kṣatriyo 'sti loke nirvacanaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:028.034c: tad adya tvayi paśyāmi kṣatriye viparītavat
GE07mbh_03_u:028.035a: yo na darśayate tejaḥ kṣatriyaḥ kāla āgate
GE07mbh_03_u:028.035c: sarvabhūtāni taṃ pārtha sadā paribhavanty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:028.036a: tat tvayā na kṣamā kāryā śatrūn prati kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:028.036c: tejasaiva hi te śakyā nihantuṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:029.001c: prahlādasya ca saṃvādaṃ baler vairocanasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:029.002c: baliḥ papraccha daityendraṃ prahlādaṃ pitaraṃ pituḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:029.003a: kṣamā svic chreyasī tāta utāho teja ity uta
GE07mbh_03_u:029.003c: etan me saṃśayaṃ tāta yathāvad brūhi pṛcchate
GE07mbh_03_u:029.004a: śreyo yad atra dharmajña brūhi me tad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_03_u:029.004c: kariṣyāmi hi tat sarvaṃ yathāvad anuśāsanam
GE07mbh_03_u:029.005a: tasmai provāca tat sarvam evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:029.006a: na śreyaḥ satataṃ tejo na nityaṃ śreyasī kṣamā
GE07mbh_03_u:029.006c: iti tāta vijānīhi dvayam etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_03_u:029.007a: yo nityaṃ kṣamate tāta bahūn doṣān sa vindati
GE07mbh_03_u:029.007c: bhṛtyāḥ paribhavanty enam udāsīnās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:029.008a: sarvabhūtāni cāpy asya na namante kadā cana
GE07mbh_03_u:029.008c: tasmān nityaṃ kṣamā tāta paṇḍitair apavāditā
GE07mbh_03_u:029.009a: avajñāya hi taṃ bhṛtyā bhajante bahudoṣatām
GE07mbh_03_u:029.010a: yānaṃ vastrāṇy alaṃkārāñ śayanāny āsanāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:029.011c: pradiṣṭāni ca deyāni na dadyur bhartṛśāsanāt
GE07mbh_03_u:029.012a: na cainaṃ bhartṛpūjābhiḥ pūjayanti kadā cana
GE07mbh_03_u:029.012c: avajñānaṃ hi loke 'smin maraṇād api garhitam
GE07mbh_03_u:029.013a: kṣamiṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ tāta bruvanti kaṭukāny api
GE07mbh_03_u:029.013c: preṣyāḥ putrāś ca bhṛtyāś ca tathodāsīnavṛttayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:029.014a: apy asya dārān icchanti paribhūya kṣamāvataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:029.015a: tathā ca nityam uditā yadi svalpam apīśvarāt
GE07mbh_03_u:029.015c: daṇḍam arhanti duṣyanti duṣṭāś cāpy apakurvate
GE07mbh_03_u:029.016a: ete cānye ca bahavo nityaṃ doṣāḥ kṣamāvatām
GE07mbh_03_u:029.016c: atha vairocane doṣān imān viddhy akṣamāvatām
GE07mbh_03_u:029.017a: asthāne yadi vā sthāne satataṃ rajasāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:029.017c: kruddho daṇḍān praṇayati vividhān svena tejasā
GE07mbh_03_u:029.018a: mitraiḥ saha virodhaṃ ca prāpnute tejasāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:029.018c: prāpnoti dveṣyatāṃ caiva lokāt svajanatas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:029.019c: saṃtāpadveṣalobhāṃś ca śatrūṃś ca labhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:029.020a: krodhād daṇḍān manuṣyeṣu vividhān puruṣo nayan
GE07mbh_03_u:029.020c: bhraśyate śīghram aiśvaryāt prāṇebhyaḥ svajanād api
GE07mbh_03_u:029.021c: tasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarpād veśmagatād iva
GE07mbh_03_u:029.022a: yasmād udvijate lokaḥ kathaṃ tasya bhavo bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:029.022c: antaraṃ hy asya dṛṣṭvaiva loko vikurute dhruvam
GE07mbh_03_u:029.022e: tasmān nātyutsṛjet tejo na ca nityaṃ mṛdur bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:029.022f-0099_01: kāle kāle tu saṃprāpte mṛdus tīkṣṇo 'pi vā bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:029.023a: kāle mṛdur yo bhavati kāle bhavati dāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:029.023c: sa vai sukham avāpnoti loke 'muṣminn ihaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:029.024a: kṣamākālāṃs tu vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me vistareṇa tān
GE07mbh_03_u:029.024c: ye te nityam asaṃtyājyā yathā prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:029.026c: na hi sarvatra pāṇḍityaṃ sulabhaṃ puruṣeṇa vai
GE07mbh_03_u:029.027a: atha ced buddhijaṃ kṛtvā brūyus te tad abuddhijam
GE07mbh_03_u:029.027c: pāpān svalpe 'pi tān hanyād aparādhe tathānṛjūn
GE07mbh_03_u:029.028c: dvitīye sati vadhyas tu svalpe 'py apakṛte bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:029.029a: ajānatā bhavet kaś cid aparādhaḥ kṛto yadi
GE07mbh_03_u:029.030a: mṛdunā mārdavaṃ hanti mṛdunā hanti dāruṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:029.030c: nāsādhyaṃ mṛdunā kiṃ cit tasmāt tīkṣṇataro mṛduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:029.031b-0100_01: anvīkṣya kāraṇaṃ caiva kāryaṃ tejaḥ kṣamāpi vā
GE07mbh_03_u:029.031c: nādeśakāle kiṃ cit syād deśaḥ kālaḥ pratīkṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:029.033a: tad ahaṃ tejasaḥ kālaṃ tava manye narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:029.034a: na hi kaś cit kṣamākālo vidyate 'dya kurūn prati
GE07mbh_03_u:029.034c: tejasaś cāgate kāle teja utsraṣṭum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:029.035a: mṛdur bhavaty avajñātas tīkṣṇād udvijate janaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:029.035c: kāle prāpte dvayaṃ hy etad yo veda sa mahīpatiḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:030.000-0101_04: yena krodhaṃ mahāprājñe bahudhā bahu manyase
GE07mbh_03_u:030.000-0101_05: krodhaṃ mūlaharaṃ śatruṃ kāraṇaiḥ śṛṇu taṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:030.001a: krodho hantā manuṣyāṇāṃ krodho bhāvayitā punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.002a: yo hi saṃharate krodhaṃ bhāvas tasya suśobhane
GE07mbh_03_u:030.002b-0102_01: yo na saṃharate krodhaṃ tasyābhāvo bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:030.002c: yaḥ punaḥ puruṣaḥ krodhaṃ nityaṃ na sahate śubhe
GE07mbh_03_u:030.003a: krodhamūlo vināśo hi prajānām iha dṛśyate
GE07mbh_03_u:030.003c: tat kathaṃ mādṛśaḥ krodham utsṛjel lokanāśanam
GE07mbh_03_u:030.004a: kruddhaḥ pāpaṃ naraḥ kuryāt kruddho hanyād gurūn api
GE07mbh_03_u:030.005a: vācyāvācye hi kupito na prajānāti karhi cit
GE07mbh_03_u:030.005c: nākāryam asti kruddhasya nāvācyaṃ vidyate tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:030.006a: hiṃsyāt krodhād avadhyāṃś ca vadhyān saṃpūjayed api
GE07mbh_03_u:030.006c: ātmānam api ca kruddhaḥ preṣayed yamasādanam
GE07mbh_03_u:030.007a: etān doṣān prapaśyadbhir jitaḥ krodho manīṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.007c: icchadbhiḥ paramaṃ śreya iha cāmutra cottamam
GE07mbh_03_u:030.008a: taṃ krodhaṃ varjitaṃ dhīraiḥ katham asmadvidhaś caret
GE07mbh_03_u:030.008c: etad draupadi saṃdhāya na me manyuḥ pravardhate
GE07mbh_03_u:030.009a: ātmānaṃ ca paraṃ caiva trāyate mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_03_u:030.011c: tasmād draupady aśaktasya manyor niyamanaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:030.012a: vidvāṃs tathaiva yaḥ śaktaḥ kliśyamāno na kupyati
GE07mbh_03_u:030.012c: sa nāśayitvā kleṣṭāraṃ paraloke ca nandati
GE07mbh_03_u:030.013a: tasmād balavatā caiva durbalena ca nityadā
GE07mbh_03_u:030.014a: manyor hi vijayaṃ kṛṣṇe praśaṃsantīha sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.014c: kṣamāvato jayo nityaṃ sādhor iha satāṃ matam
GE07mbh_03_u:030.015c: tam evaṃ bahudoṣaṃ tu krodhaṃ sādhuvivarjitam
GE07mbh_03_u:030.016a: tejasvīti yam āhur vai paṇḍitā dīrghadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.017a: yas tu krodhaṃ samutpannaṃ prajñayā pratibādhate
GE07mbh_03_u:030.018a: kruddho hi kāryaṃ suśroṇi na yathāvat prapaśyati
GE07mbh_03_u:030.018c: na kāryaṃ na ca maryādāṃ naraḥ kruddho 'nupaśyati
GE07mbh_03_u:030.019a: hanty avadhyān api kruddho gurūn rūkṣais tudaty api
GE07mbh_03_u:030.019c: tasmāt tejasi kartavye krodho dūrāt pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.020a: dākṣyaṃ hy amarṣaḥ śauryaṃ ca śīghratvam iti tejasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.020c: guṇāḥ krodhābhibhūtena na śakyāḥ prāptum añjasā
GE07mbh_03_u:030.021a: krodhaṃ tyaktvā tu puruṣaḥ samyak tejo 'bhipadyate
GE07mbh_03_u:030.022a: krodhas tv apaṇḍitaiḥ śaśvat teja ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_03_u:030.022c: rajas tal lokanāśāya vihitaṃ mānuṣān prati
GE07mbh_03_u:030.023a: tasmāc chaśvat tyajet krodhaṃ puruṣaḥ samyag ācaran
GE07mbh_03_u:030.023c: śreyān svadharmānapago na kruddha iti niścitam
GE07mbh_03_u:030.024c: atikramo madvidhasya kathaṃ svit syād anindite
GE07mbh_03_u:030.025a: yadi na syur manuṣyeṣu kṣamiṇaḥ pṛthivīsamāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.025c: na syāt saṃdhir manuṣyāṇāṃ krodhamūlo hi vigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.026a: abhiṣakto hy abhiṣajed āhanyād guruṇā hataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.026c: evaṃ vināśo bhūtānām adharmaḥ prathito bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:030.027c: pratihanyād dhataś caiva tathā hiṃsyāc ca hiṃsitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.028a: hanyur hi pitaraḥ putrān putrāś cāpi tathā pitṝn
GE07mbh_03_u:030.028c: hanyuś ca patayo bhāryāḥ patīn bhāryās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:030.029a: evaṃ saṃkupite loke janma kṛṣṇe na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:030.029c: prajānāṃ saṃdhimūlaṃ hi janma viddhi śubhānane
GE07mbh_03_u:030.030a: tāḥ kṣīyeran prajāḥ sarvāḥ kṣipraṃ draupadi tādṛśe
GE07mbh_03_u:030.030c: tasmān manyur vināśāya prajānām abhavāya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:030.031a: yasmāt tu loke dṛśyante kṣamiṇaḥ pṛthivīsamāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.031c: tasmāj janma ca bhūtānāṃ bhavaś ca pratipadyate
GE07mbh_03_u:030.032c: kṣamā bhavo hi bhūtānāṃ janma caiva prakīrtitam
GE07mbh_03_u:030.033a: ākruṣṭas tāḍitaḥ kruddhaḥ kṣamate yo balīyasā
GE07mbh_03_u:030.033c: yaś ca nityaṃ jitakrodho vidvān uttamapūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.034a: prabhāvavān api naras tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.034c: krodhanas tv alpavijñānaḥ pretya ceha ca naśyati
GE07mbh_03_u:030.036a: kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā vedāḥ kṣamā śrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:030.036c: yas tām evaṃ vijānāti sa sarvaṃ kṣantum arhati
GE07mbh_03_u:030.037a: kṣamā brahma kṣamā satyaṃ kṣamā bhūtaṃ ca bhāvi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:030.037c: kṣamā tapaḥ kṣamā śaucaṃ kṣamayā coddhṛtaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_03_u:030.038a: ati brahmavidāṃ lokān ati cāpi tapasvinām
GE07mbh_03_u:030.038c: ati yajñavidāṃ caiva kṣamiṇaḥ prāpnuvanti tān
GE07mbh_03_u:030.039a: kṣamā tejasvināṃ tejaḥ kṣamā brahma tapasvinām
GE07mbh_03_u:030.039c: kṣamā satyaṃ satyavatāṃ kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.040a: tāṃ kṣamām īdṛśīṃ kṛṣṇe katham asmadvidhas tyajet
GE07mbh_03_u:030.040c: yasyāṃ brahma ca satyaṃ ca yajñā lokāś ca viṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.040e: bhujyante yajvanāṃ lokāḥ kṣamiṇām apare tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:030.041c: yadā hi kṣamate sarvaṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:030.042a: kṣamāvatām ayaṃ lokaḥ paraś caiva kṣamāvatām
GE07mbh_03_u:030.042c: iha saṃmānam ṛcchanti paratra ca śubhāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_03_u:030.043a: yeṣāṃ manyur manuṣyāṇāṃ kṣamayā nihataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_03_u:030.043c: teṣāṃ paratare lokās tasmāt kṣāntiḥ parā matā
GE07mbh_03_u:030.044a: iti gītāḥ kāśyapena gāthā nityaṃ kṣamāvatām
GE07mbh_03_u:030.044c: śrutvā gāthāḥ kṣamāyās tvaṃ tuṣya draupadi mā krudhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.045c: ācāryo viduraḥ kṣattā śamam eva vadiṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.045e: kṛpaś ca saṃjayaś caiva śamam eva vadiṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.046a: somadatto yuyutsuś ca droṇaputras tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:030.046c: pitāmahaś ca no vyāsaḥ śamaṃ vadati nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.047a: etair hi rājā niyataṃ codyamānaḥ śamaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:030.047c: rājyaṃ dāteti me buddhir na cel lobhān naśiṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:030.047d-0105_01: yatra pārtho dhanuṣpāṇir bhīmaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:030.048b-0106_01: kṣayaḥ sarvasya lokasya pṛthivyām iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.048b-0106_02: bhīṣmo droṇaś ca karṇaś ca kiṃ śeṣaṃ tatra paśyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:030.048c: niścitaṃ me sadaivaitat purastād api bhāmini
GE07mbh_03_u:030.049a: suyodhano nārhatīti kṣamām evaṃ na vindati
GE07mbh_03_u:030.049c: arhas tasyāham ity eva tasmān māṃ vindate kṣamā
GE07mbh_03_u:030.050a: etad ātmavatāṃ vṛttam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:030.050c: kṣamā caivānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca tat kartāsmy aham añjasā
GE07mbh_03_u:031.001a: namo dhātre vidhātre ca yau mohaṃ cakratus tava
GE07mbh_03_u:031.001d-0107_02: tasmāt karmāṇi nityāni lobhān mokṣaṃ yiyāsati
GE07mbh_03_u:031.002a: neha dharmānṛśaṃsyābhyāṃ na kṣāntyā nārjavena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:031.002c: puruṣaḥ śriyam āpnoti na ghṛṇitvena karhi cit
GE07mbh_03_u:031.003a: tvāṃ ced vyasanam abhyāgād idaṃ bhārata duḥsaham
GE07mbh_03_u:031.003c: yat tvaṃ nārhasi nāpīme bhrātaras te mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.004a: na hi te 'dhyagamaj jātu tadānīṃ nādya bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:031.004c: dharmāt priyataraṃ kiṃ cid api cej jīvitād iha
GE07mbh_03_u:031.005a: dharmārtham eva te rājyaṃ dharmārthaṃ jīvitaṃ ca te
GE07mbh_03_u:031.005c: brāhmaṇā guravaś caiva jānanty api ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.006a: bhīmasenārjunau caiva mādreyau ca mayā saha
GE07mbh_03_u:031.006c: tyajes tvam iti me buddhir na tu dharmaṃ parityajeḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.007c: iti me śrutam āryāṇāṃ tvāṃ tu manye na rakṣati
GE07mbh_03_u:031.008a: ananyā hi naravyāghra nityadā dharmam eva te
GE07mbh_03_u:031.008c: buddhiḥ satatam anveti chāyeva puruṣaṃ nijā
GE07mbh_03_u:031.009a: nāvamaṃsthā hi sadṛśān nāvarāñ śreyasaḥ kutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.009c: avāpya pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ na te śṛṅgam avardhata
GE07mbh_03_u:031.010a: svāhākāraiḥ svadhābhiś ca pūjābhir api ca dvijān
GE07mbh_03_u:031.010c: daivatāni pitṝṃś caiva satataṃ pārtha sevase
GE07mbh_03_u:031.011a: brāhmaṇāḥ sarvakāmais te satataṃ pārtha tarpitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.011c: yatayo mokṣiṇaś caiva gṛhasthāś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:031.012c: nādeyaṃ brāhmaṇebhyas te gṛhe kiṃ cana vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:031.013d-0110_01: śvabhyaś ca śvapacebhyaś ca dattvā śiṣṭena jīvasi
GE07mbh_03_u:031.014a: iṣṭayaḥ paśubandhāś ca kāmyanaimittikāś ca ye
GE07mbh_03_u:031.014c: vartante pākayajñāś ca yajñakarma ca nityadā
GE07mbh_03_u:031.015c: rāṣṭrād apetya vasato dhārmas te nāvasīdati
GE07mbh_03_u:031.016c: etair api mahāyajñair iṣṭaṃ te bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.017c: rājyaṃ vasūny āyudhāni bhrātṝn māṃ cāsi nirjitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.019a: atīva moham āyāti manaś ca paridūyate
GE07mbh_03_u:031.019c: niśāmya te duḥkham idam imāṃ cāpadam īdṛśīm
GE07mbh_03_u:031.020c: īśvarasya vaśe lokas tiṣṭhate nātmano yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:031.021c: dadhāti sarvam īśānaḥ purastāc chukram uccaran
GE07mbh_03_u:031.022c: īrayaty aṅgam aṅgāni tathā rājann imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.023a: ākāśa iva bhūtāni vyāpya sarvāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:031.023c: īśvaro vidadhātīha kalyāṇaṃ yac ca pāpakam
GE07mbh_03_u:031.024c: īśvarasya vaśe tiṣṭhan nānyeṣāṃ nātmanaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.025a: maṇiḥ sūtra iva proto nasyota iva govṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.025c: dhātur ādeśam anveti tanmayo hi tadarpaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.026a: nātmādhīno manuṣyo 'yaṃ kālaṃ bhavati kaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:031.026c: srotaso madhyam āpannaḥ kūlād vṛkśa iva cyutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.027c: īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ narakam eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:031.028a: yathā vāyos tṛṇāgrāṇi vaśaṃ yānti balīyasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.028c: dhātur evaṃ vaśaṃ yānti sarvabhūtāni bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:031.029a: āryakarmaṇi yuñjānaḥ pāpe vā punar īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.029c: vyāpya bhūtāni carate na cāyam iti lakṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:031.033a: anyathaiva hi manyante puruṣās tāni tāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:031.033c: anyathaiva prabhus tāni karoti vikaroti ca
GE07mbh_03_u:031.034a: yathā kāṣṭhena vā kāṣṭham aśmānaṃ cāśmanā punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.034c: ayasā cāpy ayaś chindyān nirviceṣṭam acetanam
GE07mbh_03_u:031.035a: evaṃ sa bhagavān devaḥ svayambhūḥ prapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.035c: hinasti bhūtair bhūtāni chadma kṛtvā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:031.036c: krīḍate bhagavan bhūtair bālaḥ krīḍanakair iva
GE07mbh_03_u:031.037a: na mātṛpitṛvad rājan dhātā bhūteṣu vartate
GE07mbh_03_u:031.037c: roṣād iva pravṛtto 'yaṃ yathāyam itaro janaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.039a: tavemām āpadaṃ dṛṣṭvā samṛddhiṃ ca suyodhane
GE07mbh_03_u:031.040c: dhārtarāṣṭre śriyaṃ dattvā dhātā kiṃ phalam aśnute
GE07mbh_03_u:031.041a: karma cet kṛtam anveti kartāraṃ nānyam ṛcchati
GE07mbh_03_u:031.041c: karmaṇā tena pāpena lipyate nūnam īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:031.042a: atha karma kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ na cet kartāram ṛcchati
GE07mbh_03_u:031.042c: kāraṇaṃ balam eveha janāñ śocāmi durbalān
GE07mbh_03_u:032.001a: valgu citrapadaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ yājñaseni tvayā vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.001c: uktaṃ tac chrutam asmābhir nāstikyaṃ tu prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_03_u:032.002c: dadāmi deyam ity eva yaje yaṣṭavyam ity uta
GE07mbh_03_u:032.003a: astu vātra phalaṃ mā vā kartavyaṃ puruṣeṇa yat
GE07mbh_03_u:032.003c: gṛhān āvasatā kṛṣṇe yathāśakti karomi tat
GE07mbh_03_u:032.004c: āgamān anatikramya satāṃ vṛttam avekṣya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:032.004e: dharma eva manaḥ kṛṣṇe svabhāvāc caiva me dhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:032.005a: na dharmaphalam āpnoti yo dharmaṃ dogdhum icchati
GE07mbh_03_u:032.005c: yaś cainaṃ śaṅkate kṛtvā nāstikyāt pāpacetanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.006a: ativādān madāc caiva mā dharmam atiśaṅkithāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.007a: dharmo yasyātiśaṅkyaḥ syād ārṣaṃ vā durbalātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.007c: vedāc chūdra ivāpeyāt sa lokād ajarāmarāt
GE07mbh_03_u:032.009a: pāpīyān hi sa śūdrebhyas taskarebhyo viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.010a: pratyakṣaṃ hi tvayā dṛṣṭa ṛṣir gacchan mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.011a: vyāso vasiṣṭho maitreyo nārado lomaśaḥ śukaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.011c: anye ca ṛṣayaḥ siddhā dharmeṇaiva sucetasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.013a: ete hi dharmam evādau varṇayanti sadā mama
GE07mbh_03_u:032.014a: ato nārhasi kalyāṇi dhātāraṃ dharmam eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:032.014c: rajomūḍhena manasā kṣeptuṃ śaṅkitum eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:032.016c: etāvān manyate bālo moham anyatra gacchati
GE07mbh_03_u:032.017a: prāyaścittaṃ na tasyāsti yo dharmam atiśaṅkate
GE07mbh_03_u:032.017c: dhyāyan sa kṛpaṇaḥ pāpo na lokān pratipadyate
GE07mbh_03_u:032.019a: yas tu nityaṃ kṛtamatir dharmam evābhipadyate
GE07mbh_03_u:032.020c: sarvaśāstrātigo mūḍhaḥ śaṃ janmasu na vindati
GE07mbh_03_u:032.020d-0113_01: yasya nārṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāc chiṣṭācāraś ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_03_u:032.020d-0113_02: naiva tasya paro loko nāyam astīti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.021a: śiṣṭair ācaritaṃ dharmaṃ kṛṣṇe mā smātiśaṅkithāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.022a: dharma eva plavo nānyaḥ svargaṃ draupadi gacchatām
GE07mbh_03_u:032.022c: saiva nauḥ sāgarasyeva vaṇijaḥ pāram ṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.023a: aphālo yadi dharmaḥ syāc carito dharmacāribhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.023c: apratiṣṭhe tamasy etaj jagan majjed anindite
GE07mbh_03_u:032.024c: vighātenaiva yujyeyur na cārthaṃ kiṃ cid āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.025a: tapaś ca brahmacaryaṃ ca yajñaḥ svādhyāya eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:032.025c: dānam ārjavam etāni yadi syur aphalāni vai
GE07mbh_03_u:032.026a: nācariṣyan pare dharmaṃ pare paratare ca ye
GE07mbh_03_u:032.026c: vipralambho 'yam atyantaṃ yadi syur aphalāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.027c: īśvarāḥ kasya hetos te careyur dharmam ādṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.028a: phaladaṃ tv iha vijñāya dhātāraṃ śreyasi dhruve
GE07mbh_03_u:032.028c: dharmaṃ te hy ācaran kṛṣṇe tad dhi dharmasanātanam
GE07mbh_03_u:032.029a: sa cāyaṃ saphalo dharmo na dharmo 'phala ucyate
GE07mbh_03_u:032.029c: dṛśyante 'pi hi vidyānāṃ phalāni tapasāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:032.030a: tvayy etad vai vijānīhi janma kṛṣṇe yathā śrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:032.030c: vettha cāpi yathā jāto dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_03_u:032.032a: bahunāpi hy avidvāṃso naiva tuṣyanty abuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.032c: teṣāṃ na dharmajaṃ kiṃ cit pretya śarmāsti karma vā
GE07mbh_03_u:032.033a: karmaṇām uta puṇyānāṃ pāpānāṃ ca phalodayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.034a: naitāni veda yaḥ kaś cin muhyanty atra prajā imāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.034c: rakṣyāṇy etāni devānāṃ gūḍhamāyā hi devatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.035c: prasannair mānasair yuktāḥ paśyanty etāni vai dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.036a: na phalādarśanād dharmaḥ śaṅkitavyo na devatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.037a: karmaṇāṃ phalam astīti tathaitad dharma śāśvatam
GE07mbh_03_u:032.037c: brahmā provāca putrāṇāṃ yad ṛṣir veda kaśyapaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.038a: tasmāt te saṃśayaḥ kṛṣṇe nīhāra iva naśyatu
GE07mbh_03_u:032.038c: vyavasya sarvam astīti nāstikyaṃ bhāvam utsṛja
GE07mbh_03_u:032.039a: īśvaraṃ cāpi bhūtānāṃ dhātāraṃ mā vicikṣipaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:032.039c: śikṣasvainaṃ namasvainaṃ mā te bhūd buddhir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_03_u:032.040a: yasya prasādāt tadbhakto martyo gacchaty amartyatām
GE07mbh_03_u:032.040c: uttamaṃ daivataṃ kṛṣṇe mātivocaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:033.001a: nāvamanye na garhe ca dharmaṃ pārtha kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:033.002a: ārtāhaṃ pralapāmīdam iti māṃ viddhi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:033.002c: bhūyaś ca vilapiṣyāmi sumanās tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_03_u:033.003c: akarmāṇo hi jīvanti sthāvarā netare janāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.005c: icchanti karmaṇā vṛttim avāptuṃ pretya ceha ca
GE07mbh_03_u:033.007c: api dhātā vidhātā ca yathāyam udake bakaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.007d-0115_01: akarmaṇāṃ vai bhūtānāṃ vṛttiḥ syān na hi kā cana
GE07mbh_03_u:033.007d-0115_02: tad evābhiprapadyeta na vihanyāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:033.008a: svakarma kuru mā glāsīḥ karmaṇā bhava daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.008c: kṛtyaṃ hi yo 'bhijānāti sahasre nāsti so 'sti vā
GE07mbh_03_u:033.009a: tasya cāpi bhavet kāryaṃ vivṛddhau rakṣaṇe tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:033.009c: bhakṣyamāṇo hy anāvāpaḥ kṣīyate himavān api
GE07mbh_03_u:033.010a: utsīderan prajāḥ sarvā na kuryuḥ karma ced yadi
GE07mbh_03_u:033.010b-0116_01: tathā hy etā na vardheran karma ced aphalaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:033.010c: api cāpy aphalaṃ karma paśyāmaḥ kurvato janān
GE07mbh_03_u:033.010e: nānyathā hy abhijānanti vṛttiṃ loke kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:033.011a: yaś ca diṣṭaparo loke yaś cāyaṃ haṭhavādakaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.012a: yo hi diṣṭam upāsīno nirviceṣṭaḥ sukhaṃ svapet
GE07mbh_03_u:033.013a: tathaiva haṭhabuddhir yaḥ śaktaḥ karmaṇy akarmakṛt
GE07mbh_03_u:033.013c: āsīta na ciraṃ jīved anātha iva durbalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.014a: akasmād api yaḥ kaś cid arthaṃ prāpnoti pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.014c: taṃ haṭheneti manyante sa hi yatno na kasya cit
GE07mbh_03_u:033.015a: yac cāpi kiṃ cit puruṣo diṣṭaṃ nāma labhaty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:033.015c: daivena vidhinā pārtha tad daivam iti niścitam
GE07mbh_03_u:033.016a: yat svayaṃ karmaṇā kiṃ cit phalam āpnoti pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.016c: pratyakṣaṃ cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭaṃ tat pauruṣam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:033.018a: evaṃ haṭhāc ca daivāc ca svabhāvāt karmaṇas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:033.018c: yāni prāpnoti puruṣas tat phalaṃ pūrvakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.019a: dhātāpi hi svakarmaiva tais tair hetubhir īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.020a: yad dhy ayaṃ puruṣaḥ kiṃ cit kurute vai śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_03_u:033.021a: kāraṇaṃ tasya deho 'yaṃ dhātuḥ karmaṇi karmaṇi
GE07mbh_03_u:033.021c: sa yathā prerayaty enaṃ tathāyaṃ kurute 'vaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.022a: teṣu teṣu hi kṛtyeṣu viniyoktā maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.023c: buddhipūrvaṃ svayaṃ dhīraḥ puruṣas tatra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:033.025a: tile tailaṃ gavi kṣīraṃ kāṣṭhe pāvakam antataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.025c: dhiyā dhīro vijānīyād upāyaṃ cāsya siddhaye
GE07mbh_03_u:033.026a: tataḥ pravartate paścāt karaṇeṣv asya siddhaye
GE07mbh_03_u:033.026c: tāṃ siddhim upajīvanti karmaṇām iha jantavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.027a: kuśalena kṛtaṃ karma kartrā sādhu viniścitam
GE07mbh_03_u:033.028a: iṣṭāpūrtaphalaṃ na syān na śiṣyo na gurur bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:033.028c: puruṣaḥ karmasādhyeṣu syāc ced ayam akāraṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:033.029c: asiddhau nindyate cāpi karmanāśaḥ kathaṃ tv iha
GE07mbh_03_u:033.030a: sarvam eva haṭhenaike diṣṭenaike vadanty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:033.030c: puruṣaprayatnajaṃ ke cit traidham etan nirucyate
GE07mbh_03_u:033.031a: na caivaitāvatā kāryaṃ manyanta iti cāpare
GE07mbh_03_u:033.031c: asti sarvam adṛśyaṃ tu diṣṭaṃ caiva tathā haṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.031e: dṛśyate hi haṭhāc caiva diṣṭāc cārthasya saṃtatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.032a: kiṃ cid daivād dhaṭhāt kiṃ cit kiṃ cid eva svakarmataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.032c: puruṣaḥ phalam āpnoti caturthaṃ nātra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:033.033c: yadi na syān na bhūtānāṃ kṛpaṇo nāma kaś cana
GE07mbh_03_u:033.034a: yaṃ yam artham abhiprepsuḥ kurute karma pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.034c: tat tat saphalam eva syād yadi na syāt purākṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:033.035a: tridvārām arthasiddhiṃ tu nānupaśyanti ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.035c: tathaivānarthasiddhiṃ ca yathā lokās tathaiva te
GE07mbh_03_u:033.036a: kartavyaṃ tv eva karmeti manor eṣa viniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.036b-0117_01: ā mṛtyoḥ śriyam anvicchen naināṃ manyeta durlabhām
GE07mbh_03_u:033.036d-0118_01: tat tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ na syāt tvayy akarmaṇy avasthite
GE07mbh_03_u:033.037a: kurvato hi bhavaty eva prāyeṇeha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:033.037c: ekāntaphalasiddhiṃ tu na vindaty alasaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:033.038a: asaṃbhave tv asya hetuḥ prāyaścittaṃ tu lakṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:033.039a: alakṣmīr āviśaty enaṃ śayānam alasaṃ naram
GE07mbh_03_u:033.039c: niḥsaṃśayaṃ phalaṃ labdhvā dakṣo bhūtim upāśnute
GE07mbh_03_u:033.040c: dhīrā narāḥ karmaratā na tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:033.041c: na tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ na syāt tvayi karmaṇy avasthite
GE07mbh_03_u:033.042a: atha vā siddhir eva syān mahimā tu tathaiva te
GE07mbh_03_u:033.042c: vṛkodarasya bībhatsor bhrātroś ca yamayor api
GE07mbh_03_u:033.043a: anyeṣāṃ karma saphalam asmākam api vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.044a: pṛthivīṃ lāṅgalenaiva bhittvā bījaṃ vapaty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:033.044c: āste 'tha karṣakas tūṣṇīṃ parjanyas tatra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:033.045a: vṛṣṭiś cen nānugṛhṇīyād anenās tatra karṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.045c: yad anyaḥ puruṣaḥ kuryāt kṛtaṃ tat sakalaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:033.046a: tac ced aphalam asmākaṃ nāparādho 'sti naḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:033.047a: kurvato nārthasiddhir me bhavatīti ha bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:033.047c: nirvedo nātra gantavyo dvāv etau hy asya karmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.047e: siddhir vāpy atha vāsiddhir apravṛttir ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_03_u:033.048a: bahūnāṃ samavāye hi bhāvānāṃ karma sidhyati
GE07mbh_03_u:033.048c: guṇābhāve phalaṃ nyūnaṃ bhavaty aphalam eva vā
GE07mbh_03_u:033.048e: anārambhe tu na phalaṃ na guṇo dṛśyate 'cyuta
GE07mbh_03_u:033.049a: deśakālāv upāyāṃś ca maṅgalaṃ svasti vṛddhaye
GE07mbh_03_u:033.051a: yaṃ tu dhīro 'nvavekṣeta śreyāṃsaṃ bahubhir guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.051c: sāmnaivārthaṃ tato lipset karma cāsmai prayojayet
GE07mbh_03_u:033.052a: vyasanaṃ vāsya kāṅkṣeta vināśaṃ vā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:033.052c: api sindhor girer vāpi kiṃ punar martyadharmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:033.053c: ānṛṇyam āpnoti naraḥ parasyātmana eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:033.054c: na hy ātmaparibhūtasya bhūtir bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:033.055a: evaṃ saṃsthitikā siddhir iyaṃ lokasya bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:033.056a: brāhmaṇaṃ me pitā pūrvaṃ vāsayām āsa paṇḍitam
GE07mbh_03_u:033.056c: so 'smā artham imaṃ prāha pitre me bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:033.057c: teṣāṃ sāṃkathyam aśrauṣam aham etat tadā gṛhe
GE07mbh_03_u:033.058a: sa māṃ rājan karmavatīm āgatām āha sāntvayan
GE07mbh_03_u:034.003a: naiva dharmeṇa tad rājyaṃ nārjavena na caujasā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.004c: āmiṣaṃ vighasāśena tadvad rājyaṃ hi no hṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:034.005c: artham utsṛjya kiṃ rājan durgeṣu paritapyase
GE07mbh_03_u:034.007a: kuṇīnām iva bilvāni paṅgūnām iva dhenavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.007c: hṛtam aiśvaryam asmākaṃ jīvatāṃ bhavataḥ kṛte
GE07mbh_03_u:034.008a: bhavataḥ priyam ity evaṃ mahad vyasanam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:034.010a: yad vayaṃ na tadaivaitān dhārtarāṣṭrān nihanmahi
GE07mbh_03_u:034.010c: bhavataḥ śāstram ādāya tan nas tapati duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:034.012a: yāṃ na kṛṣṇo na bībhatsur nābhimanyur na sṛñjayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.012c: na cāham abhinandāmi na ca mādrīsutāv ubhau
GE07mbh_03_u:034.013a: bhavān dharmo dharma iti satataṃ vratakarśitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.013c: kaccid rājan na nirvedād āpannaḥ klībajīvikām
GE07mbh_03_u:034.013d-0119_01: aśakyam iti vā kaś cit kṣātraṃ naiva smariṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:034.014b-0121_01: pratipannā viṣīdanti paṅke gaur iva durbalā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.014c: aśaktāḥ śriyam āhartum ātmanaḥ kurvate priyam
GE07mbh_03_u:034.015a: sa bhavān dṛṣṭimāñ śaktaḥ paśyann ātmani pauruṣam
GE07mbh_03_u:034.016a: asmān amī dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kṣamamāṇān alaṃ sataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.016c: aśaktān eva manyante tadduḥkhaṃ nāhave vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.017c: sarvaśo hi vadhaḥ śreyān pretya lokāṃl labhemahi
GE07mbh_03_u:034.018a: atha vā vayam evaitān nihatya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:034.018c: ādadīmahi gāṃ sarvāṃ tathāpi śreya eva naḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.019a: sarvathā kāryam etan naḥ svadharmam anutiṣṭhatām
GE07mbh_03_u:034.020c: anyair apahṛte rājye praśaṃsaiva na garhaṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.021a: karśanārtho hi yo dharmo mitrāṇām ātmanas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.021c: vyasanaṃ nāma tad rājan na sa dharmaḥ kudharma tat
GE07mbh_03_u:034.022c: jahatas tāta dharmārthau pretaṃ duḥkhasukhe yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.023a: yasya dharmo hi dharmārthaṃ kleśabhāṅ na sa paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.023c: na sa dharmasya vedārthaṃ sūryasyāndhaḥ prabhām iva
GE07mbh_03_u:034.024a: yasya cārthārtham evārthaḥ sa ca nārthasya kovidaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.024c: rakṣate bhṛtako 'raṇyaṃ yathā syāt tādṛg eva saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.026a: satataṃ yaś ca kāmārthī netarāv anutiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_03_u:034.026c: mitrāṇi tasya naśyanti dharmārthābhyāṃ ca hīyate
GE07mbh_03_u:034.028a: tasmād dharmārthayor nityaṃ na pramādyanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.028c: prakṛtiḥ sā hi kāmasya pāvakasyāraṇir yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.030c: sa kāmaś cittasaṃkalpaḥ śarīraṃ nāsya vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:034.031a: arthārthī puruṣo rājan bṛhantaṃ dharmam ṛcchati
GE07mbh_03_u:034.031c: artham ṛcchati kāmārthī na kāmād anyam ṛcchatī
GE07mbh_03_u:034.031d-0123_01: kāmārthī caiva yaḥ kāmaṃ na kāmād anyam ṛcchati
GE07mbh_03_u:034.032a: na hi kāmena kāmo 'nyaḥ sādhyate phalam eva tat
GE07mbh_03_u:034.033a: imāñ śakunikān rājan hanti vaitaṃsiko yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.033c: etad rūpam adharmasya bhūteṣu ca vihiṃsatām
GE07mbh_03_u:034.034a: kāmāl lobhāc ca dharmasya pravṛttiṃ yo na paśyati
GE07mbh_03_u:034.034c: sa vadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pretya ceha ca durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.035a: vyaktaṃ te vidito rājann artho dravyaparigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.035c: prakṛtiṃ cāpi vetthāsya vikṛtiṃ cāpi bhūyasīm
GE07mbh_03_u:034.036a: tasya nāśaṃ vināśaṃ vā jarayā maraṇena vā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.036c: anartham iti manyante so 'yam asmāsu vartate
GE07mbh_03_u:034.037a: indriyāṇāṃ ca pañcānāṃ manaso hṛdayasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:034.037e: sa kāma iti me buddhiḥ karmaṇāṃ phalam uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:034.038a: evam eva pṛthag dṛṣṭvā dharmārthau kāmam eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:034.038c: na dharmapara eva syān na cārthaparamo naraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.038e: na kāmaparamo vā syāt sarvān seveta sarvadā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.039a: dharmaṃ pūrvaṃ dhanaṃ madhye jaghanye kāmam ācaret
GE07mbh_03_u:034.039c: ahany anucared evam eṣa śāstrakṛto vidhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.040a: kāmaṃ pūrvaṃ dhanaṃ madhye jaghanye dharmam ācaret
GE07mbh_03_u:034.040c: vayasy anucared evam eṣa śāstrakṛto vidhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.041a: dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yathāvad vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_03_u:034.041c: vibhajya kāle kālajñaḥ sarvān seveta paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.042a: mokṣo vā paramaṃ śreya eṣa rājan sukhārthinām
GE07mbh_03_u:034.042c: prāptir vā buddhim āsthāya sopāyaṃ kurunandana
GE07mbh_03_u:034.043a: tad vāśu kriyatāṃ rājan prāptir vāpy adhigamyatām
GE07mbh_03_u:034.044a: viditaś caiva te dharmaḥ satataṃ caritaś ca te
GE07mbh_03_u:034.045a: dānaṃ yajñaḥ satāṃ pūjā vedadhāraṇam ārjavam
GE07mbh_03_u:034.045c: eṣa dharmaḥ paro rājan phalavān pretya ceha ca
GE07mbh_03_u:034.046c: akhilāḥ puruṣavyāghra guṇāḥ syur yady apītare
GE07mbh_03_u:034.047a: dharmamūlaṃ jagad rājan nānyad dharmād viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:034.047c: dharmaś cārthena mahatā śakyo rājan niṣevitum
GE07mbh_03_u:034.048a: na cārtho bhaikṣacaryeṇa nāpi klaibyena karhi cit
GE07mbh_03_u:034.048c: vettuṃ śakyaḥ sadā rājan kevalaṃ dharmabuddhinā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.049a: pratiṣiddhā hi te yācñā yayā sidhyati vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.050a: bhaikṣacaryā na vihitā na ca viṭśūdrajīvikā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.050c: kṣatriyasya viśeṣeṇa dharmas tu balam aurasam
GE07mbh_03_u:034.051a: udāram eva vidvāṃso dharmaṃ prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.053c: eṣa te vihito rājan dhātrā dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.054a: tasmād vicalitaḥ pārtha loke hāsyaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:034.054c: svadharmād dhi manuṣyāṇāṃ calanaṃ na praśasyate
GE07mbh_03_u:034.055a: sa kṣātraṃ hṛdayaṃ kṛtvā tyaktvedaṃ śithilaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.055c: vīryam āsthāya kaunteya dhuram udvaha dhuryavat
GE07mbh_03_u:034.056a: na hi kevaladharmātmā pṛthivīṃ jātu kaś cana
GE07mbh_03_u:034.056c: pārthivo vyajayad rājan na bhūtiṃ na punaḥ śriyam
GE07mbh_03_u:034.057a: jihvāṃ dattvā bahūnāṃ hi kṣudrāṇāṃ lubdhacetasām
GE07mbh_03_u:034.057c: nikṛtyā labhate rājyam āhāram iva śalyakaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.058a: bhrātaraḥ pūrvajātāś ca susamṛddhāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.059a: evaṃ balavataḥ sarvam iti buddhvā mahīpate
GE07mbh_03_u:034.059c: jahi śatrūn mahābāho parāṃ nikṛtim āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.060a: na hy arjunasamaḥ kaś cid yudhi yoddhā dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.060c: bhavitā vā pumān kaś cin matsamo vā gadādharaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.061a: sattvena kurute yuddhaṃ rājan subalavān api
GE07mbh_03_u:034.061c: na pramāṇena notsāhāt sattvastho bhava pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_03_u:034.062a: sattvaṃ hi mūlam arthasya vitathaṃ yad ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.062c: na tu prasaktaṃ bhavati vṛkṣacchāyeva haimanī
GE07mbh_03_u:034.063a: arthatyāgo hi kāryaḥ syād arthaṃ śreyāṃsam icchatā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.063c: bījaupamyena kaunteya mā te bhūd atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.064a: arthena tu samo 'nartho yatra labhyeta nodayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.064c: na tatra vipaṇaḥ kāryaḥ kharakaṇḍūyitaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_03_u:034.065a: evam eva manuṣyendra dharmaṃ tyaktvālpakaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.065c: bṛhantaṃ dharmam āpnoti sa buddha iti niścitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.066c: bhinnair mitraiḥ parityaktaṃ durbalaṃ kurute vaśe
GE07mbh_03_u:034.067a: sattvena kurute yuddhaṃ rājan subalavān api
GE07mbh_03_u:034.067c: nodyamena na hotrābhiḥ sarvāḥ svīkurute prajāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.068a: sarvathā saṃhatair eva durbalair balavān api
GE07mbh_03_u:034.068c: amitraḥ śakyate hantuṃ madhuhā bhramarair iva
GE07mbh_03_u:034.069a: yathā rājan prajāḥ sarvāḥ sūryaḥ pāti gabhastibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.069c: atti caiva tathaiva tvaṃ savituḥ sadṛśo bhava
GE07mbh_03_u:034.070a: etad dhy api tapo rājan purāṇam iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:034.070c: vidhinā pālanaṃ bhūmer yat kṛtaṃ naḥ pitāmahaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.070d-0126_01: na tathā tapasā rājaṃl lokān prāpnoti kṣatriyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.071a: apeyāt kila bhāḥ sūryāl lakṣmīś candramasas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.071c: iti loko vyavasito dṛṣṭvemāṃ bhavato vyathām
GE07mbh_03_u:034.072a: bhavataś ca praśaṃsābhir nindābhir itarasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:034.073a: idam abhyadhikaṃ rājan brāhmaṇā guravaś ca te
GE07mbh_03_u:034.074a: yan na mohān na kārpaṇyān na lobhān na bhayād api
GE07mbh_03_u:034.074c: anṛtaṃ kiṃ cid uktaṃ te na kāmān nārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_03_u:034.075a: yad enaḥ kurute kiṃ cid rājā bhūmim avāpnuvan
GE07mbh_03_u:034.075c: sarvaṃ tan nudate paścād yajñair vipuladakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.076a: brāhmaṇebhyo dadad grāmān gāś ca rājan sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.077d-0127_01: dhārtarāṣṭrīṃ mahārāja na śaṃsanti matiṃ janāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:034.078a: śvadṛtau kṣīram āsaktaṃ brahma vā vṛṣale yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.078c: satyaṃ stene balaṃ nāryāṃ rājyaṃ duryodhane tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:034.079a: iti nirvacanaṃ loke ciraṃ carati bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:034.079c: api caitat striyo bālāḥ svādhyāyam iva kurvate
GE07mbh_03_u:034.079d-0128_01: imām avasthāṃ ca gate sahāsmābhir ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:034.079d-0128_02: hanta naṣṭāḥ sma sarve vai bhavatopadrave sati
GE07mbh_03_u:034.083c: sparśam āśīviṣābhānāṃ martyaḥ kaś cana saṃsahet
GE07mbh_03_u:034.084a: na sa vīro na mātaṅgo na sadaśvo 'sti bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:034.084c: yaḥ saheta gadāvegaṃ mama kruddhasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_03_u:034.085a: sṛñjayaiḥ saha kaikeyair vṛṣṇīnām ṛṣabheṇa ca
GE07mbh_03_u:034.085c: kathaṃ svid yudhi kaunteya rājyaṃ na prāpnuyāmahe
GE07mbh_03_u:034.085d-0130_01: śatruhastagatāṃ rājan kathaṃ svinn āharer mahīm
GE07mbh_03_u:034.085d-0130_02: iha yatnam upāhṛtya balena mahatānvitaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:035.001a: asaṃśayaṃ bhārata satyam etad; yan mā tudan vākyaśalyaiḥ kṣiṇoṣi
GE07mbh_03_u:035.001c: na tvā vigarhe pratikūlam etan; mamānayād dhi vyasanaṃ va āgāt
GE07mbh_03_u:035.002a: ahaṃ hy akṣān anvapadyaṃ jihīrṣan; rājyaṃ sarāṣṭraṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāt
GE07mbh_03_u:035.002c: tan mā śaṭhaḥ kitavaḥ pratyadevīt; suyodhanārthaṃ subalasya putraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:035.003a: mahāmāyaḥ śakuniḥ pārvatīyaḥ; sadā sabhāyāṃ pravapann akṣapūgān
GE07mbh_03_u:035.003c: amāyinaṃ māyayā pratyadevīt; tato 'paśyaṃ vṛjinaṃ bhīmasena
GE07mbh_03_u:035.004a: akṣān hi dṛṣṭvā śakuner yathāvat; kāmānulomān ayujo yujaś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:035.004c: śakyaṃ niyantum abhaviṣyad ātmā; manyus tu hanti puruṣasya dhairyam
GE07mbh_03_u:035.005a: yantuṃ nātmā śakyate pauruṣeṇa; mānena vīryeṇa ca tāta naddhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:035.005c: na te vācaṃ bhīmasenābhyasūye; manye tathā tad bhavitavyam āsīt
GE07mbh_03_u:035.006a: sa no rājā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putro; nyapātayad vyasane rājyam icchan
GE07mbh_03_u:035.006c: dāsyaṃ ca no 'gamayad bhīmasena; yatrābhavac charaṇaṃ draupadī naḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:035.007a: tvaṃ cāpi tad vettha dhanaṃjayaś ca; punardyūtāyāgatānāṃ sabhāṃ naḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:035.007c: yan mābravīd dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putra; ekaglahārthaṃ bharatānāṃ samakṣam
GE07mbh_03_u:035.008a: vane samā dvādaśa rājaputra; yathākāmaṃ viditam ajātaśatro
GE07mbh_03_u:035.008c: athāparaṃ cāviditaṃ carethāḥ; sarvaiḥ saha bhrātṛbhiś chadmagūḍhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:035.009a: tvāṃ cec chrutvā tāta tathā carantam; avabhotsyante bhāratānāṃ carāḥ sma
GE07mbh_03_u:035.009c: anyāṃś carethās tāvato 'bdāṃs tatas tvaṃ; niścitya tat pratijānīhi pārtha
GE07mbh_03_u:035.010a: caraiś cen no 'viditaḥ kālam etaṃ; yukto rājan mohayitvā madīyān
GE07mbh_03_u:035.010c: bravīmi satyaṃ kurusaṃsadīha; tavaiva tā bhārata pañca nadyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:035.011a: vayaṃ caivaṃ bhrātaraḥ sarva eva; tvayā jitāḥ kālam apāsya bhogān
GE07mbh_03_u:035.011c: vasema ity āha purā sa rājā; madhye kurūṇāṃ sa mayoktas tatheti
GE07mbh_03_u:035.012a: tatra dyūtam abhavan no jaghanyaṃ; tasmiñ jitāḥ pravrajitāś ca sarve
GE07mbh_03_u:035.012c: itthaṃ ca deśān anusaṃcarāmo; vanāni kṛcchrāṇi ca kṛcchrarūpāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:035.013a: suyodhanaś cāpi na śāntim icchan; bhūyaḥ sa manyor vaśam anvagacchat
GE07mbh_03_u:035.013c: udyojayām āsa kurūṃś ca sarvān; ye cāsya ke cid vaśam anvagacchan
GE07mbh_03_u:035.014a: taṃ saṃdhim āsthāya satāṃ sakāśe; ko nāma jahyād iha rājyahetoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:035.014c: āryasya manye maraṇād garīyo; yad dharmam utkramya mahīṃ praśiṣyāt
GE07mbh_03_u:035.015a: tadaiva ced vīrakarmākariṣyo; yadā dyūte parighaṃ paryamṛkṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:035.015c: bāhū didhakṣan vāritaḥ phalgunena; kiṃ duṣkṛtaṃ bhīma tadābhaviṣyat
GE07mbh_03_u:035.016a: prāg eva caivaṃ samayakriyāyāḥ; kiṃ nābravīḥ pauruṣam āvidānaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:035.016c: prāptaṃ tu kālaṃ tv abhipadya paścāt; kiṃ mām idānīm ativelam āttha
GE07mbh_03_u:035.017a: bhūyo 'pi duḥkhaṃ mama bhīmasena; dūye viṣasyeva rasaṃ viditvā
GE07mbh_03_u:035.017c: yad yājñasenīṃ parikṛṣyamāṇāṃ; saṃdṛśya tat kṣāntam iti sma bhīma
GE07mbh_03_u:035.018a: na tv adya śakyaṃ bharatapravīra; kṛtvā yad uktaṃ kuruvīramadhye
GE07mbh_03_u:035.018c: kālaṃ pratīkṣasva sukhodayasya; paktiṃ phalānām iva bījavāpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:035.019a: yadā hi pūrvaṃ nikṛto nikṛtyā; vairaṃ sapuṣpaṃ saphalaṃ viditvā
GE07mbh_03_u:035.019c: mahāguṇaṃ harati hi pauruṣeṇa; tadā vīro jīvati jīvaloke
GE07mbh_03_u:035.020a: śriyaṃ ca loke labhate samagrāṃ; manye cāsmai śatravaḥ saṃnamante
GE07mbh_03_u:035.020c: mitrāṇi cainam atirāgād bhajante; devā ivendram anujīvanti cainam
GE07mbh_03_u:035.021a: mama pratijñāṃ ca nibodha satyāṃ; vṛṇe dharmam amṛtāj jīvitāc ca
GE07mbh_03_u:035.021c: rājyaṃ ca putrāś ca yaśo dhanaṃ ca; sarvaṃ na satyasya kalām upaiti
GE07mbh_03_u:036.002a: pratyakṣaṃ manyase kālaṃ martyaḥ san kālabandhanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:036.004a: yo nūnam amitāyuḥ syād atha vāpi pramāṇavit
GE07mbh_03_u:036.005a: pratīkṣamāṇān kālo naḥ samā rājaṃs trayodaśa
GE07mbh_03_u:036.006a: śarīriṇāṃ hi maraṇaṃ śarīre nityam āśritam
GE07mbh_03_u:036.006c: prāg eva maraṇāt tasmād rājyāyaiva ghaṭāmahe
GE07mbh_03_u:036.007a: yo na yāti prasaṃkhyānam aspaṣṭo bhūmivardhanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:036.008a: yo na yātayate vairam alpasattvodyamaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_03_u:036.009a: hairaṇyau bhavato bāhū śrutir bhavati pārthiva
GE07mbh_03_u:036.009c: hatvā dviṣantaṃ saṃgrāme bhuktvā bāhvarjitaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_03_u:036.010a: hatvā cet puruṣo rājan nikartāram ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:036.010c: ahnāya narakaṃ gacchet svargeṇāsya sa saṃmitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:036.011c: yenāham abhisaṃtapto na naktaṃ na divā śaye
GE07mbh_03_u:036.012a: ayaṃ ca pārtho bībhatsur variṣṭho jyāvikarṣaṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:036.014a: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca vṛddhā mātā ca vīrasūḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:036.015a: sarve te priyam icchanti bāndhavāḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:036.016a: priyam eva tu sarveṣāṃ yad bravīmy uta kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:036.016c: sarve hī vyasanaṃ prāptāḥ sarve yuddhābhinandinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:036.017a: netaḥ pāpīyasī kā cid āpad rājan bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:036.017c: yan no nīcair alpabalai rājyam ācchidya bhujyate
GE07mbh_03_u:036.018c: kleśāṃs titikṣase rājan nānyaḥ kaś cit praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_03_u:036.019c: asyāṃ hi yonau jāyante prāyaśaḥ krūrabuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:036.020a: aśrauṣīs tvaṃ rājadharmān yathā vai manur abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:036.020d-0135_01: jñāne tapasi śaurye vā yasya na prathitaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:036.020d-0135_02: vidyāyām atha lābhe vā mātur uccāra eva saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:036.022c: channam icchasi kaunteya yo 'smān saṃvartum icchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:036.023c: divīva pārtha sūryeṇa na śakyā carituṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:036.024c: hastī śveta ivājñātaḥ kathaṃ jiṣṇuś cariṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:036.025a: imau ca siṃhasaṃkāśau bhrātarau sahitau śiśū
GE07mbh_03_u:036.025c: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca kathaṃ pārtha cariṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:036.026c: viśrutā katham ajñātā kṛṣṇā pārtha cariṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:036.027a: māṃ cāpi rājañ jānanti ākumāram imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:036.029a: na hi te 'py upaśāmyanti nikṛtānāṃ nirākṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:036.030a: te 'py asmāsu prayuñjīran pracchannān subahūñ janān
GE07mbh_03_u:036.030c: ācakṣīraṃś ca no jñātvā tan naḥ syāt sumahad bhayam
GE07mbh_03_u:036.031a: asmābhir uṣitāḥ samyag vane māsās trayodaśa
GE07mbh_03_u:036.032a: asti māsaḥ pratinidhir yathā prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:036.032c: pūtikān iva somasya tathedaṃ kriyatām iti
GE07mbh_03_u:036.034a: tasmāc chatruvadhe rājan kriyatāṃ niścayas tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:036.034c: kṣatriyasya tu sarvasya nānyo dharmo 'sti saṃyugāt
GE07mbh_03_u:037.001d-0136_01: śrutā me rājadharmāś ca varṇānāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_03_u:037.001d-0136_02: āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
GE07mbh_03_u:037.001d-0136_04: kathaṃ balāt kariṣyāmi meror iva vimardanam
GE07mbh_03_u:037.003a: evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:037.003c: idam anyat samādhatsva vākyaṃ me vākyakovida
GE07mbh_03_u:037.005c: sidhyanty arthā mahābāho daivaṃ cātra pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:037.006c: ārabdhavyam idaṃ karma manyase śṛṇu tatra me
GE07mbh_03_u:037.007a: bhūriśravāḥ śalaś caiva jalasaṃdhaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:037.007c: bhīṣmo droṇaś ca karṇaś ca droṇaputraś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:037.008c: sarva eva kṛtāstrāś ca satataṃ cātatāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.009c: saṃśritāḥ kauravaṃ pakṣaṃ jātasnehāś ca sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_03_u:037.011c: saṃvibhaktā hi mātrābhir bhogair api ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.012a: duryodhanena te vīrā mānitāś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.012c: prāṇāṃs tyakṣyanti saṃgrāme iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.013a: samā yady api bhīṣmasya vṛttir asmāsu teṣu ca
GE07mbh_03_u:037.013c: droṇasya ca mahābāho kṛpasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.014a: avaśyaṃ rājapiṇḍas tair nirveśya iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.014c: tasmāt tyakṣyanti saṃgrāme prāṇān api sudustyajān
GE07mbh_03_u:037.015c: ajeyāś ceti me buddhir api devaiḥ savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.017c: aśakyo hy asahāyena hantuṃ duryodhanas tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:037.019c: babhūva vimanās trasto na caivovāca kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:037.020a: tayoḥ saṃvadator evaṃ tadā pāṇḍavayor dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.021c: yudhiṣṭhiram idaṃ vākyam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.022a: yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho vedmi te hṛdi mānasam
GE07mbh_03_u:037.023a: bhīṣmād droṇāt kṛpāt karṇād droṇaputrāc ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:037.023c: yat te bhayam amitraghna hṛdi saṃparivartate
GE07mbh_03_u:037.024c: tac chrutvā dhṛtim āsthāya karmaṇā pratipādaya
GE07mbh_03_u:037.024d-0138_01: pratipādya tu rājendra tataḥ kṣipraṃ jvaraṃ jahi
GE07mbh_03_u:037.026a: śreyasas te paraḥ kālaḥ prāpto bharatasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:037.027a: gṛhāṇemāṃ mayā proktāṃ siddhiṃ mūrtimatīm iva
GE07mbh_03_u:037.027c: vidyāṃ pratismṛtiṃ nāma prapannāya bravīmi te
GE07mbh_03_u:037.028c: varuṇaṃ ca dhaneśaṃ ca dharmarājaṃ ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_03_u:037.028e: śakto hy eṣa surān draṣṭuṃ tapasā vikrameṇa ca
GE07mbh_03_u:037.029c: purāṇaḥ śāśvato devo viṣṇor aṃśaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.030a: astrāṇīndrāc ca rudrāc ca lokapālebhya eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:037.031a: vanād asmāc ca kaunteya vanam anyad vicintyatām
GE07mbh_03_u:037.031c: nivāsārthāya yad yuktaṃ bhaved vaḥ pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_03_u:037.032a: ekatra ciravāso hi na prītijanano bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:037.034a: evam uktvā prapannāya śucaye bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.036a: yudhiṣṭhiras tu dharmātmā tad brahma manasā yataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.036c: dhārayām āsa medhāvī kāle kāle samabhyasan
GE07mbh_03_u:037.038c: brāhmaṇās tapasā yuktā devendram ṛṣayo yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:037.039a: tataḥ kāmyakam āsādya punas te bharatarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.040a: tatra te nyavasan rājan kaṃ cit kālaṃ manasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:037.041a: caranto mṛgayāṃ nityaṃ śuddhair bāṇair mṛgārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:038.001a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:038.003a: sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā vanavāsam ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:038.004a: bhīṣme droṇe kṛpe karṇe droṇaputre ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:038.006c: saṃvibhaktāś ca tuṣṭāś ca guruvat teṣu vartate
GE07mbh_03_u:038.006d-0140_01: aikātmyaṃ ca gatāḥ sarve dhārtarāṣṭreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:038.007b-0141_01: ācāryā mānitās tuṣṭāḥ śāntiṃ vyavaharanty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:038.007c: śaktiṃ na hāpayiṣyanti te kāle pratipūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:038.009c: tayā prayuktayā samyag jagat sarvaṃ prakāśate
GE07mbh_03_u:038.009e: tena tvaṃ brahmaṇā tāta saṃyuktaḥ susamāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:038.011c: na kasya cid dadan mārgaṃ gaccha tātottarāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_03_u:038.011e: indre hy astrāṇi divyāni samastāni dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_03_u:038.012a: vṛtrād bhītais tadā devair balam indre samarpitam
GE07mbh_03_u:038.012c: tāny ekasthāni sarvāṇi tatas tvaṃ pratipatsyase
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013a: śakram eva prapadyasva sa te 'strāṇi pradāsyati
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0001: yogayuktasya te pārtha tatra nāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0002: pravarām atulāṃ satyāṃ nirdoṣāṃ sarvadā satām
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0003: tām ekaḥ pāṇḍaveṣv adya astraṃ prāpto dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0004: na cādharmam imaṃ devā nāsiddhaṃ nātapasvinam
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0005: draṣṭum icchanti kaunteya calacittaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0010: ākroṣṭā cātimānī ca raudro lubdho 'tha lolupaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0011: stenaś ca madyapaś caiva bhrūṇahā gurutalpagaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0012: saṃbhāvitātmā cātyarthaṃ nṛśaṃsaḥ paruṣaś ca ha
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0013: naite lokān āpnuvanti nirlokās te dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0015: damaḥ sthitir dhṛtir dharmaḥ kṣamā rūpam anuttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0016: dayā damaś ca dharmaś ca gurupūjā kṛtajñatā
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0017: mitratā dvijabhaktiś ca vasanti tvayi phālguna
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0018: vyapekṣā sarvabhūteṣu kṣamā dānaṃ matiḥ smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0022: tvaṃ gatiḥ paramā tāta vṛtrahā marutām iva
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0023: tasmiṃs trayodaśe varṣe bhrātaraḥ suhṛdaś ca te
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0025: sa pārtha pitaraṃ gaccha sahasrākṣam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0030: prāpya puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān raṃsyate jayatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:038.013b-003_0031: mānitas tridaśaiḥ pārtha vihṛtya susukhaṃ divi

GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-0192_04: tatas tenātulāṃ prītim upagamya kva cit kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-0192a_01: tad indras tasya vijñāya cikīrṣitam anuttamam vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0001: ādāv evātha taṃ śakraś citrasenaṃ raho 'bravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0002: pārthasya cakṣur urvaśyāṃ saktaṃ vijñāya vāsava
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0007: evam uktas tathety uktvā so 'nujñāṃ prāpya vāsavāt
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0009: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vidito hṛṣṭaḥ svāgatenārcitas tayā
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0013: yas tu devamanuṣyeṣu prakhyātaḥ sahajair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0014: śriyā śīlena rūpeṇa vratena ca damena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0020: eko vai rakṣitā caiva tridivaṃ maghavān iva
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0024: bhaktānukampī kāntaś ca priyaś ca sthirasaṃgaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0026: viditas te 'rjuno vīraḥ sa svargaphalam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0028: tad evaṃ kuru kalyāṇi prapannas tvāṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0029: evam uktā smitaṃ kṛtvā saṃmānaṃ bahumanya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0031: yas tv asya kathitaḥ satyo guṇoddeśas tvayā mama
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0032: taṃ śrutvāvyathayaṃ puṃso vṛṇuyāṃ kim ato 'rjunam
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0035: vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca gaccha tvaṃ hi yathākāmam āgamiṣyāmy ahaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0043: manorathena saṃprāptaṃ ramanty enaṃ hi phālgunaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0045: prasthitā sā pṛthuśroṇī pārthasya bhavanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0068: tatra dvāram anuprāptā dvārasthaiś ca niveditā
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0071: sa śaṅkitamanā rājan pratyudgacchata tāṃ niśi
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0073: arjuna uvāca tadābhivādanaṃ kṛtvā gurupūjāṃ prayuktavān
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0075: kim ājñāpayase devi preṣyas te 'ham upasthitaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0076: phālgunasya vacaḥ śrutvā gatasaṃjñā tadorvaśī urvaśy uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0077: gandharvavacanaṃ sarvaṃ śrāvayām āsa taṃ tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0079: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi yathā cāham ihāgatā
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0082: rudrāṇāṃ caiva sāṃnidhyam ādityānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0091: tvaṃ kilānimiṣaḥ pārtha mām ekāṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0093: tava pitrābhyanujñātā gatāḥ svaṃ svaṃ gṛhaṃ surāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0095: api cānyāś ca śatrughna tava pitrā visarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0097: prāptaḥ kamalapatrākṣa sa ca mām abravīd atha
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0099: priyaṃ kuru mahendrasya mama caivātmanaś ca ha
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0101: pārthaṃ prārthaya suśroṇi tvam ity evaṃ tadābravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0102: tato 'haṃ samanujñātā tena pitrā ca te 'nagha
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0106: tāṃ tathā bruvatīṃ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ lajjāvṛto 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0108: duḥśrutaṃ me 'stu subhage yan māṃ vadasi bhāvini
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0110: yathā kuntī mahābhāgā yathendrāṇī śacī mama
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0111: tathā tvam api kalyāṇī nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0112: yac cekṣitāsi vispaṣṭaṃ viśeṣeṇa mayā śubhe
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0113: tac ca kāraṇapūrvaṃ hi śṛṇu satyaṃ śucismite
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0116: na mām arhasi kalyāṇi anyathā dhyātum apsaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0117: guror gurutarī me tvaṃ mama vaṃśavivardhinī urvaśy uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0119: gurusthāne na māṃ vīra niyoktuṃ tvam ihārhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0120: pūror vaṃśe hi ye putrā naptāro vā tv ihāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0121: tapasā ramayanty asmān na ca teṣāṃ vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0122: tat prasīda na mām ārtāṃ visarjayitum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0123: hṛcchayena ca saṃtaptāṃ bhaktāṃ ca bhaja mānada arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0124: śruṇu satyaṃ varārohe yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmy
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0125: śṛṇvantu me diśaś caiva vidiśaś ca sadevatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0126: yathā kuntī ca mādrī ca śacī caiva mamānaghe
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0127: tathā svavaṃśajananī tvaṃ hi me 'dya garīyasī
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0128: gaccha mūrdhnā prapanno 'smi pādau te varavarṇini vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0129: tvaṃ hi me mātṛvat pūjyā rakṣyo 'haṃ putravat tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0130: evam uktā tu pārthena urvaśī krodhamūrchitā
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0131: vepantī bhrukuṭīvakrā śaśāpātha dhanaṃjayam urvaśy uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0132: tava pitrābhyanujñātāṃ svayaṃ ca gṛham āgatām
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0134: tasmāt tvaṃ nartanaḥ pārtha strīmadhye mānavarjitaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0136: evaṃ dattvārjune śāpaṃ sphuradoṣṭhī śvasanty atha
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0137: punaḥ pratyāgatā kṣipram urvaśī gṛham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0139: saṃprāpya rajanīvṛttaṃ tad urvaśyā yathā tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0141: tatra caivaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ śāpaṃ caiva punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0145: suputrādya pṛthā tāta tvayā putreṇa sattama
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0146: ṛṣayo 'pi hi dhairyeṇa jitā vai te mahābhuja
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0147: yat tu dattavatī śāpam urvaśī tava mānada
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0148: sa cāpi te 'rthakṛt tāta sādhakaś ca bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0150: varṣe trayodaśe vīra tatra tvaṃ kṣapayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0152: varṣam ekaṃ vihṛtyaiva tataḥ puṃstvam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0153: evam uktas tu śakreṇa phālgunaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0154: mudaṃ paramikāṃ lebhe na ca śāpaṃ vyacintayat
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0157: ya idaṃ śruṇuyān nityaṃ vṛttaṃ pāṇḍusutasya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:045.008d-006_0158: na tasya kāmaḥ kāmeṣu pāpakeṣu pravartate
GE07mbh_03_u:045.009a: kadā cid aṭamānas tu maharṣir uta lomaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.012a: tasya dṛṣṭvābhavad buddhiḥ pārtham indrāsane sthitam
GE07mbh_03_u:045.012c: kathaṃ nu kṣatriyaḥ pārthaḥ śakrāsanam avāptavān
GE07mbh_03_u:045.013a: kiṃ tv asya sukṛtaṃ karma lokā vā ke vinirjitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.014c: lomaśaṃ prahasan vākyam idam āha śacīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.015a: brahmarṣe śrūyatāṃ yat te manasaitad vivakṣitam
GE07mbh_03_u:045.016a: maharṣe mama putro 'yaṃ kuntyāṃ jāto mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.016c: astrahetor iha prāptaḥ kasmāc cit kāraṇāntarāt
GE07mbh_03_u:045.017a: aho nainaṃ bhavān vetti purāṇam ṛṣisattamam
GE07mbh_03_u:045.017c: śṛṇu me vadato brahman yo 'yaṃ yac cāsya kāraṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:045.019a: yan na śakyaṃ surair draṣṭum ṛṣibhir vā mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.019c: tad āśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ badarī nāma viśrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:045.020a: sa nivāso 'bhavad vipra viṣṇor jiṣṇos tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:045.021a: tau manniyogād brahmarṣe kṣitau jātau mahādyutī
GE07mbh_03_u:045.022a: udvṛttā hy asurāḥ ke cin nivātakavacā iti
GE07mbh_03_u:045.023c: devān na gaṇayante ca tathā dattavarā hi te
GE07mbh_03_u:045.024c: sarve devanikāyā hi nālaṃ yodhayituṃ sma tān
GE07mbh_03_u:045.025c: kapilo nāma devo 'sau bhagavān ajito hariḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.027a: tena kāryaṃ mahat kāryam asmākaṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:045.027d-0194_01: so 'surān darśanād eva śakto hantuṃ sahānugān
GE07mbh_03_u:045.027d-0194_03: kiṃ tu nālpena kāryeṇa prabodhyo madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.027d-0194_04: tejasaḥ sumahān rāśiḥ prabuddhaḥ pradahej jagat
GE07mbh_03_u:045.028c: tān nihatya raṇe śūraḥ punar yāsyati mānuṣān
GE07mbh_03_u:045.030a: sa vācyo mama saṃdeśād dharmātmā satyasaṃgaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:045.030c: notkaṇṭhā phalgune kāryā kṛtāstraḥ śīghram eṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:045.033c: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvair draṣṭum arhaty ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:045.036a: giridurgeṣu hi sadā deśeṣu viṣameṣu ca
GE07mbh_03_u:045.036c: vasanti rākṣasā raudrās tebhyo rakṣet sadā bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:045.036d-0195_01: evam ukte mahendreṇa bībhatsur api lomaśam
GE07mbh_03_u:045.036d-0195_03: yathā guptas tvayā rājā caret tīrthāni sattama
GE07mbh_03_u:045.036d-0195_04: dānaṃ dadyād yathā caiva tathā kuru mahāmune
GE07mbh_03_u:046.001c: dhṛtarāṣṭro mahātejāḥ śrutvā vipra kim abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:046.003a: śrutaṃ me sūta kārtsnyena karma pārthasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.005a: yasya nityam ṛtā vācaḥ svaireṣv api mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.005c: trailokyam api tasya syād yoddhā yasya dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.007a: mama putrā durātmānaḥ sarve mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.008a: tasyaiva ca na paśyāmi yudhi gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.008c: aniśaṃ cintayāno 'pi ya enam udiyād rathī
GE07mbh_03_u:046.009a: droṇakarṇau pratīyātāṃ yadi bhīṣmo 'pi vā raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:046.009c: mahān syāt saṃśayo loke na tu paśyāmi no jayam
GE07mbh_03_u:046.010a: ghṛṇī karṇaḥ pramādī ca ācāryaḥ sthaviro guruḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.011c: sarve hy astravidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve prāptā mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.012a: api sarveśvaratvaṃ hi na vāñcheran parājitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.012c: vadhe nūnaṃ bhavec chāntis teṣāṃ vā phalgunasya vā
GE07mbh_03_u:046.013a: na tu hantārjunasyāsti jetā vāsya na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:046.013c: manyus tasya kathaṃ śāmyen mandān prati samutthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.015a: śeṣaṃ kuryād girer vajraṃ nipatan mūrdhni saṃjaya
GE07mbh_03_u:046.015c: na tu kuryuḥ śarāḥ śeṣam astās tāta kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_03_u:046.016a: yathā hi kiraṇā bhānos tapantīha carācaram
GE07mbh_03_u:046.016c: tathā pārthabhujotsṛṣṭāḥ śarās tapsyanti me sutān
GE07mbh_03_u:046.018a: yad udvapan pravapaṃś caiva bāṇān; sthātātatāyī samare kirīṭī
GE07mbh_03_u:046.018c: sṛṣṭo 'ntakaḥ sarvaharo vidhātrā; bhaved yathā tadvad apāraṇīyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.019a: yad etat kathitaṃ rājaṃs tvayā duryodhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:046.019c: sarvam etad yathāttha tvaṃ naitan mithyā mahīpate
GE07mbh_03_u:046.020c: dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇāṃ sabhāṃ nītāṃ dharmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_03_u:046.021a: duḥśāsanasya tā vācaḥ śrutvā te dāruṇodayāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.021c: karṇasya ca mahārāja na svapsyantīti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.022a: śrutaṃ hi te mahārāja yathā pārthena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_03_u:046.023a: kairātaṃ veṣam āsthāya yodhayām āsa phalgunam
GE07mbh_03_u:046.024a: tatrainaṃ lokapālās te darśayām āsur arjunam
GE07mbh_03_u:046.025a: naitad utsahate 'nyo hi labdhum anyatra phalgunāt
GE07mbh_03_u:046.025c: sākṣād darśanam eteṣām īśvarāṇāṃ naro bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:046.026a: maheśvareṇa yo rājan na jīrṇo grastamūrtimān
GE07mbh_03_u:046.026c: kas tam utsahate vīraṃ yuddhe jarayituṃ pumān
GE07mbh_03_u:046.028a: yatra visphuramāṇoṣṭho bhīmaḥ prāha vaco mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:046.029a: ūrū bhetsyāmi te pāpa gadayā vajrakalpayā
GE07mbh_03_u:046.032a: kiṃ kṛtaṃ sūta karṇena vadatā paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.032c: paryāptaṃ vairam etāvad yat kṛṣṇā sā sabhāṃ gatā
GE07mbh_03_u:046.033c: yeṣāṃ bhrātā gurur jyeṣṭho vinaye nāvatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_03_u:046.034a: mamāpi vacanaṃ sūta na śuśrūṣati mandabhāk
GE07mbh_03_u:046.034c: dṛṣṭvā māṃ cakṣuṣā hīnaṃ nirviceṣṭam acetanam
GE07mbh_03_u:046.035c: te 'py asya bhūyaso doṣān vardhayanti vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.036c: nirdaheyur mama sutān kiṃ punar manyuneritāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.038a: yasya mantrī ca goptā ca suhṛc caiva janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.038c: haris trailokyanāthaḥ sa kiṃ nu tasya na nirjitam
GE07mbh_03_u:046.039a: idaṃ ca sumahac citram arjunasyeha saṃjaya
GE07mbh_03_u:046.039c: mahādevena bāhubhyāṃ yat sameta iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.041a: sarvathā nāsti me putraḥ sāmātyaḥ sahabāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:046.041c: kruddhe pārthe ca bhīme ca vāsudeve ca sātvate
GE07mbh_03_u:047.001a: yad idaṃ śocitaṃ rājñā dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa vai mune
GE07mbh_03_u:047.001c: pravrājya pāṇḍavān vīrān sarvam etan nirarthakam
GE07mbh_03_u:047.002a: kathaṃ hi rājā putraṃ svam upekṣetālpacetasam
GE07mbh_03_u:047.003a: kim āsīt pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ vane bhojanam ucyatām
GE07mbh_03_u:047.003c: vāneyam atha vā kṛṣṭam etad ākhyātu me bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:047.004a: vāneyaṃ ca mṛgāṃś caiva śuddhair bāṇair nipātitān
GE07mbh_03_u:047.005a: tāṃs tu śūrān maheṣvāsāṃs tadā nivasato vane
GE07mbh_03_u:047.006c: daśa mokṣavidāṃ tadvad yān bibharti yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:047.007a: rurūn kṛṣṇamṛgāṃś caiva medhyāṃś cānyān vanecarān
GE07mbh_03_u:047.008a: na tatra kaś cid durvarṇo vyādhito vāpy adṛśyata
GE07mbh_03_u:047.008c: kṛśo vā durbalo vāpi dīno bhīto 'pi vā naraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:047.008d-0197_01: na tatrāvinayaḥ kaś cid adṛśyata tadā dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:047.009a: putrān iva priyāñ jñātīn bhrātṝn iva sahodarān
GE07mbh_03_u:047.010a: patīṃś ca draupadī sarvān dvijāṃś caiva yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_03_u:047.011a: prācīṃ rājā dakṣiṇāṃ bhīmaseno; yamau pratīcīm atha vāpy udīcīm
GE07mbh_03_u:047.011c: dhanurdharā māṃsahetor mṛgāṇāṃ; kṣayaṃ cakrur nityam evopagamya
GE07mbh_03_u:047.012a: tathā teṣāṃ vasatāṃ kāmyake vai; vihīnānām arjunenotsukānām
GE07mbh_03_u:047.012c: pañcaiva varṣāṇi tadā vyatīyur; adhīyatāṃ japatāṃ juhvatāṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:048.001d-0198_01: teṣāṃ tac caritaṃ śrutvā manuṣyātītam adbhutam
GE07mbh_03_u:048.001d-0199_01: na rātrau na divā sūta śāntiṃ prāpnomi vai kṣaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:048.001d-0199_02: saṃcintya durnayaṃ ghoram atītaṃ dyūtajaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_03_u:048.001d-0199_03: teṣām asahyavīryāṇāṃ śauryaṃ dhairyaṃ dhṛtiṃ parām
GE07mbh_03_u:048.004e: na śeṣam iha paśyāmi tadā sainyasya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_03_u:048.005a: tau hy apratirathau yuddhe devaputrau mahārathau
GE07mbh_03_u:048.005c: draupadyās taṃ parikleśaṃ na kṣaṃsyete tv amarṣiṇau
GE07mbh_03_u:048.006a: vṛṣṇayo vā maheṣvāsā pāñcālā vā mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:048.006e: pradhakṣyanti raṇe pārthāḥ putrāṇāṃ mama vāhinīm
GE07mbh_03_u:048.007c: na śakyaḥ sahituṃ vegaḥ parvatair api saṃyuge

GE07mbh_03_u:056.008d-0236_01: tataḥ sa rājā sahasā devituṃ saṃpracakrame
GE07mbh_03_u:056.009c: āviṣṭaḥ kalinā dyūte jīyate sma nalas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:056.010a: tam akṣamadasaṃmattaṃ suhṛdāṃ na tu kaś cana
GE07mbh_03_u:056.011a: tataḥ paurajanaḥ sarvo mantribhiḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:056.012c: eṣa paurajanaḥ sarvo dvāri tiṣṭhati kāryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:056.014a: tataḥ sā bāṣpakalayā vācā duḥkhena karśitā
GE07mbh_03_u:056.015a: rājan paurajano dvāri tvāṃ didṛkṣur avasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:056.015d-0237_01: vṛddhair brāhmaṇamukhyaiś ca vaṇigbhiś ca samanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:056.015e: taṃ draṣṭum arhasīty evaṃ punaḥ punar abhāṣata
GE07mbh_03_u:056.016c: āviṣṭaḥ kalinā rājā nābhyabhāṣata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:056.017a: tatas te mantriṇaḥ sarve te caiva puravāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:056.017c: nāyam astīti duḥkhārtā vrīḍitā jagmur ālayān
GE07mbh_03_u:056.018a: tathā tad abhavad dyūtaṃ puṣkarasya nalasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:056.018c: yudhiṣṭhira bahūn māsān puṇyaślokas tv ajīyata
GE07mbh_03_u:057.002c: cintayām āsa tat kāryaṃ sumahat pārthivaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:057.003a: sā śaṅkamānā tatpāpaṃ cikīrṣantī ca tatpriyam
GE07mbh_03_u:057.004c: ācakṣva yad dhṛtaṃ dravyam avaśiṣṭaṃ ca yad vasu
GE07mbh_03_u:057.004d-0239_01: ity evaṃ sā samādiṣṭā bṛhatsenā nareśvara
GE07mbh_03_u:057.004d-0239_02: uvāca devyā vacanaṃ mantriṇāṃ sā samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:057.005a: tatas te mantriṇaḥ sarve vijñāya nalaśāsanam
GE07mbh_03_u:057.005c: api no bhāgadheyaṃ syād ity uktvā punar āvrajan
GE07mbh_03_u:057.006a: tās tu sarvāḥ prakṛtayo dvitīyaṃ samupasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:057.006c: nyavedayad bhīmasutā na ca tat pratyanandata
GE07mbh_03_u:057.007c: damayantī punar veśma vrīḍitā praviveśa ha
GE07mbh_03_u:057.008c: nalaṃ ca hṛtasarvasvaṃ dhātrīṃ punar uvāca ha
GE07mbh_03_u:057.009c: sūtam ānaya kalyāṇi mahat kāryam upasthitam
GE07mbh_03_u:057.010a: bṛhatsenā tu tac chrutvā damayantyāḥ prabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_03_u:057.011a: vārṣṇeyaṃ tu tato bhaimī sāntvayañ ślakṣṇayā girā
GE07mbh_03_u:057.012a: jānīṣe tvaṃ yathā rājā samyagvṛttaḥ sadā tvayi
GE07mbh_03_u:057.012c: tasya tvaṃ viṣamasthasya sāhāyyaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:057.013a: yathā yathā hi nṛpatiḥ puṣkareṇeha jīyate
GE07mbh_03_u:057.013c: tathā tathāsya dyūte vai rāgo bhūyo 'bhivardhate
GE07mbh_03_u:057.015b-0240_01: mamāpi ca tathā vākyaṃ nābhinandati mohitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:057.015b-0241_01: yathā rājñaḥ pradīptānāṃ bhāgyānām adya sārathe
GE07mbh_03_u:057.015c: nūnaṃ manye na śeṣo 'sti naiṣadhasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:057.016a: yatra me vacanaṃ rājā nābhinandati mohitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:057.016c: śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ prapannāsmi sārathe kuru madvacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:057.016e: na hi me śudhyate bhāvaḥ kadā cid vinaśed iti
GE07mbh_03_u:057.017c: idam āropya mithunaṃ kuṇḍinaṃ yātum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:057.018a: mama jñātiṣu nikṣipya dārakau syandanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:057.018c: aśvāṃś caitān yathākāmaṃ vasa vānyatra gaccha vā
GE07mbh_03_u:057.019a: damayantyās tu tad vākyaṃ vārṣṇeyo nalasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:057.020c: yayau mithunam āropya vidarbhāṃs tena vāhinā
GE07mbh_03_u:057.021a: hayāṃs tatra vinikṣipya sūto rathavaraṃ ca tam
GE07mbh_03_u:057.021c: indrasenāṃ ca tāṃ kanyām indrasenaṃ ca bālakam
GE07mbh_03_u:057.022a: āmantrya bhīmaṃ rājānam ārtaḥ śocan nalaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_03_u:057.022b-0242_01: kva nu yāsyāmi manasā cintayāno muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:058.001a: tatas tu yāte vārṣṇeye puṇyaślokasya dīvyataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:058.001c: puṣkareṇa hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ yac cānyad vasu kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:058.002c: dyūtaṃ pravartatāṃ bhūyaḥ pratipāṇo 'sti kas tava
GE07mbh_03_u:058.003a: śiṣṭā te damayanty ekā sarvam anyad dhṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:058.003c: damayantyāḥ paṇaḥ sādhu vartatāṃ yadi manyase
GE07mbh_03_u:058.004c: vyadīryateva hṛdayaṃ na cainaṃ kiṃ cid abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:058.005b-0243_01: uvāca vidyate 'nyac ca dhanaṃ mama narādhama
GE07mbh_03_u:058.005b-0243_03: uttarīyaṃ tadā vastraṃ tasyāś cābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:058.006c: niścakrāma tadā rājā tyaktvā suvipulāṃ śriyam
GE07mbh_03_u:058.007c: sa tayā bāhyataḥ sārdhaṃ trirātraṃ naiṣadho 'vasat
GE07mbh_03_u:058.008a: puṣkaras tu mahārāja ghoṣayām āsa vai pure
GE07mbh_03_u:058.008c: nale yaḥ samyag ātiṣṭhet sa gacched vadhyatāṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:058.009a: puṣkarasya tu vākyena tasya vidveṣaṇena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:058.009c: paurā na tasmin satkāraṃ kṛtavanto yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:058.010a: sa tathā nagarābhyāśe satkārārho na satkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:058.010d-0244_02: prātiṣṭhata tato rājā damayantī tam anvagāt
GE07mbh_03_u:058.012a: sa cintayām āsa tadā niṣadhādhipatir balī
GE07mbh_03_u:058.012c: asti bhakṣo mamādyāyaṃ vasu cedaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:058.014a: utpatantaḥ khagās te tu vākyam āhus tadā nalam
GE07mbh_03_u:058.014c: dṛṣṭvā digvāsasaṃ bhūmau sthitaṃ dīnam adhomukham
GE07mbh_03_u:058.015a: vayam akṣāḥ sudurbuddhe tava vāso jihīrṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:058.015c: āgatā na hi naḥ prītiḥ savāsasi gate tvayi
GE07mbh_03_u:058.016a: tān samīkṣya gatān akṣān ātmānaṃ ca vivāsasam
GE07mbh_03_u:058.017c: prāṇayātrāṃ na vinde ca duḥkhitaḥ kṣudhayārditaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:058.018a: yeṣāṃ kṛte na satkāram akurvan mayi naiṣadhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:058.018c: ta ime śakunā bhūtvā vāso 'py apaharanti me
GE07mbh_03_u:058.019c: bhartā te 'haṃ nibodhedaṃ vacanaṃ hitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:058.021a: eṣa vindhyo mahāśailaḥ payoṣṇī ca samudragā
GE07mbh_03_u:058.022a: eṣa panthā vidarbhāṇām ayaṃ gacchati kosalān
GE07mbh_03_u:058.022c: ataḥ paraṃ ca deśo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇāpathaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:058.022d-0245_01: etad vākyaṃ nalo rājā damayantīṃ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:058.022d-0245_02: uvācāsakṛd ārto hi bhaimīm uddiśya bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:058.023a: tataḥ sā bāṣpakalayā vācā duḥkhena karśitā
GE07mbh_03_u:058.023c: uvāca damayantī taṃ naiṣadhaṃ karuṇaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:058.024a: udvepate me hṛdayaṃ sīdanty aṅgāni sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:058.024c: tava pārthiva saṃkalpaṃ cintayantyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:058.025c: katham utsṛjya gaccheyam ahaṃ tvāṃ vijane vane
GE07mbh_03_u:058.026a: śrāntasya te kṣudhārtasya cintayānasya tat sukham
GE07mbh_03_u:058.026c: vane ghore mahārāja nāśayiṣyāmi te klamam
GE07mbh_03_u:058.027a: na ca bhāryāsamaṃ kiṃ cid vidyate bhiṣajāṃ matam
GE07mbh_03_u:058.027c: auṣadhaṃ sarvaduḥkheṣu satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_03_u:058.028a: evam etad yathāttha tvaṃ damayanti sumadhyame
GE07mbh_03_u:058.029a: na cāhaṃ tyaktukāmas tvāṃ kimarthaṃ bhīru śaṅkase
GE07mbh_03_u:058.029c: tyajeyam aham ātmānaṃ na tv eva tvām anindite
GE07mbh_03_u:058.030a: yadi māṃ tvaṃ mahārāja na vihātum ihecchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:058.031a: avaimi cāhaṃ nṛpate na tvaṃ māṃ tyaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:058.031c: cetasā tv apakṛṣṭena māṃ tyajethā mahāpate
GE07mbh_03_u:058.033a: yadi cāyam abhiprāyas tava rājan vrajed iti
GE07mbh_03_u:058.033c: sahitāv eva gacchāvo vidarbhān yadi manyase
GE07mbh_03_u:058.034c: tena tvaṃ pūjito rājan sukhaṃ vatsyasi no gṛhe bṛhadaśvaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:059.000-0246_01: ity uktaḥ sa tadā devyā naḷo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:059.001a: yathā rājyaṃ pitus te tat tathā mama na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:059.001c: na tu tatra gamiṣyāmi viṣamasthaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:059.003a: iti bruvan nalo rājā damayantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:059.005a: tāṃ sabhām upasaṃprāpya tadā sa niṣadhādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:059.006a: sa vai vivastro malino vikacaḥ pāṃsuguṇṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:059.008a: suptāyāṃ damayantyāṃ tu nalo rājā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:059.008c: śokonmathitacittātmā na sma śete yathā purā
GE07mbh_03_u:059.009a: sa tad rājyāpaharaṇaṃ suhṛttyāgaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:059.009c: vane ca taṃ paridhvaṃsaṃ prekṣya cintām upeyivān
GE07mbh_03_u:059.010a: kiṃ nu me syād idaṃ kṛtvā kiṃ nu me syād akurvataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:059.010c: kiṃ nu me maraṇaṃ śreyaḥ parityāgo janasya vā
GE07mbh_03_u:059.011a: mām iyaṃ hy anuraktedaṃ duḥkham āpnoti matkṛte
GE07mbh_03_u:059.011c: madvihīnā tv iyaṃ gacchet kadā cit svajanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:059.012a: mayā niḥsaṃśayaṃ duḥkham iyaṃ prāpsyaty anuttamā
GE07mbh_03_u:059.012c: utsarge saṃśayaḥ syāt tu vindetāpi sukhaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:059.013a: sa viniścitya bahudhā vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:059.013d-0247_01: na caiṣā tejasā śakyā kaiś cid dharṣayituṃ pathi
GE07mbh_03_u:059.013d-0247_03: evaṃ tasya tadā buddhir damayantyāṃ nyavartata
GE07mbh_03_u:059.014a: so 'vastratām ātmanaś ca tasyāś cāpy ekavastratām
GE07mbh_03_u:059.015a: kathaṃ vāso vikarteyaṃ na ca budhyeta me priyā
GE07mbh_03_u:059.015c: cintyaivaṃ naiṣadho rājā sabhāṃ paryacarat tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:059.016a: paridhāvann atha nala itaś cetaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:059.017a: tenārdhaṃ vāsasaś chittvā nivasya ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:059.018a: tato nibaddhahṛdayaḥ punar āgamya tāṃ sabhām
GE07mbh_03_u:059.019a: yāṃ na vāyur na cādityaḥ purā paśyati me priyām
GE07mbh_03_u:059.019c: seyam adya sabhāmadhye śete bhūmāv anāthavat
GE07mbh_03_u:059.021a: katham ekā satī bhaimī mayā virahitā śubhā
GE07mbh_03_u:059.021d-0248_03: evam uktvā priyāṃ bhāryāṃ rūpeṇāpratimāṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:059.022a: gatvā gatvā nalo rājā punar eti sabhāṃ muhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:059.023c: doleva muhur āyāti yāti caiva sabhāṃ muhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:059.024a: so 'pakṛṣṭas tu kalinā mohitaḥ prādravan nalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:059.024c: suptām utsṛjya tāṃ bhāryāṃ vilapya karuṇaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_03_u:059.025a: naṣṭātmā kalinā spṛṣṭas tat tad vigaṇayan nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:059.025c: jagāmaiva vane śūnye bhāryām utsṛjya duḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:060.003a: hā nātha hā mahārāja hā svāmin kiṃ jahāsi mām
GE07mbh_03_u:060.003c: hā hatāsmi vinaṣṭāsmi bhītāsmi vijane vane
GE07mbh_03_u:060.004a: nanu nāma mahārāja dharmajñaḥ satyavāg asi
GE07mbh_03_u:060.004c: katham uktvā tathāsatyaṃ suptām utsṛjya māṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:060.005a: katham utsṛjya gantāsi vaśyāṃ bhāryām anuvratām
GE07mbh_03_u:060.006a: śakṣyase tā giraḥ satyāḥ kartuṃ mayi nareśvara
GE07mbh_03_u:060.006c: yās tvayā lokapālānāṃ saṃnidhau kathitāḥ purā
GE07mbh_03_u:060.006d-0249_02: yatra kāntā tvayotsṛṣṭā muhūrtam api jīvati
GE07mbh_03_u:060.008a: dṛśyase dṛśyase rājann eṣa tiṣṭhasi naiṣadha
GE07mbh_03_u:060.008c: āvārya gulmair ātmānaṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
GE07mbh_03_u:060.009a: nṛśaṃsaṃ bata rājendra yan mām evaṃgatām iha
GE07mbh_03_u:060.010a: na śocāmy aham ātmānaṃ na cānyad api kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:060.010b-0251_01: satyavāg asi māṃ tyaktvā gatasatyaḥ kathaṃ bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:060.010c: kathaṃ nu bhavitāsy eka iti tvāṃ nṛpa śocimi
GE07mbh_03_u:060.011a: kathaṃ nu rājaṃs tṛṣitaḥ kṣudhitaḥ śramakarśitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:060.012a: tataḥ sā tīvraśokārtā pradīpteva ca manyunā
GE07mbh_03_u:060.012c: itaś cetaś ca rudatī paryadhāvata duḥkhitā
GE07mbh_03_u:060.012d-0252_01: māṃ tvaṃ saṃbhāṣaya vibho anāthāṃ nirjane vane
GE07mbh_03_u:060.012d-0252_03: sahasā muhyate bālā muhū roditi śocatī
GE07mbh_03_u:060.013a: muhur utpatate bālā muhuḥ patati vihvalā
GE07mbh_03_u:060.013c: muhur ālīyate bhītā muhuḥ krośati roditi
GE07mbh_03_u:060.015c: tasya bhūtasya tad duḥkhād duḥkham abhyadhikaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:060.016a: apāpacetasaṃ pāpo ya evaṃ kṛtavān nalam
GE07mbh_03_u:060.017a: evaṃ tu vilapantī sā rājño bhāryā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:060.018c: hā hā rājann iti muhur itaś cetaś ca dhāvati
GE07mbh_03_u:060.019a: tāṃ śuṣyamāṇām atyarthaṃ kurarīm iva vāśatīm
GE07mbh_03_u:060.019c: karuṇaṃ bahu śocantīṃ vilapantīṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:060.021a: sā grasyamānā grāheṇa śokena ca parājitā
GE07mbh_03_u:060.021c: nātmānaṃ śocati tathā yathā śocati naiṣadham
GE07mbh_03_u:060.022a: hā nātha mām iha vane grasyamānām anāthavat
GE07mbh_03_u:060.023a: kathaṃ bhaviṣyasi punar mām anusmṛtya naiṣadha
GE07mbh_03_u:060.023b-0254_01: kathaṃ bhavāñ jagāmādya mām utsṛjya vane prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:060.023c: pāpān muktaḥ punar labdhvā buddhiṃ ceto dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:060.025a: tām akasmān mṛgavyādho vicaran gahane vane
GE07mbh_03_u:060.026a: tāṃ sa dṛṣṭvā tathā grastām urageṇāyatekṣaṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:060.027a: mukhataḥ pātayām āsa śastreṇa niśitena ha
GE07mbh_03_u:060.028a: mokṣayitvā ca tāṃ vyādhaḥ prakṣālya salilena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:060.029a: kasya tvaṃ mṛgaśāvākṣi kathaṃ cābhyāgatā vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:060.029c: kathaṃ cedaṃ mahat kṛcchraṃ prāptavaty asi bhāmini
GE07mbh_03_u:060.030a: damayantī tathā tena pṛcchyamānā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:060.033a: tām atha ślakṣṇayā vācā lubdhako mṛdupurvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:060.033c: sāntvayām āsa kāmārtas tad abudhyata bhāminī
GE07mbh_03_u:060.034a: damayantī tu taṃ duṣṭam upalabhya pativratā
GE07mbh_03_u:060.035a: sa tu pāpamatiḥ kṣudraḥ pradharṣayitum āturaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:060.035c: durdharṣāṃ tarkayām āsa dīptām agniśikhām iva
GE07mbh_03_u:060.037a: yathāhaṃ naiṣadhād anyaṃ manasāpi na cintaye
GE07mbh_03_u:060.038a: uktamātre tu vacane tayā sa mṛgajīvanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:060.038c: vyasuḥ papāta medinyām agnidagdha iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:061.006e: nadīḥ sarāṃsi vāpīś ca vividhāṃś ca mṛgadvijān
GE07mbh_03_u:061.009a: tejasā yaśasā sthityā śriyā ca parayā yutā
GE07mbh_03_u:061.009c: vaidarbhī vicaraty ekā nalam anveṣatī tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:061.009d-0257_01: atibhīme vane tatra yūthabhraṣṭā mṛgī yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:061.010a: nābibhyat sā nṛpasutā bhaimī tatrātha kasya cit
GE07mbh_03_u:061.012-0258_01: yathoktaṃ ca tvayā kānta matsamakṣaṃ ca matpriyam

GE07mbh_03_u:081.117a: kārttikeyaś ca bhagavāṃs trisaṃdhyaṃ kila bhārata

GE07mbh_03_u:081.129a: tatra snātvā divaṃ yānti api pāpakṛto janāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:082.002b-0406_01: kṛcchrena mahatā gatvā tatra snātvā samāhitaḥ
