GE07mbh_03_u:106.022a: sa dṛṣṭvā tejaso rāśiṃ purāṇam ṛṣisattamam
GE07mbh_03_u:106.022c: praṇamya śirasā bhūmau kāryam asmai nyavedayat
GE07mbh_03_u:106.024a: sa vavre turagaṃ tatra prathamaṃ yajñakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_03_u:106.025c: dadāni tava bhadraṃ te yad yat prārthayase 'nagha
GE07mbh_03_u:106.026a: tvayi kṣamā ca dharmaś ca satyaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_03_u:106.026c: tvayā kṛtārthaḥ sagaraḥ putravāṃś ca tvayā pitā
GE07mbh_03_u:106.027a: tava caiva prabhāvena svargaṃ yāsyanti sāgarāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:106.027c: pautraś ca te tripathagāṃ tridivād ānayiṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:106.028a: hayaṃ nayasva bhadraṃ te yajñiyaṃ narapuṃgava
GE07mbh_03_u:106.029a: aṃśumān evam uktas tu kapilena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_03_u:106.030c: mūrdhni tenāpy upāghrātas tasmai sarvaṃ nyavedayat
GE07mbh_03_u:106.031a: yathā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ cāpi sāgarāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:106.031c: taṃ cāsmai hayam ācaṣṭa yajñavāṭam upāgatam
GE07mbh_03_u:106.032a: tac chrutvā sagaro rājā putrajaṃ duḥkham atyajat
GE07mbh_03_u:106.032c: aṃśumantaṃ ca saṃpūjya samāpayata taṃ kratum
GE07mbh_03_u:106.034c: pautre bhāraṃ samāveśya jagāma tridivaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:106.036a: tasya putraḥ samabhavad dilīpo nāma dharmavit
GE07mbh_03_u:106.036c: tasmai rājyaṃ samādhāya aṃśumān api saṃsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:106.037a: dilīpas tu tataḥ śrutvā pitṝṇāṃ nidhanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:106.038d-0528_01: sa rājarṣir dilīpas tu yuyuje kāladharmaṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:106.040a: abhiṣicya tu taṃ rājye dilīpo vanam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:107.001a: sa tu rājā maheṣvāsaś cakravartī mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:107.002c: pitṝṇāṃ nidhanaṃ ghoram aprāptiṃ tridivasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:107.003a: sa rājyaṃ sacive nyasya hṛdayena vidūyatā
GE07mbh_03_u:107.007a: śakunaiś ca vicitrāṅgaiḥ kūjadbhir vividhā giraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:107.012a: kva cit kanakasaṃkāśaṃ kva cid rajatasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_03_u:107.013a: sa tu tatra naraśreṣṭhas tapo ghoraṃ samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:107.014c: darśayām āsa taṃ gaṅgā tadā mūrtimatī svayam gaṅgovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:107.015a: kim icchasi mahārāja mattaḥ kiṃ ca dadāni te
GE07mbh_03_u:107.015c: tad bravīhi naraśreṣṭha kariṣyāmi vacas tava
GE07mbh_03_u:107.016a: evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca rājā haimavatīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:107.017c: kāpilaṃ teja āsādya kṣaṇena nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:107.018a: teṣām evaṃ vinaṣṭānāṃ svarge vāso na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:107.018c: yāvat tāni śarīrāṇi tvaṃ jalair nābhiṣiñcasi
GE07mbh_03_u:107.018d-0531_01: tāvat svarge na vatsyaṃti mama pūrvapitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:107.018d-0532_01: tāvat teṣāṃ gatir nāsti sāgarāṇāṃ mahānadi
GE07mbh_03_u:107.019c: teṣām arthe 'bhiyācāmi tvām ahaṃ vai mahānadi
GE07mbh_03_u:107.020a: etac chrutvā vaco rājño gaṅgā lokanamaskṛtā
GE07mbh_03_u:107.021a: kariṣyāmi mahārāja vacas te nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:107.021c: vegaṃ tu mama durdhāryaṃ patantyā gaganāc cyutam
GE07mbh_03_u:107.022a: na śaktas triṣu lokeṣu kaś cid dhārayituṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:107.023a: taṃ toṣaya mahābāho tapasā varadaṃ haram
GE07mbh_03_u:107.023c: sa tu māṃ pracyutāṃ devaḥ śirasā dhārayiṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:107.023e: kariṣyati ca te kāmaṃ pitṝṇāṃ hitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_03_u:107.024a: etac chrutvā vaco rājan mahārājo bhagīrathaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:107.024c: kailāsaṃ parvataṃ gatvā toṣayām āsa śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_03_u:107.025a: tatas tena samāgamya kālayogena kena cit
GE07mbh_03_u:107.025c: agṛhṇāc ca varaṃ tasmād gaṅgāyā dhāraṇaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:108.001c: evam astv iti rājānaṃ bhagavān pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_03_u:108.004a: tataḥ sthitvā naraśreṣṭhaṃ bhagīratham uvāca ha
GE07mbh_03_u:108.004d-0535_01: pitṝṇāṃ pāvanārthaṃ te tām ahaṃ manujādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:108.005a: etac chrutvā vaco rājā śarveṇa samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:108.006c: īśānaṃ ca sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā gaganāt sahasā cyutā
GE07mbh_03_u:108.007a: tāṃ pracyutāṃ tato dṛṣṭvā devāḥ sārdhaṃ maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:108.008a: tataḥ papāta gaganād gaṅgā himavataḥ sutā
GE07mbh_03_u:108.009a: tāṃ dadhāra haro rājan gaṅgāṃ gaganamekhalām
GE07mbh_03_u:108.010a: sā babhūva visarpantī tridhā rājan samudragā
GE07mbh_03_u:108.011a: kva cid ābhogakuṭilā praskhalantī kva cit kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:108.011e: kva cit sā toyaninadair nadantī nādam uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:108.011f-0536_01: kva cid ākāśam āvartaiḥ saṃkṣipantīva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:108.012a: evaṃ prakārān subahūn kurvantī gaganāc cyutā
GE07mbh_03_u:108.013a: darśayasva mahārāja mārgaṃ kena vrajāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:108.014a: etac chrutvā vaco rājā prātiṣṭhata bhagīrathaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:108.016a: samudraṃ ca samāsādya gaṅgayā sahito nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:108.016d-0538_01: jahnunā ca dhṛtā muktā jāhnavī tena saṃsmṛtā
GE07mbh_03_u:108.018a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ gaṅgā tripathagā yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:108.018d-0539_01: kāleyāś ca yathā rājaṃs tridaśair vinipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:108.019a: samudraś ca yathā pītaḥ kāraṇārthe mahātmanā
GE07mbh_03_u:108.019c: vātāpiś ca yathā nītaḥ kṣayaṃ sa brahmahā prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:108.019e: agastyena mahārāja yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:109.002c: acintyān adbhutān bhāvān dadarśa subahūn nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:109.003a: vāco yatrābhavan meghā upalāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:109.004a: vāyur nityaṃ vavau yatra nityaṃ devaś ca varṣati
GE07mbh_03_u:109.004b-0540_01: svādhyāyaghoṣaś ca tathā śrūyate na ca dṛśyate
GE07mbh_03_u:109.004b-0541_02: nirvedo jāyate tatra gṛhāṇi smarate janaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:109.004c: sāyaṃ prātaś ca bhagavān dṛśyate havyavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:109.005a: evaṃ bahuvidhān bhāvān adbhutān vīkṣya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:109.005c: lomaśaṃ punar eva sma paryapṛcchat tad adbhutam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:109.005d-0542_01: yad etad bhagavaṃś citraṃ parvate 'smin mahaujasi
GE07mbh_03_u:109.005d-0542_02: etan me sarvam ācakṣva vistareṇa mahādyute
GE07mbh_03_u:109.006c: tad ekāgramanā rājan nibodha gadato mama
GE07mbh_03_u:109.008a: sa vai saṃbhāṣyamāṇo 'nyaiḥ kopād girim uvāca ha
GE07mbh_03_u:109.008c: ya iha vyāharet kaś cid upalān utsṛjes tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:109.009a: vātaṃ cāhūya mā śabdam ity uvāca sa tāpasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:109.010a: evam etāni karmāṇi rājaṃs tena maharṣiṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:109.010c: kṛtāni kāni cit kopāt pratiṣiddhāni kāni cit
GE07mbh_03_u:109.011a: nandām abhigatān devān purā rājann iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:109.013a: tadā prabhṛti kaunteya narā girim imaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_03_u:109.014c: āroḍhuṃ vāpi kaunteya tasmān niyatavāg bhava
GE07mbh_03_u:109.015a: iha devāḥ sadā sarve yajñān ājahrur uttamān
GE07mbh_03_u:109.016a: kuśākāreva dūrveyaṃ saṃstīrṇeva ca bhūr iyam
GE07mbh_03_u:109.016c: yūpaprakārā bahavo vṛkṣāś ceme viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:109.017a: devāś ca ṛṣayaś caiva vasanty adyāpi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:109.017c: teṣāṃ sāyaṃ tathā prātar dṛśyate havyavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:109.020a: tatas tatra samāplutya gātrāṇi sagaṇo nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:109.020c: jagāma kauśikīṃ puṇyāṃ ramyāṃ śivajalāṃ nadīm
GE07mbh_03_u:110.003a: tapaso yaḥ prabhāvena varṣayām āsa vāsavam
GE07mbh_03_u:110.004a: mṛgyāṃ jātaḥ sa tejasvī kāśyapasya sutaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.005a: nivartiteṣu sasyeṣu yasmai śāntāṃ dadau nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.006c: viruddhe yonisaṃsarge kathaṃ ca tapasā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.007a: kimarthaṃ ca bhayāc chakras tasya bālasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.008c: lobhayām āsa yā ceto mṛgabhūtasya tasya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:110.009c: kathaṃ vai viṣaye tasya nāvarṣat pākaśāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.010a: etan me bhagavan sarvaṃ vistareṇa yathātatham
GE07mbh_03_u:110.012a: śṛṇu putro yathā jāta ṛśyaśṛṅgaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_03_u:110.014c: apsūpaspṛśato rājan mṛgī tac cāpibat tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:110.015a: saha toyena tṛṣitā sā garbhiṇy abhavan nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:110.015b-0543_02: devakanyā mṛgī bhūtvā muniṃ sūya vimokṣyase
GE07mbh_03_u:110.016a: tasyāṃ mṛgyāṃ samabhavat tasya putro mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.017c: tenarśyaśṛṅga ity evaṃ tadā sa prathito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:110.018a: na tena dṛṣṭapūrvo 'nyaḥ pitur anyatra mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.018c: tasmāt tasya mano nityaṃ brahmacarye 'bhavan nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:110.019a: etasminn eva kāle tu sakhā daśarathasya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:110.020a: tena kāmaḥ kṛto mithyā brāhmaṇebhya iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.020c: sa brāhmaṇaiḥ parityaktas tadā vai jagatīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.021c: na vavarṣa sahasrākṣas tato 'pīḍyanta vai prajāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.023c: tam ūcuś coditās tena svamatāni manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.024a: tatra tv eko munivaras taṃ rājānam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_03_u:110.024c: kupitās tava rājendra brāhmaṇā niskṛtiṃ cara
GE07mbh_03_u:110.025c: vāneyam anabhijñaṃ ca nārīṇām ārjave ratam
GE07mbh_03_u:110.026a: sa ced avatared rājan viṣayaṃ te mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.026c: sadyaḥ pravarṣet parjanya iti me nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.027a: etac chrutvā vaco rājan kṛtvā niskṛtim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.027c: sa gatvā punar āgacchat prasanneṣu dvijātiṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:110.027f-0546_01: sa ca tāḥ pratijagrāha piteva hitakṛt sadā
GE07mbh_03_u:110.029a: so 'dhyagacchad upāyaṃ tu tair amātyaiḥ sahācyutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.029c: śāstrajñair alam arthajñair nītyāṃ ca pariniṣṭhitaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.030c: veśyāḥ sarvatra niṣṇātās tā uvāca sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.031d-0547_01: niyojayām āsa ca tās tasya bālasya lobhane
GE07mbh_03_u:110.032a: tā rājabhayabhītāś ca śāpabhītāś ca yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.032c: aśakyam ūcus tat kāryaṃ vivarṇā gatacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.033a: tatra tv ekā jaradyoṣā rājānam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:110.034a: abhipretāṃs tu me kāmān samanujñātum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:110.034c: tataḥ śakṣye lobhayitum ṛśyaśṛṅgam ṛṣeḥ sutam
GE07mbh_03_u:110.035a: tasyāḥ sarvam abhiprāyam anvajānāt sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:110.035c: dhanaṃ ca pradadau bhūri ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:110.036a: tato rūpeṇa saṃpannā vayasā ca mahīpate
GE07mbh_03_u:110.036c: striya ādāya kāś cit sā jagāma vanam añjasā
GE07mbh_03_u:111.001c: saṃdeśāc caiva nṛpateḥ svabuddhyā caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:111.003a: atīva ramaṇīyaṃ tad atīva ca manoharam
GE07mbh_03_u:111.004a: tato nibadhya tāṃ nāvam adūre kāśyapāśramāt
GE07mbh_03_u:111.004c: cārayām āsa puruṣair vihāraṃ tasya vai muneḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:111.006a: sā tatra gatvā kuśalā taponityasya saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_03_u:111.006c: āśramaṃ taṃ samāsādya dadarśa tam ṛṣeḥ sutam veśyovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:111.007a: kaccin mune kuśalaṃ tāpasānāṃ; kaccic ca vo mūlaphalaṃ prabhūtam
GE07mbh_03_u:111.007c: kaccid bhavān ramate cāśrame 'smiṃs; tvāṃ vai draṣṭuṃ sāṃpratam āgato 'smi
GE07mbh_03_u:111.008a: kaccit tapo vardhate tāpasānāṃ; pitā ca te kaccid ahīnatejāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:111.008c: kaccit tvayā prīyate caiva vipra; kaccit svādhyāyaḥ kriyate ṛśyaśṛṅga
GE07mbh_03_u:111.009a: ṛddho bhavāñ jyotir iva prakāśate; manye cāhaṃ tvām abhivādanīyam
GE07mbh_03_u:111.009c: pādyaṃ vai te saṃpradāsyāmi kāmād; yathādharmaṃ phalamūlāni caiva
GE07mbh_03_u:111.010a: kauśyāṃ bṛsyām āssva yathopajoṣaṃ; kṛṣṇājinenāvṛtāyāṃ sukhāyām
GE07mbh_03_u:111.010c: kva cāśramas tava kiṃ nāma cedaṃ; vrataṃ brahmaṃś carasi hi devavat tvam veśyovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:111.011a: mamāśramaḥ kāśyapaputra ramyas; triyojanaṃ śailam imaṃ pareṇa
GE07mbh_03_u:111.011c: tatra svadharmo 'nabhivādanaṃ no; na codakaṃ pādyam upaspṛśāmaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:111.011d-0548_02: vratam etādṛśaṃ brahman pariṣvajyo bhavān mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:111.012a: phalāni pakvāni dadāni te 'haṃ; bhallātakāny āmalakāni
GE07mbh_03_u:111.013a: sā tāni sarvāṇi visarjayitvā; bhakṣān mahārhān pradadau tato 'smai
GE07mbh_03_u:111.013c: tāny ṛśyaśṛṅgasya mahārasāni; bhṛśaṃ surūpāṇi ruciṃ dadur hi
GE07mbh_03_u:111.014a: dadau ca mālyāni sugandhavanti; citrāṇi vāsāṃsi ca bhānumanti
GE07mbh_03_u:111.014c: pānāni cāgryāṇi tato mumoda; cikrīḍa caiva prajahāsa caiva
GE07mbh_03_u:111.015a: sā kandukenāramatāsya mūle; vibhajyamānā phalitā lateva
GE07mbh_03_u:111.015c: gātraiś ca gātrāṇi niṣevamāṇā; samāśliṣac cāsakṛd ṛśyaśṛṅgam
GE07mbh_03_u:111.016a: sarjān aśokāṃs tilakāṃś ca vṛkṣān; prapuṣpitān avanāmyāvabhajya
GE07mbh_03_u:111.016c: vilajjamāneva madābhibhūtā; pralobhayām āsa sutaṃ maharṣeḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:111.017a: atharśyaśṛṅgaṃ vikṛtaṃ samīkṣya; punaḥ punaḥ pīḍya ca kāyam asya
GE07mbh_03_u:111.018a: tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ madanena matto; vicetanaś cābhavad ṛśyaśṛṅgaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:111.018c: tām eva bhāvena gatena śūnyo; viniḥśvasann ārtarūpo babhūva
GE07mbh_03_u:111.019a: tato muhūrtād dharipiṅgalākṣaḥ; praveṣṭito romabhirā nakhāgrāt
GE07mbh_03_u:111.020a: so 'paśyad āsīnam upetya putraṃ; dhyāyantam ekaṃ viparītacittam
GE07mbh_03_u:111.020c: viniḥśvasantaṃ muhur ūrdhvadṛṣṭiṃ; vibhāṇḍakaḥ putram uvāca dīnam
GE07mbh_03_u:111.021a: na kalpyante samidhaḥ kiṃ nu tāta; kaccid dhutaṃ cāgnihotraṃ tvayādya
GE07mbh_03_u:111.021c: sunirṇiktaṃ sruksruvaṃ homadhenuḥ; kaccit savatsā ca kṛtā tvayādya
GE07mbh_03_u:111.022a: na vai yathāpūrvam ivāsi putra; cintāparaś cāsi vicetanaś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:111.022c: dīno 'timātraṃ tvam ihādya kiṃ nu; pṛcchāmi tvāṃ ka ihādyāgato 'bhūt
GE07mbh_03_u:112.001a: ihāgato jaṭilo brahmacārī; na vai hrasvo nātidīrgho manasvī
GE07mbh_03_u:112.001c: suvarṇavarṇaḥ kamalāyatākṣaḥ; sutaḥ surāṇām iva śobhamānaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:112.002c: nīlāḥ prasannāś ca jaṭāḥ sugandhā; hiraṇyarajjugrathitāḥ sudīrghāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:112.003a: ādhārarūpā punar asya kaṇṭhe; vibhrājate vidyud ivāntarikṣe
GE07mbh_03_u:112.003c: dvau cāsya piṇḍāv adhareṇa kaṇṭham; ajātaromau sumanoharau ca
GE07mbh_03_u:112.004a: vilagnamadhyaś ca sa nābhideśe; kaṭiś ca tasyātikṛtapramāṇā

GE07mbh_03_u:115.021a: tataḥ snuṣāṃ sa bhagavān prahṛṣṭo bhṛgur abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:115.021c: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva subhage dātā hy asmi tavepsitam
GE07mbh_03_u:115.022a: sā vai prasādayām āsa taṃ guruṃ putrakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_03_u:115.022c: ātmanaś caiva mātuś ca prasādaṃ ca cakāra saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:115.023a: ṛtau tvaṃ caiva mātā ca snāte puṃsavanāya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:115.023c: āliṅgetāṃ pṛthag vṛkṣau sāśvatthaṃ tvam udumbaram
GE07mbh_03_u:115.023d-0570_01: carudvayam idaṃ bhadre jananyāś ca tavaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:115.023d-0570_02: viśvam āvartayitvā tu mayā yatnena sādhitam
GE07mbh_03_u:115.024a: āliṅgane tu te rājaṃś cakratuḥ sma viparyayam
GE07mbh_03_u:115.024c: kadā cid bhṛgur āgacchat taṃ ca veda viparyayam
GE07mbh_03_u:115.024d-0571_01: tataḥ punaḥ sa bhagavān kāle bahutithe gate
GE07mbh_03_u:115.024d-0571_02: divyajñānād viditvā tu bhagavān āgataḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:115.025b-0572_01: upayuktaś carur bhadre vṛkṣe cāliṅganaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:115.025b-0572_02: viparītena te subhrūr mātrā caivāsi vañcitā
GE07mbh_03_u:115.025c: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatravṛttir vai tava putro bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:115.026a: kṣatriyo brāhmaṇācāro mātus tava suto mahān
GE07mbh_03_u:115.027a: tataḥ prasādayām āsa śvaśuraṃ sā punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:115.027c: na me putro bhaved īdṛk kāmaṃ pautro bhaved iti
GE07mbh_03_u:115.028a: evam astv iti sā tena pāṇḍava pratinanditā
GE07mbh_03_u:115.028b-0573_01: kālaṃ pratīkṣya taṃ garbhaṃ dhārayām āsa yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:115.028c: jamadagniṃ tataḥ putraṃ sā jajñe kāla āgate
GE07mbh_03_u:115.030a: taṃ tu kṛtsno dhanurvedaḥ pratyabhād bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:116.001c: tapas tepe tato devān niyamād vaśam ānayat
GE07mbh_03_u:116.001d-0574_01: taṃ tapyamānaṃ brahmarṣim ūcur devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:116.001d-0574_02: kimarthaṃ tapyase brahman kaḥ kāmaḥ prārthitas tava
GE07mbh_03_u:116.001d-0574_04: svargahetos tapas tapye lokāś ca syur mamākṣayāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:116.001d-0574_05: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya tadā devās tam ūcire
GE07mbh_03_u:116.001d-0574_06: nāsaṃtater bhavel lokaḥ kṛtvā dharmaśatāny api
GE07mbh_03_u:116.001d-0574_07: sa śrutvā vacanaṃ teṣāṃ tridaśānāṃ kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_03_u:116.002c: reṇukāṃ varayām āsa sa ca tasmai dadau nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:116.003a: reṇukāṃ tv atha saṃprāpya bhāryāṃ bhārgavanandanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:116.004c: sarveṣām ajaghanyas tu rāma āsīj jaghanyajaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:116.005a: phalāhāreṣu sarveṣu gateṣv atha suteṣu vai
GE07mbh_03_u:116.005c: reṇukā snātum agamat kadā cin niyatavratā
GE07mbh_03_u:116.006a: sā tu citrarathaṃ nāma mārttikāvatakaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_03_u:116.007c: ṛddhimantaṃ tatas tasya spṛhayām āsa reṇukā
GE07mbh_03_u:116.008a: vyabhicārāt tu sā tasmāt klinnāmbhasi vicetanā
GE07mbh_03_u:116.008d-0575_02: uttīrya cāpi sā yatnāj jagāma bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:116.009a: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā cyutāṃ dhairyād brāhmyā lakṣmyā vivarjitām
GE07mbh_03_u:116.010a: tato jyeṣṭho jāmadagnyo rumaṇvān nāma nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:116.010c: ājagāma suṣeṇaś ca vasur viśvāvasus tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:116.011a: tān ānupūrvyād bhagavān vadhe mātur acodayat
GE07mbh_03_u:116.011c: na ca te jātasaṃmohāḥ kiṃ cid ūcur vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:116.012a: tataḥ śaśāpa tān kopāt te śaptāś cetanāṃ jahuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:116.014a: jahīmāṃ mātaraṃ pāpāṃ mā ca putra vyathāṃ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:116.014b-0576_01: ity ukto guruṇā rājan krodhāt tu jamadagninā
GE07mbh_03_u:116.014c: tata ādāya paraśuṃ rāmo mātuḥ śiro 'harat
GE07mbh_03_u:116.015c: kopo agacchat sahasā prasannaś cābravīd idam
GE07mbh_03_u:116.016a: mamedaṃ vacanāt tāta kṛtaṃ te karma duṣkaram
GE07mbh_03_u:116.016c: vṛṇīṣva kāmān dharmajña yāvato vāñchase hṛdā
GE07mbh_03_u:116.017a: sa vavre mātur utthānam asmṛtiṃ ca vadhasya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:116.017c: pāpena tena cāsparśaṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ prakṛtiṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:116.018a: apratidvandvatāṃ yuddhe dīrgham āyuś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:116.018c: dadau ca sarvān kāmāṃs tāñ jamadagnir mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:116.019a: kadā cit tu tathaivāsya viniṣkrāntāḥ sutāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:116.020a: tam āśramapadaṃ prāptam ṛṣer bhāryā samarcayat
GE07mbh_03_u:116.021a: pramathya cāśramāt tasmād dhomadhenvās tadā balāt
GE07mbh_03_u:116.021c: jahāra vatsaṃ krośantyā babhañja ca mahādrumān
GE07mbh_03_u:116.022a: āgatāya ca rāmāya tadācaṣṭa pitā svayam
GE07mbh_03_u:116.022c: gāṃ ca rorūyatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kopo rāmaṃ samāviśat
GE07mbh_03_u:116.024d-0578_01: āgatya karma tat pitre nivedya gatavān vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:116.026a: te taṃ jaghnur mahāvīryam ayudhyantaṃ tapasvinam
GE07mbh_03_u:116.029a: sa dṛṣṭvā pitaraṃ vīras tathā mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_03_u:117.001a: mamāparādhāt taiḥ kṣudrair hatas tvaṃ tāta bāliśaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:117.003a: kiṃ nu tair na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yair bhavāṃs tapasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:117.003c: ayudhyamāno vṛddhaḥ san hataḥ śaraśataiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:117.004a: kiṃ nu te tatra vakṣyanti saciveṣu suhṛtsu ca
GE07mbh_03_u:117.005a: vilapyaivaṃ sa karuṇaṃ bahu nānāvidhaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:117.008a: teṣāṃ cānugatā ye ca kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:117.008c: tāṃś ca sarvān avāmṛdnād rāmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:117.010a: sa teṣu tarpayām āsa pitṝn bhṛgukulodvahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:117.010c: sākṣād dadarśa carcīkaṃ sa ca rāmaṃ nyavārayat
GE07mbh_03_u:117.011c: tarpayām āsa devendram ṛtvigbhyaś ca mahīṃ dadau
GE07mbh_03_u:117.012a: vedīṃ cāpy adadad dhaimīṃ kaśyapāya mahātmane
GE07mbh_03_u:117.013c: vyabhajaṃs tena te rājan prakhyātāḥ khāṇḍavāyanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:117.014a: sa pradāya mahīṃ tasmai kaśyapāya mahātmane
GE07mbh_03_u:117.015a: evaṃ vairam abhūt tasya kṣatriyair lokavāsibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:117.016c: darśayām āsa tān viprān dharmarājaṃ ca sānujam
GE07mbh_03_u:117.017a: sa tam ānarca rājendro bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:117.017c: dvijānāṃ ca parāṃ pūjāṃ cakre nṛpatisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:117.018c: mahendra uṣya tāṃ rātriṃ prayayau dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:118.001a: gacchan sa tīrthāni mahānubhāvaḥ; puṇyāni ramyāṇi dadarśa rājā
GE07mbh_03_u:118.001c: sarvāṇi viprair upaśobhitāni; kva cit kva cid bhārata sāgarasya
GE07mbh_03_u:118.002a: sa vṛttavāṃs teṣu kṛtābhiṣekaḥ; sahānujaḥ pārthivaputrapautraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:118.002c: samudragāṃ puṇyatamāṃ praśastāṃ; jagāma pārikṣita pāṇḍuputraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:118.003a: tatrāpi cāplutya mahānubhāvaḥ; saṃtarpayām āsa pitṝn surāṃś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:118.003c: dvijātimukhyeṣu dhanaṃ visṛjya; godāvariṃ sāgaragām agacchat
GE07mbh_03_u:118.004a: tato vipāpmā draviḍeṣu rājan; samudram āsādya ca lokapuṇyam
GE07mbh_03_u:118.004c: agastyatīrthaṃ ca pavitrapuṇyaṃ; nārītīrthāny atha vīro dadarśa
GE07mbh_03_u:118.005a: tatrārjunasyāgryadhanurdharasya; niśamya tat karma parair asahyam
GE07mbh_03_u:118.005c: saṃpūjyamānaḥ paramarṣisaṃghaiḥ; parāṃ mudaṃ pāṇḍusutaḥ sa lebhe
GE07mbh_03_u:118.006a: sa teṣu tīrtheṣv abhiṣiktagātraḥ; kṛṣṇāsahāyaḥ sahito 'nujaiś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:118.006c: saṃpūjayan vikramam arjunasya; reme mahīpālapatiḥ pṛthivyām
GE07mbh_03_u:118.007a: tataḥ sahasrāṇi gavāṃ pradāya; tīrtheṣu teṣv ambudharottamasya
GE07mbh_03_u:118.007c: hṛṣṭaḥ saha bhrātṛbhir arjunasya; saṃkīrtayām āsa gavāṃ pradānam
GE07mbh_03_u:118.008a: sa tāni tīrthāni ca sāgarasya; puṇyāni cānyāni bahūni rājan
GE07mbh_03_u:118.008c: krameṇa gacchan paripūrṇakāmaḥ; śūrpārakaṃ puṇyatamaṃ dadarśa
GE07mbh_03_u:118.009a: tatrodadheḥ kaṃ cid atītya deśaṃ; khyātaṃ pṛthivyāṃ vanam āsasāda
GE07mbh_03_u:118.009c: taptaṃ surair yatra tapaḥ purastād; iṣṭaṃ tathā puṇyatamair narendraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:118.010a: sa tatra tām agryadhanurdharasya; vedīṃ dadarśāyatapīnabāhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:118.011a: tato vasūnāṃ vasudhādhipaḥ sa; marudgaṇānāṃ ca tathāśvinoś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:118.011c: vaivasvatādityadhaneśvarāṇām; indrasya viṣṇoḥ savitur vibhoś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:118.012a: bhagasya candrasya divākarasya; pater apāṃ sādhyagaṇasya caiva
GE07mbh_03_u:118.012c: dhātuḥ pitṝṇāṃ ca tathā mahātmā; rudrasya rājan sagaṇasya caiva
GE07mbh_03_u:118.013a: sarasvatyāḥ siddhagaṇasya caiva; pūṣṇaś ca ye cāpy amarās tathānye
GE07mbh_03_u:118.013c: puṇyāni cāpy āyatanāni teṣāṃ; dadarśa rājā sumanoharāṇi
GE07mbh_03_u:118.014a: teṣūpavāsān vividhān upoṣya; dattvā ca ratnāni mahādhanāni
GE07mbh_03_u:118.014c: tīrtheṣu sarveṣu pariplutāṅgaḥ; punaḥ sa śūrpārakam ājagāma
GE07mbh_03_u:118.015a: sa tena tīrthena tu sāgarasya; punaḥ prayātaḥ saha sodarīyaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:118.015c: dvijaiḥ pṛthivyāṃ prathitaṃ mahadbhis; tīrthaṃ prabhāsaṃ samupājagāma
GE07mbh_03_u:118.016a: tatrābhiṣiktaḥ pṛthulohitākṣaḥ; sahānujair devagaṇān pitṝṃś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:118.016c: saṃtarpayām āsa tathaiva kṛṣṇā; te cāpi viprāḥ saha lomaśena
GE07mbh_03_u:118.017a: sa dvādaśāhaṃ jalavāyubhakṣaḥ; kurvan kṣapāhaḥsu tadābhiṣekam
GE07mbh_03_u:118.017c: samantato 'gnīn upadīpayitvā; tepe tapo dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:118.018a: tam ugram āsthāya tapaś carantaṃ; śuśrāva rāmaś ca janārdanaś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:118.018c: tau sarvavṛṣṇipravarau sasainyau; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ jagmatur ājamīḍham
GE07mbh_03_u:118.019a: te vṛṣṇayaḥ pāṇḍusutān samīkṣya; bhūmau śayānān maladigdhagātrān
GE07mbh_03_u:118.019c: anarhatīṃ draupadīṃ cāpi dṛṣṭvā; suduḥkhitāś cukruśur ārtanādam
GE07mbh_03_u:118.020a: tataḥ sa rāmaṃ ca janārdanaṃ ca; kārṣṇiṃ ca sāmbaṃ ca śineś ca pautram
GE07mbh_03_u:118.020c: anyāṃś ca vṛṣṇīn upagamya pūjāṃ; cakre yathādharmam adīnasattvaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:118.021a: te cāpi sarvān pratipūjya pārthāṃs; taiḥ satkṛtāḥ pāṇḍusutais tathaiva
GE07mbh_03_u:118.021c: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ saṃparivārya rājann; upāviśan devagaṇā yathendram
GE07mbh_03_u:118.022a: teṣāṃ sa sarvaṃ caritaṃ pareṣāṃ; vane ca vāsaṃ paramapratītaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:118.022c: astrārtham indrasya gataṃ ca pārthaṃ; kṛṣṇe śaśaṃsāmararājaputram
GE07mbh_03_u:118.023a: śrutvā tu te tasya vacaḥ pratītās; tāṃś cāpi dṛṣṭvā sukṛśān atīva
GE07mbh_03_u:118.023c: netrodbhavaṃ saṃmumucur daśārhā; duḥkhārtijaṃ vāri mahānubhāvāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:119.001c: kim akurvan kathāś caiṣāṃ kās tatrāsaṃs tapodhana
GE07mbh_03_u:119.002c: vṛṣṇayaḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva suhṛdaś ca parasparam
GE07mbh_03_u:119.005a: na kṛṣṇa dharmaś carito bhavāya; jantor adharmaś ca parābhavāya
GE07mbh_03_u:119.005c: yudhiṣṭhiro yatra jaṭī mahātmā; vanāśrayaḥ kliśyati cīravāsāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:119.006a: duryodhanaś cāpi mahīṃ praśāsti; na cāsya bhūmir vivaraṃ dadāti
GE07mbh_03_u:119.006c: dharmād adharmaś carito garīyān; itīva manyeta naro 'lpabuddhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:119.007a: duryodhane cāpi vivardhamāne; yudhiṣṭhire cāsukha āttarājye hṛtasvarājyāyatanārthabhārye
GE07mbh_03_u:119.007c: kiṃ nv adya kartavyam iti prajābhiḥ; śaṅkā mithaḥ saṃjanitā narāṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:119.008a: ayaṃ hi dharmaprabhavo narendro; dharme rataḥ satyadhṛtiḥ pradātā
GE07mbh_03_u:119.008c: caled dhi rājyāc ca sukhāc ca pārtho; dharmād apetaś ca kathaṃ vivardhet
GE07mbh_03_u:119.009a: kathaṃ nu bhīṣmaś ca kṛpaś ca vipro; droṇaś ca rājā ca kulasya vṛddhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:119.009c: pravrājya pārthān sukham āpnuvanti; dhik pāpabuddhīn bharatapradhānān
GE07mbh_03_u:119.010a: kiṃ nāma vakṣyaty avanipradhānaḥ; pitṝn samāgamya paratra pāpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:119.010c: putreṣu samyak caritaṃ mayeti; putrān apāpān avaropya rājyāt
GE07mbh_03_u:119.011a: nāsau dhiyā saṃpratipaśyati sma; kiṃ nāma kṛtvāham acakṣur evam
GE07mbh_03_u:119.011c: jātaḥ pṛthivyām iti pārthiveṣu; pravrājya kaunteyam athāpi rājyāt
GE07mbh_03_u:119.012a: nūnaṃ samṛddhān pitṛlokabhūmau; cāmīkarābhān kṣitijān praphullān
GE07mbh_03_u:119.012c: vicitravīryasya sutaḥ saputraḥ; kṛtvā nṛśaṃsaṃ bata paśyati sma
GE07mbh_03_u:119.013a: vyūḍhottarāṃsān pṛthulohitākṣān; nemān sma pṛcchan sa śṛṇoti nūnam
GE07mbh_03_u:119.013c: prasthāpayad yat sa vanaṃ hy aśaṅko; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ sānujam āttaśastram
GE07mbh_03_u:119.014a: yo 'yaṃ pareṣāṃ pṛtanāṃ samṛddhāṃ; nirāyudho dīrghabhujo nihanyāt
GE07mbh_03_u:119.014c: śrutvaiva śabdaṃ hi vṛkodarasya; muñcanti sainyāni śakṛt samūtram
GE07mbh_03_u:119.015c: vane smaran vāsam imaṃ sughoraṃ; śeṣaṃ na kuryād iti niścitaṃ me
GE07mbh_03_u:119.016a: na hy asya vīryeṇa balena kaś cit; samaḥ pṛthivyāṃ bhavitā nareṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:119.016c: śītoṣṇavātātapakarśitāṅgo; na śeṣam ājāv asuhṛtsu kuryāt
GE07mbh_03_u:119.017a: prācyāṃ nṛpān ekarathena jitvā; vṛkodaraḥ sānucarān raṇeṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:119.017c: svastyāgamad yo 'tirathas tarasvī; so 'yaṃ vane kliśyati cīravāsāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:119.018a: yo dantakūre vyajayan nṛdevān; samāgatān dākṣiṇātyān mahīpān
GE07mbh_03_u:119.018c: taṃ paśyatemaṃ sahadevam adya; tapasvinaṃ tāpasaveṣarūpam
GE07mbh_03_u:119.019a: yaḥ pārthivān ekarathena vīro; diśaṃ pratīcīṃ prati yuddhaśauṇḍaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:119.019c: so 'yaṃ vane mūlaphalena jīvañ; jaṭī caraty adya malācitāṅgaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:119.020a: satre samṛddhe 'ti rathasya rājño; vedītalād utpatitā sutā yā
GE07mbh_03_u:119.020c: seyaṃ vane vāsam imaṃ suduḥkhaṃ; kathaṃ sahaty adya satī sukhārhā
GE07mbh_03_u:119.021a: trivargamukhyasya samīraṇasya; deveśvarasyāpy atha vāśvinoś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:119.021c: eṣāṃ surāṇāṃ tanayāḥ kathaṃ nu; vane caranty alpasukhāḥ sukhārhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:119.022a: jite hi dharmasya sute sabhārye; sabhrātṛke sānucare niraste
GE07mbh_03_u:119.022c: duryodhane cāpi vivardhamāne; kathaṃ na sīdaty avaniḥ saśailā
GE07mbh_03_u:120.001a: na rāma kālaḥ paridevanāya; yad uttaraṃ tatra tad eva sarve
GE07mbh_03_u:120.001b-0584_01: kurvīmahe yac ca hitaṃ bhavet tu
GE07mbh_03_u:120.001c: samācarāmo hy anatītakālaṃ; yudhiṣṭhiro yady api nāha kiṃ cit
GE07mbh_03_u:120.002a: ye nāthavanto hi bhavanti loke; te nātmanā karma samārabhante

GE07mbh_03_u:129.022c: kuror vai yajñaśīlasya kṣetram etan mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:130.001a: iha martyās tapas taptvā svargaṃ gacchanti bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:130.002a: evam āśīḥ prayuktā hi dakṣeṇa yajatā purā
GE07mbh_03_u:130.002c: iha ye vai mariṣyanti te vai svargajito narāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:130.003a: eṣā sarasvatī puṇyā divyā coghavatī nadī
GE07mbh_03_u:130.003c: etad vinaśanaṃ nāma sarasvatyā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:130.004b-0635_01: kṣīṇapāpā śubhāṃl lokān prāpnute nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:130.004c: praviṣṭā pṛthivīṃ vīra mā niṣādā hi māṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:130.005a: eṣa vai camasodbhedo yatra dṛśyā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_03_u:130.006a: etat sindhor mahat tīrthaṃ yatrāgastyam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:130.008a: etad viṣṇupadaṃ nāma dṛśyate tīrtham uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:130.008b-0636_03: munīnām āśramāś caiva sarvāḥ svargamayāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:130.008c: eṣā ramyā vipāśā ca nadī paramapāvanī
GE07mbh_03_u:130.011c: agneś cātraiva saṃvādaḥ kāśyapasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:130.012c: varṣam asya girer madhye rāmeṇa śrīmatā kṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:130.013c: nābhyavartata yad dvāraṃ videhān uttaraṃ ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:130.013d-0639_02: kṣīṇe yuge 'pi kaunteya śarvasya saha pārṣadaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:130.013d-0639_04: asmin sarasi ramye vai caitre māsi pinākinam
GE07mbh_03_u:130.013d-0639_07: kṣīṇapāpaḥ śubhāṃl lokān prāpnute nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:130.014a: eṣa ujjānako nāma yavakrīr yatra śāntavān
GE07mbh_03_u:130.015a: hradaś ca kuśavān eṣa yatra padmaṃ kuśeśayam
GE07mbh_03_u:130.016a: samādhīnāṃ samāsas tu pāṇḍaveya śrutas tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:130.016d-0640_01: maṇḍavāṃ ca tathā saṃdhyāṃ drakṣyasy amitavikrama
GE07mbh_03_u:130.017a: jalāṃ copajalāṃ caiva yamunām abhito nadīm
GE07mbh_03_u:130.018a: tāṃ devasamitiṃ tasya vāsavaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:130.018c: abhyagacchata rājānaṃ jñātum agniś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:130.020a: ūruṃ rājñaḥ samāsādya kapotaḥ śyenajād bhayāt
GE07mbh_03_u:131.000-0641_01: śṛṇu tvaṃ tatra vai rājañ śyeno yad abhibhāṣata
GE07mbh_03_u:131.001a: dharmātmānaṃ tv āhur ekaṃ sarve rājan mahīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:131.001c: sa vai dharmaviruddhaṃ tvaṃ kasmāt karma cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_03_u:131.002a: vihitaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ rājan pīḍyamānasya me kṣudhā
GE07mbh_03_u:131.002c: mā bhāṅkṣīr dharmalobhena dharmam utsṛṣṭavān asi rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:131.004c: apradāne paro 'dharmaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ śyena prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:131.005d-0642_01: yo hi kaś cid dvijān hanyād gāṃ vā lokasya mātaram
GE07mbh_03_u:131.005d-0642_02: śaraṇāgataṃ ca tyajate tulyaṃ teṣāṃ hi pātakam
GE07mbh_03_u:131.007c: na tu bhojanam utsṛjya śakyaṃ vartayituṃ ciram
GE07mbh_03_u:131.008a: bhakṣyād vilopitasyādya mama prāṇā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:131.009c: rakṣamāṇaḥ kapotaṃ tvaṃ bahūn prāṇān naśiṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:131.010a: dharmaṃ yo bādhate dharmo na sa dharmaḥ kudharma tat
GE07mbh_03_u:131.010c: avirodhī tu yo dharmaḥ sa dharmaḥ satyavikrama
GE07mbh_03_u:131.011c: na bādhā vidyate yatra taṃ dharmaṃ samudācaret
GE07mbh_03_u:131.012c: yato bhūyāṃs tato rājan kuru dharmaviniścayam rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:131.013c: suparṇaḥ pakṣirāṭ kiṃ tvaṃ dharmajñaś cāsy asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_03_u:131.013e: tathā hi dharmasaṃyuktaṃ bahu citraṃ prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_03_u:131.014a: na te 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid iti tvā lakṣayāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:131.014c: śaraṇaiṣiṇaḥ parityāgaṃ kathaṃ sādhv iti manyase
GE07mbh_03_u:131.015c: śakyaś cāpy anyathā kartum āhāro 'py adhikas tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:131.016a: govṛṣo vā varāho vā mṛgo vā mahiṣo 'pi vā
GE07mbh_03_u:131.016c: tvadartham adya kriyatāṃ yad vānyad abhikāṅkṣase
GE07mbh_03_u:131.017a: na varāhaṃ na cokṣāṇaṃ na mṛgān vividhāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:131.017c: bhakṣayāmi mahārāja kim annādyena tena me
GE07mbh_03_u:131.018a: yas tu me daivavihito bhakṣaḥ kṣatriyapuṃgava
GE07mbh_03_u:131.018c: tam utsṛja mahīpāla kapotam imam eva me
GE07mbh_03_u:131.019a: śyenāḥ kapotān khādanti sthitir eṣā sanātanī
GE07mbh_03_u:131.019c: mā rājan mārgam ājñāya kadalīskandham āruha rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:131.020a: rājyaṃ śibīnām ṛddhaṃ vai śādhi pakṣigaṇārcita
GE07mbh_03_u:131.020b-0645_01: kṛtsnam etan mayā dattaṃ rājavad vihagottama
GE07mbh_03_u:131.020c: yad vā kāmayase kiṃ cic chyena sarvaṃ dadāni te
GE07mbh_03_u:131.021c: tad ācakṣva kariṣyāmi na hi dāsye kapotakam
GE07mbh_03_u:131.022a: uśīnara kapote te yadi sneho narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:131.023a: yadā samaṃ kapotena tava māṃsaṃ bhaven nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:131.023c: tadā pradeyaṃ tan mahyaṃ sā me tuṣṭir bhaviṣyati rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:131.024a: anugraham imaṃ manye śyena yan mābhiyācase
GE07mbh_03_u:131.024c: tasmāt te 'dya pradāsyāmi svamāṃsaṃ tulayā dhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:131.024d-0646_02: tataḥ kim upacāro 'sya pratyahe kriyate vṛthā
GE07mbh_03_u:131.026c: punaś cotkṛtya māṃsāni rājā prādād uśīnaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:131.027a: na vidyate yadā māṃsaṃ kapotena samaṃ dhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:131.028a: indro 'ham asmi dharmajña kapoto havyavāḍ ayam
GE07mbh_03_u:131.029a: yat te māṃsāni gātrebhya utkṛttāni viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:131.029c: eṣā te bhāsvarī kīrtir lokān abhibhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:131.030a: yāval loke manuṣyās tvāṃ kathayiṣyanti pārthiva
GE07mbh_03_u:131.030c: tāvat kīrtiś ca lokāś ca sthāsyanti tava śāśvatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:131.030d-0647_01: ity evam uktvā rājānam āruroha divaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:131.030d-0647_03: vibhrājamāno vapuṣāpy āruroha triviṣṭapam lomaśa uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:131.031-0648_01: ity uktvā taṃ dānapatim indrāgnī tau tadā nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:131.031a: tat pāṇḍaveya sadanaṃ rājñas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:131.032a: atra vai satataṃ devā munayaś ca sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:132.001a: yaḥ kathyate mantravid agryabuddhir; auddālakiḥ śvetaketuḥ pṛthivyām
GE07mbh_03_u:132.001c: tasyāśramaṃ paśya narendra puṇyaṃ; sadāphalair upapannaṃ mahījaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:132.002a: sākṣād atra śvetaketur dadarśa; sarasvatīṃ mānuṣadeharūpām
GE07mbh_03_u:132.002c: vetsyāmi vāṇīm iti saṃpravṛttāṃ; sarasvatīṃ śvetaketur babhāṣe
GE07mbh_03_u:132.003a: tasmin kāle brahmavidāṃ variṣṭhāv; āstāṃ tadā mātulabhāgineyau
GE07mbh_03_u:132.003c: aṣṭāvakraś caiva kahoḍasūnur; auddālakiḥ śvetaketuś ca rājan
GE07mbh_03_u:132.004a: videharājasya mahīpates tau; viprāv ubhau mātulabhāgineyau
GE07mbh_03_u:132.004c: praviśya yajñāyatanaṃ vivāde; bandiṃ nijagrāhatur aprameyam
GE07mbh_03_u:132.005a: kathaṃprabhāvaḥ sa babhūva vipras; tathāyuktaṃ yo nijagrāha bandim
GE07mbh_03_u:132.005c: aṣṭāvakraḥ kena cāsau babhūva; tat sarvaṃ me lomaśa śaṃsa tattvam
GE07mbh_03_u:132.006a: uddālakasya niyataḥ śiṣya eko; nāmnā kahoḍeti babhūva
GE07mbh_03_u:132.006c: śuśrūṣur ācāryavaśānuvartī; dīrghaṃ kālaṃ so 'dhyayanaṃ cakāra
GE07mbh_03_u:132.007a: taṃ vai viprāḥ paryabhavaṃś ca śiṣyās; taṃ ca jñātvā viprakāraṃ guruḥ saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:132.007c: tasmai prādāt sadya eva śrutaṃ ca; bhāryāṃ ca vai duhitaraṃ svāṃ sujātām
GE07mbh_03_u:132.008a: tasyā garbhaḥ samabhavad agnikalpaḥ; so 'dhīyānaṃ pitaram athābhyuvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:132.008c: sarvāṃ rātrim adhyayanaṃ karoṣi; nedaṃ pitaḥ samyag ivopavartate
GE07mbh_03_u:132.009a: upālabdhaḥ śiṣyamadhye maharṣiḥ; sa taṃ kopād udarasthaṃ śaśāpa
GE07mbh_03_u:132.009c: yasmāt kukṣau vartamāno bravīṣi; tasmād vakro bhavitāsy aṣṭakṛtvaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:132.010a: sa vai tathā vakra evābhyajāyad; aṣṭāvakraḥ prathito vai maharṣiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:132.010c: tasyāsīd vai mātulaḥ śvetaketuḥ; sa tena tulyo vayasā babhūva
GE07mbh_03_u:132.011a: saṃpīḍyamānā tu tadā sujātā; vivardhamānena sutena kukṣau
GE07mbh_03_u:132.011c: uvāca bhartāram idaṃ rahogatā; prasādya hīnaṃ vasunā dhanārthinī
GE07mbh_03_u:132.012a: kathaṃ kariṣyāmy adhanā maharṣe; māsaś cāyaṃ daśamo vartate me
GE07mbh_03_u:132.012c: na cāsti te vasu kiṃ cit prajātā; yenāham etām āpadaṃ nistareyam
GE07mbh_03_u:132.013a: uktas tv evaṃ bhāryayā vai kahoḍo; vittasyārthe janakam athābhyagacchat
GE07mbh_03_u:132.013c: sa vai tadā vādavidā nigṛhya; nimajjito bandinehāpsu vipraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:132.014a: uddālakas taṃ tu tadā niśamya; sūtena vāde 'psu tathā nimajjitam
GE07mbh_03_u:132.014c: uvāca tāṃ tatra tataḥ sujātām; aṣṭāvakre gūhitavyo 'yam arthaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:132.015a: rarakṣa sā cāpy ati taṃ sumantraṃ; jāto 'py evaṃ na sa śuśrāva vipraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:132.015c: uddālakaṃ pitṛvac cāpi mene; aṣṭāvakro bhrātṛvac chvetaketum
GE07mbh_03_u:132.016a: tato varṣe dvādaśe śvetaketur; aṣṭāvakraṃ pitur aṅke nisannam
GE07mbh_03_u:132.016c: apākarṣad gṛhya pāṇau rudantaṃ; nāyaṃ tavāṅkaḥ pitur ity uktavāṃś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:132.017a: yat tenoktaṃ duruktaṃ tat tadānīṃ; hṛdi sthitaṃ tasya suduḥkham āsīt
GE07mbh_03_u:132.017c: gṛhaṃ gatvā mātaraṃ rodamānaḥ; papracchedaṃ kva nu tāto mameti
GE07mbh_03_u:132.018a: tataḥ sujātā paramārtarūpā; śāpād bhītā sarvam evācacakṣe
GE07mbh_03_u:132.018c: tad vai tattvaṃ sarvam ājñāya mātur; ity abravīc chvetaketuṃ sa vipraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:132.019a: gacchāva yajñaṃ janakasya rājño; bahvāścaryaḥ śrūyate tasya yajñaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:132.019c: śroṣyāvo 'tra brāhmaṇānāṃ vivādam; annaṃ cāgryaṃ tatra bhokṣyāvahe ca
GE07mbh_03_u:132.019e: vicakṣaṇatvaṃ ca bhaviṣyate nau; śivaś ca saumyaś ca hi brahmaghoṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:132.020a: tau jagmatur mātulabhāgineyau; yajñaṃ samṛddhaṃ janakasya rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:132.020c: aṣṭāvakraḥ pathi rājñā sametya; utsāryamāṇo vākyam idaṃ jagāda
GE07mbh_03_u:133.001a: andhasya panthā badhirasya panthāḥ; striyaḥ panthā vaivadhikasya panthāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.001c: rājñaḥ panthā brāhmaṇenāsametya; sametya tu brāhmaṇasyaiva panthāḥ rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:133.002a: panthā ayaṃ te 'dya mayā nisṛṣṭo; yenecchase tena kāmaṃ vrajasva
GE07mbh_03_u:133.002c: na pāvako vidyate vai laghīyān; indro 'pi nityaṃ namate brāhmaṇānām lomaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.003a: yajñaṃ draṣṭuṃ prāptavantau sva tāta; kautūhalaṃ nau balavad vai vivṛddham
GE07mbh_03_u:133.003c: āvāṃ prāptāv atithī saṃpraveśaṃ; kāṅkṣāvahe dvārapate tavājñām
GE07mbh_03_u:133.004a: aindradyumner yajñadṛśāv ihāvāṃ; vivakṣū vai janakendraṃ didṛkṣū
GE07mbh_03_u:133.004c: na vai krodhād vyādhinaivottamena; saṃyojaya dvārapāla kṣaṇena
GE07mbh_03_u:133.004d-0654_01: mā ca tvam āvāṃ vyādhinā tapyamānāv
GE07mbh_03_u:133.005a: bandeḥ samādeśakarā vayaṃ sma; nibodha vākyaṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:133.005c: na vai bālāḥ praviśanty atra viprā; vṛddhā vidvāṃsaḥ praviśanti dvijāgryāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.006a: yady atra vṛddheṣu kṛtaḥ praveśo; yuktaṃ mama dvārapāla praveṣṭum
GE07mbh_03_u:133.006c: vayaṃ hi vṛddhāś caritavratāś ca; vedaprabhāvena praveśanārhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.007a: śuśrūṣavaś cāpi jitendriyāś ca; jñānāgame cāpi gatāḥ sma niṣṭhām
GE07mbh_03_u:133.007c: na bāla ity avamantavyam āhur; bālo 'py agnir dahati spṛśyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.008c: aṅgātmānaṃ samavekṣasva bālaṃ; kiṃ ślāghase durlabhā vādasiddhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.009a: na jñāyate kāyavṛddhyā vivṛddhir; yathāṣṭhīlā śālmaleḥ saṃpravṛddhā
GE07mbh_03_u:133.009c: hrasvo 'lpakāyaḥ phalito vivṛddho; yaś cāphalas tasya na vṛddhabhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.010a: vṛddhebhya eveha matiṃ sma bālā; gṛhṇanti kālena bhavanti vṛddhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.010c: na hi jñānam alpakālena śakyaṃ; kasmād bālo vṛddha ivāvabhāṣase
GE07mbh_03_u:133.011a: na tena sthaviro bhavati yenāsya palitaṃ śiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.011c: bālo 'pi yaḥ prajānāti taṃ devāḥ sthaviraṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.012a: na hāyanair na palitair na vittena na bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.012c: ṛṣayaś cakrire dharmaṃ yo 'nūcānaḥ sa no mahān
GE07mbh_03_u:133.014a: draṣṭāsy adya vadato dvārapāla; manīṣibhiḥ saha vāde vivṛddhe
GE07mbh_03_u:133.014b-0655_02: saha vāde vivṛddhe tu bandinaṃ cāpi nirjitam
GE07mbh_03_u:133.014c: utāho vāpy uccatāṃ nīcatāṃ vā; tūṣṇīṃ bhūteṣv atha sarveṣu cādya
GE07mbh_03_u:133.015a: kathaṃ yajñaṃ daśavarṣo viśes tvaṃ; vinītānāṃ viduṣāṃ saṃpraveśyam
GE07mbh_03_u:133.015c: upāyataḥ prayatiṣye tavāhaṃ; praveśane kuru yatnaṃ yathāvat
GE07mbh_03_u:133.015d-0658_04: praveśane yac ca kiṃ cit taveṣṭam
GE07mbh_03_u:133.016a: bho bho rājañ janakānāṃ variṣṭha; sabhājyas tvaṃ tvayi sarvaṃ samṛddham
GE07mbh_03_u:133.016c: tvaṃ vā kartā karmaṇāṃ yajñiyānāṃ; yayātir eko nṛpatir vā purastāt
GE07mbh_03_u:133.017a: vidvān bandī vedavido nigṛhya; vāde bhagnān apratiśaṅkamānaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.017c: tvayā nisṛṣṭaiḥ puruṣair āptakṛdbhir; jale sarvān majjayatīti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:133.018a: sa tac chrutvā brāhmaṇānāṃ sakāśād; brahmodyaṃ vai kathayitum āgato 'smi
GE07mbh_03_u:133.018c: kvāsau bandī yāvad enaṃ sametya; nakṣatrāṇīva savitā nāśayāmi rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:133.019a: āśaṃsase bandinaṃ tvaṃ vijetum; avijñātvā vākyabalaṃ parasya
GE07mbh_03_u:133.019c: vijñātavīryaiḥ śakyam evaṃ pravaktuṃ; dṛṣṭaś cāsau brāhmaṇair vādaśīlaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.020a: vivādito 'sau na hi mādṛśair hi; siṃhīkṛtas tena abhītaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.020c: sametya māṃ nihataḥ śeṣyate 'dya; mārge bhagnaṃ śakaṭam ivābalākṣam rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:133.021c: yas triṣaṣṭiśatārasya vedārthaṃ sa paraḥ kaviḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:133.022c: tat triṣaṣṭiśatāraṃ vai cakraṃ pātu sadāgati rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:133.023c: kas tayor garbham ādhatte garbhaṃ suṣuvatuś ca kam
GE07mbh_03_u:133.024a: mā sma te te gṛhe rājañ śātravāṇām api dhruvam
GE07mbh_03_u:133.024c: vātasārathir ādhatte garbhaṃ suṣuvatuś ca tam rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:133.025a: kiṃ svit suptaṃ na nimiṣati kiṃ svij jātaṃ na copati
GE07mbh_03_u:133.025c: kasya svid dhṛdayaṃ nāsti kiṃ svid vegena vardhate
GE07mbh_03_u:133.026a: matsyaḥ supto na nimiṣaty aṇḍaṃ jātaṃ na copati
GE07mbh_03_u:133.026c: aśmano hṛdayaṃ nāsti nadī vegena vardhate rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:133.027a: na tvā manye mānuṣaṃ devasattvaṃ; na tvaṃ bālaḥ sthaviras tvaṃ mato me
GE07mbh_03_u:133.027c: na te tulyo vidyate vākpralāpe; tasmād dvāraṃ vitarāmy eṣa bandī
GE07mbh_03_u:134.001c: na vai vivitsāntaram asti vādināṃ; mahājale haṃsaninādinām iva
GE07mbh_03_u:134.002a: na me 'dya vakṣyasy ativādimānin; glahaṃ prapannaḥ saritām ivāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.002c: hutāśanasyeva samiddhatejasaḥ; sthiro bhavasveha mamādya bandin
GE07mbh_03_u:134.003a: vyāghraṃ śayānaṃ prati mā prabodhaya; āśīviṣaṃ sṛkkiṇī lelihānam
GE07mbh_03_u:134.003c: padāhatasyeva śiro 'bhihatya; nādaṣṭo vai mokṣyase tan nibodha
GE07mbh_03_u:134.004a: yo vai darpāt saṃhananopapannaḥ; sudurbalaḥ parvatam āvihanti
GE07mbh_03_u:134.004c: tasyaiva pāṇiḥ sanakho viśīryate; na caiva śailasya hi dṛśyate vraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.005d-0660_01: āsanaṃ tu samāsyaivaṃ saṃvādaṃ bandinā saha
GE07mbh_03_u:134.006a: aṣṭāvakraḥ samitau garjamāno; jātakrodho bandinam āha
GE07mbh_03_u:134.006c: ukte vākye cottaraṃ me bravīhi; vākyasya cāpy uttaraṃ te bravīmi
GE07mbh_03_u:134.007a: eka evāgnir bahudhā samidhyate; ekaḥ sūryaḥ sarvam idaṃ prabhāsate
GE07mbh_03_u:134.007c: eko vīro devarājo nihantā; yamaḥ pitṝṇām īśvaraś caika eva
GE07mbh_03_u:134.008a: dvāv indrāgnī carato vai sakhāyau; dvau devarṣī nāradaḥ parvataś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:134.008c: dvāv aśvinau dve ca rathasya cakre; bhāryāpatī dvau vihitau vidhātrā
GE07mbh_03_u:134.009a: triḥ sūyate karmaṇā vai prajeyaṃ; trayo yuktā vājapeyaṃ vahanti
GE07mbh_03_u:134.009c: adhvaryavas triṣavaṇāni tanvate; trayo lokās trīṇi jyotīṃṣi cāhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.010a: catuṣṭayaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ niketaṃ; catvāro yuktā yajñam imaṃ vahanti
GE07mbh_03_u:134.010c: diśaś catasraś caturaś ca varṇāś; catuṣpadā gaur api śaśvad uktā
GE07mbh_03_u:134.011a: pañcāgnayaḥ pañcapadā ca paṅktir; yajñāḥ pañcaivāpy atha pañcendriyāṇi
GE07mbh_03_u:134.011c: dṛṣṭā vede pañcacūḍāś ca pañca; loke khyātaṃ pañcanadaṃ ca puṇyam
GE07mbh_03_u:134.012a: ṣaḍādhāne dakṣiṇām āhur eke; ṣaḍ eveme ṛtavaḥ kālacakram
GE07mbh_03_u:134.012c: ṣaḍ indriyāṇy uta ṣaṭ kṛttikāś ca; ṣaṭ sādyaskāḥ sarvavedeṣu dṛṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.013a: sapta grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ sapta vanyāḥ; sapta chandāṃsi ekaṃ vahanti
GE07mbh_03_u:134.013c: saptarṣayaḥ sapta cāpy arhaṇāni; saptatantrī prathitā caiva vīṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:134.014a: aṣṭau śāṇāḥ śatamānaṃ vahanti; tathāṣṭapādaḥ śarabhaḥ siṃhaghātī
GE07mbh_03_u:134.014c: aṣṭau vasūñ śuśruma devatāsu; yūpaś cāṣṭāsrir vihitaḥ sarvayajñaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.015a: navaivoktāḥ sāmidhenyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ; tathā prāhur navayogaṃ viṣargam
GE07mbh_03_u:134.015c: navākṣarā bṛhatī saṃpradiṣṭā; navayogo gaṇanām eti śaśvat
GE07mbh_03_u:134.016a: daśā daśoktāḥ puruṣasya loke; sahasram āhur daśa pūrṇaṃ śatāni
GE07mbh_03_u:134.016c: daśaiva māsān bibhrati garbhavatyo; daśerakā daśa dāśā daśārṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.017c: ekādaśa prāṇabhṛtāṃ vikārā; ekādaśoktā divi deveṣu rudrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.018a: saṃvatsaraṃ dvādaśa māsam āhur; jagatyāḥ pādo dvādaśaivākṣarāṇi
GE07mbh_03_u:134.018c: dvādaśāhaḥ prākṛto yajña ukto; dvādaśādityān kathayantīha viprāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.019a: trayodaśī tithir uktā mahogrā; trayodaśadvīpavatī mahī
GE07mbh_03_u:134.020a: etāvad uktvā virarāma bandī; ślokasyārdhaṃ vyājahārāṣṭavakraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.020c: trayodaśāhāni sasāra keśī; trayodaśādīny aticchandāṃsi cāhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.021a: tato mahān udatiṣṭhan ninādas; tūṣṇīṃbhūtaṃ sūtaputraṃ niśamya
GE07mbh_03_u:134.021c: adhomukhaṃ dhyānaparaṃ tadānīm; aṣṭāvakraṃ cāpy udīryantam eva
GE07mbh_03_u:134.022a: tasmiṃs tathā saṃkule vartamāne; sphīte yajñe janakasyātha rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.022c: aṣṭāvakraṃ pūjayanto 'bhyupeyur; viprāḥ sarve prāñjalayaḥ pratītāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.023a: anena vai brāhmaṇāḥ śuśruvāṃso; vāde jitvā salile majjitāḥ kila
GE07mbh_03_u:134.023c: tān eva dharmān ayam adya bandī; prāpnotu gṛhyāpsu nimajjayainam
GE07mbh_03_u:134.024a: ahaṃ putro varuṇasyota rājñas; tatrāsa satraṃ dvādaśavārṣikaṃ vai
GE07mbh_03_u:134.024c: satreṇa te janaka tulyakālaṃ; tadarthaṃ te prahitā me dvijāgryāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.025a: ete sarve varuṇasyota yajñaṃ; draṣṭuṃ gatā iha āyānti bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.025c: aṣṭāvakraṃ pūjaye pūjanīyaṃ; yasya hetor janitāraṃ sameṣye
GE07mbh_03_u:134.026a: viprāḥ samudrāmbhasi majjitās te; vācā jitā medhayā
GE07mbh_03_u:134.026c: tāṃ medhayā vācam athojjahāra; yathā vācam avacinvanti santaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.027a: agnir dahañ jātavedāḥ satāṃ gṛhān; visarjayaṃs tejasā na sma dhākṣīt
GE07mbh_03_u:134.027c: bāleṣu putreṣu kṛpaṇaṃ vadatsu; tathā vācam avacinvanti santaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.028a: śleṣmātakī kṣīṇavarcāḥ śṛṇoṣi; utāho tvāṃ stutayo mādayanti
GE07mbh_03_u:134.028c: hastīva tvaṃ janaka vitudyamāno; na māmikāṃ vācam imāṃ śṛṇoṣi
GE07mbh_03_u:134.029a: śṛṇomi vācaṃ tava divyarūpām; amānuṣīṃ divyarūpo 'si sākṣāt
GE07mbh_03_u:134.029c: ajaiṣīr yad bandinaṃ tvaṃ vivāde; nisṛṣṭa eṣa tava kāmo 'dya bandī
GE07mbh_03_u:134.030a: nānena jīvatā kaś cid artho me bandinā nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:134.030c: pitā yady asya varuṇo majjayainaṃ jalāśaye
GE07mbh_03_u:134.031a: ahaṃ putro varuṇasyota rājño; na me bhayaṃ salile majjitasya
GE07mbh_03_u:134.031c: imaṃ muhūrtaṃ pitaraṃ drakṣyate 'yam; aṣṭāvakraś ciranaṣṭaṃ kahoḍam
GE07mbh_03_u:134.032a: tatas te pūjitā viprā varuṇena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_03_u:134.033a: ityartham icchanti sutāñ janā janaka karmaṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:134.033c: yad ahaṃ nāśakaṃ kartuṃ tat putraḥ kṛtavān mama
GE07mbh_03_u:134.034c: uta vāviduṣo vidvān putro janaka jāyate
GE07mbh_03_u:134.035a: śitena te paraśunā svayam evāntako nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:134.035c: śirāṃsy apāharatv ājau ripūṇāṃ bhadram astu te
GE07mbh_03_u:134.036a: mahad ukthyaṃ gīyate sāma cāgryaṃ; samyak somaḥ pīyate cātra satre
GE07mbh_03_u:134.036c: śucīn bhāgān pratijagṛhuś ca hṛṣṭāḥ; sākṣād devā janakasyeha yajñe
GE07mbh_03_u:134.037a: samutthiteṣv atha sarveṣu rājan; vipreṣu teṣv adhikaṃ suprabheṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:134.037c: anujñāto janakenātha rājñā; viveśa toyaṃ sāgarasyota bandī
GE07mbh_03_u:134.038a: aṣṭāvakraḥ pitaraṃ pūjayitvā; saṃpūjito brāhmaṇais tair yathāvat
GE07mbh_03_u:134.038c: pratyājagāmāśramam eva cāgryaṃ; jitvā bandiṃ sahito mātulena
GE07mbh_03_u:134.039a: atra kaunteya sahito bhrātṛbhis tvaṃ; sukhoṣitaḥ saha vipraiḥ pratītaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:134.039c: puṇyāny anyāni śucikarmaikabhaktir; mayā sārdhaṃ caritāsy ājamīḍha
GE07mbh_03_u:134.039d-0662a_03: bhāvena dṛḍhabhaktyā ca mayā sārdhaṃ cariṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:135.002a: alakṣmyā kila saṃyukto vṛtraṃ hatvā śacīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.003c: aditir yatra putrārthaṃ tadannam apacat purā
GE07mbh_03_u:135.005a: ete kanakhalā rājan ṛṣīṇāṃ dayitā nagāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.006a: sanatkumāro bhagavān atra siddhim agāt parām
GE07mbh_03_u:135.007a: apāṃ hradaṃ ca puṇyākhyaṃ bhṛgutuṅgaṃ ca parvatam
GE07mbh_03_u:135.007c: tūṣṇīṃ gaṅgāṃ ca kaunteya sāmātyaḥ samupaspṛśa
GE07mbh_03_u:135.008c: atra mānaṃ ca kaunteya krodhaṃ caiva vivarjaya
GE07mbh_03_u:135.011a: etat sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ śrotum icchāmi lomaśa
GE07mbh_03_u:135.012a: bharadvājaś ca raibhyaś ca sakhāyau saṃbabhūvatuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.013c: āsīd yavakrīḥ putras tu bharadvājasya bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:135.014c: tayoś cāpy atulā prītir bālyāt prabhṛti bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:135.015c: dṛṣṭvā ca satkṛtaṃ viprai raibhyaṃ putraiḥ sahānagha
GE07mbh_03_u:135.016c: tapas tepe tato ghoraṃ vedajñānāya pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_03_u:135.018c: abravīt kasya hetos tvam āsthitas tapa uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:135.019c: pratibhāntv iti tapye 'ham idaṃ paramakaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.021a: kālena mahatā vedāḥ śakyā gurumukhād vibho
GE07mbh_03_u:135.021c: prāptuṃ tasmād ayaṃ yatnaḥ paramo me samāsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.022a: amārga eṣa viprarṣe yena tvaṃ yātum icchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:135.022c: kiṃ vighātena te vipra gacchādhīhi guror mukhāt
GE07mbh_03_u:135.023a: evam uktvā gataḥ śakro yavakrīr api bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:135.024c: saṃtāpayām āsa bhṛśaṃ devendram iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:135.025a: taṃ tathā tapyamānaṃ tu tapas tīvraṃ mahāmunim
GE07mbh_03_u:135.025c: upetya balabhid devo vārayām āsa vai punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.026c: pratibhāsyanti vai vedās tava caiva pituś ca te
GE07mbh_03_u:135.027a: na caitad evaṃ kriyate devarāja mamepsitam
GE07mbh_03_u:135.028a: samiddhe 'gnāv upakṛtyāṅgam aṅgaṃ; hoṣyāmi vā maghavaṃs tan nibodha
GE07mbh_03_u:135.028c: yady etad evaṃ na karoṣi kāmaṃ; mamepsitaṃ devarājeha sarvam
GE07mbh_03_u:135.029a: niścayaṃ tam abhijñāya munes tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.031c: bhāgīrathyāṃ tatra setuṃ vālukābhiś cakāra saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.032a: yadāsya vadato vākyaṃ na sa cakre dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.034a: taṃ dadarśa yavakrīs tu yatnavantaṃ nibandhane
GE07mbh_03_u:135.034c: prahasaṃś cābravīd vākyam idaṃ sa munipuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.035a: kim idaṃ vartate brahman kiṃ ca te ha cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_03_u:135.035c: atīva hi mahān yatnaḥ kriyate 'yaṃ nirarthakaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.036a: bandhiṣye setunā gaṅgāṃ sukhaḥ panthā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:135.036c: kliśyate hi janas tāta taramāṇaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.037a: nāyaṃ śakyas tvayā baddhuṃ mahān oghaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:135.038a: yathaiva bhavatā cedaṃ tapo vedārtham udyatam
GE07mbh_03_u:135.038c: aśakyaṃ tadvad asmābhir ayaṃ bhāraḥ samudyataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.040a: kriyatāṃ yad bhavec chakyaṃ mayā suragaṇeśvara
GE07mbh_03_u:135.040c: varāṃś ca me prayacchānyān yair anyān bhavitāsmy ati
GE07mbh_03_u:135.041a: tasmai prādād varān indra uktavān yān mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.041c: pratibhāsyanti te vedāḥ pitrā saha yathepsitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:135.042a: yac cānyat kāṅkṣase kāmaṃ yavakrīr gamyatām iti
GE07mbh_03_u:136.001a: pratibhāsyanti vai vedā mama tātasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:136.001c: ati cānyān bhaviṣyāvo varā labdhās tathā mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:136.002a: darpas te bhavitā tāta varāṃl labdhvā yathepsitān
GE07mbh_03_u:136.002c: sa darpapūrṇaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ kṣipram eva vinaśyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:136.003c: ṛṣir āsīt purā putra bāladhir nāma vīryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:136.004a: sa putraśokād udvignas tapas tepe suduścaram
GE07mbh_03_u:136.004c: bhaven mama suto 'martya iti taṃ labdhavāṃś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:136.005a: tasya prasādo devaiś ca kṛto na tv amaraiḥ samaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:136.006c: akṣayās tan nimittaṃ me sutasyāyur bhaved iti
GE07mbh_03_u:136.007a: tasya putras tadā jajñe medhāvī krodhanaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_03_u:136.007c: sa tac chrutvākarod darpam ṛṣīṃś caivāvamanyata
GE07mbh_03_u:136.008a: vikurvāṇo munīnāṃ tu caramāṇo mahīm imām
GE07mbh_03_u:136.009a: tasyāpacakre medhāvī taṃ śaśāpa sa vīryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:136.009c: bhava bhasmeti coktaḥ sa na bhasma samapadyata
GE07mbh_03_u:136.010a: dhanuṣākṣas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā medhāvinam anāmayam
GE07mbh_03_u:136.010b-0664_01: munis tat kāraṇaṃ jñātvā svayaṃ mahiṣarūpadhṛk
GE07mbh_03_u:136.010c: nimittam asya mahiṣair bhedayām āsa vīryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:136.011a: sa nimitte vinaṣṭe tu mamāra sahasā śiśuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:136.011c: taṃ mṛtaṃ putram ādāya vilalāpa tataḥ pitā
GE07mbh_03_u:136.012a: lālapyamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ punar ārtavat
GE07mbh_03_u:136.012c: ūcur vedoktayā pūrvaṃ gāthayā tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_03_u:136.013a: na diṣṭam artham atyetum īśo martyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:136.014a: evaṃ labdhvā varān bālā darpapūrṇās tarasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:136.014c: kṣipram eva vinaśyanti yathā na syāt tathā bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:136.015a: eṣa raibhyo mahāvīryaḥ putrau cāsya tathāvidhau
GE07mbh_03_u:136.015c: taṃ yathā putra nābhyeṣi tathā kuryās tv atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:136.016a: sa hi kruddhaḥ samarthas tvāṃ putra pīḍayituṃ ruṣā
GE07mbh_03_u:136.016c: vaidyaś cāpi tapasvī ca kopanaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:136.017a: evaṃ kariṣye mā tāpaṃ tāta kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:136.017c: yathā hi me bhavān mānyas tathā raibhyaḥ pitā mama
GE07mbh_03_u:136.018a: uktvā sa pitaraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ yavakrīr akutobhayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:136.018c: viprakurvann ṛṣīn anyān atuṣyat parayā mudā
GE07mbh_03_u:137.002c: vicarantīṃ snuṣāṃ tasya kiṃnarīm iva bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:137.003a: yavakrīs tām uvācedam upatiṣṭhasva mām iti
GE07mbh_03_u:137.004a: sā tasya śīlam ājñāya tasmāc chāpāc ca bibhyatī
GE07mbh_03_u:137.004c: tejasvitāṃ ca raibhyasya tathety uktvā jagāma sā
GE07mbh_03_u:137.005a: tata ekāntam unnīya majjayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:137.005c: ājagāma tadā raibhyaḥ svam āśramam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:137.006a: rudantīṃ ca snuṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāryām ārtāṃ parāvasoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:137.007a: sā tasmai sarvam ācaṣṭa yavakrībhāṣitaṃ śubhā
GE07mbh_03_u:137.008c: dahann iva tadā cetaḥ krodhaḥ samabhavan mahān
GE07mbh_03_u:137.010a: tataḥ samabhavan nārī tasyā rūpeṇa saṃmitā
GE07mbh_03_u:137.011c: abrūtāṃ tau tadā raibhyaṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ karavāmahe
GE07mbh_03_u:137.012a: tāv abravīd ṛṣiḥ kruddho yavakrīr vadhyatām iti
GE07mbh_03_u:137.012d-0666_02: yavakrīto 'pi raibhyasya snuṣāṃ matvā jagāma tām
GE07mbh_03_u:137.013a: tatas taṃ samupāsthāya kṛtyā sṛṣṭā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_03_u:137.015c: yavakrīḥ sahasotthāya prādravad yena vai saraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:137.016a: jalahīnaṃ saro dṛṣṭvā yavakrīs tvaritaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:137.016c: jagāma saritaḥ sarvās tāś cāpy āsan viśoṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:137.018a: sa vai praviśamānas tu śūdreṇāndhena rakṣiṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:137.019a: nigṛhītaṃ tu śūdreṇa yavakrītaṃ sa rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:137.020a: yavakrītaṃ sa hatvā tu rākṣaso raibhyam āgamat
GE07mbh_03_u:137.020c: anujñātas tu raibhyeṇa tayā nāryā sahācarat
GE07mbh_03_u:138.001a: bharadvājas tu kaunteya kṛtvā svādhyāyam āhnikam
GE07mbh_03_u:138.002a: taṃ sma dṛṣṭvā purā sarve pratyuttiṣṭhanti pāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:138.002c: na tv enam upatiṣṭhanti hataputraṃ tadāgnayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:138.003a: vaikṛtaṃ tv agnihotre sa lakṣayitvā mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:138.003c: tam andhaṃ śūdram āsīnaṃ gṛhapālam athābravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:138.004a: kiṃ nu me nāgnayaḥ śūdra pratinandanti darśanam
GE07mbh_03_u:138.004c: tvaṃ cāpi na yathāpūrvaṃ kaccit kṣemam ihāśrame
GE07mbh_03_u:138.005a: kaccin na raibhyaṃ putro me gatavān alpacetanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:138.005c: etad ācakṣva me śīghraṃ na hi me śudhyate manaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:138.006a: raibhyaṃ gato nūnam asau sutas te mandacetanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:138.006c: tathā hi nihataḥ śete rākṣasena balīyasā
GE07mbh_03_u:138.007c: agnyāgāraṃ prati dvāri mayā dorbhyāṃ nivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:138.008a: tataḥ sa nihato hy atra jalakāmo 'śucir dhruvam
GE07mbh_03_u:138.009a: bharadvājas tu śūdrasya tac chrutvā vipriyaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:138.010a: brāhmaṇānāṃ kilārthāya nanu tvaṃ taptavāṃs tapaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:138.010c: dvijānām anadhītā vai vedāḥ saṃpratibhāntv iti
GE07mbh_03_u:138.013a: yaḥ sa jānan mahātejā vṛddhasyaikaṃ mamātmajam
GE07mbh_03_u:138.014c: tyakṣyāmi tvām ṛte putra prāṇān iṣṭatamān bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:138.015c: tathā jyeṣṭhaḥ suto raibhyaṃ hiṃsyāc chīghram anāgasam
GE07mbh_03_u:138.016a: sukhino vai narā yeṣāṃ jātyā putro na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:138.017a: ye tu putrakṛtāc chokād bhṛśaṃ vyākulacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:138.017c: śapantīṣṭān sakhīn ārtās tebhyaḥ pāpataro nu kaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:138.018a: parāsuś ca suto dṛṣṭaḥ śaptaś ceṣṭaḥ sakhā mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:139.001a: etasminn eva kāle tu bṛhaddyumno mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.003a: tatra tau samanujñātau pitrā kaunteya jagmatuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.003c: āśrame tv abhavad raibhyo bhāryā caiva parāvasoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.005c: carantaṃ gahane 'raṇye mene sa pitaraṃ mṛgam
GE07mbh_03_u:139.006a: mṛgaṃ tu manyamānena pitā vai tena hiṃsitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.006d-0668_01: tataḥ samīpam āsādya pitaraṃ dṛṣṭavān hatam
GE07mbh_03_u:139.006d-0668_03: vilapya bahudhā rājan raibhyasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.007a: sa tasya pretakāryāṇi kṛtvā sarvāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:139.007c: punar āgamya tat satram abravīd bhrātaraṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.008a: idaṃ karma na śaktas tvaṃ voḍhum ekaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:139.008c: mayā tu hiṃsitas tāto manyamānena taṃ mṛgam
GE07mbh_03_u:139.009a: so 'smadarthe vrataṃ sādhu cara tvaṃ brahmahiṃsanam
GE07mbh_03_u:139.009c: samartho hy aham ekākī karma kartum idaṃ mune
GE07mbh_03_u:139.010a: karotu vai bhavān satraṃ bṛhaddyumnasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.010d-0670_01: tac chrutvārvāvasuḥ paścāt prāyaścittaṃ vidhāya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:139.011a: sa tasyā brahmahatyāyāḥ pāraṃ gatvā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:139.011c: arvāvasus tadā satram ājagāma punar muniḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.013a: eṣa te brahmahā yajñaṃ mā draṣṭuṃ praviśed iti
GE07mbh_03_u:139.013c: brahmahā prekṣitenāpi pīḍayet tvāṃ na saṃśayaḥ lomaśa uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:139.013d-0671_01: tac chrutvaiva tadā rājā preṣyān āha sa viṭpate
GE07mbh_03_u:139.014a: preṣyair utsāryamāṇas tu rājann arvāvasus tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:139.014c: na mayā brahmahatyeyaṃ kṛtety āha punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.015c: naiva sa pratijānāti brahmahatyāṃ svayaṃ kṛtām
GE07mbh_03_u:139.015e: mama bhrātrā kṛtam idaṃ mayā tu parirakṣitam
GE07mbh_03_u:139.015f-0672_01: sa tathā pravadan krodhāt taiś ca preṣyaiḥ prabhāṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.015f-0672_02: tūṣṇīṃ jagāma brahmarṣir vanam eva mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.015f-0672_05: mūrtimāṃs taṃ dadarśātha svayam agrabhug avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.016c: taṃ te pravarayām āsur nirāsuś ca parāvasum
GE07mbh_03_u:139.017a: tato devā varaṃ tasmai dadur agnipurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.017c: sa cāpi varayām āsa pitur utthānam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.018a: anāgastvaṃ tathā bhrātuḥ pituś cāsmaraṇaṃ vadhe
GE07mbh_03_u:139.018d-0673_02: evam astv iti taṃ devāḥ procuś cāpi varān daduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:139.019a: tataḥ prādurbabhūvus te sarva eva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:139.020a: samadhītaṃ mayā brahma vratāni caritāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:139.020c: kathaṃ nu raibhyaḥ śakto mām adhīyānaṃ tapasvinam
GE07mbh_03_u:139.021a: maivaṃ kṛthā yavakrīta yathā vadasi vai mune
GE07mbh_03_u:139.021c: ṛte gurum adhītā hi sukhaṃ vedās tvayā purā
GE07mbh_03_u:139.022a: anena tu gurūn duḥkhāt toṣayitvā svakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:139.023c: saṃjīvayitvā tān sarvān punar jagmus triviṣṭapam
GE07mbh_03_u:139.023d-0674_01: tato vai sa yavakrīto brahmacaryaṃ cacāra ha
GE07mbh_03_u:139.023d-0674_02: aṣṭau daśa ca varṣāṇi triṃśataṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:140.001a: uśīrabījaṃ mainākaṃ giriṃ śvetaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:140.002c: sthānaṃ virajasaṃ ramyaṃ yatrāgnir nityam idhyate
GE07mbh_03_u:140.003a: etad vai mānuṣeṇādya na śakyaṃ draṣṭum apy uta
GE07mbh_03_u:140.004a: śvetaṃ giriṃ pravekṣyāmo mandaraṃ caiva parvatam
GE07mbh_03_u:140.004c: yatra māṇicaro yakṣaḥ kuberaś cāpi yakṣarāṭ
GE07mbh_03_u:140.005c: tathā kiṃpuruṣā rājan yakṣāś caiva caturguṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:140.007a: teṣām ṛddhir atīvāgryā gatau vāyusamāś ca te
GE07mbh_03_u:140.007c: sthānāt pracyāvayeyur ye devarājam api dhruvam
GE07mbh_03_u:140.008a: tais tāta balibhir guptā yātudhānaiś ca rakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:140.008c: durgamāḥ parvatāḥ pārtha samādhiṃ paramaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_03_u:140.009a: kuberasacivāś cānye raudrā maitrāś ca rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:140.009c: taiḥ sameṣyāma kaunteya yatto vikramaṇe bhava
GE07mbh_03_u:140.010c: yatra devāḥ samāyānti viśālā yatra bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:140.012a: tān vigāhasva pārthādya tapasā ca damena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:140.013a: svasti te varuṇo rājā yamaś ca samitiṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:140.013c: gaṅgā ca yamunā caiva parvataś ca dadhātu te
GE07mbh_03_u:140.013d-0676_01: marutaś ca sahāśvibhyāṃ saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:140.013d-0676_02: svasti devāsurebhyaś ca vasubhyaś ca mahādyute
GE07mbh_03_u:140.014a: indrasya jāmbūnadaparvatāgre; śṛṇomi ghoṣaṃ tava devi gaṅge
GE07mbh_03_u:140.014e: bhavasva śarma pravivikṣato 'sya; śailān imāñ śailasute nṛpasya
GE07mbh_03_u:140.015a: apūrvo 'yaṃ saṃbhramo lomaśasya; kṛṣṇāṃ sarve rakṣata mā pramādam
GE07mbh_03_u:140.015c: deśo hy ayaṃ durgatamo mato 'sya; tasmāt paraṃ śaucam ihācaradhvam
GE07mbh_03_u:140.016a: tato 'bravīd bhīmam udāravīryaṃ; kṛṣṇāṃ yattaḥ bhīmasena
GE07mbh_03_u:140.016c: śūnye 'rjune 'saṃnihite ca tāta; tvam eva kṛṣṇāṃ bhajase 'sukheṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:140.017a: tato mahātmā yamajau sametya; mūrdhany upāghrāya vimṛjya gātre
GE07mbh_03_u:140.017c: uvāca tau bāṣpakalaṃ sa rājā; mā bhaiṣṭam āgacchatam apramattau
GE07mbh_03_u:141.001c: agninā tapasā caiva śakyaṃ gantuṃ vṛkodara
GE07mbh_03_u:141.002c: tato balaṃ ca dākṣyaṃ ca saṃśrayasva kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_03_u:141.003a: ṛṣes tvayā śrutaṃ vākyaṃ kailāsaṃ parvataṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:141.003c: buddhyā prapaśya kaunteya kathaṃ kṛṣṇā gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:141.004a: atha vā sahadevena dhaumyena ca sahābhibho
GE07mbh_03_u:141.004c: sūdaiḥ paurogavaiś caiva sarvaiś ca paricārakaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:141.005a: rathair aśvaiś ca ye cānye viprāḥ kleśāsahāḥ pathi
GE07mbh_03_u:141.006c: ahaṃ ca nakulaś caiva lomaśaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:141.008d-0679_01: apaśyantīha taṃ vīram evam eṣā suduḥkhitā
GE07mbh_03_u:141.008d-0679_02: kiṃ punar nakulaṃ tvāṃ ca taṃ ca vīraṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_03_u:141.009a: tava cāpy aratis tīvrā vardhate tam apaśyataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:141.009c: kiṃ punaḥ sahadevaṃ ca māṃ ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:141.010a: rathāḥ kāmaṃ nivartantāṃ sarve ca paricārakāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:141.010c: sūdāḥ paurogavāś caiva manyate yatra no bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:141.011a: na hy ahaṃ hātum icchāmi bhavantam iha karhi cit
GE07mbh_03_u:141.013c: na jātu vinivarteta matajño hy aham asya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:141.014c: sarve lālasabhūtāḥ sma tasmād yāsyāmahe saha
GE07mbh_03_u:141.015a: yady aśakyo rathair gantuṃ śailo 'yaṃ bahukandaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:141.015c: padbhir eva gamiṣyāmo mā rājan vimanā bhava
GE07mbh_03_u:141.016a: ahaṃ vahiṣye pāñcālīṃ yatra yatra na śakṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:141.016c: iti me vartate buddhir mā rājan vimanā bhava
GE07mbh_03_u:141.018c: yas tvam utsahase voḍhuṃ draupadīṃ vipule 'dhvani
GE07mbh_03_u:141.019a: yamajau cāpi bhadraṃ te naitad anyatra vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:141.019c: balaṃ ca te yaśaś caiva dharmaḥ kīrtiś ca vardhatām
GE07mbh_03_u:141.020a: yas tvam utsahase netuṃ bhrātarau saha kṛṣṇayā
GE07mbh_03_u:141.020c: mā te glānir mahābāho mā ca te 'stu parābhavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:141.021c: gamiṣyāmi na saṃtāpaḥ kāryo māṃ prati bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:141.022c: tapasā caiva kaunteya sarve yokṣyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_03_u:141.023a: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca bhīmasenaś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_03_u:141.023c: ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca kaunteya drakṣyāmaḥ śvetavāhanam
GE07mbh_03_u:141.024a: evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇās te subāhor viṣayaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:141.026a: subāhuś cāpi tān dṛṣṭvā pūjayā pratyagṛhṇata
GE07mbh_03_u:141.027a: tatra te pūjitās tena sarva eva sukhoṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:141.027c: pratasthur vimale sūrye himavantaṃ giriṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:141.028c: sūdāṃś ca paribarhaṃ ca draupadyāḥ sarvaśo nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:141.030a: te śanaiḥ prādravan sarve kṛṣṇayā saha pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.001a: bhīmasena yamau cobhau pāñcāli ca nibodhata
GE07mbh_03_u:142.001c: nāsti bhūtasya nāśo vai paśyatāsmān vanecarān
GE07mbh_03_u:142.003a: tan me dahati gātrāṇi tūlarāśim ivānalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.003c: yac ca vīraṃ na paśyāmi dhanaṃjayam upāntike
GE07mbh_03_u:142.004a: tasya darśanatṛṣṇaṃ māṃ sānujaṃ vanam āsthitam
GE07mbh_03_u:142.004c: yājñasenyāḥ parāmarśaḥ sa ca vīra dahaty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:142.005a: nakulāt pūrvajaṃ pārthaṃ na paśyāmy amitaujasam
GE07mbh_03_u:142.006a: tīrthāni caiva ramyāṇi vanāni ca sarāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:142.007a: pañca varṣāṇy ahaṃ vīraṃ satyasaṃdhaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_03_u:142.007c: yan na paśyāmi bībhatsuṃ tena tapye vṛkodara
GE07mbh_03_u:142.008c: na paśyāmi mahābāhuṃ tena tapye vṛkodara
GE07mbh_03_u:142.009c: na paśyāmi naraśreṣṭhaṃ tena tapye vṛkodara
GE07mbh_03_u:142.011a: yaḥ sa śakrād anavaro vīryeṇa draviṇena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:142.011d-0681_02: taṃ mamāpaśyato bhīma na śāntir hṛdayasya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:142.012c: ajeyam ugradhanvānaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi phalgunam
GE07mbh_03_u:142.017a: ratnāni yasya vīryeṇa divyāny āsan purā mama
GE07mbh_03_u:142.018a: yasya bāhubalād vīra sabhā cāsīt purā mama
GE07mbh_03_u:142.019c: ajeyam ajitaṃ yuddhe taṃ na paśyāmi phalgunam
GE07mbh_03_u:142.020c: anujātaḥ sa vīryeṇa vāsudevaṃ ca śatruhā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.021a: yasya bāhubale tulyaḥ prabhāve ca puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.021c: jave vāyur mukhe somaḥ krodhe mṛtyuḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.022a: te vayaṃ taṃ naravyāghraṃ sarve vīra didṛkṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.023c: taṃ sadādhyuṣitaṃ yakṣair drakṣyāmo girim uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:142.024c: padbhir eva gamiṣyāmas tapyamānā mahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.027a: makṣikān maśakān daṃśān vyāghrān siṃhān sarīsṛpān
GE07mbh_03_u:142.027c: prāpnoty aniyataḥ pārtha niyatas tān na paśyati
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0002: tīrthāni caiva śrīmanti spṛṣṭaṃ ca salilaṃ karaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0003: parvataṃ mandaraṃ divyam eṣa panthāḥ prayāsyati
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0005: ayaṃ devanivāso vai gantavyo vo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0007: eṣā śivajalā puṇyā yāti saumya mahānadī
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0010: arcitā copayātā ca gandharvaiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0011: atra sāma sma gāyanti sāmagāḥ puṇyanisvanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0012: marīciḥ pulahaś caiva bhṛguś caivāṅgirās tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0014: sādhyāś caivāśvinau caiva paridhāvanti taṃ tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0015: candramāḥ saha sūryeṇa jyotīṃṣi ca grahaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0019: etāṃ bhagavatīṃ devīṃ bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0021: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā lomaśasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0023: abhivādya ca te sarve pāṇḍavā dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0024: punaḥ prayātāḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sarvair ṛṣigaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0027: tān praṣṭukāmān vijñāya pāṇḍavān sa tu lomaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0038: nityam eva durādharṣo dharṣayan sa diteḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0039: sa tu tasya balaṃ jñātvā dharme ca caritavratam
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0041: tena saṃcintito devo manasā viṣṇur avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0042: sarvatragaḥ prabhuḥ śrīmān āgataś ca sthito babhau
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0043: ṛṣayaś cāpi taṃ sarve tuṣṭuvuś ca divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0046: taṃ dṛṣṭvā varadaṃ devaṃ viṣṇuṃ devagaṇeśvaram
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0047: prāñjaliḥ praṇato bhūtvā namaskṛtya ca vajrabhṛt viṣṇur uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0048: prāha vākyaṃ tatas tattvaṃ yatas tasya bhayaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0049: jānāmi te bhayaṃ śakra daityendrān narakāt tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0051: so 'ham enaṃ tava prītyā tapaḥsiddham api dhruvam
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0053: tasya viṣṇur mahātejāḥ pāṇinā cetanāṃ harat
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0054: sa papāta tato bhūmau girirāja ivāhataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0056: idaṃ dvitīyam aparaṃ viṣṇoḥ karma prakāśate
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0057: naṣṭā vasumatī kṛtsnā pātāle caiva majjitā yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0060: kathaṃ tena sureśena naṣṭā vasumatī tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0061: yojanānāṃ śataṃ brahman punar uddharitā tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0062: kena caiva prakāreṇa jagato dharaṇī dhruvā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0064: kasya caiva prabhāvād dhi yojanānāṃ śataṃ gatā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0066: etat sarvaṃ yathātattvam icchāmi dvijasattama lomaśa uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0067: śrotuṃ vistaraśaḥ sarvaṃ tvaṃ hi tasya pratiśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0068: yat te 'haṃ paripṛṣṭo 'smi kathām etāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0069: tat sarvam akhileneha śrūyatāṃ mama bhāṣataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0073: na tatra mriyate kaś cij jāyate vā tathācyuta
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0075: gavāśvaṃ ca mṛgāś caiva sarve te piśitāśanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0077: sahasraśo hy ayutaśo vardhante salilaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0081: nārāyaṇaṃ varaṃ devaṃ prapannā śaraṇaṃ gatā pṛthivy uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0082: bhagavaṃs tvatprasādād dhi tiṣṭheyaṃ suciraṃ tv iha
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0083: bhāreṇāsmi samākrāntā na śaknomi sma vartitum
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0084: mamemaṃ bhagavan bhāraṃ vyapanetuṃ tvam arhasi lomaśa uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0085: śaraṇāgatāsmi te deva prasādaṃ kuru me vibho
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0086: tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhagavān akṣaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0088: na te mahi bhayaṃ kāryaṃ bhārārte vasudhāriṇi
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0089: ayam evaṃ tathā kurmi yathā laghvī bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0090: sa tāṃ visarjayitvā tu vasudhāṃ śailakuṇḍalām
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0092: raktābhyāṃ nayanābhyāṃ tu bhayam utpādayann iva
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0093: dhūmaṃ ca jvalayaṃl lakṣmyā tatra deśe vyavardhata
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0097: devāḥ saṃkṣubhitāḥ sarve ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0098: hāhābhūtam abhūt sarvaṃ tridivaṃ vyoma bhūs tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0099: na paryavasthitaḥ kaś cid devo vā mānuṣo 'pi vā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0100: tato brahmāṇam āsīnaṃ jvalamānam iva śriyā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0103: bhūtvā prāñjalayaḥ sarve vākyam uccārayaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0104: lokāḥ saṃkṣubhitāḥ sarve vyākulaṃ ca carācaram
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0106: saiṣā vasumatī kṛtsnā yojanānāṃ śataṃ gatā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0107: kim etat kiṃprabhāveṇa yenedaṃ vyākulaṃ jagat brahmovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0108: ākhyātu no bhavāñ śīghraṃ visaṃjñāḥ smeha sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0109: asurebhyo bhayaṃ nāsti yuṣmākaṃ kutra cit kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0110: śrūyatāṃ yat kṛteṣv eva saṃkṣobho jāyate 'marāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0113: yaiṣā vasumatī kṛtsnā yojanānāṃ śataṃ gatā
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0116: devā ūcuḥ evaṃ bhavanto jānantu chidyatāṃ saṃśayaś ca vaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0118: taṃ deśaṃ bhagavan brūhi tatra yāsyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0119: hanta gacchata bhadraṃ vo nandane paśyata sthitam
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0124: paśyadhvaṃ vibudhāḥ sarve bhūtam etad anāmayam lomaśa uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0125: tato dṛṣṭvā mahātmānaṃ śrutvā cāmantrya vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:142.028d-016_0127: śrutvā tu tāṃ kathāṃ sarve pāṇḍavā janamejaya
GE07mbh_03_u:143.003a: sarāṃsi saritaś caiva parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:143.006c: caṇḍavātaṃ mahad varṣaṃ prādurāsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:143.007c: pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca dyāṃ caiva tamasāvṛṇot
GE07mbh_03_u:143.008a: na sma prajñāyate kiṃ cid āvṛte vyomni reṇunā
GE07mbh_03_u:143.008c: na cāpi śekus te kartum anyonyasyābhibhāṣaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:143.010c: anyeṣāṃ ca mahījānāṃ śabdaḥ samabhavan mahān
GE07mbh_03_u:143.011a: dyauḥ svit patati kiṃ bhūmau dīryante parvatā nu kim
GE07mbh_03_u:143.011c: iti te menire sarve pavanena vimohitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:143.012a: te yathānantarān vṛkṣān valmīkān viṣamāṇi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:143.013c: kṛṣṇām ādāya saṃgatyā tasthāv āśritya pādapam
GE07mbh_03_u:143.014a: dharmarājaś ca dhaumyaś ca nililyāte mahāvane
GE07mbh_03_u:143.015a: nakulo brāhmaṇāś cānye lomaśaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:143.015c: vṛkṣān āsādya saṃtrastās tatra tatra nililyire
GE07mbh_03_u:143.016a: mandībhūte ca pavane tasmin rajasi śāmyati
GE07mbh_03_u:143.016c: mahadbhiḥ pṛṣatais tūrṇaṃ varṣam abhyājagāma ha
GE07mbh_03_u:143.016d-0682_02: tatas tāḥ cañcalābhāsaś cerur abhre ca vidyutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:143.020a: tasminn uparate varṣe vāte ca samatāṃ gate
GE07mbh_03_u:143.020c: gate hy ambhasi nimnāni prādurbhūte divākare
GE07mbh_03_u:143.021a: nirjagmus te śanaiḥ sarve samājagmuś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:143.021c: pratasthuś ca punar vīrāḥ parvataṃ gandhamādanam
GE07mbh_03_u:144.002a: śrāntā duḥkhaparītā ca vātavarṣeṇa tena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:144.004c: papāta sahasā bhūmau vepantī kadalī yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:144.005a: tāṃ patantīṃ varārohāṃ sajjamānāṃ latām iva
GE07mbh_03_u:144.006c: śrāntā nipatitā bhūmau tām avekṣasva bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:144.008a: rājā tu vacanāt tasya bhṛśaṃ duḥkhasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:144.008c: bhīmaś ca sahadevaś ca sahasā samupādravan
GE07mbh_03_u:144.009a: tām avekṣya tu kaunteyo vivarṇavadanāṃ kṛśām
GE07mbh_03_u:144.011a: sukumārau kathaṃ pādau mukhaṃ ca kamalaprabham
GE07mbh_03_u:144.012a: kim idaṃ dyūtakāmena mayā kṛtam abuddhinā
GE07mbh_03_u:144.013a: sukhaṃ prāpsyati pāñcālī pāṇḍavān prāpya vai patīn
GE07mbh_03_u:144.014a: tat sarvam anavāpyaiva śramaśokād dhi karśitā
GE07mbh_03_u:144.014c: śete nipatitā bhūmau pāpasya mama karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:144.016a: te samāśvāsayām āsur āśīrbhiś cāpy apūjayan
GE07mbh_03_u:144.016c: rakṣoghnāṃś ca tathā mantrāñ jepuś cakruś ca te kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:144.017c: spṛśyamānā karaiḥ śītaiḥ pāṇḍavaiś ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:144.018c: pāñcālī sukham āsādya lebhe cetaḥ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:144.019a: parigṛhya ca tāṃ dīnāṃ kṛṣṇām ajinasaṃstare
GE07mbh_03_u:144.021c: uvāca ca kuruśreṣṭho bhīmasenam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:144.022c: teṣu kṛṣṇā mahābāho kathaṃ nu vicariṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:144.023a: tvāṃ rājan rājaputrīṃ ca yamau ca puruṣarṣabhau
GE07mbh_03_u:144.023c: svayaṃ neṣyāmi rājendra mā viṣāde manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:144.024a: atha vāsau mayā jāto vihago madbalopamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:144.024c: vahed anagha sarvān no vacanāt te ghatotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:144.024d-0683_01: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ bhīmasenasya dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_03_u:144.024d-0683_02: bhīmaṃ saṃpūjayaṃs tuṣṭa evam astv ity abhāṣata
GE07mbh_03_u:144.025c: ghaṭotkacaś ca dharmātmā smṛtamātraḥ pitus tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:144.026a: brāhmaṇāṃś ca mahābāhuḥ sa ca tair abhinanditaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:144.027a: smṛto 'smi bhavatā śīghraṃ śuśrūṣur aham āgataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:144.027e: tac chrutvā bhīmasenas tu rākṣasaṃ pariṣasvaje
GE07mbh_03_u:145.001c: bhakto 'smān aurasaḥ putro bhīma gṛhṇātu mātaram
GE07mbh_03_u:145.004c: tvaṃ ca kāmagamas tāta balavān vaha tāṃ khaga
GE07mbh_03_u:145.005a: skandham āropya bhadraṃ te madhye 'smākaṃ vihāyasā
GE07mbh_03_u:145.005c: gaccha nīcikayā gatyā yathā caināṃ na pīḍayeḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:145.006a: dharmarājaṃ ca dhaumyaṃ ca rājaputrīṃ yamau tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:145.006c: eko 'py aham alaṃ voḍhuṃ kim utādya sahāyavān
GE07mbh_03_u:145.006d-0684_01: anye ca śataśaḥ śūrā vihagāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:145.006d-0684_02: sarvān vo brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ vakṣyanti sahitānagha
GE07mbh_03_u:145.007a: evam uktvā tataḥ kṛṣṇām uvāha sa ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:145.007c: pāṇḍūnāṃ madhyago vīraḥ pāṇḍavān api cāpare
GE07mbh_03_u:145.009a: brāhmaṇāṃś cāpi tān sarvān samupādāya rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:145.010c: ālokayantas te jagmur viśālāṃ badarīṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:145.011a: te tv āśugatibhir vīrā rākṣasais tair mahābalaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:145.011c: uhyamānā yayuḥ śīghraṃ mahad adhvānam alpavat
GE07mbh_03_u:145.013c: tathā kiṃpuruṣaiś caiva gandharvaiś ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:145.013d-0687_01: sṛmaraiś camaraiś caiva vānarai rurubhis tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:145.013d-0687_02: varāhair gavayaiś caiva mahiṣaiś ca samāvṛtān
GE07mbh_03_u:145.014d-0689_01: samadaiś cāpi vihagaiḥ pādapair anvitāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:145.015a: te vyatītya bahūn deśān uttarāṃś ca kurūn api
GE07mbh_03_u:145.017a: dadṛśus tāṃ ca badarīṃ vṛttaskandhāṃ manoramām
GE07mbh_03_u:145.018a: patraiḥ snigdhair aviralair upetāṃ mṛdubhiḥ śubhām
GE07mbh_03_u:145.019a: phalair upacitair divyair ācitāṃ svādubhir bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:145.022a: tām upetya mahātmānaḥ saha tair brāhmaṇarṣabhaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:145.024a: tamasā rahitaṃ puṇyam anāmṛṣṭaṃ raveḥ karaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:145.031a: so 'bhyagacchan mahātejās tān ṛṣīn niyataḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:145.033a: prītās te tasya satkāraṃ vidhinā pāvakopamāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:145.034a: sa taiḥ prītyātha satkāram upanītaṃ maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:145.035c: prītaḥ svargopamaṃ puṇyaṃ pāṇḍavaḥ saha kṛṣṇayā
GE07mbh_03_u:145.036a: viveśa śobhayā yuktaṃ bhrātṛbhiś ca sahānagha
GE07mbh_03_u:145.037d-0690_01: paśyantas te naravyāghrā remire tatra pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:145.038c: tām upetya mahātmānas te 'vasan brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:145.038d-0691_01: mudā yuktā mahātmāno remire tatra te tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:145.039c: hiraṇyaśikharaṃ caiva tac ca bindusaraḥ śivam
GE07mbh_03_u:145.040b-0692_01: prāpya puṇyāṃ devanadīṃ viśālāṃ badarīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:145.041d-0693_03: devān ṛṣīṃś ca kaunteyāḥ paramaṃ śaucam āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:145.042a: tatra devān pitṝṃś caiva tarpayantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.001a: tatra te puruṣavyāghrāḥ paramaṃ śaucam āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.001e: tasmin viharamāṇāś ca ramamāṇāś ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.008a: tac chubhā śubham āsādya saugandhikam anuttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:146.009a: paśya divyaṃ suruciraṃ bhīma puṣpam anuttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:146.010c: harer idaṃ me kāmāya kāmyake punar āśrame
GE07mbh_03_u:146.011a: yadi te 'haṃ priyā pārtha bahūnīmāny upāhara
GE07mbh_03_u:146.011c: tāny ahaṃ netum icchāmi kāmyakaṃ punar āśramam
GE07mbh_03_u:146.012a: evam uktvā tu pāñcālī bhīmasenam aninditā
GE07mbh_03_u:146.012c: jagāma dharmarājāya puṣpam ādāya tat tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:146.014a: vātaṃ tam evābhimukho yatas tat puṣpam āgatam
GE07mbh_03_u:146.014c: ājihīrṣur jagāmāśu sa puṣpāṇy aparāṇy api
GE07mbh_03_u:146.015c: mṛgarāḍ iva saṃkruddhaḥ prabhinna iva kuñjaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.015d-0695_02: na glānir na ca vaiklavyaṃ na bhayaṃ na ca saṃbhramaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.015d-0695_03: kadā cij juṣate pārtham ātmajaṃ mātariśvanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.021c: gandham uddāmam uddāmo vane matta iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.025c: muktāhārair iva citaṃ cyutaiḥ prasravaṇodakaiḥ abhirāmanadīkuñjanirjharodarakandaram
GE07mbh_03_u:146.035a: so 'cintayad gate svargam arjune mayi cāgate
GE07mbh_03_u:146.035c: puṣpahetoḥ kathaṃ nv āryaḥ kariṣyati yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.036a: snehān naravaro nūnam aviśvāsād vanasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:146.036c: nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca na mokṣyati yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.037a: kathaṃ nu kusumāvāptiḥ syāc chīghram iti cintayan
GE07mbh_03_u:146.038a: kampayan medinīṃ padbhyāṃ nirghāta iva parvasu
GE07mbh_03_u:146.040c: upary upari śailāgram ārurukṣur iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.041d-0700_01: ṛkṣāś cotsasṛjur vṛkṣāṃs tatyajur harayo guhām
GE07mbh_03_u:146.041d-0700_04: tad vanaṃ saṃparityajya jagmur anyan mahāvanam
GE07mbh_03_u:146.041d-0700_08: śukāḥ puṃskokilāḥ krauñcā visaṃjñā bhejire diśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.041d-0700_09: tathānye darpitā nāgā mahiṣāś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.044c: cikṣepa tarasā bhīmaḥ samantād balināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.044d-0701_01: mahāntam akarot tatra tarūṇāṃ pāṇḍavo balī
GE07mbh_03_u:146.045a: tataḥ sattvāny upākrāman bahūni ca mahānti ca
GE07mbh_03_u:146.045d-0703_01: praviveśa tataḥ kṣipraṃ tān apāsya mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.045d-0703a_01: dadhmau ca śaṅkhaṃ svanavat sarvaprāṇena pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.047c: gajenāghnan gajaṃ bhīmaḥ siṃhaṃ siṃhena cābhibhūḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.047e: talaprahārair anyāṃś ca vyahanat pāṇḍavo balī
GE07mbh_03_u:146.048c: bhayād visasṛpuḥ sarve śakṛnmūtraṃ ca susruvuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.049a: praviveśa tataḥ kṣipraṃ tān apāsya mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.052c: tān evānusaran ramyaṃ dadarśa sumahat saraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.054f-0705_01: kṣobhayan salilaṃ bhīmaḥ prabhinna iva vāraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.055c: dadhmau ca śaṅkhaṃ svanavat sarvaprāṇena pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.055d-0706_01: āsphoṭayac ca balavān bhīmaḥ saṃnādayan diśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.056d-0707_01: tataḥ śaṅkhasvanaṃ śrutvā narditaṃ ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.056d-0707_02: vṛkṣāṇāṃ bhajyamānānāṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā tadā girau
GE07mbh_03_u:146.056d-0707_04: hanūmān nāma sa kapir lāṅgūlamadhunot tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.056d-0707_07: tataḥ pṛthvī ca śailāś ca prakampitam ivābhavat (!)
GE07mbh_03_u:146.058c: mukto virāvaḥ sumahān parvato yena pūritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.059a: taṃ tu nādaṃ tataḥ śrutvā supto vānarapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.059d-0708_01: bhrātaraṃ bhīmasenaṃ tu vijñāya hanumān kapiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.059d-0708_03: anena hi pathā mā vai gacched iti vicārya saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.059d-0708_05: bhrātur bhīmasya rakṣārthaṃ taṃ mārgam avarudhya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:146.059d-0708_06: mātra prāpsyati śāpaṃ vā dharṣaṇāṃ veti pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.061c: udgāram iva gaur nardam utsasarja samantataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.062d-0711_02: pratinedur gajāḥ siṃhā vitresuś ca mṛgadvijāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:146.071d-0714_01: dṛṣṭvā cainaṃ mahābāhur ekas tasmin mahāvane
GE07mbh_03_u:146.073c: hanūmāṃś ca mahāsattva īṣad unmīlya locane
GE07mbh_03_u:146.075a: nanu nāma tvayā kāryā dayā bhūteṣu jānatā
