GE07mbh_03_u:161.016d-0832_05: yamasya dhātuḥ savitus tvaṣṭur vaiśravaṇasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:161.016d-0832_07: anujñātas tadā tena kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:161.017a: tataḥ kadā cid dharisaṃprayuktaṃ; mahendravāhaṃ sahasopayātam
GE07mbh_03_u:161.017c: vidyutprabhaṃ prekṣya mahārathānāṃ; harṣo 'rjunaṃ cintayatāṃ babhūva
GE07mbh_03_u:161.018c: babhau maholkeva ghanāntarasthā; śikheva cāgner jvalitā vidhūmā
GE07mbh_03_u:161.019a: tam āsthitaḥ saṃdadṛśe kirīṭī; sragvī varāṇy ābharaṇāni bibhrat
GE07mbh_03_u:161.019c: dhanaṃjayo vajradharaprabhāvaḥ; śriyā jvalan parvatam ājagāma
GE07mbh_03_u:161.020a: sa śailam āsādya kirīṭamālī; mahendravāhād avaruhya tasmāt
GE07mbh_03_u:161.020c: dhaumyasya pādāv abhivādya pūrvam; ajātaśatros tadanantaraṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:161.021a: vṛkodarasyāpi vavanda pādau; mādrīsutābhyām abhivāditaś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:161.021c: sametya kṛṣṇāṃ parisāntvya caināṃ; prahvo 'bhavad bhrātur upahvare saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:161.022a: babhūva teṣāṃ paramaḥ praharṣas; tenāprameyeṇa samāgatānām
GE07mbh_03_u:161.022c: sa cāpi tān prekṣya kirīṭamālī; nananda rājānam abhipraśaṃsan
GE07mbh_03_u:161.023a: yam āsthitaḥ sapta jaghāna pūgān; diteḥ sutānāṃ namucer nihantā
GE07mbh_03_u:161.023c: tam indravāhaṃ samupetya pārthāḥ; pradakṣiṇaṃ cakrur adīnasattvāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:161.024a: te mātaleś cakrur atīva hṛṣṭāḥ; satkāram agryaṃ surarājatulyam
GE07mbh_03_u:161.024c: sarvaṃ yathāvac ca divaukasas tān; papracchur enaṃ kururājaputrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:161.025a: tān apy asau mātalir abhyanandat; piteva putrān anuśiṣya cainān
GE07mbh_03_u:161.026a: gate tu tasmin varadevavāhe; śakrātmajaḥ sarvaripupramāthī
GE07mbh_03_u:161.026c: śakreṇa dattāni dadau mahātmā; mahādhanāny uttamarūpavanti
GE07mbh_03_u:161.027a: tataḥ sa teṣāṃ kurupuṃgavānāṃ; teṣāṃ ca sūryāgnisamaprabhāṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:161.027c: viprarṣabhāṇām upaviśya madhye; sarvaṃ yathāvat kathayāṃ babhūva
GE07mbh_03_u:161.028a: evaṃ mayāstrāṇy upaśikṣitāni; śakrāc ca vātāc ca śivāc ca sākṣāt
GE07mbh_03_u:161.028c: tathaiva śīlena samādhinā ca; prītāḥ surā me sahitāḥ sahendrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:161.029a: saṃkṣepato vai sa viśuddhakarmā; tebhyaḥ samākhyāya divi praveśam
GE07mbh_03_u:161.029c: mādrīsutābhyāṃ sahitaḥ kirīṭī; suṣvāpa tām āvasatiṃ pratītaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:162.001c: babhūva tumulaḥ śabdas tv antarikṣe divaukasām
GE07mbh_03_u:162.002c: pṛthag vyālamṛgāṇāṃ ca pakṣiṇāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:162.005c: āgatya ca sahasrākṣo rathād avaruroha vai
GE07mbh_03_u:162.012a: tvam imāṃ pṛthivīṃ rājan praśāsiṣyasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_03_u:162.012c: svasti prāpnuhi kaunteya kāmyakaṃ punar āśramam
GE07mbh_03_u:162.013a: astrāṇi labdhāni ca pāṇḍavena; sarvāṇi mattaḥ prayatena rājan
GE07mbh_03_u:162.013c: kṛtapriyaś cāsmi dhanaṃjayena; jetuṃ na śakyas tribhir eṣa lokaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:162.015c: śakreṇa ya imaṃ vidvān adhīyīta samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:162.016c: sa jīveta nirābādhaḥ susukhī śaradāṃ śatam
GE07mbh_03_u:163.001a: yathāgataṃ gate śakre bhrātṛbhiḥ saha saṃgataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.003a: katham arjuna kālo 'yaṃ svarge vyatigatas tava
GE07mbh_03_u:163.003c: kathaṃ cāstrāṇy avāptāni devarājaś ca toṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.004a: samyag vā te gṛhītāni kaccid astrāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:163.004c: kaccit surādhipaḥ prīto rudraś cāstrāṇy adāt tava
GE07mbh_03_u:163.005a: yathā dṛṣṭaś ca te śakro bhagavān vā pinākadhṛk
GE07mbh_03_u:163.005c: yathā cāstrāṇy avāptāni yathā cārādhitaś ca te
GE07mbh_03_u:163.006c: kṛtapriyas tvayāsmīti tac ca te kiṃ priyaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:163.006e: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vistareṇa mahādyute
GE07mbh_03_u:163.007a: yathā tuṣṭo mahādevo devarājaś ca te 'nagha
GE07mbh_03_u:163.007c: yac cāpi vajrapāṇes te priyaṃ kṛtam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:163.007e: etad ākhyāhi me sarvam akhilena dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_03_u:163.008a: śṛṇu hanta mahārāja vidhinā yena dṛṣṭavān
GE07mbh_03_u:163.008c: śatakratum ahaṃ devaṃ bhagavantaṃ ca śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_03_u:163.009a: vidyām adhītya tāṃ rājaṃs tvayoktām arimardana
GE07mbh_03_u:163.009c: bhavatā ca samādiṣṭas tapase prasthito vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:163.010a: bhṛgutuṅgam atho gatvā kāmyakād āsthitas tapaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.010c: ekarātroṣitaḥ kaṃ cid apaśyaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pathi
GE07mbh_03_u:163.011a: sa mām apṛcchat kaunteya kvāsi gantā bravīhi me
GE07mbh_03_u:163.012a: sa tathyaṃ mama tac chrutvā brāhmaṇo rājasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:163.012c: apūjayata māṃ rājan prītimāṃś cābhavan mayi
GE07mbh_03_u:163.013a: tato mām abravīt prītas tapa ātiṣṭha bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:163.014a: tato 'haṃ vacanāt tasya girim āruhya śaiśiram
GE07mbh_03_u:163.015a: dvitīyaś cāpi me māso jalaṃ bhakṣayato gataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.016a: ūrdhvabāhuś caturthaṃ tu māsam asmi sthitas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:163.016c: na ca me hīyate prāṇas tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:163.018a: nighnan prothena pṛthivīṃ vilikhaṃś caraṇair api
GE07mbh_03_u:163.018c: saṃmārjañ jaṭhareṇorvīṃ vivartaṃś ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.021a: yugapat tat kirātaś ca vikṛṣya balavad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.021c: abhyājaghne dṛḍhataraṃ kampayann iva me manaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.022a: sa tu mām abravīd rājan mama pūrvaparigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.023a: eṣa te niśitair bāṇair darpaṃ hanmi sthiro bhava
GE07mbh_03_u:163.023c: sa varṣmavān mahākāyas tato mām abhyadhāvata
GE07mbh_03_u:163.024a: tato girim ivātyartham āvṛṇon māṃ mahāśaraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.025c: pratyavidhyam ahaṃ taṃ tu vajrair iva śiloccayam
GE07mbh_03_u:163.026a: tasya tac chatadhā rūpam abhavac ca sahasradhā
GE07mbh_03_u:163.026c: tāni cāsya śarīrāṇi śarair aham atāḍayam
GE07mbh_03_u:163.027c: adṛśyanta mahārāja tāny ahaṃ vyadhamaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.028a: aṇur bṛhacchirā bhūtvā bṛhac cāṇuśirāḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.028c: ekībhūtas tadā rājan so 'bhyavartata māṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_03_u:163.029a: yadābhibhavituṃ bāṇair naiva śaknomi taṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:163.030a: na cainam aśakaṃ hantuṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:163.030c: tasmin pratihate cāstre vismayo me mahān abhūt
GE07mbh_03_u:163.031a: bhūyaś caiva mahārāja saviśeṣam ahaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.032e: jagrāsa prahasaṃs tāni sarvāṇy astrāṇi me 'nagha
GE07mbh_03_u:163.033a: teṣu sarveṣu śānteṣu brahmāstram aham ādiśam
GE07mbh_03_u:163.034c: kṣaṇena hi diśaḥ khaṃ ca sarvato 'bhividīpitam
GE07mbh_03_u:163.035a: tad apy astraṃ mahātejāḥ kṣaṇenaiva vyaśātayat
GE07mbh_03_u:163.035c: brahmāstre tu hate rājan bhayaṃ māṃ mahad āviśat
GE07mbh_03_u:163.036c: sahasābhyahanaṃ bhūtaṃ tāny apy astrāṇy abhakṣayat
GE07mbh_03_u:163.037a: hateṣv astreṣu sarveṣu bhakṣiteṣv āyudheṣu ca
GE07mbh_03_u:163.037c: mama tasya ca bhūtasya bāhuyuddham avartata
GE07mbh_03_u:163.038a: vyāyāmaṃ muṣṭibhiḥ kṛtvā talair api samāhatau
GE07mbh_03_u:163.038c: apātayac ca tad bhūtaṃ niśceṣṭo hy agamaṃ mahīm
GE07mbh_03_u:163.039b-0839_01: tataś cintāṃ samagamaṃ pūjayiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.039b-0839_02: iti puṣpāṇi saṃgṛhya saikataṃ śaṃkaraṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_03_u:163.039b-0839_04: tataś cānyāni puṣpāṇi pūjayiṣyan punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.039b-0839_05: tāni sarvāṇi dṛṣṭvāhaṃ kirātasya ca mūrdhani
GE07mbh_03_u:163.039b-0839_06: iti kṛtvā mahādevaṃ praṇato 'smi punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.040a: evaṃ kṛtvā sa bhagavāṃs tato 'nyad rūpam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.041c: svarūpaṃ divyam āsthāya tasthau tatra maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.043a: sa mām abhyetya samare tathaivābhimukhaṃ sthitam
GE07mbh_03_u:163.044a: tatas tad dhanur ādāya tūṇau cākṣayyasāyakau
GE07mbh_03_u:163.045a: tuṣṭo 'smi tava kaunteya brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_03_u:163.045c: yat te manogataṃ vīra tad brūhi vitarāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:163.045e: amaratvam apāhāya brūhi yat te manogatam
GE07mbh_03_u:163.046c: praṇamya śirasā śarvaṃ tato vacanam ādade
GE07mbh_03_u:163.047a: bhagavān me prasannaś ced īpsito 'yaṃ varo mama
GE07mbh_03_u:163.047c: astrāṇīcchāmy ahaṃ jñātuṃ yāni deveṣu kāni cit
GE07mbh_03_u:163.047e: dadānīty eva bhagavān abravīt tryambakaś ca mām
GE07mbh_03_u:163.048a: raudram astraṃ madīyaṃ tvām upasthāsyati pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_03_u:163.048c: pradadau ca mama prītaḥ so 'straṃ pāśupataṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:163.049a: uvāca ca mahādevo dattvā me 'straṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_03_u:163.049c: na prayojyaṃ bhaved etan mānuṣeṣu kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:163.051c: mūrtiman me sthitaṃ pārśve prasanne govṛṣadhvaje
GE07mbh_03_u:163.053a: anujñātas tv ahaṃ tena tatraiva samupāviśam
GE07mbh_03_u:164.001a: tatas tām avasaṃ prīto rajanīṃ tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:164.002c: apaśyaṃ taṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ dṛṣṭavān asmi yaṃ purā
GE07mbh_03_u:164.003a: tasmai cāhaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ sarvam eva nyavedayam
GE07mbh_03_u:164.004a: sa mām uvāca rājendra prīyamāṇo dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.004c: dṛṣṭas tvayā mahādevo yathā nānyena kena cit
GE07mbh_03_u:164.005c: draṣṭāsy anagha devendraṃ sa ca te 'strāṇi dāsyati
GE07mbh_03_u:164.006a: evam uktvā sa māṃ rājann āśliṣya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.007c: punar navam imaṃ lokaṃ kurvann iva sapatnahan
GE07mbh_03_u:164.008a: divyāni caiva mālyāni sugandhīni navāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:164.010a: gaṇāś cāpsarasāṃ tatra gandharvāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:164.011a: marutāṃ ca gaṇās tatra devayānair upāgaman
GE07mbh_03_u:164.012a: tato marutvān haribhir yuktair vāhaiḥ svalaṃkṛtaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.013a: etasminn eva kāle tu kubero naravāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.013c: darśayām āsa māṃ rājaṃl lakṣmyā paramayā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.015a: te mām ūcur mahārāja sāntvayitvā surarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.018c: atha devā yayuḥ sarve yathāgatam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:164.019a: maghavān api deveśo ratham āruhya suprabham
GE07mbh_03_u:164.019c: uvāca bhagavān vākyaṃ smayann iva surārihā
GE07mbh_03_u:164.020c: ataḥ paraṃ tv ahaṃ vai tvāṃ darśaye bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:164.021a: tvayā hi tīrtheṣu purā samāplāvaḥ kṛto 'sakṛt
GE07mbh_03_u:164.021c: tapaś cedaṃ purā taptaṃ svargaṃ gantāsi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_03_u:164.022a: bhūyaś caiva tu taptavyaṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:164.022d-0842_01: svargas tv avaśyaṃ gantavyas tvayā śatruniṣūdana
GE07mbh_03_u:164.023c: viditas tvaṃ hi devānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_03_u:164.024a: tato 'ham abruvaṃ śakraṃ prasīda bhagavan mama
GE07mbh_03_u:164.025c: yadartham astrāṇīpsus tvaṃ taṃ kāmaṃ pāṇḍavāpnuhi
GE07mbh_03_u:164.026a: tato 'ham abruvaṃ nāhaṃ divyāny astrāṇi śatruhan
GE07mbh_03_u:164.028a: parīkṣārthaṃ mayaitat te vākyam uktaṃ dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_03_u:164.029a: śikṣa me bhavanaṃ gatvā sarvāṇy astrāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:164.030c: vaiṣṇavāni ca sarvāṇi nairṛtāni tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:164.031a: evam uktvā tu māṃ śakras tatraivāntaradhīyata
GE07mbh_03_u:164.031e: divyaṃ māyāmayaṃ puṇyaṃ yattaṃ mātalinā nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:164.032c: draṣṭum icchati śakras tvāṃ devarājo mahādyute
GE07mbh_03_u:164.033a: saṃsiddhas tvaṃ mahābāho kuru kāryam anuttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:164.033c: paśya puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān saśarīro divaṃ vraja
GE07mbh_03_u:164.034a: ity ukto 'haṃ mātalinā girim āmantrya śaiśiram
GE07mbh_03_u:164.036a: avaikṣata ca me vaktraṃ sthitasyātha sa sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.036c: tathā bhrānte rathe rājan vismitaś cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:164.037a: atyadbhutam idaṃ me 'dya vicitraṃ pratibhāti mām
GE07mbh_03_u:164.037c: yad āsthito rathaṃ divyaṃ padā na calito bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:164.039a: tvaṃ punaḥ sthita evātra rathe bhrānte kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_03_u:164.039c: atiśakram idaṃ sattvaṃ taveti pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_03_u:164.040c: darśayām āsa me rājan vimānāni ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:164.040d-0845_01: sa ratho haribhir yukto hy ūrdhvam ācakrame tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.040d-0845_03: tataḥ kāmagamāṃl lokān apaśyaṃ vai surarṣiṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:164.041c: darśayām āsa me prītyā mātaliḥ śakrasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.042c: divyaiḥ kāmaphalair vṛkṣai ratnaiś ca samalaṃkṛtām
GE07mbh_03_u:164.043a: na tāṃ bhāsayate sūryo na śītoṣṇe na ca klamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.043c: rajaḥ paṅko na ca tamas tatrāsti na jarā nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:164.044a: na tatra śoko dainyaṃ vā vaivarṇyaṃ copalakṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:164.044c: divaukasāṃ mahārāja na ca glānir ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:164.045a: na krodhalobhau tatrāstām aśubhaṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:164.045c: nityatuṣṭāś ca hṛṣṭāś ca prāṇinaḥ suraveśmani
GE07mbh_03_u:164.047a: śītas tatra vavau vāyuḥ sugandho jīvanaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.049a: tato 'paśyaṃ vasūn rudrān sādhyāṃś ca samarudgaṇān
GE07mbh_03_u:164.049c: ādityān aśvinau caiva tān sarvān pratyapūjayam
GE07mbh_03_u:164.050a: te māṃ vīryeṇa yaśasā tejasā ca balena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:164.052a: dadāv ardhāsanaṃ prītaḥ śakro me dadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.052c: bahumānāc ca gātrāṇi pasparśa mama vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.054a: viśvāvasoś ca me putraś citraseno 'bhavat sakhā
GE07mbh_03_u:164.054c: sa ca gāndharvam akhilaṃ grāhayām āsa māṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:164.056a: śṛṇvan vai gītaśabdaṃ ca tūryaśabdaṃ ca puṣkalam
GE07mbh_03_u:164.057a: tat sarvam anavajñāya tathyaṃ vijjñāya bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:164.058a: tato 'tuṣyat sahasrākṣas tena kāmena me vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:164.058c: evaṃ me vasato rājann eṣa kālo 'tyagād divi
GE07mbh_03_u:165.001c: saṃspṛśya mūrdhni pāṇibhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:165.002a: na tvam adya yudhā jetuṃ śakyaḥ suragaṇair api
GE07mbh_03_u:165.002c: kiṃ punar mānuṣe loke mānuṣair akṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:165.002f-0846_01: ajeyas tvaṃ hi saṃgrāme sarvair api surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:165.003c: astrayuddhe samo vīra na te kaś cid bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:165.004c: brahmaṇyaś cāstravic cāsi śūraś cāsi kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_03_u:165.005a: astrāṇi samavāptāni tvayā daśa ca pañca ca
GE07mbh_03_u:165.005c: pañcabhir vidhibhiḥ pārtha na tvayā vidyate samaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:165.006c: prāyaścittaṃ ca vettha tvaṃ pratighātaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:165.007c: pratijānīṣva taṃ kartum ato vetsyāmy ahaṃ param
GE07mbh_03_u:165.008a: tato 'ham abruvaṃ rājan devarājam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:165.008c: viṣahyaṃ cen mayā kartuṃ kṛtam eva nibodha tat
GE07mbh_03_u:165.009a: tato mām abravīd rājan prahasya balavṛtrahā
GE07mbh_03_u:165.009c: nāviṣahyaṃ tavādyāsti triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:165.011c: tāṃs tatra jahi kaunteya gurvarthas te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:165.012c: hayair upetaṃ prādān me rathaṃ divyaṃ mahāprabham
GE07mbh_03_u:165.013a: babandha caiva me mūrdhni kirīṭam idam uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:165.014c: ajarāṃ jyām imāṃ cāpi gāṇḍīve samayojayat
GE07mbh_03_u:165.015a: tataḥ prāyām ahaṃ tena syandanena virājatā
GE07mbh_03_u:165.016a: tato devāḥ sarva eva tena ghoṣeṇa bodhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:165.016c: manvānā devarājaṃ māṃ samājagmur viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:165.016e: dṛṣṭvā ca mām apṛcchanta kiṃ kariṣyasi phalguna
GE07mbh_03_u:165.017a: tān abruvaṃ yathābhūtam idaṃ kartāsmi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_03_u:165.018a: tuṣṭuvur māṃ prasannās te yathā devaṃ puraṃdaram
GE07mbh_03_u:165.019a: bahūni ca sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:165.020a: tvam apy etena kaunteya nivātakavacān raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:165.020c: vijetā yudhi vikramya pureva maghavān vaśī
GE07mbh_03_u:165.021a: ayaṃ ca śaṅkhapravaro yena jetāsi dānavān
GE07mbh_03_u:166.001a: tato 'haṃ stūyamānas tu tatra tatra maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:166.002a: phenavatyaḥ prakīrṇāś ca saṃhatāś ca samucchritāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:166.002c: ūrmayaś cātra dṛśyante calanta iva parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:166.003c: makarāś cātra dṛśyante jale magnā ivādrayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:166.004a: śaṅkhānāṃ ca sahasrāṇi magnāny apsu samantataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:166.004c: dṛśyante sma yathā rātrau tārās tanv abhrasaṃvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:166.005a: tathā sahasraśas tatra ratnasaṃghāḥ plavanty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:166.005c: vāyuś ca ghūrṇate bhīmas tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:166.007b-0849_01: rathaṃ taṃ tu samāśliṣya prādravad rathayogavit
GE07mbh_03_u:166.008a: rathaghoṣaṃ tu taṃ śrutvā stanayitnor ivāmbare
GE07mbh_03_u:166.010c: saṃvidhāya pure rakṣāṃ na sma kaś cana dṛśyate
GE07mbh_03_u:166.011c: puram āsuram āśliṣya prādhamaṃ taṃ śanair aham
GE07mbh_03_u:166.012a: sa tu śabdo divaṃ stabdhvā pratiśabdam ajījanat
GE07mbh_03_u:166.012c: vitresuś ca nililyuś ca bhūtāni sumahānty api
GE07mbh_03_u:166.014a: āyasaiś ca mahāśūlair gadābhir musalair api
GE07mbh_03_u:166.014c: paṭṭiśaiḥ karavālaiś ca rathacakraiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:166.016a: tato vicārya bahudhā rathamārgeṣu tān hayān
GE07mbh_03_u:166.017c: nānvapaśyaṃ tadā kiṃ cit tan me 'dbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:166.018a: tatas te dānavās tatra yodhavrātāny anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:166.020a: tato vegena mahatā dānavā mām upādravan
GE07mbh_03_u:166.021a: sa saṃprahāras tumulas teṣāṃ mama ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:166.022a: tato devarṣayaś caiva dānavarṣigaṇāś ca ye
GE07mbh_03_u:166.022c: brahmarṣayaś ca siddhāś ca samājagmur mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_03_u:166.023a: te vai mām anurūpābhir madhurābhir jayaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.002c: āvṛtya sarvatas te māṃ śaravarṣair avākiran
GE07mbh_03_u:167.003c: śūlāni ca bhuśuṇḍīś ca mumucur dānavā mayi
GE07mbh_03_u:167.006a: tān ahaṃ vividhair bāṇair vegavadbhir ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.006e: te kṛtā vimukhāḥ sarve matprayuktaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.007a: tato mātalinā tūrṇaṃ hayās te saṃpracoditāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.008a: śataṃ śatās te harayas tasmin yuktā mahārathe
GE07mbh_03_u:167.008c: tadā mātalinā yattā vyacarann alpakā iva
GE07mbh_03_u:167.009c: mama bāṇanipātaiś ca hatās te śataśo 'surāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.011a: te diśo vidiśaḥ sarvāḥ pratirudhya prahāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.011c: nighnanti vividhaiḥ śastrais tato me vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.012c: aśvāṃs tathā vegavato yad ayatnād adhārayat
GE07mbh_03_u:167.013a: tato 'haṃ laghubhiś citrair astrais tān asurān raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:167.014a: evaṃ me caratas tatra sarvayatnena śatruhan
GE07mbh_03_u:167.015a: vadhyamānās tatas te tu hayais tena rathena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:167.015c: agaman prakṣayaṃ ke cin nyavartanta tathāpare
GE07mbh_03_u:167.016d-0850_02: jvaladbhiḥ paramaiḥ śīghrais tān avidhyaṃ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.020a: tataḥ khaḍgāṃs triśūlāṃś ca tomarāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.020c: astravīryeṇa śatadhā tair muktān aham acchinam
GE07mbh_03_u:167.021a: chittvā praharaṇāny eṣāṃ tatas tān api sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.021c: pratyavidhyam ahaṃ roṣād daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.022a: gāṇḍīvād dhi tadā saṃkhye yathā bhramarapaṅktayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.022c: niṣpatanti tathā bāṇās tan mātalir apūjayat
GE07mbh_03_u:167.023a: teṣām api tu bāṇās te bahutvāc chalabhā iva
GE07mbh_03_u:167.023c: avākiran māṃ balavat tān ahaṃ vyadhamaṃ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.024a: vadhyamānās tatas te tu nivātakavacāḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.025c: jvaladbhiḥ paramaiḥ śīghrais tān avidhyaṃ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:167.026a: teṣāṃ chinnāni gātrāṇi visṛjanti sma śoṇitam
GE07mbh_03_u:167.027c: madbāṇair vadhyamānās te samudvignāḥ sma dānavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:168.001c: nagamātrair mahāghorais tan māṃ dṛḍham apīḍayat
GE07mbh_03_u:168.005c: āvṛṇvan sarvato vyoma diśaś copadiśas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:168.006a: dhārāṇāṃ ca nipātena vāyor visphūrjitena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:168.006c: garjitena ca daityānāṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:168.007a: dhārā divi ca saṃbaddhā vasudhāyāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:168.008c: dīptaṃ prāhiṇavaṃ ghoram aśuṣyat tena taj jalam
GE07mbh_03_u:168.009a: hate 'śmavarṣe tu mayā jalavarṣe ca śoṣite
GE07mbh_03_u:168.009c: mumucur dānavā māyām agniṃ vāyuṃ ca mānada
GE07mbh_03_u:168.010c: śailena ca mahāstreṇa vāyor vegam adhārayam
GE07mbh_03_u:168.013a: sā tu māyāmayī vṛṣṭiḥ pīḍayām āsa māṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_03_u:168.013c: atha ghoraṃ tamas tīvraṃ prādurāsīt samantataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:168.014a: tamasā saṃvṛte loke ghoreṇa paruṣeṇa ca
GE07mbh_03_u:168.014c: turagā vimukhāś cāsan prāskhalac cāpi mātaliḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:168.015a: hastād dhiraṇmayaś cāsya pratodaḥ prāpatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:168.015c: asakṛc cāha māṃ bhītaḥ kvāsīti bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:168.016a: māṃ ca bhīr āviśat tīvrā tasmin vigatacetasi
GE07mbh_03_u:168.016c: sa ca māṃ vigatajñānaḥ saṃtrasta idam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:168.017a: surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE07mbh_03_u:168.017c: amṛtārthe purā pārtha sa ca dṛṣṭo mayānagha
GE07mbh_03_u:168.018a: śambarasya vadhe cāpi saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE07mbh_03_u:168.019a: tathaiva vṛtrasya vadhe saṃgṛhītā hayā mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:168.019c: vairocaner mayā yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ cāpi sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:168.021c: na hi yuddham idaṃ yuktam anyatra jagataḥ kṣayāt
GE07mbh_03_u:168.022a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_03_u:168.023a: abruvaṃ mātaliṃ bhītaṃ paśya me bhujayor balam
GE07mbh_03_u:168.023c: astrāṇāṃ ca prabhāvaṃ me dhanuṣo gāṇḍivasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:168.024c: vinihanmi tamaś cograṃ mā bhaiḥ sūta sthiro bhava
GE07mbh_03_u:168.027a: punaḥ prakāśam abhavat tamasā grasyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:168.027c: vrajaty adarśanaṃ lokaḥ punar apsu nimajjati
GE07mbh_03_u:168.029c: tān ahaṃ vivaraṃ dṛṣṭvā prāhiṇvaṃ yamasādanam
GE07mbh_03_u:168.029d-0853_01: tathā devair avadhyatvaṃ purasyābhedyatvam eva tu
GE07mbh_03_u:169.001a: adṛśyamānās te daityā yodhayanti sma māyayā
GE07mbh_03_u:169.001c: adṛśyān astravīryeṇa tān apy aham ayodhayam
GE07mbh_03_u:169.002c: acchindann uttamāṅgāni yatra yatra sma te 'bhavan
GE07mbh_03_u:169.003c: saṃhṛtya māyāṃ sahasā prāviśan puram ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:169.005c: kūṭaśaḥ sma pradṛśyante gātrāṇi kavacāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:169.006a: hayānāṃ nāntaraṃ hy āsīt padād vicalituṃ padam
GE07mbh_03_u:169.008c: nyagṛhṇan dānavā ghorā rathacakre ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:169.009a: vinigṛhya harīn aśvān rathaṃ ca mama yudhyataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:169.010c: sa deśo yatra vartāma guheva samapadyata
GE07mbh_03_u:169.011c: agacchaṃ paramām ārtiṃ mātalis tad alakṣayat
GE07mbh_03_u:169.012a: lakṣayitvā tu māṃ bhītam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:169.012c: arjunārjuna mā bhais tvaṃ vajram astram udīraya
GE07mbh_03_u:169.013a: tato 'haṃ tasya tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vajram udīrayam
GE07mbh_03_u:169.014a: acalaṃ sthānam āsādya gāṇḍīvam anumantrya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:169.015a: tato māyāś ca tāḥ sarvā nivātakavacāṃś ca tān
GE07mbh_03_u:169.018c: samācchādyata deśaḥ sa vikīrṇair iva parvataiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:169.019a: na hayānāṃ kṣatiḥ kā cin na rathasya na mātaleḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:169.019c: mama cādṛśyata tadā tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:169.020a: tato māṃ prahasan rājan mātaliḥ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_03_u:169.020c: naitad arjuna deveṣu tvayi vīryaṃ yadīkṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:169.021a: hateṣv asurasaṃgheṣu dārās teṣāṃ tu sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:169.021c: prākrośan nagare tasmin yathā śaradi lakṣmaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:169.022a: tato mātalinā sārdham ahaṃ tat puram abhyayām
GE07mbh_03_u:169.023c: rathaṃ ca ravisaṃkāśaṃ prādravan gaṇaśaḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:169.024c: śilānām iva śaileṣu patantīnām abhūt tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:169.025a: vitrastā daityanāryas tāḥ svāni veśmāny athāviśan
GE07mbh_03_u:169.026a: tad adbhutākāram ahaṃ dṛṣṭvā nagaram uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:169.027a: idam evaṃvidhaṃ kasmād devatā nāviśanty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:169.028a: āsīd idaṃ purā pārtha devarājasya naḥ puram
GE07mbh_03_u:169.029a: tapas taptvā mahat tīvraṃ prasādya ca pitāmaham
GE07mbh_03_u:169.029c: idaṃ vṛtaṃ nivāsāya devebhyaś cābhayaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_03_u:169.031a: tata ukto bhagavatā diṣṭam atreti vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:169.032a: tata eṣāṃ vadhārthāya śakro 'strāṇi dadau tava
GE07mbh_03_u:169.032c: na hi śakyāḥ surair hantuṃ ya ete nihatās tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:169.033a: kālasya pariṇāmena tatas tvam iha bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:169.033c: eṣām antakaraḥ prāptas tat tvayā ca kṛtaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:169.034c: grāhitas tvaṃ mahendreṇa puruṣendra tad uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:169.035a: tataḥ praviśya nagaraṃ dānavāṃś ca nihatya tān
GE07mbh_03_u:169.035c: punar mātalinā sārdham agacchaṃ devasadma tat
GE07mbh_03_u:170.002a: drumai ratnamayaiś caitrair bhāsvaraiś ca patatribhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.005a: tad ahaṃ prekṣya daityānāṃ puram adbhutadarśanam
GE07mbh_03_u:170.005c: apṛcchaṃ mātaliṃ rājan kim idaṃ dṛśyateti vai
GE07mbh_03_u:170.006a: pulomā nāma daiteyī kālakā ca mahāsurī
GE07mbh_03_u:170.006c: divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ te ceratuḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.006e: tapaso 'nte tatas tābhyāṃ svayambhūr adadād varam
GE07mbh_03_u:170.007a: agṛhṇītāṃ varaṃ te tu sutānām alpaduḥkhatām
GE07mbh_03_u:170.010a: tad etat khacaraṃ divyaṃ caraty amaravarjitam
GE07mbh_03_u:170.011a: hiraṇyapuram ity etat khyāyate nagaraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:170.011c: rakṣitaṃ kālakeyaiś ca paulomaiś ca mahāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.012a: ta ete muditā nityam avadhyāḥ sarvadaivataiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.012e: mānuṣo mṛtyur eteṣāṃ nirdiṣṭo brahmaṇā purā
GE07mbh_03_u:170.012f-0855_01: etān api raṇe pārtha kālakañjān durāsadān
GE07mbh_03_u:170.013a: surāsurair avadhyāṃs tān ahaṃ jñātvā tataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:170.013c: abruvaṃ mātaliṃ hṛṣṭo yāhy etat puram añjasā
GE07mbh_03_u:170.014a: tridaśeśadviṣo yāvat kṣayam astrair nayāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:170.014c: na kathaṃ cid dhi me pāpā na vadhyā ye suradviṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.015a: uvāha māṃ tataḥ śīghraṃ hiraṇyapuram antikāt
GE07mbh_03_u:170.019a: vyāmohayaṃ ca tān sarvān rathamārgaiś caran raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:170.021a: te vadhyamānā daiteyāḥ puram āsthāya tat punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.021c: kham utpetuḥ sanagarā māyām āsthāya dānavīm
GE07mbh_03_u:170.022c: mārgam āvṛtya daityānāṃ gatiṃ caiṣām avārayam
GE07mbh_03_u:170.023a: tat puraṃ khacaraṃ divyaṃ kāmagaṃ divyavarcasam
GE07mbh_03_u:170.024c: punas tiryak prayāty āśu punar apsu nimajjati
GE07mbh_03_u:170.026c: nyagṛhṇaṃ saha daiteyais tat puraṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:170.027c: mahīm abhyapatad rājan prabhagnaṃ puram āsuram
GE07mbh_03_u:170.029a: tato mātalir apy āśu purastān nipatann iva
GE07mbh_03_u:170.031a: tān ahaṃ niśitair bāṇair vyadhamaṃ gārdhravājitaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.032a: neme śakyā mānuṣeṇa yuddheneti pracintya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:170.033c: astrāṇi mama divyāni pratyaghnañ śanakair iva
GE07mbh_03_u:170.036a: ahaṃ tu śaravarṣais tān astrapramuditai raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:170.036c: nāśaknuvaṃ pīḍayituṃ te tu māṃ paryapīḍayan
GE07mbh_03_u:170.037a: taiḥ pīḍyamāno bahubhiḥ kṛtāstraiḥ kuśalair yudhi
GE07mbh_03_u:170.037c: vyathito 'smi mahāyuddhe bhayaṃ cāgān mahan mama
GE07mbh_03_u:170.037d-0856_03: na vadhyante mahāghorais tattvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.037d-0856_04: sa mām uvāca paryāptas tvam eṣāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:170.037d-0856_06: etac chrutvā tu rājendra saṃprahṛṣṭas tam ūcivān
GE07mbh_03_u:170.037d-0856_07: nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ paśya caitān nipātitān
GE07mbh_03_u:170.037d-0856_08: evam ukto rathaṃ tatra mātaliḥ paryavartayat
GE07mbh_03_u:170.037d-0856_09: tato matvā raṇe bhagnaṃ dānavāḥ pratiharṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.037d-0856_11: abhagnaḥ kaiś cid apy eṣa pāṇḍavo raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_03_u:170.037d-0856_12: asmābhiḥ samare bhagna ity evaṃ saṃghaśas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:170.038c: svasti bhūtebhya ity uktvā mahāstraṃ samayojayam
GE07mbh_03_u:170.038e: yat tad raudram iti khyātaṃ sarvāmitravināśanam
GE07mbh_03_u:170.040a: vibhīs tatas tad astraṃ tu ghoraṃ raudraṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_03_u:170.042a: muktamātre tatas tasmin rūpāṇy āsan sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.042c: mṛgāṇām atha siṃhānāṃ vyāghrāṇāṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:170.042e: ṛkṣāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca pannagānāṃ tathā gavām
GE07mbh_03_u:170.043a: gajānāṃ sṛmarāṇāṃ ca śarabhāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.044a: gṛdhrāṇāṃ garuḍānāṃ ca makarāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:170.044b-0862_01: vṛkṣāṇāṃ parvatānāṃ ca samudrāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:170.044b-0863_01: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca gandharvāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.045a: guhyakānāṃ ca saṃgrāme nairṛtānāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:170.047a: etaiś cānyaiś ca bahubhir nānārūpadharais tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:170.047c: sarvam āsīj jagad vyāptaṃ tasminn astre visarjite
GE07mbh_03_u:170.048e: abhīkṣṇaṃ vadhyamānās te dānavā ye samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.052a: tad asahyaṃ kṛtaṃ karma devair api durāsadam
GE07mbh_03_u:170.052c: dṛṣṭvā māṃ pūjayām āsa mātaliḥ śakrasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.053b-0864_01: hatāṃs tān dānavān dṛṣṭvā mayā saṃkhye sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.053c: surāsurair asahyaṃ hi karma yat sādhitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:170.053e: na hy etat saṃyuge kartum api śaktaḥ sureśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.053f-0865_01: dhruvaṃ dhanaṃjaya prītas tvayi śakraḥ purārdana
GE07mbh_03_u:170.054a: surāsurair avadhyaṃ hi puram etat khagaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:170.055a: vidhvaste 'tha pure tasmin dānaveṣu hateṣu ca
GE07mbh_03_u:170.055c: vinadantyaḥ striyaḥ sarvā niṣpetur nagarād bahiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.056b-0866_01: kurarya iva vāśantyo duḥkhitāś ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.056c: petuḥ putrān pitṝn bhrātṝñ śocamānā mahītale
GE07mbh_03_u:170.060a: māṃ tu saṃhṛṣṭamanasaṃ kṣipraṃ mātalir ānayat
GE07mbh_03_u:170.062a: mama karma ca devendraṃ mātalir vistareṇa tat
GE07mbh_03_u:170.062c: sarvaṃ viśrāvayām āsa yathā bhūtaṃ mahādyute
GE07mbh_03_u:170.064a: tac chrutvā bhagavān prītaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.064c: marudbhiḥ sahitaḥ śrīmān sādhu sādhv ity athābravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:170.064d-0868_01: pariṣvajya ca māṃ premṇā mūrdhny upāghrāya sasmitam
GE07mbh_03_u:170.065a: tato māṃ devarājo vai samāśvāsya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.065c: abravīd vibudhaiḥ sārdham idaṃ sumadhuraṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:170.066a: atidevāsuraṃ karma kṛtam etat tvayā raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:170.066c: gurvarthaś ca mahān pārtha kṛtaḥ śatrūn ghnatā mama
GE07mbh_03_u:170.067a: evam eva sadā bhāvyaṃ sthireṇājau dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_03_u:171.002a: divyāny astrāṇi sarvāṇi tvayi tiṣṭhanti bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:171.002c: na tvābhibhavituṃ śakto mānuṣo bhuvi kaś cana
GE07mbh_03_u:171.003a: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇaḥ śakuniḥ saha rājabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:171.003c: saṃgrāmasthasya te putra kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm
GE07mbh_03_u:171.004a: idaṃ ca me tanutrāṇaṃ prāyacchan maghavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:171.004c: abhedyaṃ kavacaṃ divyaṃ srajaṃ caiva hiraṇmayīm
GE07mbh_03_u:171.005a: devadattaṃ ca me śaṅkhaṃ devaḥ prādān mahāravam
GE07mbh_03_u:171.005c: divyaṃ cedaṃ kirīṭaṃ me svayam indro yuyoja ha
GE07mbh_03_u:171.006a: tato divyāni vastrāṇi divyāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:171.006c: prādāc chakro mamaitāni rucirāṇi bṛhanti ca
GE07mbh_03_u:171.007a: evaṃ saṃpūjitas tatra sukham asmy uṣito nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:171.008a: tato mām abravīc chakraḥ prītimān amaraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:171.008c: samayo 'rjuna gantuṃ te bhrātaro hi smaranti te
GE07mbh_03_u:171.009a: evam indrasya bhavane pañca varṣāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:171.009c: uṣitāni mayā rājan smaratā dyūtajaṃ kalim
GE07mbh_03_u:171.011c: diṣṭyā cārādhito rājā devānām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:171.012a: diṣṭyā ca bhagavān sthāṇur devyā saha paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_03_u:171.012c: sākṣād dṛṣṭaḥ suyuddhena toṣitaś ca tvayānagha
GE07mbh_03_u:171.013a: diṣṭyā ca lokapālais tvaṃ sameto bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:171.014a: adya kṛtsnām imāṃ devīṃ vijitāṃ puramālinīm
GE07mbh_03_u:171.014b-0869_01: paśyāmi bhūmiṃ kaunteya tvayā me pratipāditām
GE07mbh_03_u:171.014c: manye ca dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrān api vaśīkṛtān
GE07mbh_03_u:171.015a: tāni tv icchāmi te draṣṭuṃ divyāny astrāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:171.015c: yais tathā vīryavantas te nivātakavacā hatā
GE07mbh_03_u:171.016a: śvaḥ prabhāte bhavān draṣṭā divyāny astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:171.017c: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvai rajanīṃ tām uvāsa ha
GE07mbh_03_u:172.002c: darśayāstrāṇi kaunteya yair jitā dānavās tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:172.003a: tato dhanaṃjayo rājan devair dattāni pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:172.003c: astrāṇi tāni divyāni darśayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:172.005c: dhanur ādāya gāṇḍīvaṃ devadattaṃ ca vārijam
GE07mbh_03_u:172.007a: atha prayokṣyamāṇena divyāny astrāṇi tena vai
GE07mbh_03_u:172.008a: kṣubhitāḥ saritaś caiva tathaiva ca mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:172.008c: śailāś cāpi vyaśīryanta na vavau ca samīraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:172.009a: na babhāse sahasrāṃśur na jajvāla ca pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:172.009c: na vedāḥ pratibhānti sma dvijātīnāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:172.011c: dahyamānās tadāstrais tair yācanti sma dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_03_u:172.012a: tato brahmarṣayaś caiva siddhāś caiva surarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:172.013a: rājarṣayaś ca pravarās tathaiva ca divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:172.014a: tataḥ pitāmahaś caiva lokapālāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:172.015a: tato vāyur mahārāja divyair mālyaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:172.016a: jaguś ca gāthā vividhā gandharvāḥ suracoditāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:172.016c: nanṛtuḥ saṃghaśaś caiva rājann apsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:172.017a: tasmiṃs tu tumule kāle nāradaḥ suracoditaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:172.017c: āgamyāha vacaḥ pārthaṃ śravaṇīyam idaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:172.018a: arjunārjuna mā yuṅkṣva divyāny astrāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:172.019a: adhiṣṭhāne na vānārtaḥ prayuñjīta kadā cana
GE07mbh_03_u:172.019c: prayoge sumahān doṣo hy astrāṇāṃ kurunandana
GE07mbh_03_u:172.021c: bhavanti sma vināśāya maivaṃ bhūyaḥ kṛthāḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:172.022a: ajātaśatro tvaṃ caiva drakṣyase tāni saṃyuge
GE07mbh_03_u:172.023a: nivāryātha tataḥ pārthaṃ sarve devā yathāgatam
GE07mbh_03_u:172.023c: jagmur anye ca ye tatra samājagmur nararṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:172.024c: tasminn eva vane hṛṣṭās ta ūṣuḥ saha kṛṣṇayā
GE07mbh_03_u:173.001a: tasmin kṛtāstre rathināṃ pradhāne; pratyāgate bhavanād vṛtrahantuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.001c: ataḥ paraṃ kim akurvanta pārthāḥ; sametya śūreṇa dhanaṃjayena
GE07mbh_03_u:173.002a: vaneṣu teṣv eva tu te narendrāḥ; sahārjunenendrasamena vīrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.002c: tasmiṃś ca śailapravare suramye; dhaneśvarākrīḍagatā vijahruḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.003a: veśmāni tāny apratimāni paśyan; krīḍāś ca nānādrumasaṃnikarṣāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.003c: cacāra dhanvī bahudhā narendraḥ; so 'streṣu yattaḥ satataṃ kirīṭī
GE07mbh_03_u:173.004a: avāpya vāsaṃ naradevaputrāḥ; prasādajaṃ vaiśravaṇasya rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.004c: na prāṇināṃ te spṛhayanti rājañ; śivaś ca kālaḥ sa babhūva teṣām
GE07mbh_03_u:173.005a: sametya pārthena yathaikarātram; ūṣuḥ samās tatra tadā catasraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.005c: pūrvāś ca ṣaṭ tā daśa pāṇḍavānāṃ; śivā babhūvur vasatāṃ vaneṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:173.006a: tato 'bravīd vāyusutas tarasvī; jiṣṇuś ca rājānam upopaviśya
GE07mbh_03_u:173.006c: yamau ca vīrau surarājakalpāv; ekāntam āsthāya hitaṃ priyaṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:173.007a: tava pratijñāṃ kururāja satyāṃ; cikīrṣamāṇās tvadanu priyaṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:173.007c: tato 'nugacchāma vanāny apāsya; suyodhanaṃ sānucaraṃ nihantum
GE07mbh_03_u:173.008a: ekādaśaṃ varṣam idaṃ vasāmaḥ; suyodhanenāttasukhāḥ sukhārhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.009a: tavājñayā pārthiva nirviśaṅkā; vihāya mānaṃ vicaran vanāni
GE07mbh_03_u:173.009c: samīpavāsena vilobhitās te; jñāsyanti nāsmān apakṛṣṭadeśān
GE07mbh_03_u:173.010a: saṃvatsaraṃ taṃ tu vihṛtya gūḍhaṃ; narādhamaṃ taṃ sukham uddharema
GE07mbh_03_u:173.010c: niryātya vairaṃ saphalaṃ sapuṣpaṃ; tasmai narendrādhamapūruṣāya
GE07mbh_03_u:173.011a: suyodhanāyānucarair vṛtāya; tato mahīm āhara dharmarāja
GE07mbh_03_u:173.011c: svargopamaṃ śailam imaṃ caradbhiḥ; śakyo vihantuṃ naradeva śokaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.012a: kīrtiś ca te bhārata puṇyagandhā; naśyeta lokeṣu carācareṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:173.012c: tat prāpya rājyaṃ kurupuṃgavānāṃ; śakyaṃ mahat prāptam atha kriyāś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:173.013a: idaṃ tu śakyaṃ satataṃ narendra; prāptuṃ tvayā yal labhase kuberāt
GE07mbh_03_u:173.013c: kuruṣva buddhiṃ dviṣatāṃ vadhāya; kṛtāgasāṃ bhārata nigrahe ca
GE07mbh_03_u:173.014a: tejas tavograṃ na saheta rājan; sametya sākṣād api vajrapāṇiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.014c: na hi vyathāṃ jātu kariṣyatas tau; sametya devair api dharmarāja
GE07mbh_03_u:173.015a: tvadarthasiddhyartham abhipravṛttau; suparṇaketuś ca śineś ca naptā
GE07mbh_03_u:173.015c: yathaiva kṛṣṇo 'pratimo balena; tathaiva rājan sa śinipravīraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.016a: tavārthasiddhyartham abhipravṛttau; yathaiva kṛṣṇaḥ saha yādavais taiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.016c: tathaiva cāvāṃ naradevavarya; yamau ca vīrau kṛtinau prayoge
GE07mbh_03_u:173.017a: tatas tad ājñāya mataṃ mahātmā; teṣāṃ sa dharmasya suto variṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.018a: āmantrya veśmāni nadīḥ sarāṃsi; sarvāṇi rakṣāṃsi ca dharmarājaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.018c: yathāgataṃ mārgam avekṣamāṇaḥ; punar giriṃ caiva nirīkṣamāṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:173.019a: samāptakarmā sahitaḥ suhṛdbhir; jitvā sapatnān pratilabhya rājyam
GE07mbh_03_u:173.019c: śailendra bhūyas tapase dhṛtātmā; draṣṭā tavāsmīti matiṃ cakāra
GE07mbh_03_u:173.020a: vṛtaḥ sa sarvair anujair dvijaiś ca; tenaiva mārgeṇa patiḥ kurūṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:173.020c: uvāha cainān sagaṇāṃs tathaiva; ghaṭotkacaḥ parvatanirjhareṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:173.021a: tān prasthitān prītimanā maharṣiḥ; piteva putrān anuśiṣya sarvān
GE07mbh_03_u:173.021c: sa lomaśaḥ prītamanā jagāma; divaukasāṃ puṇyatamaṃ nivāsam
GE07mbh_03_u:173.022c: mahānti cānyāni sarāṃsi pārthāḥ; saṃpaśyamānāḥ prayayur narāgryāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.001a: nagottamaṃ prasravaṇair upetaṃ; diśāṃ gajaiḥ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:174.001c: sukhaṃ nivāsaṃ jahatāṃ hi teṣāṃ; na prītir āsīd bharatarṣabhāṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:174.002a: tatas tu teṣāṃ punar eva harṣaḥ; kailāsam ālokya mahān babhūva
GE07mbh_03_u:174.003c: bahūn prapātāṃś ca samīkṣya vīrāḥ; sthalāni nimnāni ca tatra tatra
GE07mbh_03_u:174.004c: ālokayanto 'bhiyayuḥ pratītās; te dhanvinaḥ khaḍgadharā narāgryāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.005a: vanāni ramyāṇi sarāṃsi nadyo; guhā girīṇāṃ girigahvarāṇi
GE07mbh_03_u:174.005c: ete nivāsāḥ satataṃ babhūvur; niśāniśaṃ prāpya nararṣabhāṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:174.006a: te durgavāsaṃ bahudhā niruṣya; vyatītya kailāsam acintyarūpam
GE07mbh_03_u:174.006c: āsedur atyarthamanoramaṃ vai; tam āśramāgryaṃ vṛṣaparvaṇas te
GE07mbh_03_u:174.007a: sametya rājñā vṛṣaparvaṇas te; pratyarcitās tena ca vītamohāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.007c: śaśaṃsire vistaraśaḥ pravāsaṃ; śivaṃ yathāvad vṛṣaparvaṇas te
GE07mbh_03_u:174.008a: sukhoṣitās tatra ta ekarātraṃ; puṇyāśrame devamaharṣijuṣṭe
GE07mbh_03_u:174.008c: abhyāyayus te badarīṃ viśālāṃ; sukhena vīrāḥ punar eva vāsam
GE07mbh_03_u:174.009a: ūṣus tatas tatra mahānubhāvā; nārāyaṇasthānagatā narāgryāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.010a: tāṃ cātha dṛṣṭvā nalinīṃ viśokāḥ; pāṇḍoḥ sutāḥ sarvanarapravīrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.010c: te remire nandanavāsam etya; dvijarṣayo vītabhayā yathaiva
GE07mbh_03_u:174.011a: tataḥ krameṇopayayur nṛvīrā; yathāgatenaiva pathā samagrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.011c: vihṛtya māsaṃ sukhino badaryāṃ; kirātarājño viṣayaṃ subāhoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.012a: cīnāṃs tukhārān daradān sadārvān; deśān kuṇindasya ca bhūriratnān
GE07mbh_03_u:174.012c: atītya durgaṃ himavatpradeśaṃ; puraṃ subāhor dadṛśur nṛvīrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.013a: śrutvā ca tān pārthivaputrapautrān; prāptān subāhur viṣaye samagrān
GE07mbh_03_u:174.013c: pratyudyayau prītiyutaḥ sa rājā; taṃ cābhyanandan vṛṣabhāḥ kurūṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:174.014a: sametya rājñā tu subāhunā te; sūtair viśokapramukhaiś ca sarvaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.014c: sahendrasenaiḥ paricārakaiś ca; paurogavair ye ca mahānasasthāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.015a: sukhoṣitās tatra ta ekarātraṃ; sūtān upādāya rathāṃś ca sarvān
GE07mbh_03_u:174.015c: ghaṭotkacaṃ sānucaraṃ visṛjya; tato 'bhyayur yāmunam adrirājam
GE07mbh_03_u:174.016c: viśākhayūpaṃ samupetya cakrus; tadā nivāsaṃ puruṣapravīrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.017c: śivena yātvā mṛgayāpradhānāḥ; saṃvatsaraṃ tatra vane vijahruḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.019a: dvīpo 'bhavad yatra vṛkodarasya; yudhiṣṭhiro dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.019c: amokṣayad yas tam anantatejā; grāheṇa saṃveṣṭitasarvagātram
GE07mbh_03_u:174.020a: te dvādaśaṃ varṣam athopayāntaṃ; vane vihartuṃ kuravaḥ pratītāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.020c: tasmād vanāc caitrarathaprakāśāc; chriyā jvalantas tapasā ca yuktāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.021a: tataś ca yātvā marudhanvapārśvaṃ; sadā dhanurvedaratipradhānāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.021c: sarasvatīm etya nivāsakāmāḥ; saras tato dvaitavanaṃ pratīyuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.022a: samīkṣya tān dvaitavane niviṣṭān; nivāsinas tatra tato 'bhijagmuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.023a: plakṣākṣarauhītakavetasāś ca; snuhā badaryaḥ khadirāḥ śirīṣāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:174.024c: sarasvatīṃ prītiyutāś carantaḥ; sukhaṃ vijahrur naradevaputrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:175.001c: bhayam āhārayat tīvraṃ tasmād ajagarān mune
GE07mbh_03_u:175.003c: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_03_u:175.006a: sa dadarśa śubhān deśān girer himavatas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:175.007c: kokilair bhṛṅgarājaiś ca tatra tatra vināditān
GE07mbh_03_u:175.011c: vidhyan mṛgāñ śaraiḥ śuddhaiś cacāra sumahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:175.011d-018_0001: bhīmasenas tu vikhyāto mahāntaṃ daṃṣṭriṇaṃ balāt
GE07mbh_03_u:175.011d-018_0007: vṛkṣān utpāṭayām āsa tarasā vai babhañja ca
GE07mbh_03_u:175.011d-018_0008: pṛthivyāś ca pradeśān vai nādayaṃs tu vanāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:175.011d-018_0009: parvatāgrāṇi vai mṛdnan nādayānaś ca vijvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:175.011d-018_0011: vegena nyapatad bhīmo nirbhayaś ca punaḥ punaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:177.016d-0885_03: dīnānukampī satataṃ satataṃ sādhuvatsalaḥ sarpa uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:177.016d-0885_04: nityaṃ dānarataś caiva taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:177.016d-0885_05: yatnena brūhi rājendra kaḥ kālaḥ śrāddhadānayoḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:177.016d-0885_06: praśnaṃ praśnavidāṃ śreṣṭha sarvavit tvaṃ mato 'si me
GE07mbh_03_u:177.016d-0885_07: yatra vai brāhmaṇaṃ paśyec chrotriyaṃ dhyānatatparam sarpa uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:177.016d-0885_08: dhanaṃ manyed viśiṣṭaṃ tu sa kālaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:177.016d-0885_09: kiṃ vedyaṃ paramaṃ rājañ śaṃsa me tvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:177.017a: vedyaṃ sarpa paraṃ brahma nirduḥkham asukhaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_03_u:177.017c: yatra gatvā na śocanti bhavataḥ kiṃ vivakṣitam
GE07mbh_03_u:177.018a: cāturvarṇyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca satyaṃ ca brahma caiva ha
GE07mbh_03_u:177.018c: śūdreṣv api ca satyaṃ ca dānam akrodha eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:177.018e: ānṛśaṃsyam ahiṃsā ca ghṛṇā caiva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:177.019a: vedyaṃ yac cāttha nirduḥkham asukhaṃ ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:177.019c: tābhyāṃ hīnaṃ padaṃ cānyan na tad astīti lakṣaye
GE07mbh_03_u:177.019d-0886_01: tāṃś ca sarvān aśeṣeṇa kathayasva narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:177.020a: śūdre caitad bhavel lakṣyaṃ dvije tac ca na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:177.020c: na vai śūdro bhavec chūdro brāhmaṇo na ca brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:177.021a: yatraital lakṣyate sarpa vṛttaṃ sa brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:177.021c: yatraitan na bhavet sarpa taṃ śūdram iti nirdiśet
GE07mbh_03_u:177.022a: yat punar bhavatā proktaṃ na vedyaṃ vidyateti ha
GE07mbh_03_u:177.022c: tābhyāṃ hīnam atītyātra padaṃ nāstīti ced api
GE07mbh_03_u:177.023a: evam etan mataṃ sarpa tābhyāṃ hīnaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:177.023c: yathā śītoṣṇayor madhye bhaven noṣṇaṃ na śītatā
GE07mbh_03_u:177.024a: evaṃ vai sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ hīnam asti padaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:177.024c: eṣā mama matiḥ sarpa yathā vā manyate bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:177.025a: yadi te vṛttato rājan brāhmaṇaḥ prasamīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:177.025c: vyarthā jātis tadāyuṣman kṛtir yāvan na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_03_u:177.027a: sarve sarvāsv apatyāni janayanti yadā narāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:177.027c: vāṅ maithunam atho janma maraṇaṃ ca samaṃ nṛṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:177.028a: idam ārṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca ye yajāmaha ity api
GE07mbh_03_u:177.028c: tasmāc chīlaṃ pradhāneṣṭaṃ vidur ye tattvadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:177.029b-0887_01: tatas tu nāmakaraṇaṃ tataś caulaṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_03_u:177.029c: tatrāsya mātā sāvitrī pitā tv ācārya ucyate
GE07mbh_03_u:177.030a: vṛttyā śūdrasamo hy eṣa yāvad vede na jāyate
GE07mbh_03_u:177.031a: kṛtakṛtyāḥ punar varṇā yadi vṛttaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:177.032c: taṃ brāhmaṇam ahaṃ pūrvam uktavān bhujagottama
GE07mbh_03_u:177.033c: bhakṣayeyam ahaṃ kasmād bhrātaraṃ te vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_03_u:178.001c: brūhi kiṃ kurvataḥ karma bhaved gatir anuttamā
GE07mbh_03_u:178.002a: pātre dattvā priyāṇy uktvā satyam uktvā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:178.002c: ahiṃsānirataḥ svargaṃ gacched iti matir mama
GE07mbh_03_u:178.003a: dānād vā sarpa satyād vā kim ato guru dṛśyate
GE07mbh_03_u:178.004a: dāne ratatvaṃ satyaṃ ca ahiṃsā priyam eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:178.005a: kasmāc cid dānayogād dhi satyam eva viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:178.005c: satyavākyāc ca rājendra kiṃ cid dānaṃ viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:178.006c: ahiṃsā dṛśyate gurvī tataś ca priyam iṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:178.007a: evam etad bhaved rājan kāryāpekṣam anantaram
GE07mbh_03_u:178.007c: yad abhipretam anyat te brūhi yāvad bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:178.008a: kathaṃ svarge gatiḥ sarpa karmaṇāṃ ca phalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_03_u:178.008c: aśarīrasya dṛśyeta viṣayāṃś ca bravīhi me
GE07mbh_03_u:178.009a: tisro vai gatayo rājan paridṛṣṭāḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.009c: mānuṣyaṃ svargavāsaś ca tiryagyoniś ca tat tridhā
GE07mbh_03_u:178.010a: tatra vai mānuṣāl lokād dānādibhir atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.011a: viparītaiś ca rājendra kāraṇair mānuṣo bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:178.011c: tiryagyonis tathā tāta viśeṣaś cātra vakṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:178.014a: so 'yam etā gatīḥ sarvā jantuś carati kāryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:178.015a: jāto jātaś ca balavān bhuṅkte cātmā sa dehavān
GE07mbh_03_u:178.016a: śabde sparśe ca rūpe ca tathaiva rasagandhayoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.017a: kiṃ na gṛhṇāsi viṣayān yugapat tvaṃ mahāmate
GE07mbh_03_u:178.019a: jñānaṃ caivātra buddhiś ca manaś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:178.020a: manasā tāta paryeti kramaśo viṣayān imān
GE07mbh_03_u:178.021a: atra cāpi naravyāghra mano jantor vidhīyate
GE07mbh_03_u:178.022a: sa ātmā puruṣavyāghra bhruvor antaram āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.023a: buddher uttarakālaṃ ca vedanā dṛśyate budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.024a: manasaś cāpi buddheś ca brūhi me lakṣaṇaṃ param
GE07mbh_03_u:178.025c: tadāśritā hi saṃjñaiṣā vidhis tasyaiṣaṇe bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:178.026a: buddher guṇavidhir nāsti manas tu guṇavad bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:178.026c: buddhir utpadyate kārye manas tūtpannam eva hi
GE07mbh_03_u:178.027c: tvam apy atrābhisaṃbuddhaḥ kathaṃ vā manyate bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028a: aho buddhimatāṃ śreṣṭha śubhā buddhir iyaṃ tava
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028c: viditaṃ veditavyaṃ te kasmān mām anupṛcchasi sarpa uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0001: uktās te sarvaśas tāta praśnāḥ praśnavidāṃ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0002: idānīm eṣa muñcāmi bhrātaraṃ te vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0003: nahuṣeṇa tato muktaṃ bhīmam āśliṣya sodaram
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0007: saṃbhāṣyaṃ sādhubhiḥ puṇyam iti vai vaidikī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0008: sarpatvāt paśya mukto 'haṃ tvayā saṃbhāṣya sādhunā
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0009: dharmaṃ kila narāḥ kṛtvā labhante satsutān iha
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0010: dharmeṇa kaḥ kṛto dharmo yena labdho bhavān sutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0011: na kevalaṃ prajā dhanyā yāsāṃ rājan nṛpo bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0012: dharmo 'pi dhanyo dharmajña yasya putras tvam īdṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0013: dṛṣṭāḥ śrutāś ca bahavo nṛpā dharmaparāyaṇāḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0014: na śruto na ca dṛṣṭo me dharmajñas tvādṛśo nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0015: sabhāgyo 'haṃ mahābhāga yasya tuṣṭo bhavān guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0017: kiṃ tu kautūhalaṃ tāta mama pārthivasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0018: ataḥ pṛcchāmi sauhārdāt tvām ahaṃ nābhyasūyayā
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0020: kathaṃ tvām āviśan mohaḥ prākṛtaṃ puruṣaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0022: suprājñam api kaunteya ṛddhir mohayate naram
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0023: hīnābhijanavṛtto 'pi na sa rājāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0024: yasya cetasi rājendra karoti na madaḥ padam
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0025: yathāgnau dhruvam uṣṇatvam anile calanaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0026: yathā śaśini śītatvaṃ tathaiśvarye dhruvo madaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0027: aiśvaryatimiraṃ cakṣur na tat paśyati nirmalam
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0029: vartamānaḥ sukhe svarge nāvaitīti matir mama
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0032: lokadvayahitaṃ vaktuṃ jñātuṃ ko vā na paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0035: guhyam etan mahābāho kathitaṃ te mayākhilam
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0038: yaiḥ kṛtaḥ sarvabhakṣo 'gnir apeyaś ca mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0039: kṣayī cāpāditaś candraḥ ko na naśyet prakopya tān
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0040: lokān anyān sṛjeyur ye lokapālāṃś ca kopitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0041: devān kuryur adevāṃś ca kaḥ kṣuṇvaṃs tān samṛdhnuyāt
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0042: yān upāśritya tiṣṭhanti lokā devāś ca sarvadā
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0043: brahma caiva dhanaṃ yeṣāṃ ko hiṃsyāt tāñ jijīviṣuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0044: praṇītaś cāpraṇītaś ca yathāgnir daivataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:178.028d-020_0045: evaṃ vidvān avidvāṃś ca brāhmaṇo daivataṃ param
GE07mbh_03_u:178.029a: sarvajñaṃ tvāṃ kathaṃ moha āviśat svargavāsinam
GE07mbh_03_u:178.029b-0888_01: kathaṃ ca sarpatāṃ yāto bhavān vyākhyātum arhati
GE07mbh_03_u:178.029c: evam adbhutakarmāṇam iti me saṃśayo mahān
GE07mbh_03_u:178.030a: suprajñam api cec chūram ṛddhir mohayate naram
GE07mbh_03_u:178.030c: vartamānaḥ sukhe sarvo nāvaitīti matir mama
GE07mbh_03_u:178.031c: patitaḥ pratisaṃbuddhas tvāṃ tu saṃbodhayāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:178.032a: kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ mahārāja tvayā mama paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_03_u:178.032c: kṣīṇaḥ śāpaḥ sukṛcchro me tvayā saṃbhāṣya sādhunā
GE07mbh_03_u:178.033a: ahaṃ hi divi divyena vimānena caran purā
GE07mbh_03_u:178.033c: abhimānena mattaḥ san kaṃ cin nānyam acintayam brahmarṣidevagandharvayakṣarākṣasakiṃnarāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.035c: tasya tejo harāmy āśu tad dhi dṛṣṭibalaṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:178.036a: brahmarṣīṇāṃ sahasraṃ hi uvāha śibikāṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:178.036c: sa mām apanayo rājan bhraṃśayām āsa vai śriyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.037a: tatra hy agastyaḥ pādena vahan spṛṣṭo mayā muniḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.037c: adṛṣṭena tato 'smy ukto dhvaṃsa sarpeti vai ruṣā
GE07mbh_03_u:178.039a: ayācaṃ tam ahaṃ vipraṃ śāpasyānto bhaved iti
GE07mbh_03_u:178.040a: tataḥ sa mām uvācedaṃ prapatantaṃ kṛpānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.041c: phale kṣīṇe mahārāja phalaṃ puṇyam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:178.042a: tato me vismayo jātas tad dṛṣṭvā tapaso balam
GE07mbh_03_u:178.042c: brahma ca brāhmaṇatvaṃ ca yena tvāham acūcudam
GE07mbh_03_u:178.043a: satyaṃ damas tapo yogam ahiṃsā dānanityatā
GE07mbh_03_u:178.043c: sādhakāni sadā puṃsāṃ na jātir na kulaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:178.044a: ariṣṭa eṣa te bhrātā bhīmo mukto mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.044c: svasti te 'stu mahārāja gamiṣyāmi divaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.044d-0889_01: sa cāyaṃ puruṣavyāghra kālaḥ puṇya upasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.044d-0889_02: tad asmāt kāraṇāt pārtha kāryaṃ mama mahat kṛtam vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:178.045-0890_01: tatas tasmin muhūrte tu vimānaṃ kāmagāmi vai
GE07mbh_03_u:178.045a: ity uktvājagaraṃ dehaṃ tyaktvā sa nahuṣo nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.045c: divyaṃ vapuḥ samāsthāya gatas tridivam eva ha
GE07mbh_03_u:178.046c: dhaumyena sahitaḥ śrīmān āśramaṃ punar abhyagāt
GE07mbh_03_u:178.047c: kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.048a: tac chrutvā te dvijāḥ sarve bhrātaraś cāsya te trayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:178.048c: āsan suvrīḍitā rājan draupadī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_03_u:178.049a: te tu sarve dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ hitepsayā
GE07mbh_03_u:178.049c: maivam ity abruvan bhīmaṃ garhayanto 'sya sāhasam
GE07mbh_03_u:178.050a: pāṇḍavās tu bhayān muktaṃ prekṣya bhīmaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_03_u:178.050c: harṣam āhārayāṃ cakrur vijahruś ca mudā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:179.002a: chādayanto mahāghoṣāḥ khaṃ diśaś ca balāhakāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:179.005a: na sma prajñāyate kiṃ cid ambhasā samavastṛte
GE07mbh_03_u:179.005c: samaṃ vā viṣamaṃ vāpi nadyo vā sthāvarāṇi vā
GE07mbh_03_u:179.008c: mattāḥ paripatanti sma dardurāś caiva darpitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:179.015a: te vai mumudire vīrāḥ prasannasalilāṃ śivām
GE07mbh_03_u:179.016a: teṣāṃ puṇyatamā rātriḥ parvasaṃdhau sma śāradī
GE07mbh_03_u:179.017c: tat sarvaṃ bharataśreṣṭhāḥ samūhur yogam uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:179.018c: sūtaiḥ paurogavaiś caiva kāmyakaṃ prayayur vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:180.003a: athābravīd dvijaḥ kaś cid arjunasya priyaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_03_u:180.004a: viditā hi harer yūyam ihāyātāḥ kurūdvahāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:180.004c: sadā hi darśanākāṅkṣī śreyo 'nveṣī ca vo hariḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:180.008c: vavande mudito dhīmān bhīmaṃ ca balināṃ varam
GE07mbh_03_u:180.009a: pūjayām āsa dhaumyaṃ ca yamābhyām abhivāditaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:180.010a: sa dṛṣṭvā phalgunaṃ vīraṃ cirasya priyam āgatam
GE07mbh_03_u:180.011c: pāṇḍavānāṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ kṛṣṇasya mahiṣī priyā
GE07mbh_03_u:180.012a: tatas te pāṇḍavāḥ sarve sabhāryāḥ sapurohitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:180.013a: kṛṣṇas tu pārthena sametya vidvān; dhanaṃjayenāsuratarjanena
GE07mbh_03_u:180.013c: babhau yathā bhūtapatir mahātmā; sametya sākṣād bhagavān guhena
GE07mbh_03_u:180.014a: tataḥ samastāni kirīṭamālī; vaneṣu vṛttāni gadāgrajāya
GE07mbh_03_u:180.014c: uktvā yathāvat punar anvapṛcchat; kathaṃ subhadrā ca tathābhimanyuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:180.015a: sa pūjayitvā madhuhā yathāvat; pārthāṃś ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca purohitaṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:180.015c: uvāca rājānam abhipraśaṃsan; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ tatra sahopaviśya
GE07mbh_03_u:180.016a: dharmaḥ paraḥ pāṇḍava rājyalābhāt; tasyārtham āhus tapa eva rājan
GE07mbh_03_u:180.016c: satyārjavābhyāṃ caratā svadharmaṃ; jitas tavāyaṃ ca paraś ca lokaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:180.017a: adhītam agre caratā vratāni; samyag dhanurvedam avāpya kṛtsnam
GE07mbh_03_u:180.017c: kṣātreṇa dharmeṇa vasūni labdhvā; sarve hy avāptāḥ kratavaḥ purāṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:180.018a: na grāmyadharmeṣu ratis tavāsti; kāmān na kiṃ cit kuruṣe narendra
GE07mbh_03_u:180.018c: na cārthalobhāt prajahāsi dharmaṃ; tasmāt svabhāvād asi dharmarājaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:180.019a: dānaṃ ca satyaṃ ca tapaś ca rājañ; śraddhā ca śāntiś ca dhṛtiḥ kṣamā ca
GE07mbh_03_u:180.019b-0891_01: āpatsv api tvaṃ na jahāsi rājan
GE07mbh_03_u:180.019c: avāpya rāṣṭrāṇi vasūni bhogān; eṣā parā pārtha sadā ratis te
GE07mbh_03_u:180.020a: yadā janaughaḥ kurujāṅgalānāṃ; kṛṣṇāṃ sabhāyām avaśām apaśyat
GE07mbh_03_u:180.020c: apetadharmavyavahāravṛttaṃ; saheta tat pāṇḍava kas tvad anyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:180.021a: asaṃśayaṃ sarvasamṛddhakāmaḥ; kṣipraṃ prajāḥ pālayitāsi samyak
GE07mbh_03_u:180.021c: ime vayaṃ nigrahaṇe kurūṇāṃ; yadi pratijñā bhavataḥ samāptā
GE07mbh_03_u:180.022a: dhaumyaṃ ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca; yamau ca bhīmaṃ ca daśārhasiṃhaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:188.045c: na śrāddhair hi pitṝṃś cāpi tarpayiṣyanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:188.046a: na kaś cit kasya cic chrotā na kaś cit kasya cid guruḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:188.047a: paramāyuś ca bhavitā tadā varṣāṇi ṣoḍaśa
GE07mbh_03_u:188.048a: pañcame vātha ṣaṣṭhe vā varṣe kanyā prasūyate
GE07mbh_03_u:188.049a: patyau strī tu tadā rājan puruṣo vā striyaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:188.050c: na kaś cit kasya cid dātā bhaviṣyati yugakṣaye
GE07mbh_03_u:188.052c: bhāvinaḥ paścime kāle manuṣyā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:188.054a: jñānāni cāpy avijñāya kariṣyanti kriyās tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:188.056a: ārāmāṃś caiva vṛkṣāṃś ca nāśayiṣyanti nirvyathāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:188.056c: bhavitā saṃkṣayo loke jīvitasya ca dehinām
GE07mbh_03_u:188.057a: tathā lobhābhibhūtāś ca cariṣyanti mahīm imām
GE07mbh_03_u:188.057c: brāhmaṇāś ca bhaviṣyanti brahmasvāni ca bhuñjate
GE07mbh_03_u:188.058c: trātāram alabhanto vai bhramiṣyanti mahīm imām
GE07mbh_03_u:188.059c: yadā bhaviṣyanti narās tadā saṃkṣepsyate yugam
GE07mbh_03_u:188.060a: āśrayiṣyanti ca nadīḥ parvatān viṣamāṇi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:188.066c: bhaviṣyati yuge kṣīṇe tad yugāntasya lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:188.067a: yadā raudrā dharmahīnā māṃsādāḥ pānapās tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:188.067c: bhaviṣyanti narā nityaṃ tadā saṃkṣepsyate yugam
GE07mbh_03_u:188.068a: puṣpe puṣpaṃ yadā rājan phale phalam upāśritam
GE07mbh_03_u:188.069e: virodham atha yāsyanti vṛṣalā brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:188.072a: evaṃ paryākule loke maryādā na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:188.072c: na sthāsyanty upadeśe ca śiṣyā vipriyakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:188.074a: diśaḥ prajvalitāḥ sarvā nakṣatrāṇi calāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:188.075a: ṣaḍbhir anyaiś ca sahito bhāskaraḥ pratapiṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:188.075c: tumulāś cāpi nirhrādā digdāhāś cāpi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:188.076c: sasyāni ca na rokṣyanti yugānte paryupasthite
GE07mbh_03_u:188.077c: bhartṝṇāṃ vacane caiva na sthāsyanti tadā striyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:188.078c: sūdayiṣyanti ca patīn striyaḥ putrān apāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:188.080c: na lapsyante nivāsaṃ ca nirastāḥ pathi śerate
GE07mbh_03_u:188.083a: atha deśān diśaś cāpi pattanāni purāṇi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:188.084a: hā tāta hā sutety evaṃ tadā vācaḥ sudāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:188.087a: yadā candraś ca sūryaś ca tathā tiṣyabṛhaspatī
GE07mbh_03_u:188.088a: kālavarṣī ca parjanyo nakṣatrāṇi śubhāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:188.090c: manasā tasya sarvāṇi vāhanāny āyudhāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:188.090e: upasthāsyanti yodhāś ca śastrāṇi kavacāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:188.091c: sa cemaṃ saṃkulaṃ lokaṃ prasādam upaneṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:188.092c: sa saṃkṣepo hi sarvasya yugasya parivartakaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:188.093a: sa sarvatra gatān kṣudrān brāhmaṇaiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.001a: tataś corakṣayaṃ kṛtvā dvijebhyaḥ pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_03_u:189.003c: vipraiś corakśaye caiva kṛte kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:189.004a: kṛṣṇājināni śaktīś ca triśūlāny āyudhāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:189.005c: kalkiś cariṣyati mahīṃ sadā dasyuvadhe rataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.006a: hā tāta hā sutety evaṃ tās tā vācaḥ sudāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.007c: bhaviṣyati kṛte prāpte kriyāvāṃś ca janas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:189.008a: ārāmāś caiva caityāś ca taṭākāny avaṭās tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:189.008c: yajñakriyāś ca vividhā bhaviṣyanti kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_03_u:189.009a: brāhmaṇāḥ sādhavaś caiva munayaś ca tapasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.009c: āśramāḥ sahapāṣaṇḍāḥ sthitāḥ satye janāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.010c: sarveṣv ṛtuṣu rājendra sarvaṃ sasyaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:189.011a: narā dāneṣu niratā vrateṣu niyameṣu ca
GE07mbh_03_u:189.013a: śuśrūṣāyāṃ ratāḥ śūdrās tathā varṇatrayasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:189.013c: eṣa dharmaḥ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ dvāpare tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:189.013e: paścime yugakāle ca yaḥ sa te saṃprakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.014c: etat te sarvam ākhyātam atītānāgataṃ mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:189.015c: dṛṣṭāś caivānubhūtāś ca tāṃs te kathitavān aham
GE07mbh_03_u:189.016a: idaṃ caivāparaṃ bhūyaḥ saha bhrātṛbhir acyuta
GE07mbh_03_u:189.016b-0956_01: sarvam etad yathātattvaṃ kathitaṃ tava sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.017a: dharme tvayātmā saṃyojyo nityaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_03_u:189.017c: dharmātmā hi sukhaṃ rājā pretya ceha ca nandati
GE07mbh_03_u:189.018a: nibodha ca śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ yāṃ pravakṣyāmi te 'nagha
GE07mbh_03_u:189.018c: na brāhmaṇe paribhavaḥ kartavyas te kadā cana
GE07mbh_03_u:189.018e: brāhmaṇo ruṣito hanyād api lokān pratijñayā
GE07mbh_03_u:189.020a: kasmin dharme mayā stheyaṃ prajāḥ saṃrakṣatā mune
GE07mbh_03_u:189.020c: kathaṃ ca vartamāno vai na cyaveyaṃ svadharmataḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.020d-0957_01: etac chrutvā mayā kiṃ syāt kartavyaṃ munisattama
GE07mbh_03_u:189.020d-0957_02: kathaṃ cāyaṃ jito loko rakṣitavyo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:189.021c: apatyānām iva sveṣāṃ prajānāṃ rakṣaṇe rataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.021e: cara dharmaṃ tyajādharmaṃ pitṝn devāṃś ca pūjaya
GE07mbh_03_u:189.022a: pramādād yat kṛtaṃ te 'bhūt saṃyag dānena taj jaya
GE07mbh_03_u:189.022c: alaṃ te mānam āśritya satataṃ paravān bhava
GE07mbh_03_u:189.023a: vijitya pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ modamānaḥ sukhī bhava
GE07mbh_03_u:189.023c: eṣa bhūto bhaviṣyaś ca dharmas te samudīritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.024a: na te 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid atītānāgataṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:189.024c: tasmād imaṃ parikleśaṃ tvaṃ tāta hṛdi mā kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.026a: mā ca te 'tra vicāro bhūd yan mayoktaṃ tavānagha
GE07mbh_03_u:189.026c: atiśaṅkya vaco hy etad dharmalopo bhavet tava
GE07mbh_03_u:189.027c: karmaṇā manasā vācā sarvam etat samācara
GE07mbh_03_u:189.028c: tathā kariṣye yatnena bhavataḥ śāsanaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_03_u:189.029a: na me lobho 'sti viprendra na bhayaṃ na ca matsaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.029c: kariṣyāmi hi tat sarvam uktaṃ yat te mayi prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:189.030a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.030d-0959_01: viprarṣabhāś ca te sarve ye tatrāsan samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.031a: tathā kathāṃ śubhāṃ śrutvā mārkaṇḍeyasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:189.031c: vismitāḥ samapadyanta purāṇasya nivedanāt janamejaya uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:190.000-0960_01: bhūya eva brāhmaṇānāṃ māhātmyaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:190.001A: bhūya eva brāhmaṇamahābhāgyaṃ vaktum arhasīty pāṇḍaveyo mārkaṇḍeyam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.003A: ayodhyāyām ikṣvākukulotpannaḥ pārthivaḥ parikṣin nāma mṛgayām agamat
GE07mbh_03_u:190.004A: tam ekāśvena mṛgam anusarantaṃ mṛgo dūram apāharat
GE07mbh_03_u:190.005A: athādhvani jātaśramaḥ kṣuttṛṣṇābhibhūtaś ca kasmiṃś cid uddeśe nīlaṃ vanaṣaṇḍam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.006A: tatas tasya vanaṣaṇḍasya madhye 'tīva ramaṇīyaṃ saro dṛṣṭvā sāśva eva vyagāhata
GE07mbh_03_u:190.007A: athāśvastaḥ sa bisamṛṇālam aśvasyāgre nikṣipya puṣkariṇītīre samāviśat
GE07mbh_03_u:190.010A: athāpaśyat kanyāṃ paramarūpadarśanīyāṃ puṣpāṇy avacinvatīṃ gāyantīṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:190.018A: sa rājā bāḍham ity uktvā tāṃ samāgamya tayā sahāste
GE07mbh_03_u:190.020A: paryāśvastaś ca rājā tayaiva saha śibikayā prāyād avighāṭitayā
GE07mbh_03_u:190.020B: svanagaram anuprāpya rahasi tayā saha ramann āste
GE07mbh_03_u:190.022B: apūrvam iva paśyāma udakaṃ nātra nīyateti
GE07mbh_03_u:190.023A: athāmātyo 'nudakaṃ vanaṃ kārayitvodāravṛkṣaṃ bahumūlapuṣpaphalaṃ rahasy upagamya rājānam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:190.024A: sa tasya vacanāt tayaiva saha devyā tad vanaṃ prāviśat
GE07mbh_03_u:190.024B: sa kadā cit tasmin vane ramye tayaiva saha vyavaharat
GE07mbh_03_u:190.025A: tat praviśya rājā saha priyayā sudhātalasukṛtāṃ vimalasalilapūrṇāṃ vāpīm apaśyat
GE07mbh_03_u:190.026A: dṛṣṭvaiva ca tāṃ tasyā eva tīre sahaiva tayā devyā vyatiṣṭhat
GE07mbh_03_u:190.030A: vāpīm api niḥsrāvya maṇḍūkaṃ śvabhramukhe dṛṣṭvā kruddha ājñāpayām āsa
GE07mbh_03_u:190.030C: yo mayārthī sa mṛtakair maṇḍūkair upāyanair mām upatiṣṭhed iti
GE07mbh_03_u:190.031A: atha maṇḍūkavadhe ghore kriyamāṇe dikṣu sarvāsu maṇḍūkān bhayam āviśat
GE07mbh_03_u:190.033D: nārhasi maṇḍūkānām anaparādhināṃ vadhaṃ kartum iti
GE07mbh_03_u:190.034a: mā maṇḍūkāñ jighāṃsa tvaṃ kopaṃ saṃdhārayācyuta
GE07mbh_03_u:190.035a: pratijānīhi naitāṃs tvaṃ prāpya krodhaṃ vimokṣyase
GE07mbh_03_u:190.035c: alaṃ kṛtvā tavādharmaṃ maṇḍūkaiḥ kiṃ hatair hi te
GE07mbh_03_u:190.037F: bahavo hi rājānas tayā vipralabdhapūrvā iti
GE07mbh_03_u:190.040B: yasmāt tvayā rājāno vipralabdhās tasmād abrahmaṇyāni tavāpatyāni bhaviṣyanty anṛtakatvāt taveti
GE07mbh_03_u:190.041A: sa ca rājā tām upalabhya tasyāṃ surataguṇanibaddhahṛdayo lokatrayaiśvaryam ivopalabhya harṣabāṣpakalayā vācā praṇipatyābhipūjya maṇḍūkarājānam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:190.042A: sa ca maṇḍūkarājo jāmātaram anujñāpya yathāgatam agacchat
GE07mbh_03_u:190.043A: atha kasya cit kālasya tasyāṃ kumārās trayas tasya rājñaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ śalo dalo balaś ceti
GE07mbh_03_u:190.043B: tatas teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ śalaṃ samaye pitā rājye 'bhiṣicya tapasi dhṛtātmā vanaṃ jagāma
GE07mbh_03_u:190.044A: atha kadā cic chalo mṛgayām acarat
GE07mbh_03_u:190.046C: naiṣa śakyas tvayā mṛgo grahītuṃ yady api te rathe yuktau vāmyau syātām iti
GE07mbh_03_u:190.048A: sa evam ukto rājabhayabhīto vāmadevaśāpabhītaś ca sann ācakhyau rājñe
GE07mbh_03_u:190.048-0963_01: tataḥ punaḥ sa rājā khaḍgam udyamya śīghraṃ kathayasveti tam āha
GE07mbh_03_u:190.048-0963_02: haniṣye tvām iti sa tad āha rājabhayabhītaḥ sūtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.050A: sa gatvā vāmadevāśramaṃ tam ṛṣim abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:190.051C: kṛtakāryeṇa bhavatā mamaiva niryātyau kṣipram iti
GE07mbh_03_u:190.052A: sa ca tāv aśvau pratigṛhyānujñāpya carṣiṃ prāyād vāmyasaṃyuktena rathena mṛgaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:190.053A: evam uktvā mṛgam avāpya svanagaram etyāśvāvantaḥpure 'sthāpayat
GE07mbh_03_u:190.054B: taruṇo rājaputraḥ kalyāṇaṃ patram āsādya ramate
GE07mbh_03_u:190.055A: manasā niścitya māsi pūrṇe śiṣyam abravīt gacchātreya
GE07mbh_03_u:190.059A: tac chrutvā vacanam apriyaṃ vāmadevaḥ krodhaparītātmā svayam eva rājānam abhigamyāśvārtham abhyacodayat
GE07mbh_03_u:190.060a: prayaccha vāmyau mama pārthiva tvaṃ; kṛtaṃ hi te kāryam anyair aśakyam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.060c: mā tvā vadhīd varuṇo ghorapāśair; brahmakṣatrasyāntare vartamānaḥ 03,190.061
GE07mbh_03_u:190.061a: anaḍvāhau suvratau sādhu dāntāv; etad viprāṇāṃ vāhanaṃ vāmadeva
GE07mbh_03_u:190.061c: tābhyāṃ yāhi tvaṃ yatra kāmo maharṣe; chandāṃsi vai tvādṛśaṃ saṃvahanti
GE07mbh_03_u:190.062a: chandāṃsi vai mādṛśaṃ saṃvahanti; loke 'muṣmin pārthiva yāni santi
GE07mbh_03_u:190.062c: asmiṃs tu loke mama yānam etad; asmadvidhānām apareṣāṃ ca rājan rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:190.063a: catvāro vā gardabhās tvāṃ vahantu; śreṣṭhāśvataryo harayo vā turaṃgāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.063c: tais tvaṃ yāhi kṣatriyasyaiṣa vāho; mama vāmyau na tavaitau hi viddhi
GE07mbh_03_u:190.064a: ghoraṃ vrataṃ brāhmaṇasyaitad āhur; etad rājan yad ihājīvamānaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.064c: ayasmayā ghorarūpā mahānto; vahantu tvāṃ śitaśūlāś caturdhā
GE07mbh_03_u:190.065a: ye tvā vidur brāhmaṇaṃ vāmadeva; vācā hantuṃ manasā karmaṇā vā
GE07mbh_03_u:190.065c: te tvāṃ saśiṣyam iha pātayantu; madvākyanunnāḥ śitaśūlāsihastāḥ vāmadeva uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:190.065d-0965_03: prayaccha śīghraṃ mama vāmyau tvam aśvau rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:190.065d-0965_04: yady ātmānaṃ jīvituṃ te kṣamaṃ syāt
GE07mbh_03_u:190.065d-0965_06: na tv ānuśāsmy adya prabhṛti hy asatyam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.066a: nānuyogā brāhmaṇānāṃ bhavanti; vācā rājan manasā karmaṇā vā
GE07mbh_03_u:190.066c: yas tv evaṃ brahma tapasānveti vidvāṃs; tena śreṣṭho bhavati hi jīvamānaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.067a: evam ukte vāmadevena rājan; samuttasthū rākṣasā ghorarūpāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.067c: taiḥ śūlahastair vadhyamānaḥ sa rājā; provācedaṃ vākyam uccais tadānīm
GE07mbh_03_u:190.068a: ikṣvākavo yadi brahman dalo vā; vidheyā me yadi vānye viśo 'pi
GE07mbh_03_u:190.068c: notsrakṣye 'haṃ vāmadevasya vāmyau; naivaṃvidhā dharmaśīlā bhavanti
GE07mbh_03_u:190.069a: evaṃ bruvann eva sa yātudhānair; hato jagāmāśu mahīṃ kṣitīśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.069c: tato viditvā nṛpatiṃ nipātitam; ikṣvākavo vai dalam abhyaṣiñcan
GE07mbh_03_u:190.070a: rājye tadā tatra gatvā sa vipraḥ; provācedaṃ vacanaṃ vāmadevaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.070c: dalaṃ rājānaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ hi deyam; evaṃ rājan sarvadharmeṣu dṛṣṭam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.071a: bibheṣi cet tvam adharmān narendra; prayaccha me śīghram evādya vāmyau
GE07mbh_03_u:190.071c: etac chrutvā vāmadevasya vākyaṃ; sa pārthivaḥ sūtam uvāca roṣāt
GE07mbh_03_u:190.072a: ekaṃ hi me sāyakaṃ citrarūpaṃ; digdhaṃ viṣeṇāhara saṃgṛhītam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.072c: yena viddho vāmadevaḥ śayīta; saṃdaśyamānaḥ śvabhir ārtarūpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.073a: jānāmi putraṃ daśavarṣaṃ tavāhaṃ; jātaṃ mahiṣyāṃ narendra
GE07mbh_03_u:190.073c: taṃ jahi tvaṃ madvacanāt praṇunnas; tūrṇaṃ priyaṃ sāyakair ghorarūpaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.074a: evam ukto vāmadevena rājann; antaḥpure rājaputraṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.074c: sa sāyakas tigmatejā visṛṣṭaḥ; śrutvā dalas tac ca vākyaṃ babhāṣe
GE07mbh_03_u:190.075a: ikṣvākavo hanta carāmi vaḥ priyaṃ; nihanmīmaṃ vipram adya pramathya
GE07mbh_03_u:190.075c: ānīyatām aparas tigmatejāḥ; paśyadhvaṃ me vīryam adya kṣitīśāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.076a: yaṃ tvam enaṃ sāyakaṃ ghorarūpaṃ; viṣeṇa digdhaṃ mama saṃdadhāsi
GE07mbh_03_u:190.076c: na tvam enaṃ śaravaryaṃ vimoktuṃ; saṃdhātuṃ vā śakṣyasi mānavendra rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:190.077a: ikṣvākavaḥ paśyata māṃ gṛhītaṃ; na vai śaknomy eṣa śaraṃ vimoktum
GE07mbh_03_u:190.077c: na cāsya kartuṃ nāśam abhyutsahāmi; āyuṣmān vai jīvatu vāmadevaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.078a: saṃspṛśaināṃ mahiṣīṃ sāyakena; tatas tasmād enaso mokṣyase tvam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.079a: tatas tathā kṛtavān pārthivas tu; tato muniṃ rājaputrī babhāṣe
GE07mbh_03_u:190.079c: yathā yuktaṃ vāmadevāham enaṃ; dine dine saṃviśantī vyaśaṃsam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.079e: brāhmaṇebhyo mṛgayantī sūnṛtāni; tathā brahman puṇyalokaṃ labheyam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.080a: tvayā trātaṃ rājakulaṃ śubhekṣaṇe; varaṃ vṛṇīṣvāpratimaṃ dadāni te
GE07mbh_03_u:190.080c: praśādhīmaṃ svajanaṃ rājaputri; ikṣvākurājyaṃ sumahac cāpy anindye
GE07mbh_03_u:190.081a: varaṃ vṛṇe bhagavann ekam eva; vimucyatāṃ kilbiṣād adya bhartā
GE07mbh_03_u:190.081c: śivena cādhyāhi saputrabāndhavaṃ; varo vṛto hy eṣa mayā dvijāgrya
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082a: śrutvā vacaḥ sa munī rājaputryās; tathāstv iti kurupravīra
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082c: tataḥ sa rājā mudito babhūva; vāmyau cāsmai saṃpradadau praṇamya
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0003: mārkaṇḍeyam ṛṣayo brāhmaṇā yudhiṣṭhiraś ca paryapṛcchan | ṛṣiḥ kena
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0004: dīrghāyur āsīd bakaḥ ||1|| mārkaṇḍeyas tu tān sarvān uvāca mahātapā
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0005: dīrghāyuś ca bako rājarṣiḥ | nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0006: etac chrutvā tu kaunteyo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha bhārata |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0017: muditaś ca janaḥ sarvaḥ svadharmeṣu vyavasthitaḥ |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0018: tāḥ prajā muditāḥ sarvā dṛṣṭvā balaniṣūdanaḥ ||8||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0019: tatas tu mudito rājan devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0020: airāvataṃ samāsthāya tāḥ paśyan muditāḥ prajāḥ ||9||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0021: āśramāṃś ca vicitrāṃś ca nadīś ca vividhāḥ śubhāḥ |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0024: udapānaṃ prapā vāpī taḍāgāni sarāṃsi ca ||11||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0031: bakas tu dṛṣṭvā devendraṃ dṛḍhaṃ prītamanābhavat |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0034: tataḥ praśnaṃ bakaṃ deva uvāca tridaśeśvaraḥ ||16||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0036: samākhyāhi mama brahman kiṃ duḥkhaṃ cirajīvinām
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0038: apriyaiḥ saha saṃvāsaḥ priyaiś cāpi vinābhavaḥ |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0039: asadbhiḥ saṃprayogaś ca tad duḥkhaṃ cirajīvinām
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0041: pareṣv āyattatā kṛcchraṃ kiṃ nu duḥkhataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0042: nānyad duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ cil lokeṣu pratibhāti me |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0046: api pratyakṣam evaitat tava deva śatakrato |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0049: prāpnuvanti viparyāsaṃ kiṃ nu duḥkhataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0051: āḍhyair daridrāvamatāḥ kiṃ nu duḥkhataraṃ tataḥ |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0052: loke vaidharmyam etat tu dṛśyate bahuvistaram ||24||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0057: samākhyāhi mama brahman kiṃ sukhaṃ cirajīvinām ||26||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0059: aṣṭame dvādaśe vāpi śākaṃ yaḥ pacate gṛhe |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0060: kumitrāṇy anapāśritya kiṃ vai sukhataraṃ tataḥ ||27||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0061: yatrāhāni na gaṇyante nainam āhur mahāśanam |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0062: api śākaṃ pacānasya sukhaṃ vai maghavan gṛhe ||28||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0063: arjitaṃ svena vīryeṇa nānyapāśritya kaṃ cana |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0064: phalaśākam api śreyo bhoktuṃ hy akṛpaṇaṃ gṛhe ||29||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0065: parasya tu gṛhe bhoktuḥ paribhūtasya nityaśaḥ |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0066: sumṛṣṭam api na śreyo vikalpo 'yam ataḥ satām ||30||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0067: śvavat kīlālapo yas tu parānnaṃ bhoktum icchati |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0068: dhig astu tasya tad bhuktaṃ kṛpaṇasya durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0070: śiṣṭāny annāni yo bhuṅkte kiṃ vai sukhataraṃ tataḥ ||32||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0071: ato mṛṣṭataraṃ nānyat pūtaṃ kiṃ cic chatakrato |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0072: dattvā yas tv atithibhyo vai bhuṅkte tenaiva nityaśaḥ ||33||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0073: yāvato hy andhasaḥ piṇḍān aśnāti satataṃ dvijaḥ |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0075: yad eno yauvanakṛtaṃ tat sarvaṃ naśyate dhruvam |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0076: sadakṣiṇasya bhuktasya dvijasya tu kare gatam |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0077: yad vāri vāriṇā siñcet tad dhy enas tarate kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0079: etāś cānyāś ca vai bahvīḥ kathayitvā kathāḥ śubhāḥ |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0080: bakena saha devendra āpṛcchya tridivaṃ gataḥ ||36||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0084: tataḥ pāṇḍavāḥ punar mārkaṇḍeyam ūcuḥ | kathitaṃ brāhmaṇamahābhāgyam |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0086: tān uvāca mārkaṇḍeyo maharṣiḥ | śrūyatām idānīṃ rājanyānāṃ mahābhāgyam iti ||38||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0087: kurūṇām anyatamaḥ suhotro nāma rājā maharṣīn abhigamya
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0088: nivṛtya rathastham eva rājānam auśīnaraṃ śibiṃ dadarśābhimukham ||39||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0089: tau sametya paraspareṇa yathāvayaḥ pūjāṃ prayujya guṇasāmyena
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0090: paraspareṇa tulyātmānau viditvānyonyasya panthānaṃ na dadatuḥ ||40||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0091: tatra nāradaḥ prādur āsīt | kim idaṃ bhavantau parasparasya panthānam āvṛtya
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0092: tiṣṭhata iti ||41|| tāv ūcatur nāradam | naitad bhagavan | pūrvakarmakartrādibhir
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0093: viśiṣṭasya panthā upadiśyate samarthāya vā | āvāṃ ca sakhyaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0095: nāradas tv evam uktaḥ ślokatrayam apaṭhat ||43||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0096: krūraḥ kauravya mṛdave mṛduḥ krūre ca kaurava |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0097: sādhuś cāsādhave sādhuḥ sādhave nāpnuyāt katham
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0098: kṛtaṃ śataguṇaṃ kuryān nāsti deveṣu nirṇayaḥ |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0102: tad ubhāv eva bhavantāv udārau | ya idānīṃ bhavadbhyām anyatamaḥ so 'pasarpatu |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0103: etad vai nidarśanam | ity uktvā tūṣṇīṃ nārado babhūva ||47||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0104: etac chrutvā tu kauravyaḥ śibiṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā panthānaṃ dattvā bahukarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0105: praśasya prayayau ||48|| tad etad rājño mahābhāgyam apy uktavān
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0110: idam anyac chrūyatām | yayātir nāhuṣo rājā rājyasthaḥ paurajanāvṛta
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0111: āsāṃ cakre ||50|| gurvarthī brāhmaṇa upetyābravīt | bho rājan gurvarthaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0112: bhikṣeyaṃ samayād iti ||51|| rājovāca | bravītu bhagavān samayam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0117: taṃ tvāṃ pṛcchāmi kathaṃ tu rājan
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0127: dattaṃ na śocāmi kadā cid artham ||55||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0128: ity uktvā brāhmaṇāya rājā gosahasraṃ dadau | prāptavāṃś ca gavāṃ sahasraṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0133: bhūya eva mahābhāgyaṃ kathyatām ity abravīt pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0136: upāṃśuvratam abhyajānāt | kupyam adeyaṃ brāhmaṇasya ||59|| atha taṃ sedukaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0137: brāhmaṇaḥ kaś cid vedādhyayanasaṃpanna āśiṣaṃ dattvā gurvarthī bhikṣitavān |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0138: aśvasahasraṃ me bhagavān dadātv iti ||60|| taṃ seduko brāhmaṇam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0139: nāsti saṃbhavo gurvarthaṃ dātum iti | sa tvaṃ gaccha vṛṣadarbhasakāśam |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0140: rājā paramadharmajñaḥ | brāhmaṇa taṃ bhikṣasva | sa te dāsyati | tasyaitad upāṃśuvratam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0141: iti ||61|| atha brāhmaṇo vṛṣadarbhasakāśaṃ gatvā aśvasahasram
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0142: ayācata | sa rājā taṃ kaśenātāḍayat | taṃ brāhmaṇo 'bravīt | kiṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0143: haṃsy anāgasaṃ mām iti ||62|| evam uktvā taṃ śapantaṃ rājāha | vipra kiṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0144: yo na dadāti tubhyam | utāho svid brāhmaṇyam etat ||63|| brāhmaṇa
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0145: uvāca | rājādhirāja tava samīpaṃ sedukena preṣito bhikṣitum āgataḥ |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0146: tenānuśiṣṭena mayā tvaṃ bhikṣito 'si ||64|| rājovāca | pūrvāhṇe te
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0147: dāsyāmi | yo me 'dya balir āgamiṣyati | yo hanyate kaśayā kathaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0148: moghaṃ kṣepaṇaṃ tasya syāt ||65|| ity uktvā brāhmaṇāya daivasikām utpattiṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0153: devānāṃ kathā saṃjātā | mahītalaṃ gatvā mahīpatiṃ śibim auśīnaraṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0154: sādhv enaṃ śibiṃ jijñāsyāma iti ||67|| evaṃ bho ity uktvā agnīndrāv
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0155: upatiṣṭhetām | agniḥ kapotarūpeṇa | tam abhyadhāvad āmiṣārtham indraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0158: atha purohito rājānam abravīt | prāṇarakṣaṇārthaṃ śyenād bhīto
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0159: bhavantaṃ prāṇārthī prapadyate | vasu dadātu | antavān pārthivo 'sya
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0160: niṣkṛtiṃ kuryāt | ghoraṃ kapotasya nipātam āhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0161: atha kapoto rājānam abravīt | prāṇarakṣārthaṃ śyenād bhīto bhavantaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0162: prāṇarakṣārthī prapadye | aṅgair aṅgāni prāpyārthī munir bhūtvā prāṇāṃs tvāṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0163: prapadye | svādhyāyena karśitaṃ brahmacāriṇaṃ māṃ viddhi | tapasā damena
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0164: yuktam ācāryasyāpratikūlabhāṣiṇam | evaṃyuktam apāpaṃ māṃ viddhi ||71||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0177: yāṃ vai kapoto vadate yāṃ ca śyena
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0181: bhītaṃ prapannaṃ yo hi dadāti śatrave
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0182: na trāṇaṃ labhet trāṇam icchan sa kāle ||76||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0189: bhītaṃ prapannaṃ yo hi dadāti śatrave
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0204: pratyāmnāyaṃ tu tvaṃ hy enaṃ mā hiṃsīḥ ||81||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0206: saumyo hy ayaṃ kiṃ na jānāsi śyena |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0212: praśādhi māṃ yad vades tat karomi ||83||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0213: śyena uvāca | ūror dakṣiṇād utkṛtya svapiśitaṃ tāvad rājan yāvan
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0214: māsaṃ kapotena samam | tathā tasmāt sādhu trātaḥ kapotaḥ | praśaṃseyuś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0215: śibayaḥ | kṛtaṃ ca priyaṃ syān mameti ||84||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0216: atha sa dakṣiṇād ūror utkṛtya svamāṃsapeśīṃ tulayādhārayat | gurutara
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0217: eva kapota āsīt ||85|| punar anyam uccakarta | gurutara eva
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0218: kapotaḥ ||86|| evaṃ sarvaṃ samadhigatya śarīraṃ tulāyām āropayām āsa |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0219: tat tathāpi gurutara eva kapota āsīt ||87|| atha rājā svayam eva
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0220: tulām āruroha | na ca vyalīkam āsīd rājñaḥ ||88|| etad vṛttāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0221: trāta ity uktvā prālīyata śyenaḥ ||89|| atha rājā abravīt ||90||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0223: pṛcchāmi te śakune ko nu śyenaḥ |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0229: sādhu jñātuṃ tvām ṛṣabhaṃ sauratheya nau
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0239: kapotaromāṇaṃ śibinaudbhidaṃ putraṃ prāpsyasi nṛpa | vṛṣasaṃhananaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0244: bhūya eva mahābhāgyaṃ kathyatām | ity abravīt pāṇḍavo mārkaṇḍeyam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0246: athācaṣṭa mārkaṇḍeyaḥ | aṣṭakasya vaiśvāmitrer aśvamedhe sarve rājānaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0247: prāgacchan | bhrātaraś cāsya pratardano vasumanāḥ śibir auśīnara iti ||97||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0248: sa ca samāptayajño bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rathena prāyāt | te ca nāradam āgacchantam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0249: abhivādyārohatu bhavān ratham ity abruvan ||98|| tāṃs tathety uktvā
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0251: atha teṣām ekaḥ surarṣiṃ nāradam abravīt | prasādya bhagavantaṃ kiṃ cid
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0252: iccheyaṃ praṣṭum iti ||100|| pṛccha | ity abravīd ṛṣiḥ ||101||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0254: svargasthānaṃ caturbhir yātavyaṃ syāt ko 'vataret ||102|| ayam aṣṭako 'vataret |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0255: ity abravīd ṛṣiḥ ||103|| kiṃ kāraṇam | ity apṛcchat ||104||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0256: athācaṣṭa | aṣṭakasya gṛhe mayā uṣitam | sa māṃ rathenānuprāvahat ||105||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0258: ||106|| tam aham apṛccham | kasyemā gāva iti ||107|| so 'bravīt |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0259: mayā nisṛṣṭā ity etāḥ ||108|| tenaiva svayaṃ ślāghati kathitena | eṣo 'vataret
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0261: atha tribhir yātavyam | sāṃprataṃ ko 'vataret ||110|| pratardanaḥ |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0262: ity abravīd ṛṣiḥ ||111|| tatra kiṃ kāraṇam ||112|| pratardanasyāpi gṛhe
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0263: mayoṣitam | sa māṃ rathenānuprāvahat ||113|| athainaṃ brāhmaṇo bhikṣeta |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0264: aśvaṃ me dadātu bhavān ||114|| nivṛtto dāsyāmi | ity abravīd brāhmaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0265: ||115|| tvaritam eva dīyatām | ity abravīd brāhmaṇaḥ ||116|| tvaritam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0266: eva ||117|| sa brāhmaṇasyaivam uktvā dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam adadat ||118||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0267: athānyo 'py aśvārthī brāhmaṇa āgacchat ||119|| tathaiva cainam uktvā
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0268: vāmapārṣṇim abhyadāt ||120|| atha prāyāt | punar api cānyo 'py aśvārthī
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0269: brāhmaṇa āgacchat | tvarito 'tha tasmai apanahya vāmaṃ dhuryam adadat
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0270: ||121|| atha prayāt | punar anya āgacchad aśvārthī brāhmaṇaḥ || tam abravīt |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0271: atiyāto dāsyāmi ||122|| tvaritam eva me dīyatām |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0272: ity abravīd brāhmaṇaḥ ||123|| tasmai dattvāśvaṃ rathadhuraṃ gṛhṇatā vyāhṛtam |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0273: brāhmaṇānāṃ sāṃprataṃ nāsti kiṃ cid iti ||124|| ya eṣa dadāti cāsūyati
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0275: atha dvābhyāṃ yātavyam iti ko 'vataret ||126|| vasumanā avataret |
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0276: ity abravīd ṛṣiḥ ||127|| kiṃ kāraṇam | ity apṛcchat ||128||
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0277: athācaṣṭa nāradaḥ | ahaṃ paribhraman vasumanaso gṛham upasthitaḥ | svastivacanam
GE07mbh_03_u:190.082d-021_0278: āsīt | puṣparathasya prayojanena tam aham anvagaccham | svastivāciteṣu

GE07mbh_03_u:195.006a: sa tu devān sagandharvāñ jitvā dhundhur amarṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:195.006c: babādha sarvān asakṛd devān viṣṇuṃ ca vai bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:195.007c: āgamya ca sa duṣṭātmā taṃ deśaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:195.007e: bādhate sma paraṃ śaktyā tam uttaṅkāśramaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:195.010b-0986_01: kuvalāśvo narapatiḥ putraiś ca sahitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:195.012a: tam āviśat tato viṣṇur bhagavāṃs tejasā prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:195.013a: tasmin prayāte durdharṣe divi śabdo mahān abhūt
