GE07mbh_03_u:195.015d-0987_01: pradakṣiṇāś cāpy abhavan vanyās tasya mṛgadvijāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:195.020f-0990_01: dīpyamānas tato dhundhus tejasā ca nareśvara

GE07mbh_03_u:195.022c: abhidrutaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair gadābhir musalair api
GE07mbh_03_u:195.022e: paṭṭiśaiḥ parighaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiś ca vimalaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:195.023c: kruddhaś cābhakṣayat teṣāṃ śastrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:195.024a: āsyād vaman pāvakaṃ sa saṃvartakasamaṃ tadā

GE07mbh_03_u:195.027c: tadāpīyata tat tejo rājā vārimayaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:195.027e: yogī yogena vahniṃ ca śamayām āsa vāriṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:195.029d-0991_01: dhundhor vadhāt tadā rājā kuvalāśvo mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:195.029d-0992_01: kuvalāśvo mahābāhur dhundhuṃ hatvā jaharṣa ca
GE07mbh_03_u:195.029e: dhundhumāra iti khyāto nāmnā samabhavat tataḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:195.030e: atīva mudito rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:195.031a: dadyāṃ vittaṃ dvijāgryebhyaḥ śatrūṇāṃ cāpi durjayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:195.031c: sakhyaṃ ca viṣṇunā me syād bhūteṣv adroha eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:195.031e: dharme ratiś ca satataṃ svarge vāsas tathākṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:195.032a: tathāstv iti tato devaiḥ prītair uktaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:195.032c: ṛṣibhiś ca sagandharvair uttaṅkena ca dhīmatā
GE07mbh_03_u:195.033a: sabhājya cainaṃ vividhair āśīrvādais tato nṛpam
GE07mbh_03_u:195.033c: devā maharṣayaś caiva svāni sthānāni bhejire
GE07mbh_03_u:195.034a: tasya putrās trayaḥ śiṣṭā yudhiṣṭhira tadābhavan
GE07mbh_03_u:195.034c: dṛḍhāśvaḥ kapilāśvaś ca candrāśvaś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:195.035a: evaṃ sa nihatas tena kuvalāśvena sattama
GE07mbh_03_u:195.036a: kuvalāśvas tu nṛpatir dhundhumāra iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:195.036c: nāmnā ca guṇasaṃyuktas tadā prabhṛti so 'bhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:195.037a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:195.038a: idaṃ tu puṇyam ākhyānaṃ viṣṇoḥ samanukīrtanam
GE07mbh_03_u:195.038c: śṛṇuyād yaḥ sa dharmātmā putravāṃś ca bhaven naraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:195.039a: āyuṣmān dhṛtimāṃś caiva śrutvā bhavati parvasu
GE07mbh_03_u:195.039c: na ca vyādhibhayaṃ kiṃ cit prāpnoti vigatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:196.002a: śrotum icchāmi bhagavan strīṇāṃ māhātmyam uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:196.002c: kathyamānaṃ tvayā vipra sūkṣmaṃ dharmaṃ ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:196.003a: pratyakṣeṇa hi viprarṣe devā dṛśyanti sattama
GE07mbh_03_u:196.003c: sūryācandramasau vāyuḥ pṛthivī vahnir eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:196.004a: pitā mātā ca bhagavan gāva eva ca sattama
GE07mbh_03_u:196.004c: yac cānyad eva vihitaṃ tac cāpi bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_03_u:196.005a: manye 'haṃ guruvat sarvam ekapatnyas tathā striyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:196.006a: pativratānāṃ māhātmyaṃ vaktum arhasi naḥ prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:196.006b-0994_01: nānyad daivatam ity eva strīṇāṃ bhartur dvijottama
GE07mbh_03_u:196.006e: patiṃ daivatavac cāpi cintayantyaḥ sthitā hi yāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:196.007a: bhagavan duṣkaraṃ hy etat pratibhāti mama prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:196.007c: mātāpitṛṣu śuśrūṣā strīṇāṃ bhartṛṣu ca dvija
GE07mbh_03_u:196.008a: strīṇāṃ dharmāt sughorād dhi nānyaṃ paśyāmi duṣkaram
GE07mbh_03_u:196.008c: sādhv ācārāḥ striyo brahman yat kurvanti sadādṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:196.008e: duṣkaraṃ bata kurvanti pitaro mātaraś ca vai
GE07mbh_03_u:196.009a: ekapatnyaś ca yā nāryo yāś ca satyaṃ vadanty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:196.009c: kukṣiṇā daśa māsāṃś ca garbhaṃ saṃdhārayanti yāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:196.009e: nāryaḥ kālena saṃbhūya kim adbhutataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:196.010a: saṃśayaṃ paramaṃ prāpya vedanām atulām api
GE07mbh_03_u:196.010c: prajāyante sutān nāryo duḥkhena mahatā vibho
GE07mbh_03_u:196.011a: ye ca krūreṣu sarveṣu vartamānā jugupsitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:196.011c: svakarma kurvanti sadā duṣkaraṃ tac ca me matam
GE07mbh_03_u:196.013a: etad icchāmi bhagavan praśnaṃ praśnavidāṃ vara
GE07mbh_03_u:196.014a: hanta te sarvam ākhyāsye praśnam etaṃ sudurvacam
GE07mbh_03_u:196.014c: tattvena bharataśreṣṭha gadatas tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_03_u:196.015a: mātaraṃ sadṛśīṃ tāta pitṝn anye ca manyate
GE07mbh_03_u:196.015c: duṣkaraṃ kurute mātā vivardhayati yā prajāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:196.016c: abhicārair upāyaiś ca īhante pitaraḥ sutān
GE07mbh_03_u:196.017a: evaṃ kṛcchreṇa mahatā putraṃ prāpya sudurlabham
GE07mbh_03_u:196.018a: āśaṃsate ca putreṣu pitā mātā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:196.018c: yaśaḥ kīrtim athaiśvaryaṃ prajā dharmaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:196.018d-0997_01: mātuḥ pituś ca rājendra satataṃ hitakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:196.019a: tayor āśāṃ tu saphalāṃ yaḥ karoti sa dharmavit
GE07mbh_03_u:196.019c: pitā mātā ca rājendra tuṣyato yasya nityadā
GE07mbh_03_u:196.019e: iha pretya ca tasyātha kīrtir dharmaś ca śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:196.020a: naiva yajñaḥ striyaḥ kaś cin na śrāddhaṃ nopavāsakam
GE07mbh_03_u:196.020c: yā tu bhartari śuśrūṣā tayā svargam upāśnute
GE07mbh_03_u:197.001c: tapasvī dharmaśīlaś ca kauśiko nāma bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:197.002c: sa vṛkṣamūle kasmiṃś cid vedān uccārayan sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.004a: tām avekṣya tataḥ kruddhaḥ samapadhyāyata dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.006c: ity uktvā bahuśo vidvān grāmaṃ bhaikṣāya saṃśritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.007c: praviṣṭas tat kulaṃ yatra pūrvaṃ caritavāṃs tu saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.008a: dehīti yācamāno vai tiṣṭhety uktaḥ striyā tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.008c: śaucaṃ tu yāvat kurute bhājanasya kuṭumbinī
GE07mbh_03_u:197.010a: sā tu dṛṣṭvā patiṃ sādhvī brāhmaṇaṃ vyapahāya tam
GE07mbh_03_u:197.010c: pādyam ācamanīyaṃ ca dadau bhartre tathāsanam
GE07mbh_03_u:197.011c: āhāreṇātha bhakṣyaiś ca vākyaiḥ sumadhurais tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:197.012a: ucchiṣṭaṃ bhuñjate bhartuḥ sā tu nityaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:197.012c: daivataṃ ca patiṃ mene bhartuś cittānusāriṇī
GE07mbh_03_u:197.013a: na karmaṇā na manasā nātyaśnān nāpi cāpibat
GE07mbh_03_u:197.014c: bhartuś cāpi hitaṃ yat tat satataṃ sānuvartate
GE07mbh_03_u:197.016a: sā brāhmaṇaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā saṃsthitaṃ bhaikṣakāṅkṣiṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:197.018a: kim idaṃ bhavati tvaṃ māṃ tiṣṭhety uktvā varāṅgane
GE07mbh_03_u:197.019d-0999_02: prasīda bhagavan mahyaṃ kṛpāṃ kuru mayi dvija
GE07mbh_03_u:197.020a: kṣantum arhasi me vipra bhartā me daivataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:197.020c: sa cāpi kṣudhitaḥ śrāntaḥ prāptaḥ śuśrūṣito mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:197.021a: brāhmaṇā na garīyāṃso garīyāṃs te patiḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.022a: indro 'py eṣāṃ praṇamate kiṃ punar mānuṣā bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:197.022c: avalipte na jānīṣe vṛddhānāṃ na śrutaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:197.022e: brāhmaṇā hy agnisadṛśā daheyuḥ pṛthivīm api
GE07mbh_03_u:197.023a: nāvajānāmy ahaṃ viprān devais tulyān manasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.023c: aparādham imaṃ vipra kṣantum arhasi me 'nagha
GE07mbh_03_u:197.023d-1001_01: nāhaṃ balākā viprendra tyaja krodhaṃ tapodhana
GE07mbh_03_u:197.023d-1001_02: anayā kruddhayā dṛṣṭyā kruddhaḥ kiṃ māṃ kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:197.024a: jānāmi tejo viprāṇāṃ mahābhāgyaṃ ca dhīmatām
GE07mbh_03_u:197.024c: apeyaḥ sāgaraḥ krodhāt kṛto hi lavaṇodakaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.026c: agastyam ṛṣim āsādya jīrṇaḥ krūro mahāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.027c: krodhaḥ suvipulo brahman prasādaś ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_03_u:197.028a: asmiṃs tv atikrame brahman kṣantum arhasi me 'nagha
GE07mbh_03_u:197.028c: patiśuśrūṣayā dharmo yaḥ sa me rocate dvija
GE07mbh_03_u:197.029a: daivateṣv api sarveṣu bhartā me daivataṃ param
GE07mbh_03_u:197.030a: śuśrūṣāyāḥ phalaṃ paśya patyur brāhmaṇa yādṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:197.030c: balākā hi tvayā dagdhā roṣāt tad viditaṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:197.031b-1003_01: mā sma kruddho balākeva na vadhyāsmi pativratā
GE07mbh_03_u:197.031c: yaḥ krodhamohau tyajati taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.032a: yo vaded iha satyāni guruṃ saṃtoṣayeta ca
GE07mbh_03_u:197.032c: hiṃsitaś ca na hiṃseta taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.033c: kāmakrodhau vaśe yasya taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.034c: sarvadharmeṣu ca ratas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.035a: yo 'dhyāpayed adhīyīta yajed vā yājayīta vā
GE07mbh_03_u:197.035c: dadyād vāpi yathāśakti taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.036c: svādhyāye cāpramatto vai taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.037a: yad brāhmaṇānāṃ kuśalaṃ tad eṣāṃ parikīrtayet
GE07mbh_03_u:197.037c: satyaṃ tathā vyāharatāṃ nānṛte ramate manaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.038a: dhanaṃ tu brāhmaṇasyāhuḥ svādhyāyaṃ damam ārjavam
GE07mbh_03_u:197.038e: satyārjave dharmam āhuḥ paraṃ dharmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.039a: durjñeyaḥ śāśvato dharmaḥ sa tu satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.040a: bahudhā dṛśyate dharmaḥ sūkṣma eva dvijottama
GE07mbh_03_u:197.040c: bhavān api ca dharmajñaḥ svādhyāyanirataḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.040e: na tu tattvena bhagavan dharmān vetsīti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.040f-1004_01: yadi vipra na jānīṣe dharmaṃ paramakaṃ dvija
GE07mbh_03_u:197.040f-1004_02: dharmavyādhaṃ tataḥ pṛccha gatvā tu mithilāṃ purīm
GE07mbh_03_u:197.041c: mithilāyāṃ vasan vyādhaḥ sa te dharmān pravakṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:197.041e: tatra gacchasva bhadraṃ te yathākāmaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_03_u:197.041f-1005_01: vyādhaḥ paramadharmātmā sa te chetsyati saṃśayān
GE07mbh_03_u:197.042a: atyuktam api me sarvaṃ kṣantum arhasy anindita
GE07mbh_03_u:197.042c: striyo hy avadhyāḥ sarveṣāṃ ye dharmaviduṣo janāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:197.043a: prīto 'smi tava bhadraṃ te gataḥ krodhaś ca śobhane
GE07mbh_03_u:197.043c: upālambhas tvayā hy ukto mama niḥśreyasaṃ param
GE07mbh_03_u:197.044a: tayā visṛṣṭo nirgamya svam eva bhavanaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_03_u:197.044d-1006_01: dhanyā tvam asi kalyāṇi yasyāḥ syād vṛttam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:198.001a: cintayitvā tad āścaryaṃ striyā proktam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:198.002a: cintayānaḥ sa dharmasya sūkṣmāṃ gatim athābravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:198.002c: śraddadhānena bhāvyaṃ vai gacchāmi mithilām aham
GE07mbh_03_u:198.003a: kṛtātmā dharmavit tasyāṃ vyādho nivasate kila
GE07mbh_03_u:198.003c: taṃ gacchāmy aham adyaiva dharmaṃ praṣṭuṃ tapodhanam
GE07mbh_03_u:198.004a: iti saṃcintya manasā śraddadhānaḥ striyā vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:198.005a: atikrāmann araṇyāni grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:198.007a: praviśya sa purīṃ ramyāṃ vimānair bahubhir vṛtām
GE07mbh_03_u:198.008a: aśvai rathais tathā nāgair yānaiś ca bahubhir vṛtām
GE07mbh_03_u:198.009c: dharmavyādham apṛcchac ca sa cāsya kathito dvijaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:198.010a: apaśyat tatra gatvā taṃ sūnāmadhye vyavasthitam
GE07mbh_03_u:198.010e: ākulatvāt tu kretṝṇām ekānte saṃsthito dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:198.011a: sa tu jñātvā dvijaṃ prāptaṃ sahasā saṃbhramotthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:198.011c: ājagāma yato vipraḥ sthita ekānta āsane
GE07mbh_03_u:198.012a: abhivādaye tvā bhagavan svāgataṃ te dvijottama
GE07mbh_03_u:198.012c: ahaṃ vyādhas tu bhadraṃ te kiṃ karomi praśādhi mām
GE07mbh_03_u:198.013a: ekapatnyā yad ukto 'si gaccha tvaṃ mithilām iti
GE07mbh_03_u:198.013c: jānāmy etad ahaṃ sarvaṃ yadarthaṃ tvam ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:198.014a: śrutvā tu tasya tad vākyaṃ sa vipro bhṛśaharṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:198.014c: dvitīyam idam āścaryam ity acintayata dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:198.015a: adeśasthaṃ hi te sthānam iti vyādho 'bravīd dvijam
GE07mbh_03_u:198.016a: bāḍham ity eva saṃhṛṣṭo vipro vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:198.016c: agratas tu dvijaṃ kṛtvā sa jagāma gṛhān prati
GE07mbh_03_u:198.017b-1008_01: arghyeṇa ca sa vai tena vyādhena dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:198.018a: tataḥ sukhopaviṣṭas taṃ vyādhaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:198.018c: karmaitad vai na sadṛśaṃ bhavataḥ pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_03_u:198.018e: anutapye bhṛśaṃ tāta tava ghoreṇa karmaṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:198.019c: vartamānasya me dharme sve manyuṃ mā kṛthā dvija
GE07mbh_03_u:198.020a: dhātrā tu vihitaṃ pūrvaṃ karma svaṃ pālayāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:198.020c: prayatnāc ca gurū vṛddhau śuśrūṣe 'haṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_03_u:198.021a: satyaṃ vade nābhyasūye yathāśakti dadāmi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:198.022a: na kutsayāmy ahaṃ kiṃ cin na garhe balavattaram
GE07mbh_03_u:198.022c: kṛtam anveti kartāraṃ purā karma dvijottama
GE07mbh_03_u:198.023c: daṇḍanītis trayī vidyā tena lokā bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:198.024a: karma śūdre kṛṣir vaiśye saṃgrāmaḥ kṣatriye smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:198.024c: brahmacaryaṃ tapo mantrāḥ satyaṃ ca brāhmaṇe sadā
GE07mbh_03_u:198.025c: vikarmāṇaś ca ye ke cit tān yunakti svakarmasu

GE07mbh_03_u:204.011c: na cānyā vitathā buddhir dṛśyate sāṃprataṃ tava
GE07mbh_03_u:204.012c: tathā tvayā kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tadviśiṣṭaṃ ca putraka
GE07mbh_03_u:204.013a: tatas taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tābhyāṃ dharmavyādho nyavedayat
GE07mbh_03_u:204.013c: tau svāgatena taṃ vipram arcayām āsatus tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:204.014a: pratigṛhya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ dvijaḥ papraccha tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_03_u:204.014c: saputrābhyāṃ sabhṛtyābhyāṃ kaccid vāṃ kuśalaṃ gṛhe
GE07mbh_03_u:204.014e: anāmayaṃ ca vāṃ kaccit sadaiveha śarīrayoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:204.015a: kuśalaṃ no gṛhe vipra bhṛtyavarge ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:204.015c: kaccit tvam apy avighnena saṃprāpto bhagavann iha
GE07mbh_03_u:204.016a: bāḍham ity eva tau vipraḥ pratyuvāca mudānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:204.016c: dharmavyādhas tu taṃ vipram arthavad vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:204.017a: pitā mātā ca bhagavann etau me daivataṃ param
GE07mbh_03_u:204.017c: yad daivatebhyaḥ kartavyaṃ tad etābhyāṃ karomy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:204.018c: saṃpūjyāḥ sarvalokasya tathā vṛddhāv imau mama
GE07mbh_03_u:204.019c: kurvate tadvad etābhyāṃ karomy aham atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:204.020a: etau me paramaṃ brahman pitā mātā ca daivatam
GE07mbh_03_u:204.020c: etau puṣpaiḥ phalai ratnais toṣayāmi sadā dvija
GE07mbh_03_u:204.021a: etāv evāgnayo mahyaṃ yān vadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:204.021c: yajñā vedāś ca catvāraḥ sarvam etau mama dvija
GE07mbh_03_u:204.022a: etadarthaṃ mama prāṇā bhāryā putrāḥ suhṛjjanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:204.022c: saputradāraḥ śuśrūṣāṃ nityam eva karomy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:204.023a: svayaṃ ca snāpayāmy etau tathā pādau pradhāvaye
GE07mbh_03_u:204.024c: adharmeṇāpi saṃyuktaṃ priyam ābhyāṃ karomy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:204.025a: dharmam eva guruṃ jñātvā karomi dvijasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:204.025c: atandritaḥ sadā vipra śuśrūṣāṃ vai karomy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:204.026c: pitā mātāgnir ātmā ca guruś ca dvijasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:204.027a: eteṣu yas tu varteta samyag eva dvijottama
GE07mbh_03_u:204.027c: bhaveyur agnayas tasya paricīrṇās tu nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:204.027f-1041_01: kathitas te mayā vipra kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:205.001a: gurū nivedya viprāya tau mātāpitarāv ubhau
GE07mbh_03_u:205.001c: punar eva sa dharmātmā vyādho brāhmaṇam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:205.002c: yadartham ukto 'si tayā gacchasva mithilām iti
GE07mbh_03_u:205.003c: mithilāyāṃ vasan vyādhaḥ sa te dharmān pravakṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:205.004c: saṃsmṛtya vākyaṃ dharmajña guṇavān asi me mataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:205.005a: yat tadā tvaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha tayokto māṃ prati prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:205.005c: dṛṣṭam etat tayā samyag ekapatnyā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:205.006c: vākyaṃ ca śṛṇu me tāta yat te vakṣye hitaṃ dvija
GE07mbh_03_u:205.007a: tvayā vinikṛtā mātā pitā ca dvijasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:205.008a: tava śokena vṛddhau tāv andhau jātau tapasvinau
GE07mbh_03_u:205.008c: tau prasādayituṃ gaccha mā tvā dharmo 'tyagān mahān
GE07mbh_03_u:205.009a: tapasvī tvaṃ mahātmā ca dharme ca nirataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_03_u:205.009c: sarvam etad apārthaṃ te kṣipraṃ tau saṃprasādaya
GE07mbh_03_u:205.009d-1042_01: tau prasādya dvijaśreṣṭha yac chreyas tad avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:205.010a: śraddadhasva mama brahman nānyathā kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:205.010c: gamyatām adya viprarṣe śreyas te kathayāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:205.011a: yad etad uktaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ satyam asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_03_u:205.012a: daivatapratimo hi tvaṃ yas tvaṃ dharmam anuvrataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:205.012d-1043_01: mātāpitroḥ sakāśaṃ hi gatvā tvaṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:205.013a: atandritaḥ kuru kṣipraṃ mātāpitror hi pūjanam
GE07mbh_03_u:205.013c: ataḥ param ahaṃ dharmaṃ nānyaṃ paśyāmi kaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:205.014a: ihāham āgato diṣṭyā diṣṭyā me saṃgataṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:205.015a: eko narasahasreṣu dharmavid vidyate na vā
GE07mbh_03_u:205.015c: prīto 'smi tava satyena bhadraṃ te puruṣottama
GE07mbh_03_u:205.016c: bhavitavyam athaivaṃ ca yad dṛṣṭo 'si mayānagha
GE07mbh_03_u:205.017a: rājā yayātir dauhitraiḥ patitas tārito yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:205.017c: sadbhiḥ puruṣaśārdūla tathāhaṃ bhavatā tv iha
GE07mbh_03_u:205.019a: durjñeyaḥ śāśvato dharmaḥ śūdrayonau hi vartatā
GE07mbh_03_u:205.019c: na tvāṃ śūdram ahaṃ manye bhavitavyaṃ hi kāraṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:205.020a: etad icchāmi vijñātuṃ tattvena hi mahāmate
GE07mbh_03_u:205.020c: kāmayā brūhi me tathyaṃ sarvaṃ tvaṃ prayatātmavān
GE07mbh_03_u:205.021c: śṛṇu sarvam idaṃ vṛttaṃ pūrvadehe mamānagha
GE07mbh_03_u:205.022a: ahaṃ hi brāhmaṇaḥ pūrvam āsaṃ dvijavarātmaja
GE07mbh_03_u:205.023a: kaś cid rājā mama sakhā dhanurvedaparāyaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:205.023c: saṃsargād dhanuṣi śreṣṭhas tato 'ham abhavaṃ dvija
GE07mbh_03_u:205.024a: etasminn eva kāle tu mṛgayāṃ nirgato nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:205.024c: sahito yodhamukhyaiś ca mantribhiś ca susaṃvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:205.024e: tato 'bhyahan mṛgāṃs tatra subahūn āśramaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:205.025a: atha kṣiptaḥ śaro ghoro mayāpi dvijasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:205.025b-1044_01: tato mṛgān varāhāṃś ca mahiṣāṃś ca mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:205.025b-1044_03: tato 'ham api krīḍārthaṃ rājñaḥ priyahite rataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:205.025b-1044_04: varān nighnan varāhāṃś ca śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:205.025b-1044_06: vyacaraṃ dhanur ādāya mṛgahā lubdhako yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:205.025b-1044_08: mṛgasya vajrasaṃkāśaḥ śaraḥ kṣiptas tadā dvija
GE07mbh_03_u:205.026c: nāparādhyāmy ahaṃ kiṃ cit kena pāpam idaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:205.027a: manvānas taṃ mṛgaṃ cāhaṃ saṃprāptaḥ sahasā munim
GE07mbh_03_u:205.028a: akāryakaraṇāc cāpi bhṛśaṃ me vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:205.028c: ajānatā kṛtam idaṃ mayety atha tam abruvam
GE07mbh_03_u:205.028e: kṣantum arhasi me brahmann iti cokto mayā muniḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:205.029a: tataḥ pratyabravīd vākyam ṛṣir māṃ krodhamūrchitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:205.029c: vyādhas tvaṃ bhavitā krūra śūdrayonāv iti dvija
GE07mbh_03_u:206.002a: ajānatā mayākāryam idam adya kṛtaṃ mune
GE07mbh_03_u:206.002c: kṣantum arhasi tat sarvaṃ prasīda bhagavann iti
GE07mbh_03_u:206.003a: nānyathā bhavitā śāpa evam etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_03_u:206.003c: ānṛśaṃsyād ahaṃ kiṃ cit kartānugraham adya te
GE07mbh_03_u:206.004a: śūdrayonau vartamāno dharmajño bhavitā hy asi
GE07mbh_03_u:206.004c: mātāpitroś ca śuśrūṣāṃ kariṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:206.005c: jātismaraś ca bhavitā svargaṃ caiva gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:206.005d-1045_01: bhūtvā ca dhārmiko vyādhaḥ pitroḥ śuśrūṣaṇe rataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:206.006a: evaṃ śaptaḥ purā tena ṛṣiṇāsmy ugratejasā
GE07mbh_03_u:206.006c: prasādaś ca kṛtas tena mamaivaṃ dvipadāṃ vara
GE07mbh_03_u:206.007a: śaraṃ coddhṛtavān asmi tasya vai dvijasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:206.007c: āśramaṃ ca mayā nīto na ca prāṇair vyayujyata
GE07mbh_03_u:206.008a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathā mama purābhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:206.008c: abhitaś cāpi gantavyaṃ mayā svargaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_03_u:206.009a: evam etāni puruṣā duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:206.009e: duṣkaraṃ hi kṛtaṃ tāta jānatā jātim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:206.010a: karmadoṣaś ca vai vidvann ātmajātikṛtena vai
GE07mbh_03_u:206.010c: kaṃ cit kālaṃ mṛṣyatāṃ vai tato 'si bhavitā dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:206.010e: sāṃprataṃ ca mato me 'si brāhmaṇo nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:206.012a: yas tu śūdro dame satye dharme ca satatotthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:206.012c: taṃ brāhmaṇam ahaṃ manye vṛttena hi bhaved dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:206.013c: kṣīṇadoṣam ahaṃ manye cābhitas tvāṃ narottama
GE07mbh_03_u:206.014a: kartum arhasi notkaṇṭhāṃ tvadvidhā hy aviṣādinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:206.015a: prajñayā mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ hanyāc chārīram auṣadhaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:206.015c: etad vijñānasāmarthyaṃ na bālaiḥ samatāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_03_u:206.017a: guṇair bhūtāni yujyante viyujyante tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:206.017c: sarvāṇi naitad ekasya śokasthānaṃ hi vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:206.018c: tataś ca pratikurvanti yadi paśyanty upakramam
GE07mbh_03_u:206.018e: śocato na bhavet kiṃ cit kevalaṃ paritapyate
GE07mbh_03_u:206.019a: parityajanti ye duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vāpy ubhayaṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:206.019c: ta eva sukham edhante jñānatṛptā manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:206.020c: asaṃtoṣasya nāsty antas tuṣṭis tu paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_03_u:206.020e: na śocanti gatādhvānaḥ paśyantaḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_03_u:206.021a: na viṣāde manaḥ kāryaṃ viṣādo viṣam uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:206.022c: tejasā tasya hīnasya puruṣārtho na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:206.023c: na hi nirvedam āgamya kiṃ cit prāpnoti śobhanam
GE07mbh_03_u:206.025a: bhūteṣv abhāvaṃ saṃcintya ye tu buddheḥ paraṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:206.025c: na śocanti kṛtaprajñāḥ paśyantaḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_03_u:206.026a: na śocāmi ca vai vidvan kālākāṅkṣī sthito 'smy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:206.027a: kṛtaprajño 'si medhāvī buddhiś ca vipulā tava
GE07mbh_03_u:206.028a: āpṛcche tvāṃ svasti te 'stu dharmas tvā parirakṣatu
GE07mbh_03_u:206.028c: apramādas tu kartavyo dharme dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_03_u:206.029a: bāḍham ity eva taṃ vyādhaḥ kṛtāñjalir uvāca ha
GE07mbh_03_u:206.030a: sa tu gatvā dvijaḥ sarvāṃ śuśrūṣāṃ kṛtavāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:206.031a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ nikhilena yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:206.031c: pṛṣṭavān asi yaṃ tāta dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_03_u:206.032c: mātāpitroś ca śuśrūṣā vyādhe dharmaś ca kīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:206.034a: sukhaśravyatayā vidvan muhūrtam iva me gatam
GE07mbh_03_u:206.034c: na hi tṛpto 'smi bhagavañ śṛṇvāno dharmam uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:207.001c: punaḥ papraccha tam ṛṣiṃ mārkaṇḍeyaṃ tapasvinam
GE07mbh_03_u:207.002a: katham agnir vanaṃ yātaḥ kathaṃ cāpy aṅgirāḥ purā
GE07mbh_03_u:207.002c: naṣṭe 'gnau havyam avahad agnir bhūtvā mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:207.003a: agnir yadā tv eka eva bahutvaṃ cāsya karmasu
GE07mbh_03_u:207.003c: dṛśyate bhagavan sarvam etad icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_03_u:207.004a: kumāraś ca yathotpanno yathā cāgneḥ suto 'bhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:207.004c: yathā rudrāc ca saṃbhūto gaṅgāyāṃ kṛttikāsu ca
GE07mbh_03_u:207.005a: etad icchāmy ahaṃ tvattaḥ śrotuṃ bhārgavanandana
GE07mbh_03_u:207.005d-1047_01: vaktum arhasi me brahmann itihāsam imaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_03_u:207.006c: yathā kruddho hutavahas tapas taptuṃ vanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:207.007a: yathā ca bhagavān agniḥ svayam evāṅgirābhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:207.008c: tathā sa bhūtvā tu tadā jagat sarvaṃ prakāśayan
GE07mbh_03_u:207.009a: tapaś caraṃś ca hutabhuk saṃtaptas tasya tejasā
GE07mbh_03_u:207.009c: bhṛśaṃ glānaś ca tejasvī na sa kiṃ cit prajajñivān
GE07mbh_03_u:207.010e: agnitvaṃ vipranaṣṭaṃ hi tapyamānasya me tapaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:207.011a: katham agniḥ punar ahaṃ bhaveyam iti cintya saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:207.012a: sopāsarpac chanair bhītas tam uvāca tadāṅgirāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:207.012c: śīghram eva bhavasvāgnis tvaṃ punar lokabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:207.013a: tvam agne prathamaḥ sṛṣṭo brahmaṇā timirāpahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:207.014a: naṣṭakīrtir ahaṃ loke bhavāñ jāto hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:207.014c: bhavantam eva jñāsyanti pāvakaṃ na tu māṃ janāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:207.015a: nikṣipāmy aham agnitvaṃ tvam agniḥ prathamo bhava
GE07mbh_03_u:207.016c: māṃ ca deva kuruṣvāgne prathamaṃ putram añjasā
GE07mbh_03_u:207.017c: rājan bṛhaspatir nāma tasyāpy aṅgirasaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:207.018a: jñātvā prathamajaṃ taṃ tu vahner āṅgirasaṃ sutam
GE07mbh_03_u:207.018c: upetya devāḥ papracchuḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:207.019a: sa tu pṛṣṭas tadā devais tataḥ kāraṇam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:207.019c: pratyagṛhṇaṃs tu devāś ca tad vaco 'ṅgirasas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:207.020c: karmabhir bahubhiḥ khyātān nānātvaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv iha
GE07mbh_03_u:208.001a: brahmaṇo yas tṛtīyas tu putraḥ kurukulodvaha
GE07mbh_03_u:208.001c: tasyāpavasutā bhāryā prajās tasyāpi me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_03_u:208.004a: bhūtānām eva sarveṣāṃ yasyāṃ rāgas tadābhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:208.004c: rāgād rāgeti yām āhur dvitīyāṅgirasaḥ sutā
GE07mbh_03_u:208.006a: paśyaty arciṣmatī bhābhir havirbhiś ca haviṣmatī
GE07mbh_03_u:208.006c: ṣaṣṭhīm aṅgirasaḥ kanyāṃ puṇyām āhur haviṣmatīm
GE07mbh_03_u:208.008a: yāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā bhagavatīṃ janaḥ kuhukuhāyate
GE07mbh_03_u:208.008c: ekānaṃśeti yām āhuḥ kuhūm aṅgirasaḥ sutām
GE07mbh_03_u:209.001c: agnīn sājanayat puṇyān ṣaḍekāṃ cāpi putrikām
GE07mbh_03_u:209.002c: so 'gnir bṛhaspateḥ putraḥ śaṃyur nāma mahāprabhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:209.003c: dīpto jvālair anekābhair agnir eko 'tha vīryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:209.004a: śaṃyor apratimā bhāryā satyā satyā ca dharmajā
GE07mbh_03_u:209.004c: agnis tasya suto dīptas tisraḥ kanyāś ca suvratāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:209.005c: agnis tasya bharadvājaḥ prathamaḥ putra ucyate
GE07mbh_03_u:209.006c: bharato nāmataḥ so 'gnir dvitīyaḥ śaṃyutaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:209.007a: tisraḥ kanyā bhavanty anyā yāsāṃ sa bharataḥ patiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:209.007c: bharatas tu sutas tasya bharaty ekā ca putrikā
GE07mbh_03_u:209.009a: bharadvājasya bhāryā tu vīrā vīraś ca piṇḍadaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:209.009c: prāhur ājyena tasyejyāṃ somasyeva dvijāḥ śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:209.010a: haviṣā yo dvitīyena somena saha yujyate
GE07mbh_03_u:209.011a: sarayvāṃ janayat siddhiṃ bhānuṃ bhābhiḥ samāvṛṇot
GE07mbh_03_u:209.011c: āgneyam ānayan nityam āhvāneṣv eṣa kathyate
GE07mbh_03_u:209.012a: yas tu na cyavate nityaṃ yaśasā varcasā śriyā
GE07mbh_03_u:209.012c: agnir niścyavano nāma pṛthivīṃ stauti kevalam
GE07mbh_03_u:209.013a: vipāpmā kaluṣair mukto viśuddhaś cārciṣā jvalan
GE07mbh_03_u:209.014a: ākrośatāṃ hi bhūtānāṃ yaḥ karoti hi niṣkṛtim
GE07mbh_03_u:209.014c: agniḥ sa niṣkṛtir nāma śobhayaty abhisevitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:209.015c: tasya putraḥ svano nāma pāvakaḥ sa rujaskaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:209.016a: yas tu viśvasya jagato buddhim ākramya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_03_u:209.016c: taṃ prāhur adhyātmavido viśvajin nāma pāvakam
GE07mbh_03_u:209.017a: antarāgniḥ śrito yo hi bhuktaṃ pacati dehinām
GE07mbh_03_u:209.017c: sa yajñe viśvabhuṅ nāma sarvalokeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:209.019a: prathito gopatir nāma nadī yasyābhavat priyā

GE07mbh_03_u:213.047a: saṃspṛśann iva sarvās tāḥ śikhābhiḥ kāñcanaprabhāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:214.011c: rakṣobhiś ca piśācaiś ca raudrair bhūtagaṇais tathā

GE07mbh_03_u:214.020a: gṛhītaṃ tu dhanus tena vipulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam

GE07mbh_03_u:214.025a: dvābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ balavān gṛhītvā śaṅkham uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:214.026a: dvābhyāṃ bhujābhyām ākāśaṃ bahuśo nijaghāna saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:214.026c: krīḍan bhāti mahāsenas trīṃl lokān vadanaiḥ piban
GE07mbh_03_u:214.027e: sa paśyan vividhān bhāvāṃś cakāra ninadaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:214.028a: tasya taṃ ninadaṃ śrutvā nyapatan bahudhā janāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:214.028c: bhītāś codvignamanasas tam eva śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:214.029c: tān apy āhuḥ pāriṣadān brāhmaṇāḥ sumahābalān
GE07mbh_03_u:214.030a: sa tūtthāya mahābāhur upasāntvya ca tāñ janān
GE07mbh_03_u:214.030c: dhanur vikṛṣya vyasṛjad bāṇāñ śvete mahāgirau
GE07mbh_03_u:214.031a: bibheda sa śaraiḥ śailaṃ krauñcaṃ himavataḥ sutam
GE07mbh_03_u:214.031c: tena haṃsāś ca gṛdhrāś ca meruṃ gacchanti parvatam

GE07mbh_03_u:214.032c: tasmin nipatite tv anye neduḥ śailā bhṛśaṃ bhayāt
GE07mbh_03_u:214.032d-1062_01: ghoram ārtasvaraṃ sarve dṛṣṭvā krauñcaṃ vidāritam
GE07mbh_03_u:214.033a: sa taṃ nādaṃ bhṛśārtānāṃ śrutvāpi balināṃ varaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:214.034c: bibheda śikharaṃ ghoraṃ śvetasya tarasā gireḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:215.001-1063_03: strīpuṃsor viparītaṃ ca tathā dvaṃdvāni yāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:215.001-1063_04: grahā dīptā diśaḥ khaṃ ca rarāsa ca mahī bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:215.001-1064_01: ity etad vividhākāraṃ vṛttaṃ śuklasya pañcamīm

GE07mbh_03_u:215.002a: nivasanti vane ye tu tasmiṃś caitrarathe janāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:215.008a: viśvāmitras tu prathamaṃ kumāraṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:215.018d-1066_01: tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pātukāmaḥ stanān prabhuḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:215.023c: ramayām āsa śailasthaṃ bālaṃ krīḍanakair iva
GE07mbh_03_u:216.001a: grahāḥ sopagrahāś caiva ṛṣayo mātaras tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:216.002a: ete cānye ca bahavo ghorās tridivavāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:216.003d-1067_01: ādāya vajraṃ balavān sarvair devagaṇair vṛtaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:217.001e: ye haranti śiśūñ jātān garbhasthāṃś caiva dāruṇāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:217.014c: tatra yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ vṛttaṃ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ janādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:218.003a: tatas taṃ varadaṃ śūraṃ yuvānaṃ mṛṣṭakuṇḍalam

GE07mbh_03_u:218.011a: asūrye ca bhavet sūryas tathācandre ca candramāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:218.015a: balaṃ tavādbhutaṃ vīra tvaṃ devānām arīñ jahi
GE07mbh_03_u:218.015c: avajñāsyanti māṃ lokā vīryeṇa tava vismitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:218.016c: āvayoś ca mitho bhede prayatiṣyanty atandritāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:218.017a: bhedite ca tvayi vibho loko dvaidham upeṣyati

GE07mbh_03_u:218.019a: tvam eva rājā bhadraṃ te trailokyasya mamaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:218.019c: karomi kiṃ ca te śakra śāsanaṃ tad bravīhi me

GE07mbh_03_u:220.018a: airāvatasya ghaṇṭe dve vaijayantyāv iti śrute

GE07mbh_03_u:221.002a: sahasraṃ tasya siṃhānāṃ tasmin yuktaṃ rathottame
GE07mbh_03_u:221.004a: tasmin rathe paśupatiḥ sthito bhāty umayā saha
GE07mbh_03_u:221.004c: vidyutā sahitaḥ sūryaḥ sendracāpe ghane yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:221.005a: agratas tasya bhagavān dhaneśo guhyakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:221.006a: airāvataṃ samāsthāya śakraś cāpi suraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:221.007c: yāty amogho mahāyakṣo dakṣiṇaṃ pakṣam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.008c: gacchanti vasubhiḥ sārdhaṃ rudraiś ca saha saṃgatāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:221.010a: yamasya pṛṣṭhataś caiva ghoras triśikharaḥ śitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.010c: vijayo nāma rudrasya yāti śūlaḥ svalaṃkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.011c: parivārya śanair yāti yādobhir vividhair vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.013a: paṭṭiśaṃ tv anvagād rājaṃś chatraṃ raudraṃ mahāprabham

GE07mbh_03_u:221.015a: eṣāṃ tu pṛṣṭhato rudro vimale syandane sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.016a: ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca gandharvā bhujagās tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:221.016c: nadyo nadā drumāś caiva tathaivāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.017a: nakṣatrāṇi grahāś caiva devānāṃ śiśavaś ca ye
GE07mbh_03_u:221.017c: striyaś ca vividhākārā yānti rudrasya pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.018c: chatraṃ tu pāṇḍuraṃ somas tasya mūrdhany adhārayat
GE07mbh_03_u:221.018e: cāmare cāpi vāyuś ca gṛhītvāgniś ca viṣṭhitau
GE07mbh_03_u:221.019a: śakraś ca pṛṣṭhatas tasya yāti rājañ śriyā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.020c: sāvitryā saha sarvās tāḥ pārvatyā yānti pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.021a: tatra vidyāgaṇāḥ sarve ye ke cit kavibhiḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.021c: yasya kurvanti vacanaṃ sendrā devāś camūmukhe
GE07mbh_03_u:221.022a: sa gṛhītvā patākāṃ tu yāty agre rākṣaso grahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.022c: vyāpṛtas tu śmaśāne yo nityaṃ rudrasya vai sakhā
GE07mbh_03_u:221.023a: ebhiḥ sa sahitas tatra yayau devo yathāsukham
GE07mbh_03_u:221.023c: agrataḥ pṛṣṭhataś caiva na hi tasya gatir dhruvā
GE07mbh_03_u:221.024c: śivam ity eva yaṃ prāhur īśaṃ rudraṃ pinākinam
GE07mbh_03_u:221.024d-1084_01: evaṃ sarve suragaṇās tadā vai prītamānasāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.027c: yad anyad api me kāryaṃ deva tad vada māciram
GE07mbh_03_u:221.028a: kāryeṣv ahaṃ tvayā putra saṃdraṣṭavyaḥ sadaiva hi
GE07mbh_03_u:221.028c: darśanān mama bhaktyā ca śreyaḥ param avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:221.029b-1085_01: skandaṃ sahomayā prīto jvalantam iva tejasā
GE07mbh_03_u:221.030a: jajvāla khaṃ sanakṣatraṃ pramūḍhaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:221.030c: cacāla vyanadac corvī tamobhūtaṃ jagat prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:221.031a: tatas tad dāruṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣubhitaḥ śaṃkaras tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:221.031c: umā caiva mahābhāgā devāś ca samaharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.033a: tad dhi ghoram asaṃkhyeyaṃ garjac ca vividhā giraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.033c: abhyadravad raṇe devān bhagavantaṃ ca śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_03_u:221.034c: parvatāś ca śataghnyaś ca prāsāś ca parighā gadāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.035a: nipatadbhiś ca tair ghorair devānīkaṃ mahāyudhaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.035c: kṣaṇena vyadravat sarvaṃ vimukhaṃ cāpy adṛśyata
GE07mbh_03_u:221.036c: dānavair arditaṃ sainyaṃ devānāṃ vimukhaṃ babhau
GE07mbh_03_u:221.037a: asurair vadhyamānaṃ tat pāvakair iva kānanam
GE07mbh_03_u:221.039a: atha tad vidrutaṃ sainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā devaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.040a: bhayaṃ tyajata bhadraṃ vaḥ śūrāḥ śastrāṇi gṛhṇata
GE07mbh_03_u:221.040c: kurudhvaṃ vikrame buddhiṃ mā vaḥ kā cid vyathā bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:221.041c: abhidravata bhadraṃ vo mayā saha mahāsurān
GE07mbh_03_u:221.043a: tatas te tridaśāḥ sarve marutaś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.043c: pratyudyayur mahāvegāḥ sādhyāś ca vasubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:221.044a: tair visṛṣṭāny anīkeṣu kruddhaiḥ śastrāṇi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_03_u:221.045a: teṣāṃ dehān vinirbhidya śarās te niśitās tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:221.047a: tatas tad dānavaṃ sainyaṃ sarvair devagaṇair yudhi
GE07mbh_03_u:221.047c: trāsitaṃ vividhair bāṇaiḥ kṛtaṃ caiva parāṅmukham
GE07mbh_03_u:221.048a: athotkruṣṭaṃ tadā hṛṣṭaiḥ sarvair devair udāyudhaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.048c: saṃhatāni ca tūryāṇi tadā sarvāṇy anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.050c: tathā hi dānavā ghorā vinighnanti divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.051a: tatas tūryapraṇādāś ca bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.052c: dānavo mahiṣo nāma pragṛhya vipulaṃ girim
GE07mbh_03_u:221.053a: te taṃ ghanair ivādityaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃparivāritam
GE07mbh_03_u:221.054a: athābhidrutya mahiṣo devāṃś cikṣepa taṃ girim
GE07mbh_03_u:221.055a: atha tair dānavaiḥ sārdhaṃ mahiṣas trāsayan surān
GE07mbh_03_u:221.055c: abhyadravad raṇe tūrṇaṃ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgān iva
GE07mbh_03_u:221.056a: tam āpatantaṃ mahiṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sendrā divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.057a: tataḥ sa mahiṣaḥ kruddhas tūrṇaṃ rudrarathaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_03_u:221.058a: yadā rudrarathaṃ kruddho mahiṣaḥ sahasā gataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.058c: resatū rodasī gāḍhaṃ mumuhuś ca maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.059c: āsīc ca niścitaṃ teṣāṃ jitam asmābhir ity uta
GE07mbh_03_u:221.060a: tathābhūte tu bhagavān nāvadhīn mahiṣaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:221.060a-1087_03: daurātmyaṃ paśya putra tvaṃ dānavasya durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.060a-1087_04: jahi śīghraṃ durācāraṃ draṣṭum icchāmi te balam
GE07mbh_03_u:221.060a-1087_05: ity uktvā bhagavān skandaṃ pariṣvajya maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.060c: sasmāra ca tadā skandaṃ mṛtyuṃ tasya durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.061a: mahiṣo 'pi rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā raudraṃ rudrasya nānadat
GE07mbh_03_u:221.061c: devān saṃtrāsayaṃś cāpi daityāṃś cāpi praharṣayan
GE07mbh_03_u:221.062a: tatas tasmin bhaye ghore devānāṃ samupasthite
GE07mbh_03_u:221.062c: ājagāma mahāsenaḥ krodhāt sūrya iva jvalan
GE07mbh_03_u:221.064c: taṃ dṛṣṭvā daityasenā sā vyadravat sahasā raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:221.065a: sa cāpi tāṃ prajvalitāṃ mahiṣasya vidāriṇīm
GE07mbh_03_u:221.066a: sā muktābhyahanac chaktir mahiṣasya śiro mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:221.066d-1088_03: uttarāḥ kuravas tena gacchanty adya yathāsukham
GE07mbh_03_u:221.067a: kṣiptākṣiptā tu sā śaktir hatvā śatrūn sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.068c: śeṣā daityagaṇā ghorā bhītās trastā durāsadaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.069a: dānavān bhakṣayantas te prapibantaś ca śoṇitam
GE07mbh_03_u:221.070a: tamāṃsīva yathā sūryo vṛkṣān agnir ghanān khagaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.070c: tathā skando 'jayac chatrūn svena vīryeṇa kīrtimān
GE07mbh_03_u:221.072a: naṣṭaśatrur yadā skandaḥ prayātaś ca maheśvaram
GE07mbh_03_u:221.073c: devās tṛṇamayā yasya babhūvur jayatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_03_u:221.075c: ajeyas tvaṃ raṇe 'rīṇām umāpatir iva prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.076a: etat te prathamaṃ deva khyātaṃ karma bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:221.076c: triṣu lokeṣu kīrtiś ca tavākṣayyā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:221.076e: vaśagāś ca bhaviṣyanti surās tava surātmaja
GE07mbh_03_u:221.077a: mahāsenety evam uktvā nivṛttaḥ saha daivataiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.078a: gato bhadravaṭaṃ rudro nivṛttāś ca divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.078c: uktāś ca devā rudreṇa skandaṃ paśyata mām iva
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080a: skandasya ya idaṃ janma paṭhate susamāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080c: sa puṣṭim iha saṃprāpya skandasālokyatām iyāt yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0001: bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi nāmāny asya mahātmanaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0003: ity uktaḥ pāṇḍaveyena mahātmā ṛṣisaṃnidhau mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0005: āgneyaś caiva skandaś ca dīptakīrtir anāmayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0008: śiśuḥ śīghraḥ śuciś caṇḍo dīptavarṇaḥ śubhānanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0009: amoghas tv anagho raudraḥ priyaś candrānanas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0013: prabhur netā viśākhaś ca naigameyaḥ suduścaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0017: vāsudevapriyaś caiva priyaḥ priyakṛd eva tu
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0018: nāmāny etāni divyāni kārttikeyasya yaḥ paṭhet
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0019: svargaṃ kīrtiṃ dhanaṃ caiva sa labhen nātra saṃśayaḥ mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0030: saṃvatsaras tvam ṛtavaś ca ṣaḍ vai
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0052: sūkṣmaṃ tapas tat paramaṃ tvam eva
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0059: ataḥ paraṃ vedmi gatiṃ na te 'ham
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0060: skandasya ya idaṃ vipraḥ paṭhej janma samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0061: śrāvayed brāhmaṇebhyo yaḥ śṛṇuyād vā dvijeritam
GE07mbh_03_u:221.080d-022_0062: dhanam āyur yaśo dīptaṃ putrāñ śatrujayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:222.001c: draupadī satyabhāmā ca viviśāte tadā samam
GE07mbh_03_u:222.001d-1092_01: praviśya cāśramaṃ puṇyam ubhe te paramastriyau
GE07mbh_03_u:222.004e: kathaṃ ca vaśagās tubhyaṃ na kupyanti ca te śubhe
GE07mbh_03_u:222.005a: tava vaśyā hi satataṃ pāṇḍavāḥ priyadarśane
GE07mbh_03_u:222.005b-1093_01: na cānyonyam asūyante kathaṃ vā te sumadhyame
GE07mbh_03_u:222.005c: mukhaprekṣāś ca te sarve tattvam etad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_03_u:222.007c: yena kṛṣṇe bhaven nityaṃ mama kṛṣṇo vaśānugaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:222.010a: anupraśnaḥ saṃśayo vā naitat tvayy upapadyate
GE07mbh_03_u:222.010c: tathā hy upetā buddhyā tvaṃ kṛṣṇasya mahiṣī priyā
GE07mbh_03_u:222.012a: udvignasya kutaḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_03_u:222.012c: na jātu vaśago bhartā striyāḥ syān mantrakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_03_u:222.014a: jihvayā yāni puruṣas tvacā vāpy upasevate
GE07mbh_03_u:222.014c: tatra cūrṇāni dattāni hanyuḥ kṣipram asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_03_u:222.016a: pāpānugās tu pāpās tāḥ patīn upasṛjanty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:222.016c: na jātu vipriyaṃ bhartuḥ striyā kāryaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:222.017a: vartāmy ahaṃ tu yāṃ vṛttiṃ pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu
GE07mbh_03_u:222.017c: tāṃ sarvāṃ śṛṇu me satyāṃ satyabhāme yaśasvini
GE07mbh_03_u:222.022a: devo manuṣyo gandharvo yuvā cāpi svalaṃkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:222.022c: dravyavān abhirūpo vā na me 'nyaḥ puruṣo mataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:222.023c: na saṃviśāmi nāśnāmi sadā karmakareṣv api
GE07mbh_03_u:222.024a: kṣetrād vanād vā grāmād vā bhartāraṃ gṛham āgatam
GE07mbh_03_u:222.027a: anarme cāpi hasanaṃ dvāri sthānam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:222.027d-1094_01: niratāhaṃ sadā satye pāpānāṃ ca visarjane
GE07mbh_03_u:222.028e: sarvathā bhartṛrahitaṃ na mameṣṭaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:222.029a: yadā pravasate bhartā kuṭumbārthena kena cit
GE07mbh_03_u:222.030a: yac ca bhartā na pibati yac ca bhartā na khādati
GE07mbh_03_u:222.030c: yac ca nāśnāti me bhartā sarvaṃ tad varjayāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:222.032a: ye ca dharmāḥ kuṭumbeṣu śvaśrvā me kathitāḥ purā
GE07mbh_03_u:222.032e: mānyānāṃ mānasatkārā ye cānye viditā mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:222.033c: vinayān niyamāṃś cāpi sadā sarvātmanā śritā
GE07mbh_03_u:222.034c: āśīviṣān iva kruddhān patīn paricarāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:222.035a: patyāśrayo hi me dharmo mataḥ strīṇāṃ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:222.035c: sa devaḥ sā gatir nānyā tasya kā vipriyaṃ caret
GE07mbh_03_u:222.038a: nityam āryām ahaṃ kuntīṃ vīrasūṃ satyavādinīm
GE07mbh_03_u:222.039c: nāpi parivade cāhaṃ tāṃ pṛthāṃ pṛthivīsamām
GE07mbh_03_u:222.040a: aṣṭāv agre brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasrāṇi sma nityadā
GE07mbh_03_u:222.046a: tāsāṃ nāma ca rūpaṃ ca bhojanācchādanāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:222.046c: sarvāsām eva vedāhaṃ karma caiva kṛtākṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:222.049a: etad āsīt tadā rājño yan mahīṃ paryapālayat
GE07mbh_03_u:222.049c: yeṣāṃ saṃkhyāvidhiṃ caiva pradiśāmi śṛṇomi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:222.051a: sarvaṃ rājñaḥ samudayam āyaṃ ca vyayam eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:222.053a: tam ahaṃ bhāram āsaktam anādhṛṣyaṃ durātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:222.053c: sukhaṃ sarvaṃ parityajya rātryahāni ghaṭāmi vai
GE07mbh_03_u:222.054c: ekāhaṃ vedmi kośaṃ vai patīnāṃ dharmacāriṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:222.055c: ārādhayantyāḥ kauravyāṃs tulyā rātrir ahaś ca me
GE07mbh_03_u:222.056c: nityakālam ahaṃ satye etat saṃvananaṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:222.057a: etaj jānāmy ahaṃ kartuṃ bhartṛsaṃvananaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:222.057c: asatstrīṇāṃ samācāraṃ nāhaṃ kuryāṃ na kāmaye
GE07mbh_03_u:222.058a: tac chrutvā dharmasahitaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ kṛṣṇayā tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:223.001a: imaṃ tu te mārgam apetadoṣaṃ; vakṣyāmi cittagrahaṇāya bhartuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:223.001c: yasmin yathāvat sakhi vartamānā; bhartāram ācchetsyasi kāminībhyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:223.002a: naitādṛśaṃ daivatam asti satye; sarveṣu lokeṣu sadaivateṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:223.002c: yathā patis tasya hi sarvakāmā; labhyāḥ prasāde kupitaś ca hanyāt
GE07mbh_03_u:223.003a: tasmād apatyaṃ vividhāś ca bhogāḥ; śayyāsanāny adbhutadarśanāni
GE07mbh_03_u:223.003c: vastrāṇi mālyāni tathaiva gandhāḥ; svargaś ca loko viṣamā ca kīrtiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:223.004a: sukhaṃ sukheneha na jātu labhyaṃ; duḥkhena sādhvī labhate sukhāni
GE07mbh_03_u:223.004c: sā kṛṣṇam ārādhaya sauhṛdena; premṇā ca nityaṃ pratikarmaṇā ca
GE07mbh_03_u:223.005a: tathāśanaiś cārubhir agryamālyair; dākṣiṇyayogair vividhaiś ca gandhaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:223.005c: asyāḥ priyo 'smīti yathā viditvā; tvām eva saṃśliṣyati sarvabhāvaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:223.006a: śrutvā svaraṃ dvāragatasya bhartuḥ; pratyutthitā tiṣṭha gṛhasya madhye
GE07mbh_03_u:223.006c: dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭaṃ tvaritāsanena; pādyena caiva pratipūjaya tvam
GE07mbh_03_u:223.007a: saṃpreṣitāyām atha caiva dāsyām; utthāya sarvaṃ svayam eva kuryāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:223.007c: jānātu kṛṣṇas tava bhāvam etaṃ; sarvātmanā māṃ bhajatīti satye
GE07mbh_03_u:223.008a: tvatsaṃnidhau yat kathayet patis te; yady apy aguhyaṃ parirakṣitavyam
GE07mbh_03_u:223.008c: kā cit sapatnī tava vāsudevaṃ; pratyādiśet tena bhaved virāgaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:223.009a: priyāṃś ca raktāṃś ca hitāṃś ca bhartus; tān bhojayethā vividhair upāyaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:223.009c: dveṣyair apakṣair ahitaiś ca tasya; bhidyasva nityaṃ kuhakoddhataiś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:223.010a: madaṃ pramādaṃ puruṣeṣu hitvā; saṃyaccha bhāvaṃ pratigṛhya maunam
GE07mbh_03_u:223.010c: pradyumnasāmbāv api te kumārau; nopāsitavyau rahite kadā cit
GE07mbh_03_u:223.011a: mahākulīnābhir apāpikābhiḥ; strībhiḥ satībhis tava sakhyam astu
GE07mbh_03_u:223.011c: caṇḍāś ca śauṇḍāś ca mahāśanāś ca; caurāś ca duṣṭāś capalāś ca varjyāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:223.012a: etad yaśasyaṃ bhagavedanaṃ ca; svargyaṃ tathā śatrunibarhaṇaṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:224.002a: tatas taiḥ saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā yathāvan madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:224.002c: ārurukṣū rathaṃ satyām āhvayām āsa keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:224.004a: kṛṣṇe mā bhūt tavotkaṇṭhā mā vyathā mā prajāgaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:224.005a: na hy evaṃ śīlasaṃpannā naivaṃ pūjitalakṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:224.005c: prāpnuvanti ciraṃ kleśaṃ yathā tvam asitekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:224.006a: avaśyaṃ ca tvayā bhūmir iyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakā
GE07mbh_03_u:224.006c: bhartṛbhiḥ saha bhoktavyā nirdvaṃdveti śrutaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:224.008a: yās tāḥ pravrājamānāṃ tvāṃ prāhasan darpamohitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:224.008c: tāḥ kṣipraṃ hatasaṃkalpā drakṣyasi tvaṃ kurustriyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:224.009c: viddhi saṃprasthitān sarvāṃs tān kṛṣṇe yamasādanam
GE07mbh_03_u:224.009d-1097_01: ye ca tatra sthitā rājñi tatpakṣīyāḥ kṣitīśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:224.009d-1097_02: teṣāṃ kālaḥ kṣitīśānāṃ prāptaḥ kṛṣṇe durāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:224.010a: putras te prativindhyaś ca sutasomas tathā vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:224.010e: sahadevāc ca yo jātaḥ śrutasenas tavātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:224.011a: sarve kuśalino vīrāḥ kṛtāstrāś ca sutās tava
GE07mbh_03_u:224.011c: abhimanyur iva prītā dvāravatyāṃ ratā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:224.012a: tvam ivaiṣāṃ subhadrā ca prītyā sarvātmanā sthitā
GE07mbh_03_u:224.012d-1098_01: duḥkhitā tena duḥkhena sukhena sukhitā tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:224.014a: bhojanācchādane caiṣāṃ nityaṃ me śvaśuraḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:224.014e: tulyo hi praṇayas teṣāṃ pradyumnasya ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_03_u:224.015a: evamādi priyaṃ prītyā hṛdyam uktvā manonugam
GE07mbh_03_u:224.016c: āruroha rathaṃ śaureḥ satyabhāmā ca bhāminī
GE07mbh_03_u:224.017a: smayitvā tu yaduśreṣṭho draupadīṃ parisāntvya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:224.017c: upāvartya tataḥ śīghrair hayaiḥ prāyāt paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.001c: saras tad āsādya vanaṃ ca puṇyaṃ; tataḥ paraṃ kim akurvanta pārthāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.002a: saras tad āsādya tu pāṇḍuputrā; janaṃ samutsṛjya vidhāya caiṣām
GE07mbh_03_u:225.002c: vanāni ramyāṇy atha parvatāṃś ca; nadīpradeśāṃś ca tadā viceruḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.003a: tathā vane tān vasataḥ pravīrān; svādhyāyavantaś ca tapodhanāś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:225.003c: abhyāyayur vedavidaḥ purāṇās; tān pūjayām āsur atho narāgryāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.004a: tataḥ kadā cit kuśalaḥ kathāsu; vipro 'bhyagacchad bhuvi kauraveyān
GE07mbh_03_u:225.004c: sa taiḥ sametyātha yadṛcchayaiva; vaicitravīryaṃ nṛpam abhyagacchat
GE07mbh_03_u:225.005a: athopaviṣṭaḥ pratisatkṛtaś ca; vṛddhena rājñā kurusattamena
GE07mbh_03_u:225.005c: pracoditaḥ san kathayāṃ babhūva; dharmānilendraprabhavān yamau ca
GE07mbh_03_u:225.006a: kṛśāṃś ca vātātapakarśitāṅgān; duḥkhasya cograsya mukhe prapannān
GE07mbh_03_u:225.006c: tāṃ cāpy anāthām iva vīranāthāṃ; kṛṣṇāṃ parikleśaguṇena yuktām
GE07mbh_03_u:225.007a: tataḥ kathāṃ tasya niśamya rājā; vaicitravīryaḥ kṛpayābhitaptaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.007c: vane sthitān pārthivaputrapautrāñ; śrutvā tadā duḥkhanadīṃ prapannān
GE07mbh_03_u:225.008c: vācaṃ kathaṃ cit sthiratām upetya; tat sarvam ātmaprabhavaṃ vicintya
GE07mbh_03_u:225.009a: kathaṃ nu satyaḥ śucir āryavṛtto; jyeṣṭhaḥ sutānāṃ mama dharmarājaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.010a: prabodhyate māgadhasūtapūgair; nityaṃ stuvadbhiḥ svayam indrakalpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.010c: patatrisaṃghaiḥ sa jaghanyarātre; prabodhyate nūnam iḍātalasthaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.012a: tathārjunaḥ sukumāro manasvī; vaśe sthito dharmasutasya rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.012c: vidūyamānair iva sarvagātrair; dhruvaṃ na śete vasatīr amarṣāt
GE07mbh_03_u:225.013a: yamau ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca; bhīmaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sukhaviprayuktān
GE07mbh_03_u:225.013c: viniḥśvasan sarpa ivogratejā; dhruvaṃ na śete vasatīr amarṣāt
GE07mbh_03_u:225.014a: tathā yamau cāpy asukhau sukhārhau; samṛddharūpāv amarau divīva
GE07mbh_03_u:225.014c: prajāgarasthau dhruvam apraśāntau; dharmeṇa satyena ca vāryamāṇau
GE07mbh_03_u:225.015a: samīraṇenāpi samo balena; samīraṇasyaiva suto balīyān
GE07mbh_03_u:225.015c: sa dharmapāśena sitogratejā; dhruvaṃ viniḥśvasya sahaty amarṣam
GE07mbh_03_u:225.016a: sa cāpi bhūmau parivartamāno; vadhaṃ sutānāṃ mama kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.016c: satyena dharmeṇa ca vāryamāṇaḥ; kālaṃ pratīkṣaty adhiko raṇe 'nyaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.017a: ajātaśatrau tu jite nikṛtyā; duḥśāsano yat paruṣāṇy avocat
GE07mbh_03_u:225.017c: tāni praviṣṭāni vṛkodarāṅgaṃ; dahanti marmāgnir ivendhanāni
GE07mbh_03_u:225.018a: na pāpakaṃ dhyāsyati dharmaputro; dhanaṃjayaś cāpy anuvartate tam
GE07mbh_03_u:225.018c: araṇyavāsena vivardhate tu; bhīmasya kopo 'gnir ivānilena
GE07mbh_03_u:225.019a: sa tena kopena vidīryamāṇaḥ; karaṃ kareṇābhinipīḍya vīraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.019c: viniḥśvasaty uṣṇam atīva ghoraṃ; dahann ivemān mama putrapautrān
GE07mbh_03_u:225.020a: gāṇḍīvadhanvā ca vṛkodaraś ca; saṃrambhiṇāv antakakālakalpau
GE07mbh_03_u:225.020c: na śeṣayetāṃ yudhi śatrusenāṃ; śarān kirantāv aśaniprakāśān
GE07mbh_03_u:225.021a: duryodhanaḥ śakuniḥ sūtaputro; duḥśāsanaś cāpi sumandacetāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.021c: madhu prapaśyanti na tu prapātaṃ; vṛkodaraṃ caiva dhanaṃjayaṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:225.022a: śubhāśubhaṃ puruṣaḥ karma kṛtvā; pratīkṣate tasya phalaṃ sma kartā
GE07mbh_03_u:225.022c: sa tena yujyaty avaśaḥ phalena; mokṣaḥ kathaṃ syāt puruṣasya tasmāt
GE07mbh_03_u:225.023a: kṣetre sukṛṣṭe hy upite ca bīje; deve ca varṣaty ṛtukālayuktam
GE07mbh_03_u:225.023c: na syāt phalaṃ tasya kutaḥ prasiddhir; anyatra daivād iti cintayāmi
GE07mbh_03_u:225.024a: kṛtaṃ matākṣeṇa yathā na sādhu; sādhupravṛttena ca pāṇḍavena
GE07mbh_03_u:225.024c: mayā ca duṣputravaśānugena; yathā kurūṇām ayam antakālaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.025a: dhruvaṃ pravāsyaty asamīrito 'pi; dhruvaṃ prajāsyaty uta garbhiṇī yā
GE07mbh_03_u:225.025c: dhruvaṃ dinādau rajanīpraṇāśas; tathā kṣapādau ca dinapraṇāśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.026a: kriyeta kasmān na pare ca kuryur; vittaṃ na dadyuḥ puruṣāḥ kathaṃ cit
GE07mbh_03_u:225.026c: prāpyārthakālaṃ ca bhaved anarthaḥ; kathaṃ nu tat syād iti tat kutaḥ syāt
GE07mbh_03_u:225.027a: kathaṃ na bhidyeta na ca sraveta; na ca prasicyed iti rakṣitavyam
GE07mbh_03_u:225.027c: arakṣyamāṇaḥ śatadhā viśīryed; dhruvaṃ na nāśo 'sti kṛtasya loke
GE07mbh_03_u:225.028a: gato hy araṇyād api śakralokaṃ; dhanaṃjayaḥ paśyata vīryam asya
GE07mbh_03_u:225.028c: astrāṇi divyāni caturvidhāni; jñātvā punar lokam imaṃ prapannaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:225.029a: svargaṃ hi gatvā saśarīra eva; ko mānuṣaḥ punar āgantum icchet
GE07mbh_03_u:225.029c: anyatra kālopahatān anekān; samīkṣamāṇas tu kurūn mumūrṣūn
GE07mbh_03_u:225.030a: dhanurgrāhaś cārjunaḥ savyasācī; dhanuś ca tad gāṇḍivaṃ lokasāram
GE07mbh_03_u:225.030c: astrāṇi divyāni ca tāni tasya; trayasya tejaḥ prasaheta ko nu
GE07mbh_03_u:225.031a: niśamya tad vacanaṃ pārthivasya; duryodhano rahite saubalaś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:225.031c: abodhayat karṇam upetya sarvaṃ; sa cāpy ahṛṣṭo 'bhavad alpacetāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:226.001c: duryodhanam idaṃ kāle karṇo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:226.002a: pravrājya pāṇḍavān vīrān svena vīryeṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:226.002c: bhuṅkṣvemāṃ pṛthivīm eko divaṃ śambarahā yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:226.003c: kṛtāḥ karapradāḥ sarve rājānas te narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:226.004a: yā hi sā dīpyamāneva pāṇḍavān bhajate purā
GE07mbh_03_u:226.004c: sādya lakṣmīs tvayā rājann avāptā bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:226.006a: sā tu buddhibaleneyaṃ rājñas tasmād yudhiṣṭhirāt
GE07mbh_03_u:226.007c: śāsane 'dhiṣṭhitāḥ sarve kiṃ kurma iti vādinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:226.009a: vandyamāno dvijai rājan pūjyamānaś ca rājabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:226.009c: pauruṣād divi deveṣu bhrājase raśmivān iva
GE07mbh_03_u:226.010a: rudrair iva yamo rājā marudbhir iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:226.010c: kurubhis tvaṃ vṛto rājan bhāsi nakṣatrarāḍ iva
GE07mbh_03_u:226.011a: ye sma te nādriyante ''jñā nodvijante kadā ca na
GE07mbh_03_u:226.011c: paśyāmas tāñ śriyā hīnān pāṇḍavān vanavāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:226.012a: śrūyante hi mahārāja saro dvaitavanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:226.013a: sa prayāhi mahārāja śriyā paramayā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:226.013c: pratapan pāṇḍuputrāṃs tvaṃ raśmivān iva tejasā
GE07mbh_03_u:226.014a: sthito rājye cyutān rājyāc chriyā hīnāñ śriyā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:226.016a: yāṃ śriyaṃ suhṛdaś caiva durhṛdaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:226.016c: paśyanti puruṣe dīptāṃ sā samarthā bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:226.017c: jagatīsthān ivādristhaḥ kiṃ tataḥ paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_03_u:226.019a: kiṃ nu tasya sukhaṃ na syād āśrame yo dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_03_u:226.020c: paśyantv asukhitāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ sā ca nirvidyatāṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:226.020f-1102_01: dārāṇāṃ te śriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīptām adya janādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:226.021a: na tathā hi sabhāmadhye tasyā bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_03_u:226.021c: vaimanasyaṃ yathā dṛṣṭvā tava bhāryāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:226.022a: evam uktvā tu rājānaṃ karṇaḥ śakuninā saha
GE07mbh_03_u:227.001a: karṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:227.001c: hṛṣṭo bhūtvā punar dīna idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:227.002a: bravīṣi yad idaṃ karṇa sarvaṃ me manasi sthitam
GE07mbh_03_u:227.002c: na tv abhyanujñāṃ lapsyāmi gamane yatra pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:227.004c: evam apy āyatiṃ rakṣan nābhyanujñātum arhati
GE07mbh_03_u:227.005a: na hi dvaitavane kiṃ cid vidyate 'nyat prayojanam
GE07mbh_03_u:227.005c: utsādanam ṛte teṣāṃ vanasthānāṃ mama dviṣām
GE07mbh_03_u:227.006a: jānāsi hi yathā kṣattā dyūtakāla upasthite
GE07mbh_03_u:227.006c: abravīd yac ca māṃ tvāṃ ca saubalaṃ ca vacas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:227.007a: tāni pūrvāṇi vākyāni yac cānyat paridevitam
GE07mbh_03_u:227.008a: mamāpi hi mahān harṣo yad ahaṃ bhīmaphalgunau
GE07mbh_03_u:227.008c: kliṣṭāv araṇye paśyeyaṃ kṛṣṇayā sahitāv iti
GE07mbh_03_u:227.009a: na tathā prāpnuyāṃ prītim avāpya vasudhām api
GE07mbh_03_u:227.010a: kiṃ nu syād adhikaṃ tasmād yad ahaṃ drupadātmajām
GE07mbh_03_u:227.011a: yadi māṃ dharmarājaś ca bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:227.011c: yuktaṃ paramayā lakṣmyā paśyetāṃ jīvitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:227.012a: upāyaṃ na tu paśyāmi yena gacchema tad vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:227.013a: sa saubalena sahitas tathā duḥśāsanena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:227.013c: upāyaṃ paśya nipuṇaṃ yena gacchema tad vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:227.014a: aham apy adya niścitya gamanāyetarāya vā
GE07mbh_03_u:227.014c: kālyam eva gamiṣyāmi samīpaṃ pārthivasya ha
GE07mbh_03_u:227.015a: mayi tatropaviṣṭe tu bhīṣme ca kurusattame
GE07mbh_03_u:227.015c: upāyo yo bhaved dṛṣṭas taṃ brūyāḥ sahasaubalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:227.016a: tato bhīṣmasya rājñaś ca niśamya gamanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:227.017a: tathety uktvā tu te sarve jagmur āvasathān prati
GE07mbh_03_u:227.017c: vyuṣitāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu karṇo rājānam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_03_u:227.018a: tato duryodhanaṃ karṇaḥ prahasann idam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:227.020a: ucitaṃ hi sadā gantuṃ ghoṣayātrāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:227.020c: evaṃ ca tvāṃ pitā rājan samanujñātum arhati
GE07mbh_03_u:227.022c: anujñāsyati no rājā codayiṣyati cāpy uta
GE07mbh_03_u:227.024a: tataḥ prahasitāḥ sarve te 'nyonyasya talān daduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:227.024c: tad eva ca viniścitya dadṛśuḥ kurusattamam
GE07mbh_03_u:228.001c: pṛṣṭvā sukham atho rājñaḥ pṛṣṭvā rājñā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:228.002a: tatas tair vihitaḥ pūrvaṃ samaṅgo nāma ballavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:228.003a: anantaraṃ ca rādheyaḥ śakuniś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:228.005a: mṛgayā cocitā rājann asmin kāle sutasya te
GE07mbh_03_u:228.006a: mṛgayā śobhanā tāta gavāṃ ca samavekṣaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:228.006c: viśrambhas tu na gantavyo ballavānām iti smare
GE07mbh_03_u:228.007a: te tu tatra naravyāghrāḥ samīpa iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:228.007c: ato nābhyanujānāmi gamanaṃ tatra vaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_03_u:228.008a: chadmanā nirjitās te hi karśitāś ca mahāvane
GE07mbh_03_u:228.008c: taponityāś ca rādheya samarthāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:228.009a: dharmarājo na saṃkrudhyed bhīmasenas tv amarṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:228.009c: yajñasenasya duhitā teja eva tu kevalam
GE07mbh_03_u:228.010c: tato vinirdaheyus te tapasā hi samanvitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:228.012a: atha yūyaṃ bahutvāt tān ārabhadhvaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:228.012c: anāryaṃ paramaṃ tat syād aśakyaṃ tac ca me matam
GE07mbh_03_u:228.013c: divyāny astrāṇy avāpyātha tataḥ pratyāgato vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:228.014c: kiṃ punaḥ sa kṛtāstro 'dya na hanyād vo mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:228.015a: atha vā madvacaḥ śrutvā tatra yattā bhaviṣyatha
GE07mbh_03_u:228.016a: atha vā sainikāḥ ke cid apakuryur yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_03_u:228.016c: tad abuddhikṛtaṃ karma doṣam utpādayec ca vaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:228.017c: na svayaṃ tatra gamanaṃ rocaye tava bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:228.018a: dharmajñaḥ pāṇḍavo jyeṣṭhaḥ pratijñātaṃ ca saṃsadi
GE07mbh_03_u:228.019a: anuvṛttāś ca te sarve pāṇḍavā dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:228.019c: yudhiṣṭhiraś ca kaunteyo na naḥ kopaṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:228.020a: mṛgayāṃ caiva no gantum icchā saṃvardhate bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:228.020c: smāraṇaṃ ca cikīrṣāmo na tu pāṇḍavadarśanam
GE07mbh_03_u:228.021a: na cānāryasamācāraḥ kaś cit tatra bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:228.021c: na ca tatra gamiṣyāmo yatra teṣāṃ pratiśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:228.023a: anujñātas tu gāndhāriḥ karṇena sahitas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:228.024a: duḥśāsanena ca tathā saubalena ca devinā
GE07mbh_03_u:228.024c: saṃvṛto bhrātṛbhiś cānyaiḥ strībhiś cāpi sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:228.025a: taṃ niryāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ draṣṭuṃ dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:228.025c: paurāś cānuyayuḥ sarve sahadārā vanaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_03_u:228.026c: pattayo bahusāhasrā hayāś ca navatiḥ śatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:228.028a: tataḥ prayāṇe nṛpateḥ sumahān abhavat svanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:228.029c: prayāto vāhanaiḥ sarvais tato dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:229.001a: atha duryodhano rājā tatra tatra vane vasan
GE07mbh_03_u:229.001c: jagāma ghoṣān abhitas tatra cakre niveśanam
GE07mbh_03_u:229.003c: karṇasya śakuneś caiva bhrātṝṇāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:229.004a: dadarśa sa tadā gāvaḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:229.004c: aṅkair lakṣaiś ca tāḥ sarvā lakṣayām āsa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:229.005a: aṅkayām āsa vatsāṃś ca jajñe copasṛtās tv api

GE07mbh_03_u:240.023e: vinaṣṭe tvayi cāsmākaṃ pakṣo hīyeta kaurava

GE07mbh_03_u:240.024c: tvam asmākaṃ gatir nityaṃ devatānāṃ ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:240.025a: evam uktvā pariṣvajya daityās taṃ rājakuñjaram
GE07mbh_03_u:240.026a: sthirāṃ kṛtvā buddhim asya priyāṇy uktvā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:240.026c: gamyatām ity anujñāya jayam āpnuhi cety atha
GE07mbh_03_u:240.027a: tair visṛṣṭaṃ mahābāhuṃ kṛtyā saivānayat punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:240.027c: tam eva deśaṃ yatrāsau tadā prāyam upāviśat
GE07mbh_03_u:240.028a: pratinikṣipya taṃ vīraṃ kṛtyā samabhipūjya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:240.029a: gatāyām atha tasyāṃ tu rājā duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:240.029e: vijeṣyāmi raṇe pāṇḍūn iti tasyābhavan matiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:240.030c: amanyata vadhe yuktān samarthāṃś ca suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:240.031a: evam āśā dṛḍhā tasya dhārtarāṣṭrasya durmateḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:240.032c: arjunasya vadhe krūrām akarot sa matiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:240.034c: na tathā pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ snehavanto viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:240.034e: na cācacakṣe kasmai cid etad rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:240.035c: smayann ivāñjaliṃ kṛtvā pārthivaṃ hetumad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:240.036a: na mṛto jayate śatrūñ jīvan bhadrāṇi paśyati
GE07mbh_03_u:240.036c: mṛtasya bhadrāṇi kutaḥ kauraveya kuto jayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:240.036e: na kālo 'dya viṣādasya bhayasya maraṇasya vā
GE07mbh_03_u:240.037c: uttiṣṭha rājan kiṃ śeṣe kasmāc chocasi śatruhan
GE07mbh_03_u:240.037e: śatrūn pratāpya vīryeṇa sa kathaṃ martum icchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:240.038a: atha vā te bhayaṃ jātaṃ dṛṣṭvārjunaparākramam
GE07mbh_03_u:240.039c: ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ pārthān vaśaṃ tava janādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:240.040a: evam uktas tu karṇena daityānāṃ vacanāt tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:240.040e: daityānāṃ tad vacaḥ śrutvā hṛdi kṛtvā sthirāṃ matim
GE07mbh_03_u:240.043a: rathair nāgaiḥ padātaiś ca śuśubhe 'tīva saṃkulā
GE07mbh_03_u:240.045a: suyodhano yayāv agre śriyā paramayā jvalan
GE07mbh_03_u:240.045c: karṇena sārdhaṃ rājendra saubalena ca devinā
GE07mbh_03_u:240.046a: duḥśāsanādayaś cāsya bhrātaraḥ sarva eva te
GE07mbh_03_u:240.046b-1158_01: pratyudgatāś ca kurubhir nāgarair brāhmaṇair api
GE07mbh_03_u:240.047e: kālenālpena rājaṃs te viviśuḥ svapuraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:241.002a: karṇo vaikartanaś cāpi śakuniś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.002c: bhīṣmadroṇakṛpāś caiva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:241.003a: evaṃ gateṣu pārtheṣu visṛṣṭe ca suyodhane
GE07mbh_03_u:241.004a: uktaṃ tāta mayā pūrvaṃ gacchatas te tapovanam
GE07mbh_03_u:241.004c: gamanaṃ me na rucitaṃ tava tan na kṛtaṃ ca te
GE07mbh_03_u:241.005a: tataḥ prāptaṃ tvayā vīra grahaṇaṃ śatrubhir balāt
GE07mbh_03_u:241.005c: mokṣitaś cāsi dharmajñaiḥ pāṇḍavair na ca lajjase
GE07mbh_03_u:241.006a: pratyakṣaṃ tava gāndhāre sasainyasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:241.006f-1160_01: vyapayāt pṛṣṭhatas tasmāt prekṣamāṇaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.007a: dṛṣṭas te vikramaś caiva pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_03_u:241.008a: na cāpi pādabhāk karṇaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ nṛpottama
GE07mbh_03_u:241.008c: dhanurvede ca śaurye ca dharme vā dharmavatsala
GE07mbh_03_u:241.009a: tasya te 'haṃ kṣamaṃ manye pāṇḍavais tair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.010a: evam uktas tu bhīṣmeṇa dhārtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.012a: tāṃs tu saṃprasthitān dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmaḥ kurupitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.012c: lajjayā vrīḍito rājañ jagāma svaṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_03_u:241.013c: punar āgamya taṃ deśam amantrayata mantribhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.014a: kim asmākaṃ bhavec chreyaḥ kiṃ kāryam avaśiṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:241.014c: kathaṃ nu sukṛtaṃ ca syān mantrayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015a: duryodhana nibodhedaṃ yat tvā vakṣyāmi kaurava
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0001: bhīṣmo 'smān nindati sadā pāṇḍavāṃś ca praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0002: tvaddveṣāc ca mahābāho mamāpi dveṣṭum arhati
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0003: vigarhate ca māṃ nityaṃ tvatsamīpe nareśvara
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0004: so 'haṃ bhīṣmavacas tad vai na mṛṣyāmīha bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0006: pāṇḍavānāṃ yaśo rājaṃs tava nindāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0009: jitā ca pāṇḍavair bhūmiś caturbhir balaśālibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0010: tām ahaṃ te vijeṣyāmi eka eva na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0012: anindyaṃ nindate yo hi apraśaṃsyaṃ praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0013: sa paśyatu balaṃ me 'dya ātmānaṃ tu vigarhatu
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0014: anujānīhi māṃ rājan dhruvo hi vijayas tava
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0015: pratijānāmi te satyaṃ rājann āyudham ālabhe
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0016: tac chrutvā tu vaco rājan karṇasya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0017: prītyā paramayā yuktaḥ karṇam āha narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0018: dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya me tvaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0019: hiteṣu vartase nityaṃ saphalaṃ janma cādya me
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0021: tadā nirgaccha bhadraṃ te hy anuśādhi ca mām iti
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0022: evam uktas tadā karṇo dhārtarāṣṭreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0025: śubhe tithau muhūrte ca pūjyamāno dvijātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0026: maṅgalaiś ca śubhaiḥ snāto vāgbhiś cāpi prapūjitaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0028: tataḥ karṇo maheṣvāso balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0030: yuddhena mahatā cainaṃ cakre vīraṃ vaśānugam
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0031: suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ cāpi ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0032: karaṃ ca dāpayām āsa drupadaṃ nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0033: taṃ vinirjitya rājendra rājānas tasya ye 'nugāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0034: tān sarvān vaśagāṃś cakre karaṃ cainān adāpayat
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0035: athottarāṃ diśaṃ gatvā vaśe cakre narādhipān
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0036: bhagadattaṃ ca nirjitya rādheyo girim āruhat
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0038: prayayau ca diśaḥ sarvān nṛpatīn vaśam ānayat
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0039: sa haimavatikāñ jitvā karaṃ sarvān adāpayat
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0040: nepālaviṣaye ye ca rājānas tān avājayat
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0041: avatīrya tataḥ śailāt pūrvāṃ diśam abhidrutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0042: aṅgān vaṅgān kaliṅgāṃś ca śuṇḍikān mithilān atha
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0044: āvaśīrāṃś ca yodhyāṃś ca ahikṣatraṃ ca nirjayat
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0047: mohanaṃ pattanaṃ caiva tripurīṃ kosalāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0048: etān sarvān vinirjitya karam ādāya sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0049: dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya karṇo jitvā mahārathān
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0051: sa yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ kṛtvā rukmī provāca sūtajam
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0052: prīto 'smi tava rājendra vikrameṇa balena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0053: na te vighnaṃ kariṣyāmi pratijñāṃ samapālayam
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0054: prītyā cāhaṃ prayacchāmi hiraṇyaṃ yāvad icchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0055: sametya rukmiṇā karṇaḥ pāṇḍyaṃ śailaṃ ca so 'gamat
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0056: sa keralaṃ raṇe caiva nīlaṃ cāpi mahīpatim
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0058: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi nṛpān karān sarvān adāpayat
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0060: pārśvasthāṃś cāpi nṛpatīn vaśe cakre mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0061: āvantyāṃś ca vaśe kṛtvā sāmnā ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0062: vṛṣṇibhiḥ saha saṃgamya paścimām api nirjayat
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0063: vāruṇīṃ diśam āgamya yāvanān barbarāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0064: nṛpān paścimabhūmisthān dāpayām āsa vai karān
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0067: bhadrān rohitakāṃś caiva āgreyān mālavān api
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0068: gaṇān sarvān vinirjitya nītikṛt prahasann iva
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0071: evaṃ sa pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ vaśe kṛtvā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0076: āśrāvayac ca tat karma prīyamāṇo janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0077: yan na bhīṣmān na ca droṇān na kṛpān na ca bāhlikāt
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0078: prāptavān asmi bhadraṃ te tvattaḥ prāptaṃ mayā hi tat
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0079: bahunā ca kim uktena śṛṇu karṇa vaco mama
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0081: na hi te pāṇḍavāḥ sarve kalām arhanti ṣoḍaśīm
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0083: sa bhavān dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ taṃ gāndhārīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0084: paśya karṇa maheṣvāsa aditiṃ vajrabhṛd yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0085: tato halahalāśabdaḥ prādur āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0087: ke cid enaṃ praśaṃsanti nindanti sma tathāpare
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0088: tūṣṇīm āsaṃs tathā cānye nṛpās tatra janādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0089: evaṃ vijitya rājendra karṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0091: deśair uccāvacaiḥ pūrṇāṃ pattanair nagarair api
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0093: kālena nātidīrgheṇa vaśe kṛtvā tu pārthivān
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0094: akṣayaṃ dhanam ādāya sūtajo nṛpam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0095: praviśya ca gṛhaṃ rājann abhyantaram ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0097: putravac ca naravyāghra pādau jagrāha dharmavit
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0099: tadā prabhṛti rājā ca śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0100: jānate nirjitān pārthān karṇena yudhi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015b-024_0101: jitvā tu pṛthivīṃ rājan sūtaputro janādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:241.015c: śrutvā ca tat tathā sarvaṃ kartum arhasy ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:241.016c: tāṃ pālaya yathā śakro hataśatrur mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.017a: evam uktas tu karṇena karṇaṃ rājābravīt punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.017c: na kiṃ cid durlabhaṃ tasya yasya tvaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:241.018a: sahāyaś cānuraktaś ca madarthaṃ ca samudyataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.018c: abhiprāyas tu me kaś cit taṃ vai śṛṇu yathātatham
GE07mbh_03_u:241.019c: mama spṛhā samutpannā tāṃ saṃpādaya sūtaja
GE07mbh_03_u:241.020a: evam uktas tataḥ karṇo rājānam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:241.022c: kriyāṃ kurvantu te rājan yathāśāstram ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:241.024a: evam uktas tu karṇena dhārtarāṣṭro viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:241.025c: āhara tvaṃ mama kṛte yathānyāyaṃ yathākramam
GE07mbh_03_u:241.026a: sa evam ukto nṛpatim uvāca dvijapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.026b-1161_01: brāhmaṇaiḥ sahito dhīmān ye tatrāsan samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.026c: na sa śakyaḥ kratuśreṣṭho jīvamāne yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_03_u:241.027a: dīrghāyur jīvati ca vai dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ pitā tava
GE07mbh_03_u:241.027c: ataś cāpi viruddhas te kratur eṣa nṛpottama
GE07mbh_03_u:241.028a: asti tv anyan mahat satraṃ rājasūyasamaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:241.028c: tena tvaṃ yaja rājendra śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_03_u:241.029a: ya ime pṛthivīpālāḥ karadās tava pārthiva
GE07mbh_03_u:241.029c: te karān saṃprayacchantu suvarṇaṃ ca kṛtākṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:241.030a: tena te kriyatām adya lāṅgalaṃ nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:241.030c: yajñavāṭasya te bhūmiḥ kṛṣyatāṃ tena bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:241.032a: eṣa te vaiṣṇavo nāma yajñaḥ satpuruṣocitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.032c: etena neṣṭavān kaś cid ṛte viṣṇuṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_03_u:241.033c: asmākaṃ rocate caiva śreyaś ca tava bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:241.033e: avighnaś ca bhaved eṣa saphalā syāt spṛhā tava
GE07mbh_03_u:241.033f-1162_01: tasmād eṣa mahābāho tava yajñaḥ pravartatām
GE07mbh_03_u:241.034a: evam uktas tu tair viprair dhārtarāṣṭro mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.034c: karṇaṃ ca saubalaṃ caiva bhrātṝṃś caivedam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:241.035a: rocate me vacaḥ kṛtsnaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:241.035c: rocate yadi yuṣmākaṃ tan mā prabrūta māciram
GE07mbh_03_u:241.036a: evam uktās tu te sarve tathety ūcur narādhipam
GE07mbh_03_u:241.037c: yathoktaṃ ca nṛpaśreṣṭha kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ yathākramam
GE07mbh_03_u:242.001a: tatas tu śilpinaḥ sarve amātyapravarāś ca ha
GE07mbh_03_u:242.002a: sajjaṃ kratuvaraṃ rājan kālaprāptaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:242.002c: sauvarṇaṃ ca kṛtaṃ divyaṃ lāṅgalaṃ sumahādhanam
GE07mbh_03_u:242.003a: etac chrutvā nṛpaśreṣṭho dhārtarāṣṭro viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:242.005c: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇo gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_03_u:242.006a: nimantraṇārthaṃ dūtāṃś ca preṣayām āsa śīghragān
GE07mbh_03_u:242.006c: pārthivānāṃ ca rājendra brāhmaṇānāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:242.007a: tatra kaṃ cit prayātaṃ tu dūtaṃ duḥśāsano 'bravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:242.009c: tatra gacchanti rājāno brāhmaṇāś ca tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:242.010a: ahaṃ tu preṣito rājan kauraveṇa mahātmanā
GE07mbh_03_u:242.010e: mano 'bhilaṣitaṃ rājñas taṃ kratuṃ draṣṭum arhatha
GE07mbh_03_u:242.011a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā tac chrutvā dūtabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_03_u:242.012a: vayam apy upayāsyāmo na tv idānīṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:242.012c: samayaḥ paripālyo no yāvad varṣaṃ trayodaśam
GE07mbh_03_u:242.013c: tadā tu nṛpatir gantā dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:242.015c: āgantāras tadā smeti vācyas te sa suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:242.016a: śeṣās tu pāṇḍavā rājan naivocuḥ kiṃ cid apriyam
GE07mbh_03_u:242.018a: te tv arcitā yathāśāstraṃ yathāvarṇaṃ yathākramam
GE07mbh_03_u:242.018c: mudā paramayā yuktāḥ prītyā cāpi nareśvara
GE07mbh_03_u:242.019b-1163_01: prāptān sarvān nṛpān dṛṣṭvā dhārtarāṣṭro mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:242.020a: yathā sukhī janaḥ sarvaḥ kṣattaḥ syād annasaṃyutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:242.020c: tuṣyec ca yajñasadane tathā kṣipraṃ vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_03_u:242.021a: viduras tv evam ājñaptaḥ sarvavarṇān ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:242.022c: vāsobhir vividhaiś caiva yojayām āsa hṛṣṭavat
