GE07mbh_03_u:247.036a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi mudgala
GE07mbh_03_u:247.037a: etac chrutvā tu maudgalyo vākyaṃ vimamṛśe dhiyā
GE07mbh_03_u:247.037c: vimṛśya ca muniśreṣṭho devadūtam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_03_u:247.038a: devadūta namas te 'stu gaccha tāta yathāsukham
GE07mbh_03_u:247.038c: mahādoṣeṇa me kāryaṃ na svargeṇa sukhena vā
GE07mbh_03_u:247.039a: patanaṃ tan mahad duḥkhaṃ paritāpaḥ sudāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.039c: svargabhājaś cyavantīha tasmāt svargaṃ na kāmaye
GE07mbh_03_u:247.040a: yatra gatvā na śocanti na vyathanti calanti vā
GE07mbh_03_u:247.040c: tad ahaṃ sthānam atyantaṃ mārgayiṣyāmi kevalam mudgala uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:247.040d-1193_01: mahāntas tu amī doṣās tvayā svargasya devadūta uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:247.040d-1193_02: nirdoṣa eva yas tv anyo lokaṃ taṃ pravadasva me
GE07mbh_03_u:247.040d-1193_03: brahmaṇaḥ sadanād ūrdhvaṃ tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_03_u:247.040d-1193_04: śuddhaṃ sanātanaṃ jyotiḥ paraṃ brahmeti yad viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.040d-1193_05: na tatra vipra gacchanti puruṣā viṣayātmakāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.041a: ity uktvā sa munir vākyaṃ devadūtaṃ visṛjya tam
GE07mbh_03_u:247.043a: dhyānayogād balaṃ labdhvā prāpya carddhim anuttamām
GE07mbh_03_u:247.044a: tasmāt tvam api kaunteya na śokaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:247.044c: rājyāt sphītāt paribhraṣṭas tapasā tad avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:247.046c: varṣāt trayodaśād ūrdhvaṃ vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047a: evam uktvā sa bhagavān vyāsaḥ pāṇḍavanandanam
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047c: jagāma tapase dhīmān punar evāśramaṃ prati janamejaya uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0005: āraṇyānāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ ca māṃsair nānāvidhair api
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0008: duḥśāsanasya karṇasya śakuneś ca mate sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0009: etad ācakṣva bhagavan vaiśaṃpāyana pṛcchataḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0010: śrutvā teṣāṃ tathā vṛttiṃ nagare vasatām iva
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0019: vidhivat pūjayām āsa svayaṃ kiṃkaravat sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0020: ahāni kati cit tatra tasthau sa munisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0021: taṃ ca paryacarad rājā divārātram atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0024: ity uktvā gacchati snātuṃ pratyāgacchati vai cirāt
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0025: na bhokṣyāmy adya me nāsti kṣudhety uktvaity adarśanam
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0026: akasmād etya ca brūte bhojayāsmāṃs tvarānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0027: kadā cic ca niśīthe sa utthāya nikṛtau sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0028: pūrvavat kārayitvānnaṃ na bhuṅkte garhayan sma saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0029: vartamāne tathā tasmin yadā duryodhano nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0030: vikṛtiṃ naiti na krodhaṃ tadā tuṣṭo 'bhavan muniḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0032: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yat te manasi vartate
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0033: mayi prīte tu yad dharmyaṃ nālabhyaṃ vidyate tava
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0034: etac chrutvā vacas tasya maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0035: amanyata punar jātam ātmānaṃ sa suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0037: yācanīyaṃ munes tuṣṭād iti niścitya durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0039: śiṣyaiḥ saha mama brahman yathā jāto 'tithir bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0042: guṇavāñ śīlasaṃpannas tasya tvam atithir bhava
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0043: yadā ca rājaputrī sā sukumārī yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0044: bhojayitvā dvijān sarvān patīṃś ca varavarṇinī
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0045: viśrāntā ca svayaṃ bhuktvā sukhāsīnā bhaved yadā
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0046: tadā tvaṃ tatra gacchethā yady anugrāhyatā mayi
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0047: tathā kariṣye tvatprītyety evam uktvā suyodhanam
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0048: durvāsā api viprendro yathāgatam agāt tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0049: kṛtārtham iva cātmānaṃ tadā mene suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0050: kareṇa ca karaṃ gṛhya karṇasya mudito bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0051: karṇo 'pi bhrātṛsahitam ity uvāca nṛpaṃ mudā
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0052: diṣṭyā kāmaḥ susaṃvṛtto diṣṭyā kaurava vardhase
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0053: diṣṭyā te śatravo magnā dustare vyasanārṇave
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0055: svair eva te mahāpāpair gatā vai dustaraṃ tamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0056: itthaṃ te nikṛtiprajñā rājan duryodhanādayaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0057: hasantaḥ prītamanaso jagmuḥ svaṃ svaṃ niketanam
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0058: tataḥ kadā cid durvāsāḥ sukhāsīnāṃs tu pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0059: bhuktvā cāvasthitāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ jñātvā tasmin vane muniḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0061: dṛṣṭvāyāntaṃ tam atithiṃ sa ca rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0065: āhnikaṃ bhagavan kṛtvā śīghram ehīti cābravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0066: jagāma ca muniḥ so 'pi snātuṃ śiṣyaiḥ sahānaghaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0067: bhojayet saha śiṣyaṃ māṃ katham ity avicintayan
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0069: etasminn antare rājan draupadī yoṣitāṃ varā
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0071: sā cintayantī ca yadā nānnahetum avindata
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0077: ākūtīnāṃ ca cittīnāṃ pravartaka natāsmi te
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0080: sarvādhyakṣa parādhyakṣa tvām ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0084: tvam ādir anto bhūtānāṃ tvam eva ca parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0086: tvām evāhuḥ paraṃ bījaṃ nidhānaṃ sarvasaṃpadām
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0087: tvayā nāthena deveśa sarvāpadbhyo bhayaṃ na hi
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0088: duḥśāsanād ahaṃ pūrvaṃ sabhāyāṃ mocitā yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0089: tathaiva saṃkaṭād asmān mām uddhartum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0090: evaṃ stutas tadā devaḥ kṛṣṇayā bhaktavatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0092: pārśvasthāṃ śayane tyaktvā rukmiṇīṃ keśavaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0094: tatas taṃ draupadī dṛṣṭvā praṇamya parayā mudā
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0096: tatas tām abravīt kṛṣṇaḥ kṣudhito 'smi bhṛśāturaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0097: śīghraṃ bhojaya māṃ kṛṣṇe paścāt sarvaṃ kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0098: niśamya tadvacaḥ kṛṣṇā lajjitā vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0100: bhuktavaty asmy ahaṃ deva tasmād annaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0103: śīghraṃ gaccha mama sthālīm ānayitvā pradarśaya
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0104: iti nirbandhataḥ sthālīm ānāyya sa yadūdvahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0105: sthālyāḥ kaṇṭhe 'tha saṃlagnaṃ śākānnaṃ vīkṣya keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0107: viśvātmā prīyatāṃ devas tuṣṭaś cāstv iti yajñabhuk
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0115: rājñā hi kārayitvānnaṃ vayaṃ snātuṃ samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0116: ākaṇṭhatṛptā viprarṣe kiṃ svid bhuñjāmahe vayam durvāsā uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0117: vṛthā pākaḥ kṛto 'smābhis tatra kiṃ karavāmahe
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0123: śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca vratinas tapasi sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0125: kruddhās te nirdaheyur vai tūlarāśim ivānalaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0126: tata etān apṛṣṭvaiva śiṣyāḥ śīghraṃ palāyata
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0127: ity uktās te dvijāḥ sarve muninā guruṇā tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0128: pāṇḍavebhyo bhṛśaṃ bhītā dudruvus te diśo daśa
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0130: tīrtheṣv itas tatas tasyā vicacāra gaveṣayan
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0131: tatrasthebhyas tāpasebhyaḥ śrutvā tāṃś caiva vidrutān
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0137: iti cintāparān dṛṣṭvā niḥśvasanto muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0138: uvāca vacanaṃ śrīmān kṛṣṇaḥ pratyakṣatāṃ gataḥ śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0140: draupadyā cintitaḥ pārthā ahaṃ satvaram āgataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0141: na bhayaṃ vidyate tasmād ṛṣer durvāsaso 'lpakam
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0142: tejasā bhavatāṃ bhītaḥ pūrvam eva palāyitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0143: dharmanityās tu ye ke cin na te sīdanti karhi cit vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0144: āpṛcche vo gamiṣyāmi niyataṃ bhadram astu vaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0146: draupadyā sahitāḥ pārthās tam ūcur vigatajvarāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0147: tvayā nāthena govinda dustarām āpadaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0149: svasti sādhaya bhadraṃ te ity ājñāto yayau purīm
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0150: pāṇḍavāś ca mahābhāga draupadyā sahitāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:247.047d-025_0152: iti te 'bhihitaṃ rājan yat pṛṣṭo 'ham iha tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:248.003c: vijahrur indrapratimāḥ kaṃ cit kālam ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:248.004a: tatas te yaugapadyena yayuḥ sarve caturdiśam
GE07mbh_03_u:248.006a: tatas tu rājā sindhūnāṃ vārddhakṣatrir mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:248.007c: rājabhir bahubhiḥ sārdham upāyāt kāmyakaṃ ca saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:248.010a: apsarā devakanyā vā māyā vā devanirmitā
GE07mbh_03_u:248.010c: iti kṛtvāñjaliṃ sarve dadṛśus tām aninditām
GE07mbh_03_u:248.011a: tataḥ sa rājā sindhūnāṃ vārddhakṣatrir jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:248.012c: kasya tv eṣānavadyāṅgī yadi vāpi na mānuṣī
GE07mbh_03_u:248.013a: vivāhārtho na me kaś cid imāṃ dṛṣṭvātisundarīm
GE07mbh_03_u:248.013c: etām evāham ādāya gamiṣyāmi svam ālayam
GE07mbh_03_u:248.014a: gaccha jānīhi saumyaināṃ kasya kā ca kuto 'pi vā
GE07mbh_03_u:248.014c: kimartham āgatā subhrūr idaṃ kaṇṭakitaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:248.015a: api nāma varārohā mām eṣā lokasundarī
GE07mbh_03_u:248.016a: apy ahaṃ kṛtakāmaḥ syām imāṃ prāpya varastriyam
GE07mbh_03_u:248.016c: gaccha jānīhi ko nv asyā nātha ity eva koṭika
GE07mbh_03_u:248.017a: sa koṭikāśyas tac chrutvā rathāt praskandya kuṇḍalī
GE07mbh_03_u:248.017c: upetya papraccha tadā kroṣṭā vyāghravadhūm iva
GE07mbh_03_u:249.001a: kā tvaṃ kadambasya vinamya śākhām; ekāśrame tiṣṭhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:249.002a: atīva rūpeṇa samanvitā tvaṃ; na cāpy araṇyeṣu bibheṣi kiṃ nu
GE07mbh_03_u:249.002c: devī nu yakṣī yadi dānavī vā; varāpsarā daityavarāṅganā vā
GE07mbh_03_u:249.003c: yady eva rājño varuṇasya patnī; yamasya somasya dhaneśvarasya
GE07mbh_03_u:249.004a: dhātur vidhātuḥ savitur vibhor vā; śakrasya vā tvaṃ sadanāt prapannā
GE07mbh_03_u:249.004c: na hy eva naḥ pṛcchasi ye vayaṃ sma; na cāpi jānīma taveha nātham
GE07mbh_03_u:249.005a: vayaṃ hi mānaṃ tava vardhayantaḥ; pṛcchāma bhadre prabhavaṃ prabhuṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:249.005c: ācakṣva bandhūṃś ca patiṃ kulaṃ ca; tattvena yac ceha karoṣi kāryam
GE07mbh_03_u:249.006a: ahaṃ tu rājñaḥ surathasya putro; yaṃ koṭikāśyeti vidur manuṣyāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:249.006c: asau tu yas tiṣṭhati kāñcanāṅge; rathe huto 'gniś cayane yathaiva
GE07mbh_03_u:249.006e: trigartarājaḥ kamalāyatākṣi; kṣemaṃkaro nāma sa eṣa vīraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:249.007a: asmāt paras tv eṣa mahādhanuṣmān; putraḥ kuṇindādhipater variṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:249.008a: asau tu yaḥ puṣkariṇīsamīpe; śyāmo yuvā tiṣṭhati darśanīyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:249.008c: ikṣvākurājñaḥ subalasya putraḥ; sa eṣa hantā dviṣatāṃ sugātri
GE07mbh_03_u:249.009a: yasyānuyātraṃ dhvajinaḥ prayānti; sauvīrakā dvādaśa rājaputrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:249.009c: śoṇāśvayukteṣu ratheṣu sarve; makheṣu dīptā iva havyavāhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:249.010c: prabhaṃkaro 'tha bhramaro raviś ca; śūraḥ pratāpaḥ kuharaś ca nāma
GE07mbh_03_u:249.011a: yaṃ ṣaṭsahasrā rathino 'nuyānti; nāgā hayāś caiva padātinaś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:249.011c: jayadratho nāma yadi śrutas te; sauvīrarājaḥ subhage sa eṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:249.012c: sauvīravīrāḥ pravarā yuvāno; rājānam ete balino 'nuyānti
GE07mbh_03_u:249.013a: etaiḥ sahāyair upayāti rājā; marudgaṇair indra ivābhiguptaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:249.013c: ajānatāṃ khyāpaya naḥ sukeśi; kasyāsi bhāryā duhitā ca kasya
GE07mbh_03_u:250.001a: athābravīd draupadī rājaputrī; pṛṣṭā śibīnāṃ pravareṇa tena
GE07mbh_03_u:250.001c: avekṣya mandaṃ pravimucya śākhāṃ; saṃgṛhṇatī kauśikam uttarīyam
GE07mbh_03_u:250.002a: buddhyābhijānāmi narendraputra; na mādṛśī tvām abhibhāṣṭum arhā
GE07mbh_03_u:250.002c: na tveha vaktāsti taveha vākyam; anyo naro vāpy atha vāpi nārī
GE07mbh_03_u:250.003a: ekā hy ahaṃ saṃprati tena vācaṃ; dadāni vai bhadra nibodha cedam
GE07mbh_03_u:250.003c: ahaṃ hy araṇye katham ekam ekā; tvām ālapeyaṃ niratā svadharme
GE07mbh_03_u:250.004a: jānāmi ca tvāṃ surathasya putraṃ; yaṃ koṭikāśyeti vidur manuṣyāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:250.004c: tasmād ahaṃ śaibya tathaiva tubhyam; ākhyāmi bandhūn prati tan nibodha
GE07mbh_03_u:250.005a: apatyam asmi drupadasya rājñaḥ; kṛṣṇeti māṃ śaibya vidur manuṣyāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:250.005c: sāhaṃ vṛṇe pañca janān patitve; ye khāṇḍavaprasthagatāḥ śrutās te
GE07mbh_03_u:250.006a: yudhiṣṭhiro bhīmasenārjunau ca; mādryāś ca putrau puruṣapravīrau
GE07mbh_03_u:250.006c: te māṃ niveśyeha diśaś catasro; vibhajya pārthā mṛgayāṃ prayātāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:250.007a: prācīṃ rājā dakṣiṇāṃ bhīmaseno; jayaḥ pratīcīṃ yamajāv udīcīm
GE07mbh_03_u:250.007c: manye tu teṣāṃ rathasattamānāṃ; kālo 'bhitaḥ prāpta ihopayātum
GE07mbh_03_u:250.008a: saṃmānitā yāsyatha tair yatheṣṭaṃ; vimucya vāhān avagāhayadhvam
GE07mbh_03_u:250.008c: priyātithir dharmasuto mahātmā; prīto bhaviṣyaty abhivīkṣya yuṣmān
GE07mbh_03_u:250.009a: etāvad uktvā drupadātmajā sā; śaibyātmajaṃ candramukhī pratītā
GE07mbh_03_u:250.009c: viveśa tāṃ parṇakuṭīṃ praśastāṃ; saṃcintya teṣām atithisvadharmam
GE07mbh_03_u:251.001b-1197_01: yad uktaṃ kṛṣṇayā sārdhaṃ tat sarvaṃ pratyavedayat
GE07mbh_03_u:251.002a: yadā vācaṃ vyāharantyām asyāṃ me ramate manaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:251.003a: etāṃ dṛṣṭvā striyo me 'nyā yathā śākhāmṛgastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:251.003c: pratibhānti mahābāho satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_03_u:251.004a: darśanād eva hi manas tayā me 'pahṛtaṃ bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:251.004c: tāṃ samācakṣva kalyāṇīṃ yadi syāc chaibya mānuṣī
GE07mbh_03_u:251.005a: eṣā vai draupadī kṛṣṇā rājaputrī yaśasvinī

GE07mbh_03_u:252.011c: ṣaḍbhyo guṇebhyo 'bhyadhikā vihīnān; manyāmahe draupadi pāṇḍuputrān

GE07mbh_03_u:252.012c: āśaṃsa vā tvaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ vadantī; sauvīrarājasya punaḥ prasādam

GE07mbh_03_u:252.019a: gadāhastaṃ bhīmam abhidravantaṃ; mādrīputrau saṃpatantau diśaś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:252.019c: amarṣajaṃ krodhaviṣaṃ vamantau; dṛṣṭvā ciraṃ tāpam upaiṣyase 'dhama

GE07mbh_03_u:252.020c: tenādya satyena vaśīkṛtaṃ tvāṃ; draṣṭāsmi pārthaiḥ parikṛṣyamāṇam

GE07mbh_03_u:252.021c: samāgatāhaṃ hi kurupravīraiḥ; punar vanaṃ kāmyakam āgatā ca
GE07mbh_03_u:252.022a: sā tān anuprekṣya viśālanetrā; jighṛkṣamāṇān avabhartsayantī
GE07mbh_03_u:252.022c: provāca mā mā spṛśateti bhītā; dhaumyaṃ pracukrośa purohitaṃ sā
GE07mbh_03_u:252.023a: jagrāha tām uttaravastradeśe; jayadrathas taṃ samavākṣipat sā
GE07mbh_03_u:252.023c: tayā samākṣiptatanuḥ sa pāpaḥ; papāta śākhīva nikṛttamūlaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:252.026a: kṣudraṃ kṛtvā phalaṃ pāpaṃ prāpsyasi tvam asaṃśayam

GE07mbh_03_u:253.001a: tato diśaḥ saṃpravihṛtya pārthā; mṛgān varāhān mahiṣāṃś ca hatvā

GE07mbh_03_u:253.015a: athābravīc cārumukhaṃ pramṛjya; dhātreyikā sārathim indrasenam
GE07mbh_03_u:253.016a: tiṣṭhanti vartmāni navāny amūni; vṛkṣāś ca na mlānti tathaiva bhagnāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:253.019f-1208_02: grāmyo jano yadvad asau na nāśayet
GE07mbh_03_u:253.020a: mā vaḥ priyāyāḥ sunasaṃ sulocanaṃ; candraprabhācchaṃ vadanaṃ prasannam

GE07mbh_03_u:253.021a: bhadre tūṣṇīm āssva niyaccha vācaṃ; māsmatsakāśe paruṣāṇy avocaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:253.021c: rājāno vā yadi vā rājaputrā; balena mattā vañcanāṃ prāpnuvanti
GE07mbh_03_u:253.022a: etāvad uktvā prayayur hi śīghraṃ; tāny eva vartmāny anuvartamānāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:253.022c: muhur muhur vyālavad ucchvasanto; jyāṃ vikṣipantaś ca mahādhanurbhyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:253.023a: tato 'paśyaṃs tasya sainyasya reṇum; uddhūtaṃ vai vājikhurapraṇunnam

GE07mbh_03_u:254.002a: teṣāṃ dhvajāgrāṇy abhivīkṣya rājā; svayaṃ durātmā kurupuṃgavānām

GE07mbh_03_u:254.003a: āyāntīme pañca rathā mahānto; manye ca kṛṣṇe patayas tavaite
GE07mbh_03_u:254.003c: sā jānatī khyāpaya naḥ sukeśi; paraṃ paraṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ rathastham
GE07mbh_03_u:254.004a: kiṃ te jñātair mūḍha mahādhanurdharair; anāyuṣyaṃ karma kṛtvātighoram
GE07mbh_03_u:254.004c: ete vīrāḥ patayo me sametā; na vaḥ śeṣaḥ kaś cid ihāsti yuddhe
GE07mbh_03_u:254.005a: ākhyātavyaṃ tv eva sarvaṃ mumūrṣor; mayā tubhyaṃ pṛṣṭayā dharma eṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:254.005c: na me vyathā vidyate tvadbhayaṃ vā; saṃpaśyantyāḥ sānujaṃ dharmarājam
GE07mbh_03_u:254.006a: yasya dhvajāgre nadato mṛdaṅgau; nandopanandau madhurau yuktarūpau
GE07mbh_03_u:254.007a: ya eṣa jāmbūnadaśuddhagauraḥ; pracaṇḍaghoṇas tanur āyatākṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:254.007c: etaṃ kuruśreṣṭhatamaṃ vadanti; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ dharmasutaṃ patiṃ me
GE07mbh_03_u:254.008a: apy eṣa śatroḥ śaraṇāgatasya; dadyāt prāṇān dharmacārī nṛvīraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:254.008c: paraihy enaṃ mūḍha javena bhūtaye; tvam ātmanaḥ prāñjalir nyastaśastraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:254.009a: athāpy enaṃ paśyasi yaṃ rathasthaṃ; mahābhujaṃ śālam iva pravṛddham
GE07mbh_03_u:254.009c: saṃdaṣṭoṣṭhaṃ bhrukuṭīsaṃhatabhruvaṃ; vṛkodaro nāma patir mamaiṣaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:262.008c: akurvato 'smadvacanaṃ syān mṛtyur api te dhruvam

GE07mbh_03_u:262.009c: avaśyaṃ maraṇe prāpte kariṣyāmy asya yan matam

GE07mbh_03_u:262.011a: tam abravīd daśagrīvo gaccha sītāṃ pralobhaya
GE07mbh_03_u:262.012a: dhruvaṃ sītā samālakṣya tvāṃ rāmaṃ codayiṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:262.012c: apakrānte ca kākutsthe sītā vaśyā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:262.013a: tām ādāyāpaneṣyāmi tataḥ sa na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:262.013c: bhāryāviyogād durbuddhir etat sāhyaṃ kuruṣva me
GE07mbh_03_u:262.014a: ity evam ukto mārīcaḥ kṛtvodakam athātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:262.015c: cakratus tat tathā sarvam ubhau yat pūrvamantritam
GE07mbh_03_u:262.016a: rāvaṇas tu yatir bhūtvā muṇḍaḥ kuṇḍī tridaṇḍadhṛk
GE07mbh_03_u:262.016c: mṛgaś ca bhūtvā mārīcas taṃ deśam upajagmatuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:262.017c: codayām āsa tasyārthe sā rāmaṃ vidhicoditā
GE07mbh_03_u:262.018a: rāmas tasyāḥ priyaṃ kurvan dhanur ādāya satvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:262.019c: anvadhāvan mṛgaṃ rāmo rudras tārāmṛgaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:262.020a: so 'ntarhitaḥ punas tasya darśanaṃ rākṣaso vrajan
GE07mbh_03_u:262.020c: cakarṣa mahad adhvānaṃ rāmas taṃ bubudhe tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:262.022c: hā sīte lakṣmaṇety evaṃ cukrośārtasvareṇa ha
GE07mbh_03_u:262.023a: śuśrāva tasya vaidehī tatas tāṃ karuṇāṃ giram
GE07mbh_03_u:262.023c: sā prādravad yataḥ śabdas tām uvācātha lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:262.024a: alaṃ te śaṅkayā bhīru ko rāmaṃ viṣahiṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:262.024c: muhūrtād drakṣyase rāmam āgataṃ taṃ śucismite
GE07mbh_03_u:262.025a: ity uktvā sā prarudatī paryaśaṅkata devaram
GE07mbh_03_u:262.026a: sā taṃ paruṣam ārabdhā vaktuṃ sādhvī pativratā
GE07mbh_03_u:262.026c: naiṣa kālo bhaven mūḍha yaṃ tvaṃ prārthayase hṛdā
GE07mbh_03_u:262.027a: apy ahaṃ śastram ādāya hanyām ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_03_u:262.027c: pateyaṃ giriśṛṅgād vā viśeyaṃ vā hutāśanam
GE07mbh_03_u:262.027d-1253_01: pibeyaṃ vā viṣaṃ ghoraṃ tyajāmy ātmānam adya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:262.028a: rāmaṃ bhartāram utsṛjya na tv ahaṃ tvāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:262.029c: pidhāya karṇau sadvṛttaḥ prasthito yena rāghavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:262.029e: sa rāmasya padaṃ gṛhya prasasāra dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:262.031a: sā tam ālakṣya saṃprāptaṃ dharmajñā janakātmajā
GE07mbh_03_u:262.032a: avamanya sa tat sarvaṃ svarūpaṃ pratipadya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:262.033c: mama laṅkā purī nāmnā ramyā pāre mahodadheḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:262.034a: tatra tvaṃ varanārīṣu śobhiṣyasi mayā saha
GE07mbh_03_u:262.034c: bhāryā me bhava suśroṇi tāpasaṃ tyaja rāghavam
GE07mbh_03_u:262.035c: pidhāya karṇau suśroṇī maivam ity abravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:262.036b-1256_01: śuṣyet toyanidhau toyaṃ candraḥ śītāṃśutāṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_03_u:262.036b-1256_02: uṣṇāṃśutvam atho jahyād ādityo vahnir uṣṇatām
GE07mbh_03_u:262.036c: śaityam agnir iyān nāhaṃ tyajeyaṃ raghunandanam
GE07mbh_03_u:262.038a: kathaṃ hi pītvā mādhvīkaṃ pītvā ca madhumādhavīm
GE07mbh_03_u:262.038c: lobhaṃ sauvīrake kuryān nārī kā cid iti smare
GE07mbh_03_u:262.039a: iti sā taṃ samābhāṣya praviveśāśramaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:262.041a: tāṃ dadarśa tadā gṛdhro jaṭāyur girigocaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.002a: sa dadarśa tadā sītāṃ rāvaṇāṅkagatāṃ snuṣām
GE07mbh_03_u:263.003a: athainam abravīd gṛdhro muñca muñceti maithilīm
GE07mbh_03_u:263.003e: na hi me mokṣyase jīvan yadi notsṛjase vadhūm
GE07mbh_03_u:263.004a: uktvaivaṃ rākṣasendraṃ taṃ cakarta nakharair bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:263.004e: cakṣāra rudhiraṃ bhūri giriḥ prasravaṇair iva
GE07mbh_03_u:263.005c: khaḍgam ādāya ciccheda bhujau tasya patatriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.007a: yatra yatra tu vaidehī paśyaty āśramamaṇḍalam
GE07mbh_03_u:263.007c: saro vā saritaṃ vāpi tatra muñcati bhūṣaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:263.008c: tatra vāso mahad divyam utsasarja manasvinī
GE07mbh_03_u:263.009c: madhye supītaṃ pañcānāṃ vidyun meghāntare yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:263.009d-1261_01: evaṃ hṛtvā rāmapatnīṃ rāvaṇo 'gāt svakāṃ purīm
GE07mbh_03_u:263.010a: evaṃ hṛtāyāṃ vaidehyāṃ rāmo hatvā mahāmṛgam
GE07mbh_03_u:263.010c: nivṛtto dadṛśe dhīmān bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:263.011c: ity evaṃ bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā prāpto 'sīti vyagarhayat
GE07mbh_03_u:263.013a: garhayann eva rāmas tu tvaritas taṃ samāsadat
GE07mbh_03_u:263.013c: api jīvati vaidehī neti paśyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE07mbh_03_u:263.014a: tasya tat sarvam ācakhyau sītāyā lakṣmaṇo vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.014c: yad uktavaty asadṛśaṃ vaidehī paścimaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.015c: sa dadarśa tadā gṛdhraṃ nihataṃ parvatopamam
GE07mbh_03_u:263.016a: rākṣasaṃ śaṅkamānas tu vikṛṣya balavad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.017a: sa tāv uvāca tejasvī sahitau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE07mbh_03_u:263.017c: gṛdhrarājo 'smi bhadraṃ vāṃ sakhā daśarathasya ha
GE07mbh_03_u:263.018a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā saṃgṛhya dhanuṣī śubhe
GE07mbh_03_u:263.018c: ko 'yaṃ pitaram asmākaṃ nāmnāhety ūcatuś ca tau
GE07mbh_03_u:263.019a: tato dadṛśatus tau taṃ chinnapakṣadvayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:263.019c: tayoḥ śaśaṃsa gṛdhras tu sītārthe rāvaṇād vadham
GE07mbh_03_u:263.020a: apṛcchad rāghavo gṛdhraṃ rāvaṇaḥ kāṃ diśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.020c: tasya gṛdhraḥ śiraḥkampair ācacakṣe mamāra ca
GE07mbh_03_u:263.021a: dakṣiṇām iti kākutstho viditvāsya tad iṅgitam
GE07mbh_03_u:263.021c: saṃskāraṃ lambhayām āsa sakhāyaṃ pūjayan pituḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.021d-1262_01: aho dhanyaḥ subhāgyo 'sau jaṭāyur iti bhāratīm
GE07mbh_03_u:263.021d-1262_02: divi śṛṇvan gataḥ siddhiṃ siddhānām api durlabhām
GE07mbh_03_u:263.024a: vane mahati tasmiṃs tu rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE07mbh_03_u:263.024e: śabdaṃ ca ghoraṃ sattvānāṃ dāvāgner iva vardhataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.026a: yadṛcchayātha tad rakṣaḥ kare jagrāha lakṣmaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:263.026c: viṣādam agamat sadyaḥ saumitrir atha bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:263.027a: sa rāmam abhisaṃprekṣya kṛṣyate yena tanmukham
GE07mbh_03_u:263.027c: viṣaṇṇaś cābravīd rāmaṃ paśyāvasthām imāṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:263.028a: haraṇaṃ caiva vaidehyā mama cāyam upaplavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.028c: rājyabhraṃśaś ca bhavatas tātasya maraṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:263.029a: nāhaṃ tvāṃ saha vaidehyā sametaṃ kosalāgatam
GE07mbh_03_u:263.031a: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dhīmān vilalāpa sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.031c: tam uvācātha kākutsthaḥ saṃbhrameṣv apy asaṃbhramaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.032a: mā viṣīda naravyāghra naiṣa kaś cin mayi sthite
GE07mbh_03_u:263.032c: chindhy asya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ chinnaḥ savyo mayā bhujaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.033a: ity evaṃ vadatā tasya bhujo rāmeṇa pātitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.034c: saumitrir api saṃprekṣya bhrātaraṃ rāghavaṃ sthitam
GE07mbh_03_u:263.035a: punar abhyāhanat pārśve tad rakṣo lakṣmaṇo bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:263.035c: gatāsur apatad bhūmau kabandhaḥ sumahāṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.036c: dadṛśe divam āsthāya divi sūrya iva jvalan
GE07mbh_03_u:263.037a: papraccha rāmas taṃ vāgmī kas tvaṃ prabrūhi pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.037c: kāmayā kim idaṃ citram āścaryaṃ pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_03_u:263.039c: sugrīvam abhigacchasva sa te sāhyaṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:263.041a: saṃvasaty atra sugrīvaś caturbhiḥ sacivaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:263.041d-1264_01: tena tvaṃ saha saṃgamya duḥkhamūlaṃ nivedaya
GE07mbh_03_u:263.042a: etāvac chakyam asmābhir vaktuṃ draṣṭāsi jānakīm
GE07mbh_03_u:263.043a: ity uktvāntarhito divyaḥ puruṣaḥ sa mahāprabhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:263.043c: vismayaṃ jagmatuś cobhau tau vīrau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE07mbh_03_u:264.002c: sevyamāno vane tasmiñ jagāma manasā priyām
GE07mbh_03_u:264.003a: vilalāpa sa rājendras tatra kāntām anusmaran
GE07mbh_03_u:264.004a: na tvām evaṃvidho bhāvaḥ spraṣṭum arhati mānada
GE07mbh_03_u:264.005a: pravṛttir upalabdhā te vaidehyā rāvaṇasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:264.006c: mayi śiṣye ca bhṛtye ca sahāye ca samāśvasa
GE07mbh_03_u:264.007a: evaṃ bahuvidhair vākyair lakṣmaṇena sa rāghavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.008a: niṣevya vāri pampāyās tarpayitvā pitṝn api
GE07mbh_03_u:264.009c: giryagre vānarān pañca vīrau dadṛśatus tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:264.010a: sugrīvaḥ preṣayām āsa sacivaṃ vānaraṃ tayoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.011a: tena saṃbhāṣya pūrvaṃ tau sugrīvam abhijagmatuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.011c: sakhyaṃ vānararājena cakre rāmas tato nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:264.011d-1265_01: tataḥ sītāṃ hṛtāṃ śrutvā sugrīvo vālinā kṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:264.012a: tad vāso darśayām āsus tasya kārye nivedite
GE07mbh_03_u:264.014a: pratijajñe ca kākutsthaḥ samare vālino vadham
GE07mbh_03_u:264.014c: sugrīvaś cāpi vaidehyāḥ punar ānayanaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:264.015a: ity uktvā samayaṃ kṛtvā viśvāsya ca parasparam
GE07mbh_03_u:264.016c: nāsya tan mamṛṣe vālī taṃ tārā pratyaṣedhayat
GE07mbh_03_u:264.017a: yathā nadati sugrīvo balavān eṣa vānaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.017c: manye cāśrayavān prāpto na tvaṃ nirgantum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:264.018c: provāca vacanaṃ vāgmī tāṃ vānarapatiḥ patiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.020c: patim ity abravīt prājñā śṛṇu sarvaṃ kapīśvara
GE07mbh_03_u:264.021d-1266_01: śrūyate dāśarathī rāmo vane pitur anujñayā
GE07mbh_03_u:264.023a: maindaś ca dvividaś caiva hanūmāṃś cānilātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.025a: tasyās tad ākṣipya vaco hitam uktaṃ kapīśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.026a: tārāṃ paruṣam uktvā sa nirjagāma guhāmukhāt
GE07mbh_03_u:264.027a: asakṛt tvaṃ mayā mūḍha nirjito jīvitapriyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.027c: mukto jñātir iti jñātvā kā tvarā maraṇe punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.028a: ity uktaḥ prāha sugrīvo bhrātaraṃ hetumad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.028b-1267_01: ity uktas tu jahāsoccaiḥ sugrīvo bhrātaraṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:264.029a: hṛtadārasya me rājan hṛtarājyasya ca tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:264.029c: kiṃ nu jīvitasāmarthyam iti viddhi samāgatam
GE07mbh_03_u:264.030a: evam uktvā bahuvidhaṃ tatas tau saṃnipetatuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.031a: ubhau jaghnatur anyonyam ubhau bhūmau nipetatuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.031c: ubhau vavalgatuś citraṃ muṣṭibhiś ca nijaghnatuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.032c: śuśubhāte tadā vīrau puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau
GE07mbh_03_u:264.033a: na viśeṣas tayor yuddhe tadā kaś cana dṛśyate
GE07mbh_03_u:264.033b-1268_01: prajñānārthaṃ tadā rāmo niścitya manasā tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:264.033c: sugrīvasya tadā mālāṃ hanūmān kaṇṭha āsajat
GE07mbh_03_u:264.034a: sa mālayā tadā vīraḥ śuśubhe kaṇṭhasaktayā
GE07mbh_03_u:264.035a: kṛtacihnaṃ tu sugrīvaṃ rāmo dṛṣṭvā mahādhanuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.036a: visphāras tasya dhanuṣo yantrasyeva tadā babhau
GE07mbh_03_u:264.038a: garhayitvā sa kākutsthaṃ papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.038c: tārā dadarśa taṃ bhūmau tārāpatim iva cyutam
GE07mbh_03_u:264.040a: rāmas tu caturo māsān pṛṣṭhe mālyavataḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_03_u:264.043a: dideśa rākṣasīs tatra rakṣaṇe rākṣasādhipaḥ prāsāsiśūlaparaśumudgarālātadhāriṇīḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.046a: tās tu tām āyatāpāṅgīṃ piśācyo dāruṇasvanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.048a: ity evaṃ paribhartsantīs trāsyamānā punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.049a: āryāḥ khādata māṃ śīghraṃ na me lobho 'sti jīvite
GE07mbh_03_u:264.051a: na tv anyam abhigaccheyaṃ pumāṃsaṃ rāghavād ṛte
GE07mbh_03_u:264.051c: iti jānīta satyaṃ me kriyatāṃ yad anantaram
GE07mbh_03_u:264.052a: tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasyas tāḥ kharasvanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.052c: ākhyātuṃ rākṣasendrāya jagmus tat sarvam āditaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.053a: gatāsu tāsu sarvāsu trijaṭā nāma rākṣasī
GE07mbh_03_u:264.054a: sīte vakṣyāmi te kiṃ cid viśvāsaṃ kuru me sakhi
GE07mbh_03_u:264.054c: bhayaṃ te vyetu vāmoru śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_03_u:264.055c: sa rāmasya hitānveṣī tvadarthe hi sa māvadat
GE07mbh_03_u:264.056a: sītā madvacanād vācyā samāśvāsya prasādya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:264.056c: bhartā te kuśalī rāmo lakṣmaṇānugato balī
GE07mbh_03_u:264.057c: kṛtavān rāghavaḥ śrīmāṃs tvadarthe ca samudyataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.058a: mā ca te 'stu bhayaṃ bhīru rāvaṇāl lokagarhitāt
GE07mbh_03_u:264.059a: śapto hy eṣa purā pāpo vadhūṃ rambhāṃ parāmṛśan
GE07mbh_03_u:264.059c: na śakto vivaśāṃ nārīm upaitum ajitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.062a: dāruṇo hy eṣa duṣṭātmā kṣudrakarmā niśācaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.063c: mayā vināśaliṅgāni svapne dṛṣṭāni tasya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:264.064c: asakṛt kharayukte tu rathe nṛtyann iva sthitaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:264.068c: yaśasā pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ pūrayiṣyati te patiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.069c: lakṣmaṇaś ca mayā dṛṣṭo nirīkṣan sarvatodiśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.070c: asakṛt tvaṃ mayā dṛṣṭā gacchantī diśam uttarām
GE07mbh_03_u:264.071c: rāghaveṇa saha bhrātrā sīte tvam acirād iva
GE07mbh_03_u:264.072a: iti sā mṛgaśāvākṣī tac chrutvā trijaṭāvacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.073a: yāvad abhyāgatā raudrāḥ piśācyas tāḥ sudāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:264.073c: dadṛśus tāṃ trijaṭayā sahāsīnāṃ yathā purā
GE07mbh_03_u:265.006c: dadṛśe rohiṇīm etya śanaiścara iva grahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:265.007c: idam ity abravīd bālāṃ trastāṃ rauhīm ivābalām
GE07mbh_03_u:265.008a: sīte paryāptam etāvat kṛto bhartur anugrahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:265.008c: prasādaṃ kuru tanvaṅgi kriyatāṃ parikarma te
GE07mbh_03_u:265.010a: santi me devakanyāś ca rājarṣīṇāṃ tathāṅganāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:265.010c: santi dānavakanyāś ca daityānāṃ cāpi yoṣitaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:279.012a: anurūpo hi saṃyoge tvaṃ mamāhaṃ tavāpi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:279.012c: snuṣāṃ pratīccha me kanyāṃ bhāryāṃ satyavataḥ sutām
GE07mbh_03_u:279.013a: pūrvam evābhilaṣitaḥ saṃbandho me tvayā saha
GE07mbh_03_u:279.013c: bhraṣṭarājyas tv aham iti tata etad vicāritam
GE07mbh_03_u:279.014a: abhiprāyas tv ayaṃ yo me pūrvam evābhikāṅkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:279.014c: sa nirvartatu me 'dyaiva kāṅkṣito hy asi me 'tithiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:279.016a: dattvā tv aśvapatiḥ kanyāṃ yathārhaṃ ca paricchadam
GE07mbh_03_u:279.016c: yayau svam eva bhavanaṃ yuktaḥ paramayā mudā
GE07mbh_03_u:279.017a: satyavān api bhāryāṃ tāṃ labdhvā sarvaguṇānvitām
GE07mbh_03_u:279.017c: mumude sā ca taṃ labdhvā bhartāraṃ manasepsitam
GE07mbh_03_u:279.018c: jagṛhe valkalāny eva vastraṃ kāṣāyam eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:279.019a: paricārair guṇaiś caiva praśrayeṇa damena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:279.020c: śvaśuraṃ devakāryaiś ca vācaḥ saṃyamanena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:279.022a: evaṃ tatrāśrame teṣāṃ tadā nivasatāṃ satām
GE07mbh_03_u:279.022c: kālas tapasyatāṃ kaś cid aticakrāma bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:279.023a: sāvitryās tu śayānāyās tiṣṭhantyāś ca divāniśam
GE07mbh_03_u:279.023c: nāradena yad uktaṃ tad vākyaṃ manasi vartate
GE07mbh_03_u:279.023d-1315_01: tadā prabhṛti sāvitrī gaṇayām āsa vāsarān
GE07mbh_03_u:280.001a: tataḥ kāle bahutithe vyatikrānte kadā cana
GE07mbh_03_u:280.001c: prāptaḥ sa kālo martavyaṃ yatra satyavatā nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:280.002a: gaṇayantyāś ca sāvitryā divase divase gate
GE07mbh_03_u:280.002c: tad vākyaṃ nāradenoktaṃ vartate hṛdi nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:280.004a: taṃ śrutvā niyamaṃ duḥkhaṃ vadhvā duḥkhānvito nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:280.006a: na kāryas tāta saṃtāpaḥ pārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ vratam
GE07mbh_03_u:280.007a: vrataṃ bhindhīti vaktuṃ tvāṃ nāsmi śaktaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:280.010a: adya tad divasaṃ ceti hutvā dīptaṃ hutāśanam
GE07mbh_03_u:280.010d-1316_01: vrataṃ samāpya sāvitrī snātvā śuddhā yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_03_u:280.011a: tataḥ sarvān dvijān vṛddhāñ śvaśrūṃ śvaśuram eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:280.012a: avaidhavyāśiṣas te tu sāvitryarthaṃ hitāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:280.013c: manasā tā giraḥ sarvāḥ pratyagṛhṇāt tapasvinām
GE07mbh_03_u:280.014a: taṃ kālaṃ ca muhūrtaṃ ca pratīkṣantī nṛpātmajā
GE07mbh_03_u:280.015a: tatas tu śvaśrūśvaśurāv ūcatus tāṃ nṛpātmajām
GE07mbh_03_u:280.017c: eṣa me hṛdi saṃkalpaḥ samayaś ca kṛto mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:280.018c: skandhe paraśum ādāya satyavān prasthito vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:280.018c-1317_02: khanitraṃ satyavān gṛhya prasthitaś ca vanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:280.019a: sāvitrī tv āha bhartāraṃ naikas tvaṃ gantum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:280.019c: saha tvayāgamiṣyāmi na hi tvāṃ hātum utsahe
GE07mbh_03_u:280.020a: vanaṃ na gatapūrvaṃ te duḥkhaḥ panthāś ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_03_u:280.021a: upavāsān na me glānir nāsti cāpi pariśramaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:280.021c: gamane ca kṛtotsāhāṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ na mārhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:280.022a: yadi te gamanotsāhaḥ kariṣyāmi tava priyam
GE07mbh_03_u:280.022c: mama tv āmantraya gurūn na māṃ doṣaḥ spṛśed ayam
GE07mbh_03_u:280.023c: ayaṃ gacchati me bhartā phalāhāro mahāvanam
GE07mbh_03_u:280.024c: anena saha nirgantuṃ na hi me virahaḥ kṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:280.025c: na nivāryo nivāryaḥ syād anyathā prasthito vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:280.026a: saṃvatsaraḥ kiṃ cid ūno na niṣkrāntāham āśramāt
GE07mbh_03_u:280.026c: vanaṃ kusumitaṃ draṣṭuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_03_u:280.027a: yataḥ prabhṛti sāvitrī pitrā dattā snuṣā mama
GE07mbh_03_u:280.028a: tad eṣā labhatāṃ kāmaṃ yathābhilaṣitaṃ vadhūḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:280.028c: apramādaś ca kartavyaḥ putri satyavataḥ pathi
GE07mbh_03_u:280.031a: nadīḥ puṇyavahāś caiva puṣpitāṃś ca nagottamān
GE07mbh_03_u:280.032c: mṛtam eva hi taṃ mene kāle munivacaḥ smaran
GE07mbh_03_u:280.033c: dvidheva hṛdayaṃ kṛtvā taṃ ca kālam avekṣatī
GE07mbh_03_u:281.001a: atha bhāryāsahāyaḥ sa phalāny ādāya vīryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:281.001c: kaṭhinaṃ pūrayām āsa tataḥ kāṣṭhāny apāṭayat
GE07mbh_03_u:281.002a: tasya pāṭayataḥ kāṣṭhaṃ svedo vai samajāyata
GE07mbh_03_u:281.002c: vyāyāmena ca tenāsya jajñe śirasi vedanā
GE07mbh_03_u:281.004a: aṅgāni caiva sāvitri hṛdayaṃ dūyatīva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:281.005a: śūlair iva śiro viddham idaṃ saṃlakṣayāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:281.005c: tat svaptum icche kalyāṇi na sthātuṃ śaktir asti me
GE07mbh_03_u:281.005d-1318_01: bhramatīva diśaḥ sarvāś cakrārūḍhaṃ mano mama
GE07mbh_03_u:281.007c: taṃ muhūrtaṃ kṣaṇaṃ velāṃ divasaṃ ca yuyoja ha
GE07mbh_03_u:281.007d-1319_01: hanta prāptaḥ sa kālo 'yam iti cintāparā satī
GE07mbh_03_u:281.009c: sthitaṃ satyavataḥ pārśve nirīkṣantaṃ tam eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:281.010a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasotthāya bhartur nyasya śanaiḥ śiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.011a: daivataṃ tvābhijānāmi vapur etad dhy amānuṣam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.011c: kāmayā brūhi me deva kas tvaṃ kiṃ ca cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_03_u:281.012c: atas tvām abhibhāṣāmi viddhi māṃ tvaṃ śubhe yamam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.013a: ayaṃ te satyavān bhartā kṣīṇāyuḥ pārthivātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.013c: neṣyāmy enam ahaṃ baddhvā viddhy etan me cikīrṣitam sāvitry uvāca
GE07mbh_03_u:281.013d-1320_02: netuṃ kila bhavān kasmād āgato 'si svayaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:281.014a: ity uktvā pitṛrājas tāṃ bhagavān svaṃ cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.015c: nārho matpuruṣair netum ato 'smi svayam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.016a: tataḥ satyavataḥ kāyāt pāśabaddhaṃ vaśaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.018a: yamas tu taṃ tathā baddhvā prayāto dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.018d-1321_01: bhartuḥ śarīrarakṣāṃ ca vidhāya hi tapasvinī
GE07mbh_03_u:281.019c: kṛtaṃ bhartus tvayānṛṇyaṃ yāvad gamyaṃ gataṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:281.019d-1322_01: eṣa mārgo viśālākṣi na kenāpy anugamyate
GE07mbh_03_u:281.020a: yatra me nīyate bhartā svayaṃ vā yatra gacchati
GE07mbh_03_u:281.020c: mayāpi tatra gantavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.021a: tapasā guruvṛttyā ca bhartuḥ snehād vratena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:281.021c: tava caiva prasādena na me pratihatā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.022c: mitratāṃ ca puraskṛtya kiṃ cid vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_03_u:281.023a: nānātmavantas tu vane caranti; dharmaṃ ca vāsaṃ ca pariśramaṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:281.023c: vijñānato dharmam udāharanti; tasmāt santo dharmam āhuḥ pradhānam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.024a: ekasya dharmeṇa satāṃ matena; sarve sma taṃ mārgam anuprapannāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.024c: mā vai dvitīyaṃ mā tṛtīyaṃ ca vāñche; tasmāt santo dharmam āhuḥ pradhānam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.025c: varaṃ vṛṇīṣveha vināsya jīvitaṃ; dadāni te sarvam anindite varam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.026a: cyutaḥ svarājyād vanavāsam āśrito; vinaṣṭacakṣuḥ śvaśuro mamāśrame
GE07mbh_03_u:281.026c: sa labdhacakṣur balavān bhaven nṛpas; tava prasādāj jvalanārkasaṃnibhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.027a: dadāni te sarvam anindite varaṃ; yathā tvayoktaṃ bhavitā ca tat tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:281.027c: tavādhvanā glānim ivopalakṣaye; nivarta gacchasva na te śramo bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:281.028a: kutaḥ śramo bhartṛsamīpato hi me; yato hi bhartā mama sā gatir dhruvā
GE07mbh_03_u:281.028c: yataḥ patiṃ neṣyasi tatra me gatiḥ; sureśa bhūyaś ca vaco nibodha me
GE07mbh_03_u:281.029a: satāṃ sakṛt saṃgatam īpsitaṃ paraṃ; tataḥ paraṃ mitram iti pracakṣate
GE07mbh_03_u:281.029c: na cāphalaṃ satpuruṣeṇa saṃgataṃ; tataḥ satāṃ saṃnivaset samāgame
GE07mbh_03_u:281.030a: manonukūlaṃ budhabuddhivardhanaṃ; tvayāham ukto vacanaṃ hitāśrayam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.030c: vinā punaḥ satyavato 'sya jīvitaṃ; varaṃ dvitīyaṃ varayasva bhāmini
GE07mbh_03_u:281.031a: hṛtaṃ purā me śvaśurasya dhīmataḥ; svam eva rājyaṃ sa labheta pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.031c: jahyāt svadharmaṃ na ca me gurur yathā; dvitīyam etaṃ varayāmi te varam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.032a: svam eva rājyaṃ pratipatsyate 'cirān; na ca svadharmāt parihāsyate nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.032c: kṛtena kāmena mayā nṛpātmaje; nivarta gacchasva na te śramo bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:281.033a: prajās tvayemā niyamena saṃyatā; niyamya caitā nayase na kāmayā
GE07mbh_03_u:281.033c: ato yamatvaṃ tava deva viśrutaṃ; nibodha cemāṃ giram īritāṃ mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:281.034c: anugrahaś ca dānaṃ ca satāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.035c: santas tv evāpy amitreṣu dayāṃ prāpteṣu kurvate
GE07mbh_03_u:281.036a: pipāsitasyeva yathā bhavet payas; tathā tvayā vākyam idaṃ samīritam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.036c: vinā punaḥ satyavato 'sya jīvitaṃ; varaṃ vṛṇīṣveha śubhe yad icchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:281.037a: mamānapatyaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ pitā; bhavet pituḥ putraśataṃ mamaurasam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.037c: kulasya saṃtānakaraṃ ca yad bhavet; tṛtīyam etaṃ varayāmi te varam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.038a: kulasya saṃtānakaraṃ suvarcasaṃ; śataṃ sutānāṃ pitur astu te śubhe
GE07mbh_03_u:281.038c: kṛtena kāmena narādhipātmaje; nivarta dūraṃ hi pathas tvam āgatā
GE07mbh_03_u:281.039a: na dūram etan mama bhartṛsaṃnidhau; mano hi me dūrataraṃ pradhāvati
GE07mbh_03_u:281.039c: tathā vrajann eva giraṃ samudyatāṃ; mayocyamānāṃ śṛṇu bhūya eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:281.040a: vivasvatas tvaṃ tanayaḥ pratāpavāṃs; tato hi vaivasvata ucyase budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.040c: śamena dharmeṇa ca rañjitāḥ prajās; tatas taveheśvara dharmarājatā
GE07mbh_03_u:281.041a: ātmany api na viśvāsas tāvān bhavati satsu yaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.041c: tasmāt satsu viśeṣeṇa sarvaḥ praṇayam icchati
GE07mbh_03_u:281.042c: tasmāt satsu viśeṣeṇa viśvāsaṃ kurute janaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.043a: udāhṛtaṃ te vacanaṃ yad aṅgane; śubhe na tādṛk tvad ṛte śrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.043c: anena tuṣṭo 'smi vināsya jīvitaṃ; varaṃ caturthaṃ varayasva gaccha ca
GE07mbh_03_u:281.044a: mamātmajaṃ satyavatas tathaurasaṃ; bhaved ubhābhyām iha yat kulodvaham
GE07mbh_03_u:281.044c: śataṃ sutānāṃ balavīryaśālinām; idaṃ caturthaṃ varayāmi te varam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.045a: śataṃ sutānāṃ balavīryaśālināṃ; bhaviṣyati prītikaraṃ tavābale
GE07mbh_03_u:281.045c: pariśramas te na bhaven nṛpātmaje; nivarta dūraṃ hi pathas tvam āgatā
GE07mbh_03_u:281.046a: satāṃ sadā śāśvatī dharmavṛttiḥ; santo na sīdanti na ca vyathanti
GE07mbh_03_u:281.046c: satāṃ sadbhir nāphalaḥ saṃgamo 'sti; sadbhyo bhayaṃ nānuvartanti santaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.047a: santo hi satyena nayanti sūryaṃ; santo bhūmiṃ tapasā dhārayanti
GE07mbh_03_u:281.047c: santo gatir bhūtabhavyasya rājan; satāṃ madhye nāvasīdanti santaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.048a: āryajuṣṭam idaṃ vṛttam iti vijñāya śāśvatam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.049a: na ca prasādaḥ satpuruṣeṣu mogho; na cāpy artho naśyati nāpi mānaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.049c: yasmād etan niyataṃ satsu nityaṃ; tasmāt santo rakṣitāro bhavanti
GE07mbh_03_u:281.050a: yathā yathā bhāṣasi dharmasaṃhitaṃ; manonukūlaṃ supadaṃ mahārthavat
GE07mbh_03_u:281.050c: tathā tathā me tvayi bhaktir uttamā; varaṃ vṛṇīṣvāpratimaṃ yatavrate
GE07mbh_03_u:281.051a: na te 'pavargaḥ sukṛtād vinākṛtas; tathā yathānyeṣu mānada
GE07mbh_03_u:281.051c: varaṃ vṛṇe jīvatu satyavān ayaṃ; yathā mṛtā hy evam ahaṃ vinā patim
GE07mbh_03_u:281.052a: na kāmaye bhartṛvinākṛtā sukhaṃ; na kāmaye bhartṛvinākṛtā divam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.052c: na kāmaye bhartṛvinākṛtā śriyaṃ; na bhartṛhīnā vyavasāmi jīvitum
GE07mbh_03_u:281.053a: varātisargaḥ śataputratā mama; tvayaiva datto hriyate ca me patiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.053c: varaṃ vṛṇe jīvatu satyavān ayaṃ; tavaiva satyaṃ vacanaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:281.054a: tathety uktvā tu tān pāśān muktvā vaivasvato yamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.055a: eṣa bhadre mayā mukto bhartā te kulanandini
GE07mbh_03_u:281.055c: arogas tava neyaś ca siddhārthaś ca bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:281.056c: iṣṭvā yajñaiś ca dharmeṇa khyātiṃ loke gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:281.057c: te cāpi sarve rājānaḥ kṣatriyāḥ putrapautriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.058a: pituś ca te putraśataṃ bhavitā tava mātari
GE07mbh_03_u:281.059a: evaṃ tasyai varaṃ dattvā dharmarājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_03_u:281.059c: nivartayitvā sāvitrīṃ svam eva bhavanaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_03_u:281.060a: sāvitry api yame yāte bhartāraṃ pratilabhya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:281.060c: jagāma tatra yatrāsyā bhartuḥ śāvaṃ kalevaram
GE07mbh_03_u:281.061a: sā bhūmau prekṣya bhartāram upasṛtyopagūhya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:281.061c: utsaṅge śira āropya bhūmāv upaviveśa ha
GE07mbh_03_u:281.062a: saṃjñāṃ ca satyavāṃl labdhvā sāvitrīm abhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_03_u:281.062c: proṣyāgata iva premṇā punaḥ punar udīkṣya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:281.063c: kva cāsau puruṣaḥ śyāmo yo 'sau māṃ saṃcakarṣa ha
GE07mbh_03_u:281.064c: gataḥ sa bhagavān devaḥ prajāsaṃyamano yamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.065c: yadi śakyaṃ samuttiṣṭha vigāḍhāṃ paśya śarvarīm
GE07mbh_03_u:281.066c: diśaḥ sarvā vanāntāṃś ca nirīkṣyovāca satyavān
GE07mbh_03_u:281.067c: tataḥ pāṭayataḥ kāṣṭhaṃ śiraso me rujābhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:281.068c: tavotsaṅge prasupto 'ham iti sarvaṃ smare śubhe
GE07mbh_03_u:281.069c: tato 'paśyaṃ tamo ghoraṃ puruṣaṃ ca mahaujasam
GE07mbh_03_u:281.070a: tad yadi tvaṃ vijānāsi kiṃ tad brūhi sumadhyame
GE07mbh_03_u:281.070c: svapno me yadi vā dṛṣṭo yadi vā satyam eva tat
GE07mbh_03_u:281.071c: śvas te sarvaṃ yathāvṛttam ākhyāsyāmi nṛpātmaja
GE07mbh_03_u:281.072a: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te pitarau paśya suvrata
GE07mbh_03_u:281.072c: vigāḍhā rajanī ceyaṃ nivṛttaś ca divākaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.073c: śrūyante parṇaśabdāś ca mṛgāṇāṃ caratāṃ vane
GE07mbh_03_u:281.074c: āsthāya viruvanty ugrāḥ kampayantyo mano mama
GE07mbh_03_u:281.075c: na vijñāsyasi panthānaṃ gantuṃ caiva na śakṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:281.076a: asminn adya vane dagdhe śuṣkavṛkṣaḥ sthito jvalan
GE07mbh_03_u:281.076c: vāyunā dhamyamāno 'gnir dṛśyate 'tra kva cit kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:281.078c: na ca jñāsyasi panthānaṃ tamasā saṃvṛte vane
GE07mbh_03_u:281.079a: śvaḥ prabhāte vane dṛśye yāsyāvo 'numate tava
GE07mbh_03_u:281.079c: vasāveha kṣapām etāṃ rucitaṃ yadi te 'nagha
GE07mbh_03_u:281.080a: śirorujā nivṛttā me svasthāny aṅgāni lakṣaye
GE07mbh_03_u:281.081a: na kadā cid vikāle hi gatapūrvo mayāśramaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:281.081c: anāgatāyāṃ saṃdhyāyāṃ mātā me praruṇaddhi mām
GE07mbh_03_u:281.082a: divāpi mayi niṣkrānte saṃtapyete gurū mama

GE07mbh_03_u:281.099c: mama priyaṃ vā kartavyaṃ gacchasvāśramam antikāt

GE07mbh_03_u:282.016c: ācāreṇa ca saṃyuktā tathā jīvati satyavān
GE07mbh_03_u:282.017a: yathā dṛṣṭiḥ pravṛttā te sāvitryāś ca yathā vratam

GE07mbh_03_u:282.018a: yathā vadanti śāntāyāṃ diśi vai mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:282.020c: tāṃs tān vigaṇayann arthān avasthita ivābhavat
GE07mbh_03_u:282.021a: tato muhūrtāt sāvitrī bhartrā satyavatā saha
GE07mbh_03_u:282.021d-1332_01: dṛṣṭvā cotpatitāḥ sarve harṣaṃ jagmuś ca te dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:282.022a: putreṇa saṃgataṃ tvādya cakṣuṣmantaṃ nirīkṣya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:282.022c: sarve vayaṃ vai pṛcchāmo vṛddhiṃ te pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_03_u:282.023c: cakṣuṣaś cātmano lābhāt tribhir diṣṭyā vivardhase
GE07mbh_03_u:282.024a: sarvair asmābhir uktaṃ yat tathā tan nātra saṃśayaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:282.025a: tato 'gniṃ tatra saṃjvālya dvijās te sarva eva hi
GE07mbh_03_u:282.026a: śaibyā ca satyavāṃś caiva sāvitrī caikataḥ sthitāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:282.031a: suptaś cāhaṃ vedanayā ciram ity upalakṣaye
GE07mbh_03_u:282.031c: tāvat kālaṃ ca na mayā suptapūrvaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_03_u:282.032a: sarveṣām eva bhavatāṃ saṃtāpo mā bhaved iti
GE07mbh_03_u:282.033a: akasmāc cakṣuṣaḥ prāptir dyumatsenasya te pituḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:282.033c: nāsya tvaṃ kāraṇaṃ vettha sāvitrī vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_03_u:282.034a: śrotum icchāmi sāvitri tvaṃ hi vettha parāvaram
GE07mbh_03_u:282.034c: tvāṃ hi jānāmi sāvitri sāvitrīm iva tejasā
GE07mbh_03_u:282.035a: tvam atra hetuṃ jānīṣe tasmāt satyaṃ nirucyatām

GE07mbh_03_u:282.036a: evam etad yathā vettha saṃkalpo nānyathā hi vaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:282.036c: na ca kiṃ cid rahasyaṃ me śrūyatāṃ tathyam atra yat
GE07mbh_03_u:282.037a: mṛtyur me bhartur ākhyāto nāradena mahātmanā

GE07mbh_03_u:282.041a: caturvarṣaśatāyur me bhartā labdhaś ca satyavān

GE07mbh_03_u:282.042c: yathā vṛttaṃ sukhodarkam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahan mama

GE07mbh_03_u:283.007a: prayāhi rājan bhadraṃ te ghuṣṭas te nagare jayaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:284.003a: kiṃ nu tad viduṣāṃ śreṣṭha karṇaṃ prati mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_03_u:284.003c: āsīn na ca sa dharmātmā kathayām āsa kasya cit
GE07mbh_03_u:284.004a: ahaṃ te rājaśārdūla kathayāmi kathām imām
GE07mbh_03_u:284.005c: pāṇḍūnāṃ hitakṛc chakraḥ karṇaṃ bhikṣitum udyataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:284.008a: svapnānte niśi rājendra darśayām āsa raśmivān
GE07mbh_03_u:284.009a: brāhmaṇo vedavid bhūtvā sūryo yogād dhi rūpavān
GE07mbh_03_u:284.009c: hitārtham abravīt karṇaṃ sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:284.010a: karṇa madvacanaṃ tāta śṛṇu satyabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_03_u:284.012a: viditaṃ tena śīlaṃ te sarvasya jagatas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:284.012c: yathā tvaṃ bhikṣitaḥ sadbhir dadāsy eva na yācase
GE07mbh_03_u:284.013a: tvaṃ hi tāta dadāsy eva brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayācitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:284.013c: vittaṃ yac cānyad apy āhur na pratyākhyāsi karhi cit
GE07mbh_03_u:284.014a: taṃ tvām evaṃvidhaṃ jñātvā svayaṃ vai pākaśāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:284.015a: tasmai prayācamānāya na deye kuṇḍale tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:284.015c: anuneyaḥ paraṃ śaktyā śreya etad dhi te param
GE07mbh_03_u:284.016a: kuṇḍalārthe bruvaṃs tāta kāraṇair bahubhis tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:284.016c: anyair bahuvidhair vittaiḥ sa nivāryaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:284.017a: ratnaiḥ strībhis tathā bhogair dhanair bahuvidhair api
GE07mbh_03_u:284.018a: yadi dāsyasi karṇa tvaṃ sahaje kuṇḍale śubhe
GE07mbh_03_u:284.018c: āyuṣaḥ prakṣayaṃ gatvā mṛtyor vaśam upeṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:284.019a: kavacena ca saṃyuktaḥ kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca mānada
GE07mbh_03_u:284.019c: avadhyas tvaṃ raṇe 'rīṇām iti viddhi vaco mama
GE07mbh_03_u:284.020a: amṛtād utthitaṃ hy etad ubhayaṃ ratnasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_03_u:284.020c: tasmād rakṣyaṃ tvayā karṇa jīvitaṃ cet priyaṃ tava
GE07mbh_03_u:284.021a: ko mām evaṃ bhavān prāha darśayan sauhṛdaṃ param

GE07mbh_03_u:284.023c: pravaktādya hitānveṣī śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_03_u:284.024a: prasādaye tvāṃ varadaṃ praṇayāc ca bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:284.024c: na nivāryo vratād asmād ahaṃ yady asmi te priyaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:284.027c: na me kīrtiḥ praṇaśyeta triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā
GE07mbh_03_u:284.028c: yuktaṃ hi yaśasā yuktaṃ maraṇaṃ lokasaṃmatam
GE07mbh_03_u:284.029a: so 'ham indrāya dāsyāmi kuṇḍale saha varmaṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:284.030c: tan me kīrtikaraṃ loke tasyākīrtir bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:284.031a: vṛṇomi kīrtiṃ loke hi jīvitenāpi bhānuman
GE07mbh_03_u:284.031c: kīrtimān aśnute svargaṃ hīnakīrtis tu naśyati
GE07mbh_03_u:284.032a: kīrtir hi puruṣaṃ loke saṃjīvayati mātṛvat
GE07mbh_03_u:284.033a: ayaṃ purāṇaḥ śloko hi svayaṃ gīto vibhāvaso
GE07mbh_03_u:284.033c: dhātrā lokeśvara yathā kīrtir āyur narasya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:284.034a: puruṣasya pare loke kīrtir eva parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:284.034c: iha loke viśuddhā ca kīrtir āyurvivardhanī
GE07mbh_03_u:284.035a: so 'haṃ śarīraje dattvā kīrtiṃ prāpsyāmi śāśvatīm
GE07mbh_03_u:284.035c: dattvā ca vidhivad dānaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_03_u:284.036a: hutvā śarīraṃ saṃgrāme kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_03_u:284.036c: vijitya vā parān ājau yaśaḥ prāpsyāmi kevalam
GE07mbh_03_u:284.037c: vṛddhān bālān dvijātīṃś ca mokṣayitvā mahābhayāt
GE07mbh_03_u:284.038c: jīvitenāpi me rakṣyā kīrtis tad viddhi me vratam
GE07mbh_03_u:284.039a: so 'haṃ dattvā maghavate bhikṣām etām anuttamām
GE07mbh_03_u:284.039c: brāhmaṇacchadmine deva loke gantā parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_03_u:285.001a: māhitaṃ karṇa kārṣīs tvam ātmanaḥ suhṛdāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:285.001c: putrāṇām atha bhāryāṇām atho mātur atho pituḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:285.007e: mamāpi bhaktir utpannā sa tvaṃ kuru vaco mama
GE07mbh_03_u:285.008a: asti cātra paraṃ kiṃ cid adhyātmaṃ devanirmitam

GE07mbh_03_u:285.009c: tasmān nākhyāmi te guhyaṃ kāle vetsyati tad bhavān

GE07mbh_03_u:285.010c: māsmai te kuṇḍale dadyā bhikṣave vajrapāṇaye

GE07mbh_03_u:286.001a: bhagavantam ahaṃ bhakto yathā māṃ vettha gopate

GE07mbh_03_u:286.007c: vyetu saṃtāpajaṃ duḥkhaṃ tava bhāskara mānasam

GE07mbh_03_u:286.009a: idaṃ tvam anujānīhi suraśreṣṭha vrataṃ mama

GE07mbh_03_u:286.010a: yadi tāta dadāsy ete vajriṇe kuṇḍale śubhe

GE07mbh_03_u:286.012c: prārthayāno raṇe vatsa kuṇḍale te jihīrṣati

GE07mbh_03_u:287.010a: mama kanyā mahābrahman pṛthā nāma yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_03_u:287.010c: śīlavṛttānvitā sādhvī niyatā na ca māninī

GE07mbh_03_u:298.020d-1388_02: na tṛpyāmi naraśreṣṭha prayacchan vai varāṃs tava
GE07mbh_03_u:298.021a: tṛtīyaṃ gṛhyatāṃ putra varam apratimaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:298.021c: tvaṃ hi matprabhavo rājan viduraś ca mamāṃśabhāk
GE07mbh_03_u:298.022a: devadevo mayā dṛṣṭo bhavān sākṣāt sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:298.022c: yaṃ dadāsi varaṃ tuṣṭas taṃ grahīṣyāmy ahaṃ pitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:298.023a: jayeyaṃ lobhamohau ca krodhaṃ cāhaṃ sadā vibho
GE07mbh_03_u:298.023c: dāne tapasi satye ca mano me satataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:298.024c: bhavān dharmaḥ punaś caiva yathoktaṃ te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:298.026a: abhyetya cāśramaṃ vīrāḥ sarva eva gataklamāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:298.027a: idaṃ samutthānasamāgamaṃ mahat; pituś ca putrasya ca kīrtivardhanam
GE07mbh_03_u:298.027c: paṭhan naraḥ syād vijitendriyo vaśī; saputrapautraḥ śatavarṣabhāg bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:298.028a: na cāpy adharme na suhṛdvibhedane; parasvahāre paradāramarśane
GE07mbh_03_u:298.028c: kadaryabhāve na ramen manaḥ sadā; nṛṇāṃ sadākhyānam idaṃ vijānatām
GE07mbh_03_u:299.002a: ye tadbhaktā vasanti sma vanavāse tapasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:299.002c: tān abruvan mahātmānaḥ śiṣṭāḥ prāñjalayas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:299.003a: viditaṃ bhavatāṃ sarvaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrair yathā vayam
GE07mbh_03_u:299.003c: chadmanā hṛtarājyāś ca niḥsvāś ca bahuśaḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:299.004a: uṣitāś ca vane kṛcchraṃ yatra dvādaśa vatsarān
GE07mbh_03_u:299.004e: tad vatsyāmo vayaṃ channās tad anujñātum arhatha
GE07mbh_03_u:299.005a: suyodhanaś ca duṣṭātmā karṇaś ca sahasaubalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:299.005e: yuktācārāś ca yuktāś ca paurasya svajanasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:299.005f-1389_01: durātmanāṃ hi kas teṣāṃ viśvāsaṃ gantum arhati
GE07mbh_03_u:299.006a: api nas tad bhaved bhūyo yad vayaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:299.007a: ity uktvā duḥkhaśokārtaḥ śucir dharmasutas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:299.008a: tam athāśvāsayan sarve brāhmaṇā bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:299.008c: atha dhaumyo 'bravīd vākyaṃ mahārthaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:299.009a: rājan vidvān bhavān dāntaḥ satyasaṃdho jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:299.009c: naivaṃvidhāḥ pramuhyanti narāḥ kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE07mbh_03_u:299.010a: devair apy āpadaḥ prāptāś channaiś ca bahuśas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:299.013c: baler yathā hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ vikramais tac ca te śrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:299.014a: aurveṇa vasatā channam ūrau brahmarṣiṇā tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:299.014c: yatkṛtaṃ tāta lokeṣu tac ca sarvaṃ śrutaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:299.015c: vajraṃ praviśya śakrasya yatkṛtaṃ tac ca te śrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:299.016a: hutāśanena yac cāpaḥ praviśya channam āsatā
GE07mbh_03_u:299.016c: vibudhānāṃ kṛtaṃ karma tac ca sarvaṃ śrutaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:299.017c: nirdagdhāḥ śatravaḥ sarve vasatā bhuvi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:299.018a: viṣṇunā vasatā cāpi gṛhe daśarathasya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:299.019a: evam ete mahātmānaḥ pracchannās tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_03_u:299.019c: ajayañ śātravān yuddhe tathā tvam api jeṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:299.020c: śāstrabuddhyā svabuddhyā ca na cacāla yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:299.022c: dharmānugatayā buddhyā na kiṃ cit sāhasaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:299.023a: sahadevo mayā nityaṃ nakulaś ca nivāritau
GE07mbh_03_u:299.024a: na vayaṃ tat prahāsyāmo yasmin yokṣyati no bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:299.024c: bhavān vidhattāṃ tat sarvaṃ kṣipraṃ jeṣyāmahe parān
GE07mbh_03_u:299.025c: prayujyāpṛcchya bharatān yathāsvān svān yayur gṛhān
GE07mbh_03_u:299.026a: sarve vedavido mukhyā yatayo munayas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:299.027a: saha dhaumyena vidvāṃsas tathā te pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:299.027c: utthāya prayayur vīrāḥ kṛṣṇām ādāya bhārata
